## <a name="gx_accordion_menu_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1082">gx_accordion_menu_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1082">gx_accordion_menu_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1083">Skapa en dragspelsmeny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1083">Create an accordion menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1084">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1084">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_accordion_menu_create(
    GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    ULONG style ,
    USHORT accordion_menu_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1085">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1085">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1086">Den här tjänsten skapar en avtalsmeny som anges och bifogar överensstämmelsemenyn till den angivna överordnade widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1086">This service creates an accordion menu as specified and attaches the accordion menu to the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1087">En dragspelsmeny är en expanderande/komprimerad menyvisningswidget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1087">An accordion menu is anexpanding/collapsing menu display widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1088">Den accepterar alla typer av widget som underordnade menyalternativ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1088">It accepts all types of widget as its child menu items.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1089">Spelmenyer kan kapslas, vilket innebär att flera nivåer av menydjup kan skapas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1089">Accordion menus can be nested, meaning several levels of menu depth can be created.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1090">Om du vill infoga ett underordnat objekt i en widget för menyalternativ rekommenderar vi att du GX_MENU en widget som ett överordnat menyalternativ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1090">To insert a child item into a menu item widget, it’s recommended touse GX_MENU type widget as a parent menu item.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1091">Tips för att skapa en avtalsmeny på en nivå:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1091">Tips for creating a single level accordion menu:</span></span>

1.  <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1092">Skapa en avtalsmeny.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1092">Create an accordion menu.</span></span>

2.  <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1093">Koppla GX_MENU typwidgetar till avtalsmenyn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1093">Attach GX_MENU type widgets to the accordion menu.</span></span>

3.  <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1094">Koppla underordnade widgetar till den överordnade GX_MENU typ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1094">Attach child widgets to the GX_MENU type parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1095">Den underordnade objekttypen kan vara vilken GUIX-widgettyp som helst.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1095">The child item type can be any GUIX widget type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1096">Tips för att skapa en avtalsmeny på flera nivåer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1096">Tips for creating multi level accordion menu:</span></span>

1.  <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1097">Skapa en avtalsmeny.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1097">Create an accordion menu.</span></span>

2.  <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1098">Koppla GX_MENU typwidgetar till avtalsmenyn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1098">Attach GX_MENU type widgets to the accordion menu.</span></span>

3.  <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1099">Koppla GX_ACCORDION_MENU typwidget till den överordnade GX_MENU-typen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1099">Attach GX_ACCORDION_MENU type widget to the GX_MENU type parent.</span></span>

4.  <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1100">Koppla menyalternativ till den överordnade GX_ACCORDION_MENU enligt beskrivningen i skapa en avtalsmeny på en nivå.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1100">Attach menu items to the GX_ACCORDION_MENU type parent as described in the single level accordion menu creation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1101">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1101">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1102">**överensstämmelse** Pekare till kontrollblock för överspelningsmeny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1102">**accordion** Pointer to accordion menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1103">**namn** Namn på avtalsmenyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1103">**name** Name of the accordion menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1104">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1104">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1105">**style** Widgetens format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1105">**style** Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1106">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widgetspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1106">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1107">**accordion_menu_id** Programdefinierat ID för dragspelsmenyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1107">**accordion_menu_id** Application-defined ID of the accordion menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1108">**storlek** Storlek på dragspelsmenyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1108">**size** Size of the accordion menu</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1109">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1109">Return Values</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1117">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1117">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ACCORDION_MENU my_accordion;
GX_MENU menu_1;
GX_MENU item_1;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 100, 100, 300, 150);

status = gx_accordion_menu_create(&my_accordion, “my_accordion”,
                                  parent, GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                  MY_ACCORDION_ID, &size);

gx_menu_create(&menu_1, “menu_1”, &my_accordion,
               GX_STRING_ID_MENU_1, GX_ID_NONE,
               GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_TYLE_BORDER_THIN, 0, &size);

gx_menu_create(&item_1, “item_1”, &my_accordion,
               GX_STRING_ID_ITEM_1, GX_ID_NONE,
               GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN, 0, &size);

gx_text_offset_set(&item_1, 30, 0);

gx_menu_insert(&menu_1, &item_1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the accordion menu was successfully created. */

```

## <a name="gx_accordion_menu_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1129">gx_accordion_menu_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1129">gx_accordion_menu_draw</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_accordion_menu_draw(GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1132">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1132">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1133">Den här tjänsten ritar den angivna avtalsmenyn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1133">This service draws the specified accordion menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1134">Den här tjänsten anropas vanligtvis internt av GUIX-mekanismen för arbetsyteuppdatering, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till med implementeringen av anpassade ritningsfunktioner för anpassade dragningsmenywidgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1134">This service is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom accordion menu widgets.</span></span>

```C
VOID my_accordion_menu_draw(GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion)
{

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}

```

```C
    GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1155">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1155">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1156">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för den angivna överensstämmelsemenyn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1156">This service processes an event for the specified accordion menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1157">Den här tjänsten ska anropas som standardhändelsehanterare av alla anpassade funktioner för bearbetning av händelser i överensstämmelsemenyn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1157">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom accordion menu event processing functions.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1158">Den här tjänsten hanterar GX_EVENT_PEN_DOWN och GX_EVENT_PEN_UP händelser för att expandera/komprimera ett menyalternativ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1158">This service handles GX_EVENT_PEN_DOWN and GX_EVENT_PEN_UP events to expand/collaps a menu item.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1159">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1159">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1160">**överensstämmelse** Pekare till kontrollblock för dragspelsmeny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1160">**accordion** Pointer to accordion menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1161">**event_ptr** Pekare till den händelse som ska bearbetas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1161">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1162">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1162">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1163">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Händelseprocessen för en lyckad överensstämmelsemeny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1163">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful accordion menu event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1164">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1164">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1165">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1165">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1166">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1166">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1167">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1167">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1168">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1168">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic accordion menu event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_accordion_event_process( 
    GX_ACCORDION_MENU *accordion,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default accordion menu
            event processing */
        status =
        gx_accordion_menu_event_process(accordion, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}

```

## <a name="gx_animation_canvas_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1205">gx_animation_canvas_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1205">gx_animation_canvas_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1206">Ge arbetsytans minne till en animeringskontrollant</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1206">Provide canvas memory to an animation controller</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1207">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1207">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_canvas_define(
    GX_ANIMATION *animation, 
    GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1208">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1208">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1209">Den här tjänsten tillhandahåller en minnesarbetsyta till en animeringskontrollant som används för att implementera animeringssekvensen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1209">This service provides a memory canvas to an animation controller used to implement the animation sequence.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1210">Den här tillhandahållna arbetsytan bör vara tillräckligt stor för att rymma animeringsmålwidgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1210">This provided canvas should be large enough to hold the animation target widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1211">När en animeringsarbetsyta definieras ritas målwidgeten en gång till den här animeringsarbetsytan och skärmens dra- eller toning-effekt uppnås genom att ändra arbetsytans förskjutning och/eller arbetsytans alfavärde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1211">When an animation canvas is defined, the target widget is drawn once to this animation canvas, and the screen slide or fade effect is accomplished by modifying the canvas offset and/or canvas alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1212">När maskinvarustöd för flera grafiklager tillhandahålls kan en animeringsarbetsyta som  är bunden till ett maskinvarugrafiköverläggslager avsevärt förbättra prestandan för animeringar med dra och toning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1212">When hardware support for multiple graphics layers is provided, defining an animation canvas that is bound to a hardware graphics overlay layer can ***greatly*** improve the performance of slide and fade animations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1213">Animeringshanteraren kräver en animeringsarbetsyta för att köra animeringstyperna tona in och tona ut om den körs på ett färgdjup som är mindre än 16 bpp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1213">The animation manager does require an animation canvas to execute fade-in and fade-out animation types if running at color depth less than 16 bpp.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1214">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1214">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1215">**animering** Pekare till kontrollblock för animering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1215">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1216">**arbetsyta** Minnesarbetsyta som används för att implementera översättningsanimeringen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1216">**canvas** Memory canvas used to implement the translation animation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1217">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1217">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1218">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Animeringsarbetsyta har definierats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1218">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully defined animation canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1219">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x10) Ogiltig animeringsstatus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1219">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x10) Invalid animation status</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1220">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29) Det angivna minnesblocket är inte tillräckligt stort för att skapa arbetsytan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1220">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29) The provided memory block is not large enough to create the canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1221">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1221">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1222">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1222">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1223">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1223">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1224">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1224">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION animation;
GX_CANVAS animation_canvas;
GX_ROOT_WINDOW animation_root;
/* Create animation canvas. */
status = gx_canvas_create(
        &animation_canvas, /* Canvas control block. */
        “animation_canvas”, /* Name of canvas. */
        display, /* Display control block. */
        GX_ANIMATION_MANAGED, /* Type of canvas. */
        width, /* Width of canvas. */
        height, /* Height of canvas. */
        memory_area, /* Memory area of canvas. */
        memory_size /* Size of canvas memory. */
        );
if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    /* Create the root window for the canvas. */
    status = gx_window_root_create(
        &animation_root, /* Root window control block. */
        “animation_root”, /* Name of root window. */
        &animation_canvas, /* Canvas of the root window. */ GX_STYLE_NONE, /* Style of the window. */
        GX_ID_NONE, /* Root window ID. */
        &root_size /* Window size. */
        );
}
if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    /* Define canvas for the animation. */
    status = gx_animation_canvas_define(&animation,
                &animation_canvas);
}
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new canvas was successfully set to the animation manager. */

```

## <a name="gx_animation_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1233">gx_animation_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1233">gx_animation_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1234">Skapa en animeringskontrollant</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1234">Create an animation controller</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1235">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1235">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_create(GX_ANIMATION *animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1236">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1236">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1237">Den här tjänsten skapar en animeringskontrollant.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1237">This service creates an animation controller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1238">Kontrollanten initieras till inaktivt tillstånd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1238">The controller is initialized to the idle state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1239">Man kan inte starta en animering om den inte är i viloläge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1239">One cannot start an animation unless it is in the IDLE state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1240">Pekaren GX_ANIMATION kontrollblock kan hämtas med hjälp av gx_system_animation_get(), eller så kan det vara ett statiskt definierat kontrollblock.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1240">The GX_ANIMATION control block pointer may be obtained using gx_system_animation_get(), or it may be a statically defined control block.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1241">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1241">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1242">**animering** Pekare till kontrollblock för animering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1242">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>


### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1243">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1243">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1244">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Animeringskontrollanten har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1244">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created animation controller</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1245">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Kontrollblocket har redan initierats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1245">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Control block already initialized</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1247">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1247">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1248">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1248">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1249">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1249">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

/* Allocate an animaton control from system pool */
gx_system_animation_get(&animation);

/* Initialize the control block */

if (animation)
{
    status = gx_animation_create(&animation);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new animation controller was successfully created and initialized. */

```

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1261">Inaktivera dra animerings hook på skärmen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1261">Disable screen drag animation hook</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1262">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1262">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_drag_disable(
    GX_ANIMATION *animation, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1263">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1263">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1264">Den här tjänsten tar bort proceduren dra animeringen från widgetens standardhändelseprocessfunktion och stoppar animeringssekvensen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1264">This service removes the screen drag animation hook procedure from the widget’s default event process function and stops the animation sequence.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1265">Proceduren dra animering hook hanterar händelser för en skärm dra animering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1265">The screen drag animation hook procedure handles events for a screen drag animation.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1267">**animering** Pekare till kontrollblock för animering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1267">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1268">**widget** Pekare till widgetkontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1268">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1269">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1269">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1270">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1270">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1271">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1271">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1272">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1272">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1273">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1273">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1275">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1275">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION animation;
GX_WIDGET *animation_parent;

/* Disable screen drag animation of “animation_parent”. */
status = gx_animation_drag_disable(&animation, animation_parent);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen drag hook has been removed
    from the event process of “animation_parent”. */

```

## <a name="gx_animation_drag_enable"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1285">gx_animation_drag_enable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1285">gx_animation_drag_enable</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1286">Aktivera skärm dra animering hook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1286">Enable screen drag animation hook</span></span>

```C
    GX_ANIMATION_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1288">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1288">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1289">Den här tjänsten anger den internt definierade funktionen för att dra animeringshändelsen som en hook-procedur för en widgets standardhändelseprocessfunktion.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1289">This service sets the internally defined screen drag animation event process function as a hook procedure of a widget’s default event process function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1290">Funktionen för att dra animeringens händelseprocess på skärmen hanterar händelser för en animering som drar skärmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1290">The screen drag animation event process function handles events for a screen drag animation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1291">Dra hook-proceduren på skärmen blir standardhanteraren för pennhändelser som skickas till målwidgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1291">The screen drag hook procedure becomes the default handler for pen input events sent to the target widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1292">Den ursprungliga funktionen för händelsebearbetning av widget anropas i en seriekedja efter kontroll av händelsetyper för skärm dra indata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1292">The original widget event processing function is called in a daisy-chain fashion after checking for screen drag input event types.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1293">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1293">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1295">**widget** Pekare till widgetkontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1295">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1296">**info** Animeringsinformation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1296">**info** Animation information</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1297">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1297">Return Values</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1305">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1305">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION animation;
GX_ANIMATION_INFO info;
GX_WIDGET *animation_parent;
GX_WIDGET *screen_list[] = {
    screen_1,
    screen_2,
    screen_3,
    GX_NULL
}

memset(&info, 0, sizeof(GX_ANIMATION_INFO);
info.gx_animation_parent = animation_parent;

/* If GX_STYLE_ANIMATION_WRAP is set, the screen list will wrap itself. */
info.gx_animation_style = GX_ANIMATION_SCREEN_DRAG |
                          GX_ANIMATION_HORIZONTAL |
                          GX_STYLE_ANIMATION_WRAP;
info.gx_animation_frame_interval = 1;
info.gx_animation_slide_screen_list = screen_list;

status = gx_animation_drag_enable(&animation, animation_parent,
                                  info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen slide animinatin event
    process function has been set as a hook procedure of
    “animation_parent”. */
```

## <a name="gx_animation_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1338">gx_animation_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1338">gx_animation_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1339">Starta en timerdriven animering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1339">Start a timer-driven animation</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1340">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1340">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_animation_start(
    GX_ANIMATION *animation, 
    GX_ANIMATION_INFO *params);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1341">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1341">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1342">Den här tjänsten initierar en animeringssekvens med hjälp av en tidigare skapad animeringsinstans och en ny uppsättning animeringsparametrar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1342">This service initiates an animation sequence using a previously created animation instance and a new set of animation parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1343">Den här funktionen gör en lokal kopia av parametrarna, vilket innebär att parameterstrukturen inte behöver definieras statiskt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1343">This function makes a local copy of the parameters, meaning the parameter structure does not need to be statically defined.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1344">Kontrollstrukturen GX_ANIMATION kan definieras statiskt av programmet eller hämtas med hjälp av API:et gx_system_animation_get().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1344">The GX_ANIMATION control structure can be statically defined by the application, or it can be obtained using the gx_system_animation_get() API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1345">Den GX_ANIMATION_INFO strukturen definierar parametrarna för animeringen som ska köras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1345">The GX_ANIMATION_INFO structure defines the parameters of the animation to be executed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1346">En fullständig beskrivning av den här strukturen och innebörden av varje fält finns i avsnittet GUIX-animeringskomponent i kapitel 3 i den här handboken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1346">For a complete description of this structure and the meaning of each field, refer to the GUIX Animation Component section in Chapter 3 of this manual.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1347">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1347">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1348">**animering** Pekare till kontrollblock för animering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1348">**animation** Pointer to animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1349">**params** Pekare till parameterstruktur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1349">**params** Pointer to parameter structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1350">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1350">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1351">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1351">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1352">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Ogiltig parameter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1352">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid parameter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1353">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1353">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1354">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Ogiltigt animeringsmål</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1354">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid animation target</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1355">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) Ogiltig animeringsstatus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1355">**GX_INVALID_STATUS** (0x26) Invalid animation status</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1356">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Ogiltig animeringsarbetsyta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1356">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid animation canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1357">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1357">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1358">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1358">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1359">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1359">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION_INFO params;
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

/* obtain an animation control block pointer */
gx_system_animation_get(&animation);
if (animation)
{
    /* define a slide down and to the right */
    params.gx_animation_start_position.gx_point_x = 0;
    params.gx_animation_start_position.gx_point_y = 0;
    params.gx_animation_end_position.gx_point_x = 100;
    params.gx_animation_end_position.gx_point_y = 200;
    params.gx_animation_style= GX_ANIMATION_TRANSLATE;
    params.gx_animation_target = &my_window;
    params.gx_animation_parent = root_window;
    params.gx_animation_start_alpha = 255;
    params.gx_animation_end_alpha = 255;

    params.gx_animation_delay_before = 0;
    params.gx_animation_steps = 10;
    params.gx_animation_tick_rate = 2;

    status = gx_animation_start(&animation, &params);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the animation is initiated. */
```

## <a name="gx_binres_language_info_load"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1410">gx_binres_language_info_load</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1410">gx_binres_language_info_load</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1411">Läsa in språktabellinformation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1411">Load language table information</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1412">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1412">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_binres_language_info_load(
    GX_UBYTE *root_address, 
    GX_LANGUAGE_HEDAER *put_info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1413">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1413">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1414">Den här tjänsten parsar en binär resursdatablob för att fylla i en matris med GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER-strukturer, vilket informerar tillämpningen av språknamnen och strängtabellstorleken för varje språk som finns i binära data.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1414">This service parses a binary resource data blob to populate an array of GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structures, informing the application of the language names and string table size of each language contained within the binary data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1415">Programmet bör först anropa gx_binres_language_count_get() för att fastställa antalet språk i binära data och försäkra att put_info-pekaren som skickas till den här funktionen pekar på en matris med language_count GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER strukturer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1415">The application should first call gx_binres_language_count_get() to determine the number of languages within the binary data, and insure that the put_info pointer passed to this function points to an array of language_count GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structures.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1416">Den här tjänsten används av programmet för att vid körning fastställa innehållet i ett segment med binär resursdata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1416">This service is used by application to determine at runtime the content of a binary resource data chunk.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1417">Strukturen GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER definieras som:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1417">The GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structure is defined as:</span></span>

```c
typedef struct GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER_STRUCT{
    USHORT gx_language_header_magic_number;
    USHORT gx_language_header_index;
    UCHAR gx_language_header_name[GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER_NAME_SIZE];
    ULONG  gx_language_header_data_size;
} GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER;
```

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1418">Fältet *magic_number* används för intern validering av binär resursdataformatet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1418">The *magic_number* field is used for internal validation of the binary resource data format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1419">Fältet *header_index* anger i vilken ordning språken definieras i binärdata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1419">The *header_index* field indicates the order in which the languages are defined in the binary data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1420">Fältet *header_name* innehåller språknamnet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1420">The *header_name* field contains the language name.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1421">Fältet *header_data_size* innehåller datastorleken för språksträngtabellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1421">The *header_data_size* field contains the data size of the language string table.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1422">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1422">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1423">**root_address** Adress för binära resursdata i minnet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1423">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1424">**put_info** Pekare till matris med GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER strukturer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1424">**put_info** Pointer to array of GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER structures</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1425">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1425">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1426">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1426">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1427">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Ogiltig binär resurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1427">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1428">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1428">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

```C
GX_LANGUAGE_HEADER language_info[4];

    language_info);
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the language table was successfully loaded. */

```

## <a name="gx_binres_language_table_load"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1434">gx_binres_language_table_load</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1434">gx_binres_language_table_load</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1436">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1436">Prototype</span></span>

```C
    GX_UBYTE *root_address,

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1437">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1437">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1438">Med det här inaktuella API:et kan program läsa in strängtabelldata från äldre (före version 5.6) binära resursdatafiler.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1438">This deprecated API allows applications to load string table data from older (prior to release 5.6) binary resource data files.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1439">Nya program bör använda gx_binres_language_table_load_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1439">New applications should use gx_binres_language_table_load_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1440">Den här tjänsten skapar en språktabellstruktur som innehåller pekare till tabellresurser, de genererade datastrukturerna pekar på resursdata "på plats". Resursdata kopieras inte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1440">This service builds up a language table structure containing pointers to table resources, the generated data structures point to the resource data “in place”, it does not copy the resource data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1441">Resursdata måste placeras på en allmän minnesplats för åtkomst och basadressen för den här minnesplatsen skickas till det här API:et.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1441">The resource data must be placed in a general access memory location, and the base address of this memory location is passed to this API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1442">Den här tjänsten kräver ett allokerat minnesblock för körning som är tillräckligt stort för att rymma språktabellstrukturen, och därför måste gx_system_memory_allocator_set-API:et anropas en gång innan den här tjänsten begärs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1442">This service requires a runtime allocated memory block sufficient in size to hold the language table structure, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocator_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1443">Den returnerade språktabellen definierar en eller flera strängtabeller, varje strängtabell som innehåller pekare till strängresurser i resursdataminnet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1443">The returned language table defines one or more string table(s), each string table containing pointers to string resources in resource data memory.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1444">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1444">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1445">**root_address** Adress för binära resursdata i minnet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1445">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1446">**returnerade _language_table** Pekare till inläst språktabell</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1446">**returned _language_table** Pointer to loaded language table</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1447">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1447">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1448">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1448">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1449">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Ogiltig binär resurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1449">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1450">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1450">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1451">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) Minnes allocator eller kostnadsfri funktion har inte definierats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1451">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMPRY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator or free function is not defined</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1461">Den här tjänsten skapar en språktabellstruktur som innehåller pekare till tabellresurser, de genererade datastrukturerna pekar på resursdata "på plats" och kopierar inte resursdata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1461">This service builds up a language table structure containing pointers to table resources, the generated data structures point to the resource data “in place”, it does not copy the resource data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1462">Resursdata måste placeras på en allmän minnesplats för åtkomst och basadressen för den här minnesplatsen skickas till det här API:et.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1462">The resource data must be placed in a general access memory location, and the base address of this memory location is passed to this API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1463">Den här tjänsten kräver ett allokerat minnesblock för körning som är tillräckligt stort för att rymma språktabellstrukturen, och därför måste gx_system_memory_allocator_set-API:et anropas en gång innan den här tjänsten begärs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1463">This service requires a runtime allocated memory block sufficient in size to hold the language table structure, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocator_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1481">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1481">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1482">Den här tjänsten skapar en GX_THEME struktur som innehåller pekare till resurstabellerna för det begärda temat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1482">This service builds up a GX_THEME structure containing pointers to the resource tables for the requested theme.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1483">De genererade datastrukturerna pekar på resursdata "på plats", utan kopierar inte resursdata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1483">The generated data structures point to the resource data “in place”, it does not copy the resource data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1484">Resursdata måste placeras på en allmän minnesplats för åtkomst och basadressen för den här minnesplatsen skickas till det här API:et.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1484">So the resource data must be placed in a general access memory location, and the base address of this memory location is passed to this API.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1485">Den här tjänsten kräver ett allokerat minnesblock för körning som är tillräckligt stort för att innehålla tematabellstrukturen, och därför måste gx_system_memory_allocator_set-API:et anropas en gång innan den här tjänsten begärs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1485">This service requires a runtime allocated memory block sufficient in size to hold the theme table structure, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocator_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1486">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1486">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1487">**root_address** Adress för binära resursdata i minnet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1487">**root_address** Address of binary resource data in memory</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1488">**theme_id** Temats identifierare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1488">**theme_id** The identifier of the theme</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1489">**returned_theme** Pekare till inläst tema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1489">**returned_theme** Pointer to loaded theme</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1490">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1490">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1491">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1491">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1492">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Ogiltig binär resurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1492">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT** (0x24) Invalid binary resource</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1493">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1493">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1494">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Ogiltigt tema-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1494">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid theme ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1495">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Minnes allocator eller kostnadsfri funktion har inte definierats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1495">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator or free function is not defined</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1496">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1496">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1498">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1498">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR *theme = GX_NULL;
GX_UBYTE *root_address = 0x60000000;
INT theme_id = 0;

status = gx_binres_theme_load(root_address, theme_id, &theme);

```

## <a name="gx_brush_default"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1501">gx_brush_default</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1501">gx_brush_default</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1510">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig penselpekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1510">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid brush pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1511">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1511">Allowed From</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1526">**fill_color** Färg på penselfyllning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1526">**fill_color** Color of brush fill.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1527">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1527">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1528">Observera att programmet kan lägga till anpassade färger också.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1528">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1529">**style (stil)** Penselformat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1529">**style** Brush style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1530">**Bilaga D** beskriver de penselformat som stöds.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1530">**Appendix D** describes the supported brush styles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1531">Penselformat kan kombineras till en variabel med hjälp av en bitvis OR-åtgärd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1531">Brush styles can be combined into one variable using bitwise OR operation.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1534">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig penselpekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1534">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid brush pointer</span></span>

```C
}
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1605">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1605">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_deselect(
    GX_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_BOOL gen_event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1606">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1606">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1607">Den här tjänsten avmarkerar den angivna knappen och genererar en signalhändelse beroende på knappformat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1607">This service deselects the specified button and generate a signal event depending on button styles.</span></span>

|---------------------------|----------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1610">Ingen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1610">None</span></span>                      | <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1611">GX_EVENT_CLICKED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1611">GX_EVENT_CLICKED</span></span>         |
| <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1612">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_RADIO</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1612">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_RADIO</span></span>  | <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1613">GX_EVENT_RADIO_DESELECT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1613">GX_EVENT_RADIO_DESELECT</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1614">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1614">GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1615">GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1615">GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFF</span></span>     |



### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1616">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1616">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1618">**gen_event** Om GX_TRUE genererar knappen en händelse GX_EVENT_CLICKED, GX_EVENT_DESELECT eller GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFFSET beroende på knappformatet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1618">**gen_event** If GX_TRUE, the button will generate a GX_EVENT_CLICKED, GX_EVENT_DESELECT, or GX_EVENT_TOGGLE_OFFSET event depending on the button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1619">Om GX_FALSE genererar inte knappen någon händelse på högre nivå även om den normalt gör det.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1619">If GX_FALSE, the button will not generate any higher level event even if it would normally do so.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1642">gx_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1642">gx_button_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1643">Knappen Rita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1643">Draw button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1644">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1644">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_button_draw(GX_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1645">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1645">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1646">Den här tjänsten ritar den angivna knappen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1646">This service draws the specified button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1647">Den här funktionen anropas vanligtvis internt av GUIX-mekanismen för arbetsyteuppdatering, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till med implementeringen av anpassade ritningsfunktioner för anpassade knappwidgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1647">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom button widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1648">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1648">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1650">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1650">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1651">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1651">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1654">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1654">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom button draw function. */

{
    /* Call default button draw. */
    gx_button_draw(button);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}

```

## <a name="gx_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1669">gx_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1669">gx_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1670">Händelse för processknapp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1670">Process button event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1671">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1671">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_button_event_process(
    GX_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1672">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1672">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1673">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för den angivna knappen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1673">This service processes an event for the specified button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1674">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1674">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1675">**knapp** Pekare till knappkontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1675">**button** Pointer to button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1676">**event_ptr** Pekare till händelse att bearbeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1676">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1677">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1677">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1678">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad knapphändelseprocess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1678">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful button event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1679">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1679">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1680">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1680">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1681">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1681">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1682">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1682">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1683">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1683">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic button event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_button_event_process(GX_BUTTON *button,
                                 GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default button
            event processing */
        status = gx_button_event_process(button, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_alpha_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1735">gx_canvas_alpha_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1735">gx_canvas_alpha_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1736">Ange alpha-blend-värde för arbetsyta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1736">Set alpha-blend value for canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1737">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1737">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_alpha_set(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_UBYTE alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1738">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1738">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1739">Den här tjänsten anger värdet för alpha-blend för den angivna arbetsytan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1739">This service sets the alpha-blend value for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1740">Arbetsytans alfavärden kan vara mellan 0 (transparent) och 255 (helt täckande).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1740">Canvas alpha values can range from 0 (transparent) to 255 (fully opaque).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1741">Att blanda överläggsarbetsytan kräver antingen stöd för maskinvarugrafiklager eller programvarustöd genom att skapa en sammansatt arbetsyta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1741">Blending overlay canvases requires either hardware graphics layer support, or software support via the creation of a composite canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1742">Maskinvarustöd för blandning av arbetsyta aktiveras genom att anropa API:et gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() innan du anger alfavärdet för arbetsytan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1742">Hardware support for canvas blending is enabled by invoking the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API prior to setting the canvas alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1743">När en arbetsyta är bunden till ett maskinvarugrafiklager anropar API:et gx_canvas_alpha_set() direkt maskinvarugrafiklagret som blandar tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1743">When a canvas is bound to a hardware graphics layer, calling the gx_canvas_alpha_set() API directly invokes the hardware graphics layer blending services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1744">Om du vill använda programvarustöd för blandning av arbetsyta måste programmet skapa en arbetsyta med GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE stil, där alla andra hanterade arbetsyta är sammansatta före den slutliga visningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1744">To utilize software support for canvas blending, the application must create a canvas with GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE style, into which all other managed canvases are composited prior to final display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1745">Programvarustöd för arbetsyteblandning tillhandahålls endast när du kör med en visningsdrivrutin på 16 bpp eller högre färgdjup.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1745">Software support for canvas blending is only provided when running with a display driver of 16-bpp or higher color depth.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1746">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1746">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1747">**arbetsyta** Pekare till kontrollblock för arbetsyta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1747">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1748">**alpha** Alpha-blend-värde, intervallet 0 (transparent) till 255 (täckande).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1748">**alpha** Alpha-blend value, range from 0 (transparent) to 255 (opaque).</span></span>

### <a name="return--values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1749">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1749">Return  Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1750">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad alfablandningsvärdeuppsättning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1750">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful alpha-blend value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1751">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1751">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1752">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1752">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1753">**GX_INVALID_ERROR** (0x20) Ogiltig arbetsyta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1753">**GX_INVALID_ERROR** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1754">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1754">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1755">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1755">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1756">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1756">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the alpha-blend value of “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_alpha_set(&my_canvas, GX_ALPHA_VALUE_OPAQUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the alpha-blend value was successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_arc_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1766">gx_canvas_arc_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1766">gx_canvas_arc_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1767">Rita båge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1767">Draw arc</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1768">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1768">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_arc_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    UINT r,
    INT start_angle, 
    INT end_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1769">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1769">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1770">Den här tjänsten ritar en cirkelbåg på arbetsytan med hjälp av den aktuella penseln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1770">This service draws a circle arc on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1771">Cirkelbågen klipps till arbetsytans ogiltiga region.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1771">The circle arc is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1772">Den här GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT måste definieras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1772">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1773">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1773">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1774">**xcenter** x-position i mitten av cirkel arc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1774">**xcenter** x-position of center of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1775">**ycenter** y-position för mitten av cirkel arc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1775">**ycenter** y-position of center of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1776">**r** Radie för cirkel arc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1776">**r** Radius of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1777">**start_angle** Startvinkel för cirkelbåge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1777">**start_angle** Starting angle of the circle arc</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1778">**end_angle** Slutvinkel för cirkelbåge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1778">**end_angle** Ending angle of the circle arc</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1779">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1779">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1780">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad arc draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1780">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful arc draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1781">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1781">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1782">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Ogiltigt värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1782">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1783">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Ingen öppen ritningskontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1783">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1784">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1784">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1786">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1786">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw a circle arc from 0 degree to 90 degree in clockwise. */
status = gx_canvas_arc_draw(100, 100, 50, 0, 90);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the arc has been drawn on “my_canvas”. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_block_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1799">gx_canvas_block_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1799">gx_canvas_block_move</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1800">Flytta block med bildpunkter för arbetsyta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1800">Move block of canvas pixels</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1801">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1801">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_block_move(GX_RECTANGLE *block,
    GX_VALUE x_shift, GX_VALUE y_shift, GX_RECTANGLE *dirty);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1802">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1802">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1803">Den här tjänsten flyttar ett block med pixeldata för arbetsytan i den riktning som anges.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1803">This service moves a block of canvas pixel data in the direction specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1804">Den här tjänsten används internt av GUIX för att utföra snabb bläddring, men kan också användas av programprogramvaran.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1804">This service is used internally by GUIX to accomplish fast scrolling, but may also be used by the application software.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1805">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1805">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1806">**blockera** Koordinater för det område som ska flyttas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1806">**block** Coordinates of area to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1807">**x_shift** Antal bildpunkter som ska flyttas på x-axeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1807">**x_shift** Number of pixels to shift on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1808">**y_shift** Antal bildpunkter som ska flyttas på y-axeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1808">**y_shift** Number of pixels to shift on the y-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1809">**dirty** Om blockflyttningen lyckas returnerar den här funktionen den del av källrektangeln som fortfarande är felaktig för anroparen i den här parametern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1809">**dirty** If the block move is successful, this function returns the portion of the source rectangle that is still dirty to the caller in this parameter.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1810">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1810">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1811">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad blockflyttning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1811">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1812">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Blockflyttning misslyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1812">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Failed block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1813">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1813">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1814">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1814">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1815">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1815">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1816">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1816">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1817">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1817">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE invalid;
GX_RECTANGLE move;

/* define 100 x 100 pixel rectangle */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&move, 0, 0, 99, 99);

/* Move this rectangle 10 pixels to the right”. */
status = gx_canvas_block_move(&move, 10, 0, &invalid);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, then ‘invalid’ marks the area that needs to be redrawn after the block move. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_circle_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1830">gx_canvas_circle_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1830">gx_canvas_circle_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1831">Rita cirkel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1831">Draw circle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1832">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1832">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_circle_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    UINT r);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1833">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1833">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1834">Den här tjänsten ritar en cirkel på arbetsytan med hjälp av den aktuella penseln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1834">This service draws a circle on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1835">Cirkeln klipps till arbetsytans ogiltiga region.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1835">The circle is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1836">Den här tjänsten GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT måste definieras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1836">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1837">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1837">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1838">**xcenter** x-coord för mitten av cirkeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1838">**xcenter** x-coord of center of the circle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1839">**ycenter** y-coord of center of the cirlce</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1839">**ycenter** y-coord of center of the cirlce</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1840">**r** Radie för cirkeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1840">**r** Radius of the circle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1841">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1841">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1842">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad cirkeldrag</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1842">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful circle draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1843">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1843">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1844">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Ogiltig cirkelradie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1844">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid circle radius</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1845">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Ingen öppen ritningskontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1845">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1846">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1846">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1847">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1847">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1848">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1848">Example</span></span>

```C

/* Draw a circle of radius 10 centered at (100, 100). */
status = gx_canvas_circle_draw(100, 100, 50);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the circle has been drawn on “my_canvas”. */

```
