## <a name="gx_canvas_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1861">gx_canvas_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1861">gx_canvas_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1862">Skapa arbetsyta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1862">Create canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1863">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1863">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_create(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    UINT type, 
    UINT width, 
    UINT height,
    GX_COLOR *memory_area, 
    ULONG memory_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1864">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1864">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1865">Den här tjänsten skapar arbetsytan med de angivna egenskaperna och tillhörande minne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1865">This service creates the canvas with the specified properties and associated memory.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1866">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1866">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1867">**arbetsyta** Pekare till kontrollblock för arbetsyta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1867">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1868">**namn** Logiskt namn för arbetsytan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1868">**name** Logical name for the canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1869">**visa** Pekare till tidigare skapad visning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1869">**display** Pointer to previously created display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1870">**typ** Typ av arbetsytaArbetsytans typer är:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1870">**type** Type of canvasThe canvas types include:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1871">**GX_CANVAS_SIMPLE:** En minnesarbetsyta som används för att rita utanför skärmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1871">**GX_CANVAS_SIMPLE:** A memory canvas which is used to off-screen drawing.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1872">**GX_CANVAS_MANAGED:** En arbetsyta som automatiskt rensas till den aktiva visningen, antingen som en del av den sammansatta byggprocessen eller som en del av buffertreglageåtgärden för en enda arbetsytearkitektur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1872">**GX_CANVAS_MANAGED:** A canvas which automatically flushed to the active display, either as part of the composite building process or as part of the buffer toggle operation for single-canvas architectures.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1873">**GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE:** Den här flaggan kan användas för att aktivera och inaktivera en arbetsyta utan att förlora arbetsytans ritningsinnehåll.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1873">**GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE:** This flag can be used to turn on and off a canvas, without losing the canvas drawing contents.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1874">**GX_CANVAS_MODIFIED:** Reserverad för framtida användning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1874">**GX_CANVAS_MODIFIED:** Reserved for future use.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1875">**GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE:** Den här flaggan används av programmet när du konfigurerar ett system med flera arbetsyteenheter som ska sammansatta flera hanterade arbetsyta i den sammansatta arbetsytan, och den sammansatta styrs till maskinvarurambufferten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1875">**GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE:** This flag is used by the application when configuring a multiple-canvas system which will composite multiple managed canvases into the composite canvas, and the composite is the driven to the hardware frame buffer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1876">**bredd** Bredd i bildpunkter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1876">**width** Width in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1877">**höjd** Höjd i bildpunkter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1877">**height** Height in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1878">**memory_area** Minnesområde för arbetsyta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1878">**memory_area** Memory area for canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1879">Det här värdet kan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1879">This value can</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1880">**GX_NULL** när arbetsytan skapades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1880">**GX_NULL** at the time of canvas creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1881">**och** senare initieras med gx_canvas_memory_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1881">**and** later initialized using gx_canvas_memory_define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1882">**memory_size** Storleken på minnesområdet i byte, eller 0 om arbetsytans minne definieras efter att arbetsytan har skapats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1882">**memory_size** Size of memory area in bytes, or 0 if the canvas memory will be defined after the canvas is created.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1883">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1883">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1884">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad arbetsyte create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1884">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1885">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1885">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1886">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1886">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1892">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1892">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define global canvas memory area. */
GX_COLOR my_canvas_memory[272*480];

…

/* Create “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_create(&my_canvas, "my canvas", &my_display,
                    (GX_CANVAS_MANAGED | GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE),
                    272, 480,
                    my_canvas_memory,
                    sizeof(default_canvas_memory));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the 272 x 480 canvas was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_drawing_complete"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1920">gx_canvas_drawing_complete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1920">gx_canvas_drawing_complete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1921">Slutföra arbetsyteritning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1921">Complete canvas drawing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1922">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1922">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_drawing_complete(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_BOOL flush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1923">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1923">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1924">Den här tjänsten meddelar GUIX att programmets ritning på den angivna arbetsytan har slutförts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1924">This service lets GUIX know the application’s drawing on the specified canvas is complete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1925">Programmet kan använda den här tjänsten för att tvinga fram en omedelbar ritning till en arbetsyta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1925">The application can use this service to force immediate drawing to a canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1926">Detta tömer arbetsytan till den synliga rambufferten och/eller utlöser en växlingsåtgärd för bugger, beroende på systemets minnesarkitektur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1926">This flushes the canvas to the visible frame buffer and/or triggers a bugger toggle operation, depending on system memory architecture.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1927">Den här tjänsten bör endast anropas av programmet för att stänga en ritningssekvens som har påbörjats med gx_canvas_drawing_initiate().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1927">This service should only be called by the application to close a drawing sequence begun with gx_canvas_drawing_initiate().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1928">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1928">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1929">**arbetsyta** Pekare till kontrollblock för arbetsyta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1929">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1930">**flush (rensa)** Om **_GX_TRUE_** rensas arbetsyteändringarna till skärmen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1930">**flush** If **_GX_TRUE_**, canvas changes are flushed to the display</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1931">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1931">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1932">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Slutförd ritning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1932">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drawing completion</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1933">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1933">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1934">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1934">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1935">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1935">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1936">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1936">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1937">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1937">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Complete drawing on “my_canvas” and flush to display. */
status = gx_canvas_drawing_complete(&my_canvas, GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing was successfully completed. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_drawing_initiate"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1944">gx_canvas_drawing_initiate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1944">gx_canvas_drawing_initiate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1945">Initiera arbetsyteritning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1945">Initiate canvas drawing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1946">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1946">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_WIDGET *who, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *dirty_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1947">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1947">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1948">Den här tjänsten initierar ritningen på den angivna arbetsytan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1948">This service initiates drawing on the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1949">Den här tjänsten anropas internt som en del av den uppskjutna ritningsåtgärden som utförs automatiskt av GUIX när en arbetsyta behöver uppdateras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1949">This service is called internally as part of the deferred drawing operation performed automatically by GUIX when a canvas needs to be update.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1950">Programmet tillåts dock kringgå GUIX-algoritmen för uppskjuten ritning och utföra omedelbar och direkt ritning på en arbetsyta genom att först anropa gx_canvas_drawing_inititate, sedan anropa önskade ritningsfunktioner och sedan anropa gx_canvas_drawing_complete().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1950">However, the application is allowed bypass the GUIX deferred drawing algorithm and perform immediate and direct drawing on a canvas by first calling gx_canvas_drawing_inititate, then calling the desired drawing functions, then calling gx_canvas_drawing_complete().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1951">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1951">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1952">**arbetsyta** Pekare till kontrollblock för arbetsyta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1952">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1953">**vem** Pekare till widgetens kontrollblock för anroparen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1953">**who** Pointer to widget control block of the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1954">Den här parametern används för att initiera ritningens urklipp och visa parametrar för efterföljande ritningsåtgärder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1954">This parameter is used to initialize the drawing clipping and view parameters for subsequent drawing operations.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1955">**dirty_area** Område att rita inom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1955">**dirty_area** Area to draw within.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1956">Den här parametern skickas av anroparen för att ange det område som anroparen vill att alla ritningsåtgärder ska klippas till.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1956">This parameter is passed by the caller to indicate the area to which the caller wants all drawing operations clipped.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1957">Det här är vanligtvis det område som tidigare markerats som dirty (grovt) men anroparen kan expandera eller ta bort urklippsområdet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1957">This is usually the area previously marked as dirty, but the caller is free to expand or contract the clipping area.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1958">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1958">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1959">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad ritningsinitiering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1959">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drawing initiation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1960">**GX_DRAW_NESTING_EXCEEDED** (0x05) Överskrid det högsta kapslingsantalet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1960">**GX_DRAW_NESTING_EXCEEDED** (0x05) Exceed maximum nesting count</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1961">**GX_NO_VIEW** (0x03) Inga visningsportar för anroparen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1961">**GX_NO_VIEW** (0x03) No viewports for the caller</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1962">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1962">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1963">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1963">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1964">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Ogiltig arbetsyta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1964">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1965">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1965">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1966">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1966">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1967">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1967">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Initiate drawing on “my_canvas”, my_widget.gx_widget_size
specify the area the application wants GUIX to redraw. */
status = gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(&my_canvas, &my_widget,
    &my_widget.gx_widget_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing was successfully initiated. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_ellipse_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1974">gx_canvas_ellipse_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1974">gx_canvas_ellipse_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1975">Rita ellips</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1975">Draw ellipse</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1976">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1976">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_ellipse_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    INT a, 
    dINT b);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1977">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1977">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1978">Den här tjänsten ritar en ellips på arbetsytan med hjälp av den aktuella penseln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1978">This service draws an ellipse on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1979">Ellipsen klipps till arbetsytans ogiltiga region.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1979">The ellipse is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1980">Den här tjänsten GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT måste definieras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1980">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-1981">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-1981">Parameters</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2006">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2006">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2007">Binda arbetsytan till maskinvarugrafiklagret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2007">Bind canvas to hardware graphics layer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2008">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2008">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    INT layer);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2009">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2009">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2010">Den här tjänsten binder en GUIX-ritningsarbetsyta till ett maskinvarugrafiklager.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2010">This service binds a GUIX drawing canvas to a hardware graphics layer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2011">Den här tjänsten krävs endast för maskinvaruenheter som stöder flera maskinvarugrafiska lager.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2011">This service is only required for hardware devices supporting multiple hardware graphics layers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2012">Om du binder en arbetsyta till ett maskinvarugrafiklager implementeras API:erna gx_canvas_show(), gx_canvas_hide(), gx_canvas_alpha_set() och gx_canvas_offset_set() direkt av drivrutinstjänster för maskinvaruvisning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2012">Binding a canvas to a hardware graphics layer results in the gx_canvas_show(), gx_canvas_hide(), gx_canvas_alpha_set(), and gx_canvas_offset_set() APIs being implemented directly by hardware display driver services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2013">Om drivrutinen för maskinvaruvisning inte stöder flera grafiklager kommer den här tjänsten inte att returnera GX_INVALID_DISPLAY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2013">If the hardware display driver does not support multiple graphics layers, this service will fail returning GX_INVALID_DISPLAY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2014">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2014">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2015">**arbetsytearbetsyta** som ska implementeras i maskinvara</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2015">**canvas** canvas to be implement in hardware</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2016">**lager** maskinvarugrafikskikt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2016">**layer** hardware graphics layer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2017">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2017">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2018">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad bindning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2018">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful binding</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2019">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Visningslagertjänsten har inte definierats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2019">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Display layer service is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2020">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Ogiltiga pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2020">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2021">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2021">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2022">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Ogiltig arbetsyta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2022">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2023">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Stöds inte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2023">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Not supported</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2024">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2024">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2025">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2025">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2026">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2026">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Binds the canvas to the hardware graphics layer 1. */
status = gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(&my_canvas, 1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the drawing canvas is bound to the
    hardware graphics. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2071">**GX_INVALID_WIDTH** (0x1E) Ogiltig penselbredd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2071">**GX_INVALID_WIDTH** (0x1E) Invalid brush width</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_memory_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2087">gx_canvas_memory_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2087">gx_canvas_memory_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2088">Definiera arbetsytans minne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2088">Define canvas memory</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2089">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2089">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_memory_define(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_COLOR *memory,
    ULONG memsize);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2090">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2090">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2094">**minne** Minnesadress för arbetsyta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2094">**memory** Canvas memory address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2095">**memsize** Storlek på arbetsytans minnesblock i byte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2095">**memsize** Size of the canvas memory block in bytes</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2097">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad tilldelning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2097">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2098">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Ogiltigt kontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2098">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2099">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2099">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2114">**info** Pekare till markörinformation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2114">**info** Pointer to mouse cursor information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2115">**Bilaga I** innehåller en definition GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO struktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2115">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO structure.</span></span>

```C
/* Set mouse cursor info. */
GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO mouse_cursor;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_image_id = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_MOUSE;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_hotspot_x = 0;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_hotspot_y = 0;

status = gx_canvas_mouse_define(&my_canvas, &mouse_cursor);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the mouse info of “my_canvas” has been
set successfully. */

```

## <a name="gx_canvas_offset_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2165">gx_canvas_offset_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2165">gx_canvas_offset_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2166">Tilldela skärmförskjutning för arbetsyta x,y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2166">Assign canvas x,y display offset</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2167">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2167">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_offset_set(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_VALUE x, 
    GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2168">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2168">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2169">Den här tjänsten tilldelar en x,y-visningsförskjutning för den angivna arbetsytan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2169">This service assigns an x,y display offset for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2170">Detta styr den position där arbetsytan är sammansatt i den synliga rambufferten och används ofta när arbetsytan är mindre än den fysiska visningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2170">This controls the position at which the canvas is composited into the visible frame buffer, and is often used when the canvas is smaller than the physical display.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2171">Om arbetsytan har bundets till ett maskinvarugrafiklager med hjälp av API:gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() implementeras tjänsten gx_canvas_offset_set direkt med maskinvarustöd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2171">If the canvas has been bound to a hardware graphics layer using the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API, the gx_canvas_offset_set service is implemented directly using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2172">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2172">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2173">**arbetsyta** Pekare till kontrollblock för arbetsyta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2173">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2174">**x** X koordinat för offset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2174">**x** X coordinate of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2175">**y** Y-koordinat för offset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2175">**y** Y coordinate of offset</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2176">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2176">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2177">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad tilldelning av offset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2177">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2178">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2178">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2179">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2179">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2180">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Ogiltig arbetsyta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2180">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2181">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2181">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2182">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2182">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2183">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2183">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set display offset for “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_offset_set(&my_canvas, 20, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing is now offset from
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2195">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2195">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter,
    UINT r, 
    INT start_angle, 
    INT end_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2196">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2196">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2197">Den här tjänsten ritar ett cirkeldiagram i arbetsytan med hjälp av den aktuella penseln för ritningskontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2197">This service draws a pie into the canvas using the current drawing context brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2198">Cirkeldiagrammet klipps till arbetsytans ogiltiga region.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2198">The pie is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2199">Den här tjänsten kräver att konfigurationsalternativet GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT definieras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2199">This service requires the configuration option GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2202">**ycenter** y-position för mitten av cirkeldiagrammet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2202">**ycenter** y-position of center of the pie</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2204">**start_angle** Startvinkel för cirkeldiagrammet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2204">**start_angle** Starting angle of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2205">**end_angle** Slutvinkel för cirkeldiagrammet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2205">**end_angle** Ending angle of the pie</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixel_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2226">gx_canvas_pixel_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2226">gx_canvas_pixel_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2227">Rita pixel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2227">Draw pixel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2228">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2228">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixel_draw(GX_POINT position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2229">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2229">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2230">Den här tjänsten ritar en pixel på arbetsytan med linjefärgen för den aktuella penseln för ritningskontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2230">This service draws a pixel on the canvas using the line color of the current drawing context brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2231">Om konfigurationsalternativet GX_BRUSH_ALPHA_SUPPORT definieras blandar du pixeln med annars ritar du pixeln som helt täckande.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2231">If configuration option GX_BRUSH_ALPHA_SUPPORT is defined, blend the pixel with the otherwise, draw the pixel as fully opaque.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2232">**peka** x,y bildpunktsposition att rita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2232">**point** x,y position of pixel to draw</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2233">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2233">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2234">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2234">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2235">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2235">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2236">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Ingen öppen ritningskontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2236">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2237">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2237">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2238">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2238">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2239">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2239">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_POINT point; /* the x,y position you want to draw to */
GX_RECTANGLE drawto; /* the rectangle bounding your drawing */
GX_CANVAS *mycanvas; /* the canvas you want to draw to */

/* calculate 1x1 pixel drawing area: */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&drawto,
    point.gx_point_x, point.gx_point_y,
    point.gx_point_x, point.gx_point_y);

/* get my canvas: */
gx_widget_canvas_get(win, &mycanvas);

/* open my canvas for drawing: */
gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(mycanvas, win, &drawto);

/* setup my brush colors. Use any color ID in your resources: */
gx_context_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_ID_WINDOW_BORDER);

/* draw a pixel: */
status = gx_canvas_pixel_draw(point);

/* close the canvas: */
gx_canvas_drawing_complete(mycanvas, GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixel was successfully drawn to mycanvas. */
```

```C
    GX_VALUE y_position, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap, 
    GX_UBYTE alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2247">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2247">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2248">Den här tjänsten blandar en pixelkarta med arbetsytans bakgrund.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2248">This service blends a pixelmap with the canvas background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2249">Blandningsförhållandet anges av anroparen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2249">The blending ratio is specified by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2250">Alfavärdet kan vara mellan 0 (helt transparent) och 255 (helt täckande).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2250">The alpha value can range from 0 (fully transparent) to 255 (fully opaque).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2251">Pixelkartan kan också innehålla en intern alfakanal, som kombineras med det inkommande blandningsvärdet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2251">The pixelmap may also include an internal alpha channel, which is combined with the incoming blending value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2252">Den här tjänsten stöds endast av visningsdrivrutiner som körs med 16 bpp-färgdjup och högre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2252">This service is only supported by display drivers running at 16-bpp color depth and higher.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2254">**x_start** Starta x-position för pixelkartan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2254">**x_start** Starting x-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2255">**y_end** Starta bildpunktskartans y-position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2255">**y_end** Starting y-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2256">**pixelkarta** Pekare till pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2256">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2258">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2258">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2259">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2259">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2260">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2260">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2261">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Stöds inte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2261">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2262">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Ingen öppen ritningskontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2262">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2263">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2263">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2311">gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2311">gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2312">Rita roterad pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2312">Draw rotated pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2313">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2313">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate(
    GX_VALUE x_position, 
    GX_VALUE y_position,
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap, 
    INT angle,
    INT rot_cx, 
    INT rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2314">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2314">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2315">Den här tjänsten roterar en pixelkarta vid den angivna vinkeln och renderar pixelkartan till arbetsytan direkt när rotationen utförs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2315">This service rotates a pixelmap at the specified angle and renders the pixelmap to the canvas directly as the rotation is performed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2316">Den här tjänsten skiljer sig från gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate eftersom utdata från rotationen återges direkt till arbetsytans minne och den roterade pixelkartan inte returneras till anroparen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2316">This service differs from gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate in that the output of the rotation is directly rendered to the canvas memory, and the rotated pixelmap is not returned to the caller.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2317">Fördelen med den här tjänsten jämfört gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate är att inget ytterligare minne krävs för att hålla den roterade pixelkartan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2317">The advantage of this service over gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate is that no additional memory is required to hold the rotated pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2318">Nackdelen är att rotationskoden måste köras varje gång pixelkartan ritas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2318">The disadvantage is that the rotation code must be executed each time the pixelmap is drawn.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2319">Verifiering av cklippning och visningsport framtvingas under återgivningen av den roterade pixelkartan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2319">Clipping and viewport validation are enforced during rendering of the rotated pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2320">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2320">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2321">**x_position** Starta x-position för pixelkartan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2321">**x_position** Starting x-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2322">**y_position** Starta pixelkartans y-position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2322">**y_position** Starting y-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2323">**pixelkarta** Pekare till pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2323">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2324">**vinkel** Vinkel som ska roteras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2324">**angle** Angle to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2325">**rot_cx** X-coord för rotationscenter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2325">**rot_cx** X-coord of center of rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2326">Om det här värdet är inställt på -1 används mitten av bilden som rotationscenter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2326">If this value is set to -1, the center of the image is used as the rotation center.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2327">**rot_cy** Y-coord för rotationscenter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2327">**rot_cy** Y-coord of center of rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2328">Om det här värdet är inställt på -1 används mitten av bilden som rotationscenter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2328">If this value is set to -1, the center of the image is used as the center of rotation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2329">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2329">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2330">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2330">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2331">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2331">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2332">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2332">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2333">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Ingen öppen ritningskontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2333">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2334">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2334">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2336">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2336">Example</span></span>

```C
/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 30 degree in clockwise direction and draw in on canvas. */
status = gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate(10, 20, &my_pixelmap, 30,
    -1, -1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the rotated pixelmap “my_pixelmap” has been drawn. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2419">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2419">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2420">Rita text som roterats runt en mittpunkt (inaktuell)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2420">Draw text rotated about a center point (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2421">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2421">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw(
    const GX_CHAR *text,
    GX_VALUE xCenter, 
    GX_VALUE yCenter, 
    INT angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2422">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2422">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2423">Det här API:et har gjorts inaktuellt och ersatts gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2423">This API has been deprecated in favor or gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2424">Nya program bör inte använda det här API:et, men bör i stället använda gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2424">While still supported, new applications should not use this API and should instead use gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2425">Den här tjänsten ritar text på arbetsytan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2425">This service draws text to the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2426">Texten ritas roteras om den begärda mittpunkten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2426">The text is drawn rotated about the requested center point.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2427">Teckensnittet för den aktuella ritningskontexten och den aktuella kontextlinjefärgen används för att återge texten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2427">The current drawing context font and drawing context line color is used to render the text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2428">Den här tjänsten använder funktionen gx_utility_string_to_alphamap att rendera textsträngen till en tillfällig 8bpp-pixelkarta som endast innehåller alfavärde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2428">This service uses the function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap to render the text string to a temporary 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2429">Tjänsten roterar sedan alfakartan med hjälp av funktionen gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2429">The service then rotates the alphamap using the function gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2430">När den sista alfakartan har renderats på arbetsytan frigör den här tjänsten den tillfälliga alfakartan och tillhörande minne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2430">After the final alphamap is rendered to the canvas, this service frees the temporary alphamap and associated memory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2431">Eftersom en tillfällig alfakarta krävs för att rendera roterad text måste programmet konfigurera gx_system_memory_allocator med hjälp av anrops-API:et gx_system_memory_allocator_set() innan det försöker rita roterad text.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2431">Since a temporary alphamap is required to render rotated text, the application must configure the gx_system_memory_allocator by the calling gx_system_memory_allocator_set() API before attempting to draw rotated text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2432">Den här tjänsten ska endast användas för att rendera roterad text "en gång".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2432">This service should only be used to render rotated text “one time”.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2433">Om samma textsträng ritas flera gånger på olika platser eller olika rotationsvinklar är det mer effektivt att använda verktygsfunktionen gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() för att skapa textens alfakarta en gång och sedan använda gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate flera gånger för att rotera den resulterande alfakartan upprepade gånger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2433">If the same text string will be drawn multiple times at different locations or different rotation angles, it is more efficient to use the utility function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() to create the text alphamap once, then use gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate multiple times to rotate the resulting alphamap repeatedly.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2434">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2434">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2435">**text** Textsträng som ska ritas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2435">**text** Text string to be drawn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2436">**xCenter** Centrera kring vilken text som ska roteras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2436">**xCenter** Center positon around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2437">**yCenter** Centrera positionen runt vilken text som ska roteras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2437">**yCenter** Center position around which text will be rotated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2438">**vinkel** Den önskade textrotationsvinkeln i grader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2438">**angle** The desired text rotation angle, in degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2439">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2439">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2440">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad textåtergivning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2440">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text rendering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2441">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2441">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2442">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2442">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2443">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Otillräckligt minne tillgängligt eller gx_system_memory_allocator har inte tilldelats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2443">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Insufficient memory available or gx_system_memory_allocator has not been assigned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2444">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Ogiltig stränglängd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2444">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2445">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2445">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2446">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2446">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2447">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2447">Example</span></span>

```C
void my_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{

    GX_VALUE xpos = 100;
    GX_VALUE ypos = 100;
    INT dynamic_count = 1234567;
    GX_CHAR dynamic_text[10];

    /* Call default window draw routine. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Set font. */
    gx_context_font_set(GX_FONT_ID_SMALL_BOLD);

    /* Convert int value to string. */
    gx_utility_ltoa(dynamic_count, dynamic_text, 20);

    /* Draw rotate text. */
    gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw(dynamic_text, xpos, ypos, 45);
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2458">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2458">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2459">Den här tjänsten ritar text på arbetsytan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2459">This service draws text to the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2460">Texten ritas roteras om den begärda mittpunkten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2460">The text is drawn rotated about the requested center point.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2461">Teckensnittet för den aktuella ritningskontexten och den aktuella kontextlinjefärgen används för att återge texten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2461">The current drawing context font and drawing context line color is used to render the text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2462">Den här tjänsten använder funktionen gx_utility_string_to_alphamap att rendera textsträngen till en tillfällig 8bpp-pixelkarta som endast innehåller alfavärde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2462">This service uses the function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap to render the text string to a temporary 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2463">Tjänsten roterar sedan alfakartan med hjälp av funktionen gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2463">The service then rotates the alphamap using the function gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2464">När den sista alfakartan har renderats på arbetsytan frigör den här tjänsten den tillfälliga alfakartan och tillhörande minne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2464">After the final alphamap is rendered to the canvas, this service frees the temporary alphamap and associated memory.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2465">Eftersom en tillfällig alfakarta krävs för att rendera roterad text måste programmet konfigurera gx_system_memory_allocator av ***anrops-API:et för gx_system_memory_allocator_set*** innan det försöker rita roterad text.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2465">Since a temporary alphamap is required to render rotated text, the application must configure the gx_system_memory_allocator by the calling ***gx_system_memory_allocator_set*** API before attempting to draw rotated text.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2466">Den här tjänsten ska endast användas för att rendera roterad text "en gång".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2466">This service should only be used to render rotated text “one time”.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2467">Om samma textsträng ritas flera gånger på olika platser eller olika rotationsvinklar är det mer effektivt att använda verktygsfunktionen gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() för att skapa textens alfakarta en gång och sedan använda gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate flera gånger för att rotera den resulterande alfakartan upprepade gånger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2467">If the same text string will be drawn multiple times at different locations or different rotation angles, it is more efficient to use the utility function gx_utility_string_to_alphamap() to create the text alphamap once, then use gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate multiple times to rotate the resulting alphamap repeatedly.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2468">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2468">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2469">**text** Textsträng som ska ritas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2469">**text** Text string to be drawn</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2482">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2482">Example</span></span>

```C
void my_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{

    GX_VALUE xpos = 100;
    GX_VALUE ypos = 100;
    INT dynamic_count = 1234567;
    GX_CHAR dynamic_text[10];
    GX_STRING string;

    /* Call default window draw routine. */
    gx_window_draw(window);

    /* Set font. */
    gx_context_font_set(GX_FONT_ID_SMALL_BOLD);

    /* Convert int value to string. */
    gx_utility_ltoa(dynamic_count, dynamic_text, 20);

    string.gx_string_ptr = dynamic_text;
    string.gx_string_length = strlen(dynamic_text);

    /* Draw rotate text. */
    gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw_ext(&string, xpos, ypos, 45);
}
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2490">gx_canvas_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2490">gx_canvas_shift</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2491">Skift-arbetsyta med x,y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2491">Shift canvas by x,y</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2492">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2492">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_shift(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_VALUE x, GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2493">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2493">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2494">Den här tjänsten flyttar den angivna arbetsyteförskjutningen med det angivna beloppet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2494">This service shifts the specified canvas offset by the specified amount.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2495">Detta påverkar den position där arbetsytan återges i den synliga rambufferten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2495">This affects the position at which the canvas is rendered within the visible frame buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2496">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2496">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2497">**arbetsyta** Pekare till kontrollblock för arbetsyta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2497">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2498">**x** bildpunkter för att flytta på X-axeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2498">**x** Pixels to shift on the X axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2499">**y bildpunkter** för att flytta på Y-axeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2499">**y** Pixels to shift on the Y axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2500">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2500">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2501">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad arbetsyteväxling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2501">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas shift</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2502">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2502">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2503">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2503">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2504">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Ogiltig arbetsyta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2504">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2505">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2505">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2506">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2506">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Shift canvas “my_canvas”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas has been shifted by 10 pixels
    on the X axis and 15 on the Y axis. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2538">gx_canvas_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2538">gx_canvas_text_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2539">Rita text (inaktuell)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2539">Draw text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2540">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2540">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_text_draw(
    GX_VALUE x_start, 
    GX_VALUE y_start,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string, 
    INT length);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2541">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2541">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2542">Den här tjänsten ritar text på arbetsytan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2542">This service draws text on the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2543">Det här API:et, som fortfarande stöds, är inaktuellt och nya program bör i stället använda gx_canvas_text_draw_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2543">This API, while still supported, is deprecated and new applications should instead use gx_canvas_text_draw_ext().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2544">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2544">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2545">**x_start** Starta x-koordinat för text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2545">**x_start** Starting x-coordinate for text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2546">**y_start** Starta y-koordinaten för text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2546">**y_start** Starting y-coordinate for text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2547">**sträng** Pekare till sträng att rita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2547">**string** Pointer to string to draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2548">**längd** Om längden >= 0 begränsar antalet tecken som ritas till längd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2548">**length** If length >= 0, limits the number of characters drawn to length.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2549">Om längden < 0 dras hela strängen tills NULL-terminatorn har ritats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2549">If length < 0, the entire string until NULL terminator is drawn.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2550">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2550">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2551">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad text draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2551">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2552">**GX_FAILURE** (0x1E) Misslyckad text draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2552">**GX_FAILURE** (0x1E) Failed text draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2553">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2553">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2554">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2554">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2555">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Ingen öppen ritningskontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2555">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2556">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Ogiltig stränglängd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2556">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2557">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2557">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2558">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2558">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2559">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2559">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw text “example” on current canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_text_draw(10, 20, “example”, 7);

/* Draw all of a string of unknown length on the current canvas */
status = gx_canvas_text_draw(10, 40, string_ptr, -1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text “example” has been drawn. */
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2604">gx_checkbox_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2604">gx_checkbox_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2605">Skapa kryssruta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2605">Create checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2606">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2606">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_create(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT checkbox_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2607">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2607">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2608">Den här tjänsten skapar en kryssruta med de angivna egenskaperna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2608">This service creates a checkbox widget with the specified properties.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2609">GX_CHECKBOX härleds från GX_TEXT_BUTTON och alla gx_text_button-tjänster kan användas med GX_CHECKBOX widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2609">GX_CHECKBOX is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON, and all gx_text_button services may be used with GX_CHECKBOX widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2610">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2610">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2611">**kryssruta** Pekare till kryssruta för kontrollblocknamnet Logiskt namn för kryssrwidgeten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2611">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block name Logical name of checkbox widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2612">**överordnad** Pekare till den överordnade widgeten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2612">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2613">**text_id** Resurs-ID för kryssrutatext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2613">**text_id** Resource ID of checkbox text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2614">**style** Kryssrutans format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2614">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2615">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widgetspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2615">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2616">**checkbox_id** Kryssruta för programdefinierat ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2616">**checkbox_id** Application-defined ID of checkbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2617">**storlek** Kryssrutas dimensioner</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2617">**size** Dimensions of checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2618">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2618">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2619">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Skapa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2619">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2620">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2620">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2621">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2621">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2622">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** widgeten (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2622">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2623">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Ogiltig storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2623">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2624">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2624">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_checkbox”. */
status = gx_checkbox_create(&my_checkbox, “my_checkbox”,
    &my_parent,
    MY_CHECKBOX_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_CHECKBOX_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the checkbox “my_checkbox” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2631">gx_checkbox_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2631">gx_checkbox_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2632">Kryssrutan Rita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2632">Draw checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2633">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2633">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_checkbox_draw(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2634">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2634">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2635">Den här tjänsten ritar den angivna kryssrutan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2635">This service draws the specified checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2636">Den här funktionen anropas vanligtvis internt av GUIX-arbetsytans uppdateringsmekanism, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till med implementeringen av anpassade ritningsfunktioner för anpassade kryssrutawidgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2636">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom checkbox widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2637">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2637">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2638">**kryssruta** Pekare till kryssruta för kontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2638">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2639">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2639">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2640">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2640">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2641">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2641">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2642">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2642">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2643">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2643">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom checkbox draw function. */
VOID custom_checkbox_draw(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox)
{
    /* Call default checkbox draw. */
    gx_checkbox_draw(checkbox);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_checkbox_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2648">gx_checkbox_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2648">gx_checkbox_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2649">Processkryssruta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2649">Process checkbox event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2650">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2650">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_event_process(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2651">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2651">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2652">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för den angivna kryssrutan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2652">This service processes an event for the specified checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2653">Den här tjänsten ska anropas som standardhändelsehanterare av alla anpassade funktioner för händelsebearbetning av kryssrutor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2653">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom checkbox event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2654">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2654">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2655">**kryssruta** Pekare till kryssruta för kontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2655">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2656">**event_ptr** Pekare till den händelse som ska bearbetas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2656">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2657">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2657">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2658">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Händelseprocessen lyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2658">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2659">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2659">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2660">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2660">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2661">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2661">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2662">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2662">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2663">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2663">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2664">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2664">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic checkbox event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_checkbox_event_process(GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default checkbox
            event processing */
        status = gx_checkbox_event_process(checkbox, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

```C
UINT gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set(
    GX_CHECKBOX *checkbox,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID unchecked_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID checked_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID unchecked_disabled_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID checked_disabled_id);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2676">**kryssruta** Pekare till kryssruta för kontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2676">**checkbox** Pointer to checkbox control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2677">**unchecked_id** Pixelkarta som används för avmarkerat tillstånd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2677">**unchecked_id** Pixelmap used for unchecked state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2678">**checked_id** Pixelkarta som används för kontrollerat tillstånd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2678">**checked_id** Pixelmap used for checked state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2679">**unchecked_disabled_id** Pixelkarta som används för en inaktiverad och avmarkerad kryssruta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2679">**unchecked_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for a disabled and unchecked checkbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2680">**checked_disabled_id** Pixelkarta som används för en inaktiverad och markerad kryssruta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2680">**checked_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for a disabled and checked checkbox</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2681">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2681">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2683">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2683">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2684">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2684">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
