```C
/* Select “my_checkbox”. */
status = gx_checkbox_pixelmap_set(&my_checkbox,
    PIXELMAP_UNCHECKED_ID,
    PIXELMAP_CHECKED_ID, PIXELMAP_UNCHECKED_DISABLED_ID,
    PIXELMAP_CHECKED_SIABLED_ID));
```

```C
/* Set animation steps and delay time of circular gauge “my_gauge”
    to 30 and 1, the needle of “my_gauge” will rotate from
    current angle to target angle by 30 steps with 1 tick delay between every step. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_animation_set(&my_gauge, 30, 1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the steps and delay time of “my_gauge” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2798">gx_circular_gauge_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2798">gx_circular_gauge_create</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2800">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2800">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_create(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO *info,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID background_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT circular_gauge_id,
    GX_VALUE xpos,
    GX_VALUE ypos);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2807">**info** Pekare till mätarinformationsstrukturen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2807">**info** Pointer to the gauge information structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2808">**Bilaga I** innehåller definition för GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO struktur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2808">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2809">**background_id** Resurs-ID för bildpunktskarta för cirkelmätare i bakgrunden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2809">**background_id** Resource ID of circular gauge background pixelmap</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2822">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2822">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2823">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2823">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE gauge_info;

gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_animation_steps = 30;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_animation_delay = 1;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_xpos = 140;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_ypos = 140;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_neelde_xcor = 20;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_neelde_ycor = 88;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Create “my_gauge”. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_create(&my_gauge, “my_gauge”,
            &my_parent,
            &gauge_info, MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID, GX_NULL,
            MY_ICON_ID, 5, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the circular gauge “my_gauge” has been created. */
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2865">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2865">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic circular gauge event processing as part of custom event processing function. */
UINT custom_gauge_event_process(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default circular gauge
             event processing */
        status = gx_circular_gauge_event_process(gauge, event);
        break;
}
return status;
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2900">gx_context_brush_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2900">gx_context_brush_define</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2901">Definiera pensel av aktuell ritningskontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2901">Define brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2902">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2902">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_define(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID line_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_color_id, 
    UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2903">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2903">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2904">Den här tjänsten definierar penseln för den aktuella ritningskontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2904">This service defines the brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2905">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2905">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2906">**line_color_id** Resurs-ID för linjefärg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2906">**line_color_id** Resource ID of line color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2907">**Bilaga B** innehåller fördefinierade färgresurs-ID:er.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2907">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2908">Observera att programmet kan lägga till anpassade resurs-ID:n för färg också.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2908">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2909">**fill_color_id** Resurs-ID för fyllningsfärg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2909">**fill_color_id** Resource ID of fill color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2910">**Bilaga B** innehåller fördefinierade färgresurs-ID:er.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2910">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2911">Observera att programmet kan lägga till anpassade resurs-ID:n för färg också.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2911">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2912">**style (stil)** Penselformat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2912">**style** Style of brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2913">**Bilaga D** beskriver de penselformat som stöds.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2913">**Appendix D** describes the supported brush styles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2914">Penselformat kan kombineras till en variabel med hjälp av en bitvis OR-åtgärd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2914">Brush styles can be combined into one variable using bitwise OR operation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2915">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2915">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2916">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Definiera lyckad kontextborste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2916">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2917">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Ogiltigt resurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2917">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2918">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Ingen aktiv ritningskontext definierar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2918">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2919">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Ogiltigt resurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2919">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2920">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Ingen aktiv ritningskontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2920">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>


## <a name="gx_context_brush_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2938">gx_context_brush_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2938">gx_context_brush_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2939">Hämta pensel av aktuell ritningskontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2939">Get brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2940">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2940">Prototype</span></span>

```C

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2941">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2941">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2942">Den här tjänsten returnerar en pekare till den aktiva penseln i den aktuella ritningskontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2942">This service returns a pointer to the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2943">Om det inte finns någon aktiv ritningskontext misslyckas tjänsten och returnerar en NULL-pekare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2943">If there is no active drawing context, the service fails and returns a NULL pointer.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2945">**return_brush** Pekare till mål för pensel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2945">**return_brush** Pointer to destination for brush.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2946">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2946">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2947">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Kontextborsten har hämtats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2947">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved context brush</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2948">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Ingen aktiv ritningskontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2948">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2949">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2949">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2950">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2950">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_brush_pattern_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2967">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2967">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2968">Ange penselmönster för aktuell ritningskontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2968">Set brush pattern of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2969">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2969">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_pattern_set(ULONG pattern);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2970">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2970">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2971">Den här tjänsten anger penselmönstret för den aktuella ritningskontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2971">This service sets the brush pattern of the current drawing context.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2972">Penselmönstret används för att rita streckade vågräta och streckade lodräta linjer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2972">The brush pattern is used for drawing dashed horizontal and dashed vertical lines.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2973">När gx_canvas_line_draw() anropas och linjen är vågrät eller lodrät och brush.gx_brush_line_pattern är icke-noll ritas en mönsterlinje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2973">When the gx_canvas_line_draw() is called, and the line is horizontal or vertical, and the brush.gx_brush_line_pattern field is non-zero, a pattern line is drawn.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2974">Penselmönstermasken stöds för närvarande endast för vågräta och lodräta linjer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2974">The brush pattern mask is currently only supported for horizontal and vertical lines.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2975">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2975">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2976">**mönster** Mönster som ska användas för penseln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2976">**pattern** Pattern to be used for the brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2977">Det här är ett enkelt hexidecimalt on/off-mönster som ska användas för mönsterlinjeritning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2977">This is a simple hexidecimal on/off pattern to be used for pattern line drawing.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2978">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2978">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2979">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad kontextborsteuppsättning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2979">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2980">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Ogiltig ritningskontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2980">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2981">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2981">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2982">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2982">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2983">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2983">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the brush pattern for the current contex. */
status = gx_context_brush_pattern_set(0x80808080);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush pattern of the current context
has been set to the specified pattern. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2997">gx_context_brush_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2997">gx_context_brush_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2998">Ange pensel för aktuell ritningskontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2998">Set brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-2999">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-2999">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_set(GX_BRUSH *brush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3000">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3000">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3001">Den här tjänsten anger penseln för den aktuella ritningskontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3001">This service sets the brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3002">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3002">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3003">**brush** Pekare som ska användas för den aktuella kontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3003">**brush** Pointer to brush to use for current context.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3004">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3004">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3005">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad kontextborsteuppsättning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3005">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3006">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Ingen aktiv ritningskontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3006">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3007">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3007">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3008">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3008">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3009">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3009">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3010">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3010">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BRSUH my_brush;
GX_FONT *font;
GX_COLOR fill_color;
GX_COLOR line_color;

/* Retrieve the font that associated with the specified font ID. */
gx_context_font_get(MY_FONT_ID, &font);

/* Retrieve the color that associated with the specified color ID. */
gx_context_color_get(MY_FILL_COLOR_ID, &fill_color);
gx_context_color_get(MY_LINE_COLOR, &line_color);

my_brush.gx_brush_pixelmap = MY_PIXELMAP_ID;
my_brush.gx_brush_font = font;
my_brush.gx_brush_line_pattern = 0x80808080;
my_brush.gx_brush_pattern_mask = 0x80000000;
my_brush.gx_brush_fill_color = fill_color;
my_brush.gx_brush_line_color = line_color;
my_brush.gx_brush_style = GX_BRSUH_SOLID_FILL | GX_BRUSH_ALIAS |
                          GX_BRUSH_PIXELMAP_FILL | GX_BRUSH_ROUND
my_brush.gx_brush_width = 2;
my_brush.gx_brush_alpha = 255;

/* Set the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_set(my_brush);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been set. */
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3065">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3065">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the brush width of the current context to 10 pixels. */
status = gx_context_brush_width_set(10); /*

If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush width of the current context has been set to 10. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_color_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3080">gx_context_color_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3080">gx_context_color_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3081">Hämta färgvärde som är associerat med färg-ID i den aktuella ritade kontexten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3081">Get color value associated with color ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3082">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3082">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_color_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID color_id,
    GX_COLOR *return_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3083">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3083">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3084">Den här tjänsten hämtar färgvärdet som är associerat med det angivna färg-ID:t.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3084">This service retrieves the color value associated with the indicated color ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3085">Färgvärdet returneras i färgformatet för den aktiva kontextvisningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3085">The color value is returned in the color format of the active context display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3086">Den här tjänsten ska bara anropas inifrån en aktiv ritningsåtgärd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3086">This service should only be called from within an active drawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3087">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3087">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3088">**color_id** Resurs-ID för färg som begärts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3088">**color_id** Resource ID of color requested.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3089">**return_color** Adressen till variabeln som ska innehålla det returnerade färgvärdet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3089">**return_color** Address of variable to hold returned color value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3090">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3090">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3091">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckat färgvärde get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3091">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color value get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3092">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Ogiltigt resurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3092">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3093">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Ingen aktiv ritningskontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3093">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3094">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3094">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3095">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3095">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3096">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3096">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3097">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3097">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR color_value;

/* Get the color vaue. */
status = gx_context_color_get(MY_BLACK_COLOR_ID, &color_value);
```

## <a name="gx_context_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3112">gx_context_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3112">gx_context_fill_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3113">Ange fyllningsfärg för aktuell ritningskontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3113">Set fill color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3114">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3114">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_fill_color_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3115">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3115">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3116">Den här tjänsten anger fyllningsfärgen för den aktiva penseln i den aktuella ritningskontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3116">This service sets the fill color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3117">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3117">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3118">**fill_color_id** Resurs-ID för fyllningsfärgen för den aktuella kontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3118">**fill_color_id** Resource ID of fill color of current context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3119">**Bilaga B** innehåller fördefinierade resurs-ID:er för färg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3119">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3120">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade resurs-ID:n för färg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3120">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3121">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3121">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3122">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad kontextfyllningsfärguppsättning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3122">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context fill color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3123">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Ogiltigt resurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3123">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3124">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Ingen aktiv ritningskontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3124">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3125">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3125">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3126">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3126">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3127">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3127">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the fill color of the current context to black. */
status = gx_context_fill_color_set(MY_BLACK_COLOR_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the fill color of the current context has been set to black. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_font_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3142">gx_context_font_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3142">gx_context_font_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3143">Hämta teckensnitt som är associerat med teckensnitts-ID i den aktuella ritade kontexten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3143">Get font associated with font ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3144">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3144">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_font_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id,
    GX_FONT **return_font);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3145">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3145">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3146">Den här tjänsten hämtar den teckensnittspekare som är associerad med det angivna teckensnitts-ID:t.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3146">This service retrieves the font pointer associated with the indicated font ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3147">Den här tjänsten ska bara anropas inifrån en aktiv ritningsåtgärd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3147">This service should only be called from within an active drawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3148">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3148">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3149">**font_id** Resurs-ID för det begärda teckensnittet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3149">**font_id** Resource ID of font requested.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3150">**return_font** Adressen till variabeln som ska innehålla den returnerade teckensnitts pekaren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3150">**return_font** Address of variable to hold returned font pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3151">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3151">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3152">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Teckensnittet har hämtats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3152">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3153">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Ogiltigt resurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3153">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3154">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Ingen aktiv ritningskontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3154">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3155">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3155">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3156">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3156">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3157">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3157">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3158">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3158">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *my_font;

/* Get the font pointer. */
status = gx_context_font_get(MY_MIDSIZE_FONT, &my_font);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the font that indicated with MY_MIDSIZE_FONT has been successfully retrieved. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3203">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3203">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_line_color_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID line_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3204">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3204">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3205">Den här tjänsten anger linjefärgen för den aktiva penseln i den aktuella ritningskontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3205">This service sets the line color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3206">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3206">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3207">**line_color_id** Linjefärg för aktuell kontext.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3207">**line_color_id** Line color of current context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3208">**Bilaga B** innehåller fördefinierade färgresurs-ID:er.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3208">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3209">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade resurs-ID:n för färg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3209">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3231">gx_context_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3231">gx_context_pixelmap_get</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3233">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3233">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_pixelmap_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id,
    GX_PIXELMAP **return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3234">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3234">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3235">Den här tjänsten hämtar pekaren för pixelkartan som är associerad med det angivna pixelkarta-ID:t.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3235">This service retrieves the pixelmap pointer associated with the indicated pixelmap ID.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3236">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3236">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3237">**pixelmap_id** Resurs-ID för pixelkarta begärd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3237">**pixelmap_id** Resource ID of pixelmap requested.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3239">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3239">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3240">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Hämtad pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3240">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3241">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Ogiltigt resurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3241">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3242">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Ingen aktiv ritningskontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3242">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3243">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pixelkarta-pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3243">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pixelmap pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3244">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3244">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3245">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3245">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3246">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3246">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the pixelmap pointer. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixelmap was successfully retrieved. */
```

```C
UINT gx_context_pixelmap_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3264">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3264">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3265">Den här tjänsten tilldelar pixelkartan för den aktiva penseln i den aktuella ritningskontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3265">This service assigns the pixelmap of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3266">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3266">Parameters</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_raw_brush_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3289">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3289">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3290">Definiera raw-pensel för aktuell rita-kontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3290">Define raw brush of current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3291">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3291">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_raw_brush_define(
    GX_COLOR line_color,
    GX_COLOR fill_color, 
    UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3292">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3292">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3293">Den här tjänsten definierar den råa penseln för den aktuella skärmkontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3293">This service defines the raw brush of the current screen context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3294">Rådefinitioner används när 32-bitars ARGB-färgvärden ska skickas till penseln i stället för färg-ID:er.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3294">Raw definitions are used when 32-bit ARGB color values are to be passed into the brush rather than color IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3295">Råfärgdefinitioner är användbara när den önskade färgen inte finns i den aktuella systemfärgtabellen eller när RGB-färgvärdet beräknas vid körning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3295">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3296">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3296">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3297">**line_color** Linjefärg i 32-bitars ARGB-färgformat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3297">**line_color** Color of line in 32-bit raw ARGB color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3298">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3298">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3299">Observera att programmet kan lägga till anpassade färger också.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3299">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3300">**fill_color** Fyllningsfärg i 32-bitars argb-färgformat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3300">**fill_color** Color of fill in 32-bit raw ARGB color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3301">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3301">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3302">Observera att programmet kan lägga till anpassade färger också.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3302">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3303">**style (stil)** Penselformat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3303">**style** Style of brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3304">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widgetspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3304">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3305">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3305">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3306">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Definiera en lyckad kontextborste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3306">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw brush define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3307">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Ingen aktiv ritningskontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3307">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3308">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3308">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3309">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3309">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3310">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3310">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define the raw brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_raw_brush_define(GX_COLOR_BLACK,
    GX_COLOR_BLACK, GX_STYLE_BORDER_NONE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw brush of the current context has been defined. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3360">Den här tjänsten anger linjefärgen för den aktiva penseln i den aktuella ritningskontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3360">This service sets the line color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3361">Parametern line_color är ett 32-bitars ARGB-format för råfärg i stället för ett färg-ID-värde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3361">The line_color parameter is a 32-bit ARGB format raw color value, rather than a color ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3362">Råfärgdefinitioner är användbara när den önskade färgen inte finns i den aktuella systemfärgtabellen eller när RGB-färgvärdet beräknas vid körning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3362">Raw color definitions are useful when the desired color is not present in the current system color table or when the RGB color value is computed at runtime.</span></span>

```C
/* Set the raw line color of the current context. */
status = gx_context_raw_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_BLACK);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the raw line color of the current context has been set. */
```

```C
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id, 
    GX_STRING *return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3408">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3408">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3409">Den här tjänsten returnerar strängen som är associerad med ett visst sträng-ID.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3409">This service returns the string associated with a given string ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3410">Den här tjänsten kan bara anropas när det finns en aktiv ritningskontext, det vill säga inifrån ritningsfunktionen för en widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3410">This service can only be invoked when there is an active drawing context, i.e. from within the drawing function of a widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3411">Den här tjänsten identifierar den aktiva arbetsytan och visar och hämtar strängen från den visningsinstans som finns.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3411">This service identifies the active canvas and display and retrieves the string from the located display instance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3412">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3412">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3413">**string_id** Sträng-ID som används för att identifiera strängen, som genereras av GUIX Studio i programmets resurshuvudfil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3413">**string_id** String ID used to identify the string, as generated by GUIX Studio in the application resource header file.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3415">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3415">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3416">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad färguppsättning för kontextrå linje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3416">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context raw line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3417">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3417">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3418">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3419">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) Ingen aktiv ritningskontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3419">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0X06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3420">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3420">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_active_language_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3437">gx_display_active_language_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3437">gx_display_active_language_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3438">Tilldela visningsaktivt språk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3438">Assign the display active language</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3439">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3439">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_active_language_set(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_UBYTE language);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3440">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3440">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3441">Den här tjänsten tilldelar det aktiva språket för den angivna visningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3441">This service assigns the currently active language for the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3442">Språkindexet motsvarar de språk som definierats i tabellen med visningsspråk och är inte en ANSI-språkidentifierare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3442">The language index corresponds to the languages defined in the display language table, and is not an ANSI language identifier.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3443">Olika skärmar i ett system med flera skärmar kan köra olika aktiva språk.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3443">Different displays in a multi display system can each run different active languages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3444">Tabellen med visningsspråk ska tilldelas innan det här API:et används.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3444">The display language table should be assigned before this API is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3445">När en visning initieras med gx_studio_display_configure installeras språktabellen automatiskt och programmet skickar det aktiva språkindexet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3445">When a display is initialized using gx_studio_display_configure, the language table is automatically installed and the application passes in the active language index.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3446">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3446">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3447">**visa** Pekare för att visa kontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3447">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3448">**språk** Aktivt språkindex</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3448">**language** Active language index</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3449">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3449">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3450">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Tilldela språk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3450">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful language assign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3451">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig visningspekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3451">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid display pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3452">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Ogiltigt språkindex</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3452">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid language index</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3453">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3453">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3454">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3454">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3455">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3455">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Change value of color MY_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_display_active_language_set(&my_display,
    LANGUAGE_ENGLISH);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the active language has been assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_display_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3459">gx_display_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3459">gx_display_color_set</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3462">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3462">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3463">Den här tjänsten tilldelar om färgvärdet som är associerat med det angivna färg-ID:t.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3463">This service re-assigns the color value associated with the specified color ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3464">Detta kan användas för att ändra färgtabellen för en visning utan att tillhandahålla en helt ny färgtabell.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3464">This can be used to modify the color table of a display without providing an entirely new color table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3465">Det angivna färgvärdet måste ha det ursprungliga format som stöds av visningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3465">The color value provided must be in the native format supported by the display.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3466">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3466">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3467">**visa** Pekare för att visa kontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3467">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3468">**color_id** Färg-ID som ska tilldelas om</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3468">**color_id** Color ID to reassign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3469">**new_color** Färgvärde som ska tilldelas till color_id plats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3469">**new_color** Color value to assign to this color_id slot</span></span>

## <a name="gx_display_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3500">gx_display_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3500">gx_display_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3501">Skapa visning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3501">Create display</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3502">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3502">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_display_create(
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    GX_CONST CHAR *name,
    UINT (*display_driver_setup)(GX_DISPLAY *),
    GX_VALUE width, 
    GX_VALUE height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3503">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3503">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3504">Den här tjänsten skapar en visning och anropar funktionen för att konfigurera visningsdrivrutiner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3504">This service creates a display and calls the display driver setup function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3505">GUIX tar den här visningen och lägger till den i sin interna lista över skärmar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3505">GUIX takes this display and adds it to its internal list of displays.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3506">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3506">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3507">**visa** Pekare för att visa kontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3507">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3508">**namn** Namnet på visningen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3508">**name** Name of the display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3509">**display_driver_setup** Pekare för att visa funktionen för drivrutinsinstallation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3509">**display_driver_setup** Pointer to display driver setup function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3510">**optional_driver_info** Pekare till valfri drivrutinsinformation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3510">**optional_driver_info** Pointer to optional driver information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3511">**color_format** Färgformat enligt definitionen i **bilaga C**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3511">**color_format** Color format, as defined in **Appendix C**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3512">**bredd** Antal bildpunkter på x-axeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3512">**width** Number of pixels on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3513">**höjd** Antal bildpunkter på y-axeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3513">**height** Number of pixels on the y-axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3514">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3514">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3515">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad visnings create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3515">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful display create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3516">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR** (0xFE) Det gick inte att konfigurera visningen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3516">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR** (0xFE) Fail to setup display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3518">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3518">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3519">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x23) Ogiltig blockstorlek för visningskontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3519">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x23) Invalid display control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3520">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3520">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3522">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3522">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DISPLAY my_display;

UINT my_driver_setup_callback(GX_DISPLAY *display)
{
    …
}

/* Create screen “my_display”. */
status = gx_display_create(&my_display, “my display”,
    my_driver_setup_callback, 320, 480);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the screen “my_display” has been created. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3537">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3537">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

```C
    GX_DISPLAY *display,
    GX_CHAR **table, 
    GX_UBYTE *language_count,
    UINT *string_table_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3574">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3574">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3575">Den här tjänsten hämtar språktabellen från den angivna visningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3575">This service retrieves the language table from the indicated display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3576">Den här tjänsten kan användas av ett program för att ändra visningsspråktabellen vid körning med hjälp av dynamiskt definierade strängar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3576">This service can be used by an application to modify the display language table, at runtime, using dynamically defined strings.</span></span>


## <a name="gx_display_theme_install"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3779">gx_display_theme_install</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3779">gx_display_theme_install</span></span>

```C
    GX_DISPLAY *display,

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3782">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3782">Description</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3785">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3785">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3786">**visa** Pekare för att visa kontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3786">**display** Pointer to display control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3787">**theme_table** Tematabell som ska installeras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3787">**theme_table** Theme table to be installed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3788">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3788">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3789">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Tematabellen har installerats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3789">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully installed theme table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3790">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3790">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3791">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig tematabell pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3791">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid theme table pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3792">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Ogiltig visning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3792">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Invalid display</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3793">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3793">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3794">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3794">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3795">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3795">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_THEME theme_1;

&theme_table[1] = {
    &theme_1,
    …
}

/* Define resource tables. */
GX_COLOR color_table[32] = {…};
GX_FONT *font_table[32] = {…};
GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap_table[32] = { … };

/* Define scroll appearance. */
GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE scroll_appearance;

memset(&scroll_appearance, 0, sizeof(GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE));

scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_width = 20;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_width = 18;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_button_color =
    GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_min = 20;
scroll_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_max = 20;
scroll appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_style =
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN;

theme_1.theme_color_table = color_table;
theme_1.theme_font_table = font_table;
theme_1.theme_pixlemap_table = pixelmap_table;
theme_1.theme_palette = GX_NULL;
theme_1.theme_vertical_scrollbar_appearance = scroll_appearance;
theme_1.theme_horizontal_scrollbar_appearance = scroll_appearance;
theme_1.theme_vertical_scroll_style = GX_SCROLLBAR_RELATIVE_THUMB;
theme_1.theme_horizontal_scroll_style =
    GX_SCROLLBAR_RELATIVE_THUMB;
theme_1.theme_color_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_font_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_pixelmap_table_size = 32;
theme_1.theme_palette_size = 0;

/* Install theme table. */
status = gx_display_theme_install(&my_display, theme_table);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the theme table has been installed. */
```

## <a name="gx_drop_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3819">gx_drop_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3819">gx_drop_list_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3820">Skapa en listlista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3820">Create a drop list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3821">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3821">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_drop_list_create(
    GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list, 
    GX_CONST
    GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows, 
    INT open_height,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_VERTICAL_LIST *, 
    GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT drop_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3822">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3822">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3823">Den här tjänsten skapar en listrutan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3823">This service creates a drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3824">En listruta är en kombination av listwidgeten och en lodrät popup-lista som visas när listrutan öppnas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3824">A drop list is a combination of the drop list widget, and a popup vertical list that is displayed when the drop-list is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3825">Den lodräta popup-listan skapas automatiskt när listr listwidgeten skapas och visas eller döljs när listlistewidgeten öppnas respektive stängs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3825">The popup vertical list is created automatically when the drop-list widget is created, and displayed or hidden when the drop-list widget is opened or closed, respectively.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3826">Listlistewidgeten stöder två associerade pixelkartor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3826">The drop list widget supports two associated pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3827">Den första, som beskrivs som "List wallpaper" (Lista bakgrundsbild) i studioegenskaperna, är den valfria pixelkartan för bakgrundsbilder som visas som bakgrund till den lodräta listan som visas när listr listwidgeten öppnas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3827">The first, described as “List Wallpaper” in the Studio properties view, is the optional wallpaper pixelmap that is displayed as the background of the vertical list that is displayed when the drop-list widget is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3828">Den andra pixelkartan, som beskrivs som "Bakgrundsbild" i Studio-egenskapsvyn, är en valfri bild som visas som bakgrund i själva listrutan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3828">The second pixelmap, described as the “Background Image” in the Studio properties view, is an optional image displayed as the background of the drop-list itself.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3829">En widget i listrutan kan ha (men krävs inte) en underordnad widget som används för att öppna och stänga listrutan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3829">A drop-list widget can have (but is not required to have) a child widget that is used to open and close the drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3830">Detta är vanligtvis en ikon- eller knappwidget, men även en anpassad widget kan användas som växlingsknapp för att öppna/stänga för den överordnade listrutan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3830">This is customarily an icon or button widget, but even a custom widget could be used as the open/close toggle for the parent drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3831">Nyckelinställningen som gör att den här underordnade widgeten använder listrutan är att den underordnade widgeten måste ha det fördefinierade widget-ID:t ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3831">The key setting which makes this child widget operate the drop list is that this child widget must have the pre-defined widget id ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3832">Så här definierar du en underordnad widget som öppnar och stänger listrutan, först lägga till och underordnad widget i listrutan och placera den underordnade i listrutan efter behov:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3832">To define a child widget which will open and close the drop-list, firstadd and child widget to the drop list, and position this child within the drop list as desired:</span></span>

![Skärmbild av listrutan.](./media/guix/image6.jpg)

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3834">Använd sedan Studio-egenskapsvyn för att tilldela den underordnade widgeten ID-värdet ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON, vilket är ett internt definierat ID-värde som identifieras av den överordnade listrutan:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3834">Then use the Studio properties view to assign this child widget the ID value ID_DROP_LIST_BUTTON, which is an internally defined ID value recognized by the parent drop list:</span></span>

![Skärmbild av egenskapsvyn i Studio.](./media/guix/image7.jpg)

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3836">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3836">Parameters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3837">**drop_list** Pekare till kontrollblocket för listrutan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3837">**drop_list** Pointer to the drop list control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3838">**namn** Namn på listrutan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3838">**name** Name of the drop list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3839">**överordnad** Pekare till den överordnade widgeten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3839">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3840">**total_rows** Totalt antal rader i listrutan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3840">**total_rows** Total number of rows in the drop list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3841">**open_height** Höjden på den lodräta listan som visas när listrutan öppnas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3841">**open_height** The height of the vertical list displayed when the drop list is opened.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3842">**motringning** Funktion som anropas av den lodräta listan när listan rullas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3842">**callback** Function called by the vertical list when the list is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3843">Se dokumentationen för GX_VERTICAL_LIST för mer information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3843">Refer to the documentation of GX_VERTICAL_LIST for more information.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3844">**style** Kantlinjeformatet i listrutan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3844">**style** The drop-down list border style.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3845">**drop_list_id** Programdefinierat ID för listrutan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3845">**drop_list_id** Application-defined ID of the drop list</span></span>

```C
{
    …
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3863">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3863">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_DROP_LIST *list, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3864">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3864">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3865">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för listrutan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3865">This service processes an event for the drop list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3866">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3866">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3867">**drop_list** Kontrollblock för listwidget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3867">**drop_list** Drop list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3868">**händelse** Pekare till händelse att bearbeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3868">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3869">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3869">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3870">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Drop List-händelse har bearbetats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3870">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed drop list event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3871">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3871">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3872">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3872">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3873">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3873">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3874">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3874">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3875">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3875">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic drop list event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_drop_list_event_process(GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default drop list
            event processing */
        status = gx_drop_list_event_process(drop_list, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3905">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3905">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3906">Tilldela en bakgrundsbild till listrutan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3906">Assign a background image to the drop list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3907">Den här pixelkartan används som bakgrund för själva listwidgeten och inte för den lodräta popup-listan som visas när listan öppnas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3907">This pixelmap is used as the background for the drop list widget itself, and not for the popup vertical list that is displayed when the list is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3908">Om du vill tilldela en pixelkarta till listrutan måste du först anropa gx_drop_list_popup_get för att hämta en pekare till popup-listan och sedan använda gx_window_wallpaper_set() för att tilldela en pixelkarta till den här popup-listan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3908">To assign a pixelmap to the drop-list popup, you would need to first call gx_drop_list_popup_get to retrieve a pointer to the popup list, and then use gx_window_wallpaper_set() to assign a pixelmap to this popup list.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3914">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3914">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

## <a name="gx_drop_list_popup_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3926">gx_drop_list_popup_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3926">gx_drop_list_popup_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3927">Hämta pekare till lodrät popup-lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3927">Retrieve pointer to popup vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3928">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3928">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_drop_list_popup_get(
    GX_DROP_LIST *drop_list,
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST **return_list);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3929">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3929">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3930">En widget i listrutan består av själva widgeten för listrutan och en lodrät popup-lista som visas när widgeten för listrutan öppnas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3930">A drop-list widget is composed of the drop-list widget itself, and a popup vertical list that is shown when the drop-list widget is opened.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3931">Den här tjänsten hämtar en pekare till den lodräta listkomponenten i listrutan, så att programmet kan anropa API-tjänster direkt på den här lodräta listan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3931">This service retrieves a pointer to the vertical list component of the drop list, allowing the application to invoke API services directly on this vertical list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3932">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3932">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3933">**drop_list** Pekare till kontrollblocket för listrutan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3933">**drop_list** Pointer to the drop list control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3934">**return_list** Pekare till den lodräta listan som lagras i listrutan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3934">**return_list** Pointer to the vertical list stored in the drop list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3935">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3935">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3936">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) En lodrät popup-lista har hämtats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3936">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved popup vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3937">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3937">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3938">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3938">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-3940">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-3940">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DROP_LIST drop_list;
GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list;

/* Retrieve the popup list of “drop_list”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the popup list was successfully retrieved. */
```

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4005">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4005">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4006">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4006">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4007">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4007">Example</span></span>

```C

/* Define visible rows.  */
#define VISIBLE_ROWS 5

/* Define row memory.  */
GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT row_memory[VISIBLE_ROWS + 1];

/* Define callback function.  */
VOID row_create(GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_WIDGET *widget, INT index)
{
GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *row = (GX_PROMPT *)widget;
GX_BOOL result;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

    gx_widget_created_test(widget, &result);

    if(!result)
    {
        gx_numeric_prompt_create(row, "", wheel, 0, GX_STYLE_ENABLED, 0, &size);
    }

    gx_numeric_prompt_value_set(row, index);
}

/* Create "generic_wheel” with 20 rows.  */
status = gx_generic_scroll_wheel_create(&generic_wheel, “generic_wheel”, &parent, 20, row_create,
                                       GX_STYLE_ENABLED, WHEEL_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the generic scroll wheel "generic_wheel”" has been created. */

/* Create children for generic scroll wheel.  */
for(index = 0; index <= VISIBLE_ROWS; index++)
{
    row_create(generic_wheel, (GX_WIDGET *)&row_memory[index], index);
}
```
