### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4047">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4047">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_generic_scroll_wheel_event_process(
    GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4048">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4048">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4049">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för det här fönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4049">This service processes an event for this window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4050">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4050">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4051">**hjul** Pekare till allmänt kontrollblock för rullningshjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4051">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4052">**händelse** Pekare till händelse att bearbeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4052">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4053">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4053">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4054">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad allmän bearbetning av rullningshjulshändelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4054">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful generic scroll wheel event processing</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4055">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4055">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4056">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4056">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4057">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4057">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4058">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4058">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4059">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4059">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4060">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4060">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic generic scroll wheel event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_generic_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_GENERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
                                               GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:

            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;

        default:

            /* Pass all other events to the default generic scroll wheel
            event processing */
            status = gx_generic_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
            break;
        }
        return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4154">gx_horizontal_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4154">gx_horizontal_list_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4155">Skapa vågrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4155">Create horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4156">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4156">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_create(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *horizontal_list,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_columns,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *, 
    GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT horizontal_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4157">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4157">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4158">Den här tjänsten skapar en vågrät lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4158">This service creates a horizontal list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4159">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4159">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4160">**horizontal_list** Kontrollblock för vågrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4160">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4161">**namn** Namn på vågrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4161">**name** Name of horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4162">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4162">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4163">**total_columns** Totalt antal comumn i vågrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4163">**total_columns** Total number of comumns in horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4164">**motringning** Det här är en pekare till en återanropsfunktion som tillhandahålls av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4164">**callback** This is a pointer to a callback function provided by the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4165">Motringningsfunktionen anropas när den vågräta listan rullas för att skapa de nyligen synliga listobjekten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4165">The callback function is invoked when the horizontal list is scrolled, to create the newly visible list items.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4166">På så sätt kan den vågräta listan visa alla användardefinierade widgettyper som listobjekt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4166">In this way the horizontal list can display any user-defined widget type as the list items.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4167">**style (stil)** Stil på rullningslistswidgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4167">**style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4168">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widgetspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4168">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4169">**horizontal_list_id** Programdefinierat ID för vågrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4169">**horizontal_list_id** Application-defined ID of horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4170">**storlek** Dimensioner för horizonallistan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4170">**size** Dimensions of the horitzonal list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4171">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4171">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4172">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Den vågräta listan har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4172">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created the horizontal list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4173">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4173">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4174">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4174">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4175">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** widgeten (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4175">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4176">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Ogiltig blockstorlek för widgetkontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4176">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4177">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Antal kolumner som inte är giltiga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4177">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Number of columns not valid</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4197">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4197">Return Values</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4201">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4201">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4202">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4202">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4203">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4203">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic horizontal list event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_list_event_process(
    GX_HORIZONTAL_LIST *list,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default horizontal
        list event processing */
        status =
        gx_horizontal_list_event_process(list, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4236">gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4236">gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4238">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4238">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get(
    GX_horizobntal_LIST *horizontal_list,
    INT *return_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4239">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4239">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4240">Den här tjänsten returnerar det valda listpostindexet för den vågräta listan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4240">This service returns the selected list entry index of the horizontal list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4241">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4241">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4242">**horizontal_list** Kontrollblock för vågrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4242">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4244">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4244">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4245">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckades fick du den vågräta listposten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4245">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful obtained the horizontal list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4247">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4247">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_selected_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4258">gx_horizontal_list_selected_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4258">gx_horizontal_list_selected_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4259">Tilldela den valda posten i en vågrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4259">Assign the selected entry in a horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4260">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4260">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_selected_set(
    GX_HORIZONATAL_LIST *horizontal_list,
    INT index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4261">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4261">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4262">Den här tjänsten tilldelar den valda posten i en vågrät lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4262">This service assigns the selected entry in a horizontal list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4263">Om det behövs bläddrar den vågräta listan för att göra den valda posten synlig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4263">If required, the horizontal list will scroll to make the selected entry visible.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4264">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4264">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4265">**horizontal_list** Kontrollblock för vågrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4265">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4266">**index** Indexbaserad position för ny listpost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4266">**index** Index based position of new list entry</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4267">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4267">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4268">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ange den vågräta listposten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4268">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the horizontal list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4269">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Indexet är inte i ett ogiltigt intervall</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4269">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Index is not in invalid range</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4270">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4270">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4271">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4271">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4272">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4272">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4273">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4273">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4274">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4274">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4275">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4275">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the list entry of “my_list” to the child in line 12. */
status = gx_horizontal_list_selected_set(&my_list, 12);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the list entry of “my_list” has been successfully set to 12. */
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4284">gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4284">gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4285">Hämta markerad post från vågrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4285">Get selected entry from horizontal list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4286">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4286">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get(
    GX_horizobntal_LIST *horizontal_list,
    GX_WIDGET **return_list_entry);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4287">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4287">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4288">Den här tjänsten returnerar den valda listposten i den vågräta listan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4288">This service returns the selected list entry of the horizontal list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4289">Observera att om den vågräta listan har fler rader än underordnade widgetar och den valda posten har rullats från vyn, returnerar detta API GX_NULL eftersom underordnade widgetar används igen när listinnehållet bläddras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4289">Note that if the horizontal list has more rows than child widgets, and the selected entry has been scrolled from view, this API will return GX_NULL because the child widgets are re-used as the list content is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4290">Funktionen gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get returnerar indexet för det valda objektet på ett tillförlitligt sätt, även om objektet har bläddrats från vyn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4290">The gx_horizontal_list_selected_index_get function will reliably return the index of the selected item, even if that item has been scrolled from view.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4291">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4291">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4292">**horizontal_list** Kontrollblock för vågrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4292">**horizontal_list** Horizontal list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4293">**return_list_entry** Mål för widget för returlista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4293">**return_list_entry** Destination for return list entry widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4294">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4294">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4295">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckades fick du den vågräta listposten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4295">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful obtained the horizontal list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4296">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Vald widget har rullats från vyn i en lista med fler rader än underordnade klient.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4296">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Selected widget has been scrolled from view in a list with more rows than client children.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4297">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4297">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4298">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4298">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4299">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4299">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4300">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4300">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4301">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4301">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the list entry at the current index of horizontal list “my_list”. */
status = gx_horizontal_list_selected_widget_get(&my_list, &current_list_entry);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “current_list_entry” contains a pointer to the currently selected widget. */

    
```

## <a name="gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4334">gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4334">gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4335">Skapa vågrät rullningslist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4335">Create horizontal scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4336">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4336">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4337">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4337">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4338">Den här tjänsten skapar en vågrät rullningslist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4338">This service creates a horizontal scrollbar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4339">ID:t för en vågrät rullningslist är fördefinierat (eftersom ett fönster måste veta hur händelser ska fångas upp från den) och storleken är automatisk (eftersom det måste fylla det överordnade fönstrets klientbredd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4339">The ID for a horizontal scrollbar is pre-defined (because a window has to know how to catch events from it), and the size is automatic (because it has to fill the parent window’s client width).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4340">Om vi bestämmer oss för att tillåta rullningslisterna i klientområdet måste vi lägga till ytterligare en create-funktion med id- och storleksparametrarna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4340">If we decide to allow client area scrollbars, we will need to add another create function with the id and size parameters.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4341">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4341">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4342">**rullningslist** Kontrollblock för rullningslistswidget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4342">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4343">**namn** Namn på rullningslist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4343">**name** Name of scrollbar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4344">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4344">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4345">**utseende** Utseendestrukturen definierar utseendet på rullningslisten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4345">**appearance** The appearance structure defines the appearance of the scroll bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4346">Om det här värdet GX_NULL använder rullningslisten det standardutseende som definieras av gx_system_scroll_appearance_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4346">If this value is GX_NULL, the scrollbar will use the default scrollbar appearance defined by gx_system_scroll_appearance_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4347">Se bilaga **I för** definitionen av GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE struktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4347">Refer to **Appendix I** for the definition of the GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4348">**Stil** Stil på rullningslistswidgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4348">**Style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4349">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widgetspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4349">**Appendix D** contains pre- defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4350">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4350">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4351">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad vågrät rullningslist för att skapa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4351">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful horizontal scrollbar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4352">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4352">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4353">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4353">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4354">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4354">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4355">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Ogiltig blockstorlek för widgetkontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4355">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4356">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4356">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4357">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4357">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4358">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4358">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create horizontal scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */
status = gx_horizontal_scrollbar_create(&my_scrollbar,
    “my_horizontal_scrollbar”, &my_parent, GX_NULL,
    GX_STYLE_SCROLLBAR_END_BUTTONS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the horizontal scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4365">gx_icon_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4365">gx_icon_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4366">Knappen Skapa ikon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4366">Create icon button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4367">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4367">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_icon_button_create(
    GX_ICON_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID icon_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT icon_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4368">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4368">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4369">Den här tjänsten skapar den angivna ikonknappwidgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4369">This service creates the specified icon button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4370">GX_ICON_BUTTON härleds från GX_BUTTON och stöder alla gx_button API-tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4370">GX_ICON_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4371">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4371">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4372">**knapp** Pekare till ikonknappens kontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4372">**button** Pointer to icon button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4373">**namn** Logiskt namn på ikonknappwidget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4373">**name** Logical name of icon button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4374">**överordnad** Pekare till den överordnade widgeten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4374">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4375">**icon_id** Resurs-ID för ikon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4375">**icon_id** Resource ID of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4376">**style** Ikonformat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4376">**style** Style of icon.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4377">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widgetspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4377">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4378">**icon_button_id** Knapp för programdefinierat ID för ikon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4378">**icon_button_id** Application-defined ID of icon button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4379">**storlek** Ikonknappen Dimensions of (Ikondimensioner)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4379">**size** Dimensions of icon button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4380">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4380">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4381">**ikonknappen GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4381">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created icon button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4382">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4382">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4383">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4383">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4384">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** widgeten (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4384">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4385">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Ogiltig blockstorlek för widgetkontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4385">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4386">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4386">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4387">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4387">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4388">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4388">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_icon_button”. */
status = gx_icon_button_create(&my_icon_button, “my_icon_button”,
    &my_parent,
    MY_ICON_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_ICON_BUTTON_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the icon button “my_icon_button” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4405">gx_icon_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4405">gx_icon_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4406">Knappen Rita en ikon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4406">Draw an icon button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4407">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4407">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_button_draw(GX_ICON_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4408">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4408">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4409">Den här tjänsten ritar ikonknappen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4409">This service draws the icon button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4410">Den här funktionen anropas vanligtvis internt av GUIX som en del av en uppdateringsåtgärd för arbetsytan, men den exponeras även för programmet som kanske vill tillhandahålla en anpassad ritningsfunktion och anropar standardikonknappritningen som anpassad ritningsbas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4410">This function is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default icon button drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4411">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4411">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4412">**knapp** Pekare till ikonknappkontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4412">**button** Pointer to icon button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4413">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4413">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4414">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4414">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4415">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4415">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4416">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4416">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4417">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4417">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon draw function. */
void MyIconButtonDraw(GX_ICON_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Do the normal drawing first */
    gx_icon_button_draw(button);

    /* Add custom drawing here */
}
```

## <a name="gx_icon_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4465">gx_icon_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4465">gx_icon_background_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4466">Bakgrund av ikonen Rita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4466">Draw icon background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4467">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4467">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_background_draw(GX_ICON *icon);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4468">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4468">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4469">Den här tjänsten ritar bakgrunden till den angivna ikonwidgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4469">This service draws background of the specified icon widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4470">Den här tjänsten anropas vanligtvis internt av gx_icon_button_draw-funktionen, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till att skriva anpassade ritningsfunktioner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4470">This service is normally called internally by the gx_icon_button_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4471">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4471">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4473">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4473">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4474">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4474">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4475">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4475">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4476">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4476">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4477">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4477">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon draw function. */
void MyIconButtonDraw(GX_ICON *icon)
{
    /* Call icon background draw. */
    gx_icon_background_draw(icon);

    /* Add custom drawing here */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw(icon);
}
```

```C

    GX_ICON *icon, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT icon_id, 
    GX_VALUE x, 
    GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4486">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4486">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4487">Den här tjänsten skapar den angivna ikonwidgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4487">This service creates the specified icon widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4488">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4488">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4489">**ikon** Pekare till ikonkontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4489">**icon** Pointer to icon control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4490">**namn** Logiskt namn på ikonwidget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4490">**name** Logical name of icon widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4491">**överordnad** Pekare till den överordnade widgeten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4491">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4492">**pixelmap_id** Resurs-ID för pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4492">**pixelmap_id** Resource ID of pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4493">**style** Ikonformat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4493">**style** Style of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4494">**icon_id** Programdefinierat ID för ikon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4494">**icon_id** Application-defined ID of icon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4495">**x** Starta x-koordinatposition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4495">**x** Starting x-coordinate position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4496">**y** Startar y-koordinatposition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4496">**y** Starting y-coordinate position</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4498">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Skapa ikonen Lyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4498">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful icon create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4499">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4499">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4500">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4500">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4501">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4501">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4502">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Ogiltig blockstorlek för widgetkontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4502">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4503">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4503">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4504">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4504">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4505">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4505">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_icon”. */
status = gx_icon_create(&my_icon, “my_icon”, &my_parent,
    MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_ICON_ID,
    5, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the icon “my_icon” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_icon_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4510">gx_icon_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4510">gx_icon_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4511">Ikonen Rita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4511">Draw icon</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4512">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4512">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_icon_draw(GX_ICON *icon);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4513">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4513">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4514">Den här tjänsten ritar den angivna ikonwidgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4514">This service draws the specified icon widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4515">Den här tjänsten anropas vanligtvis internt av GUIX som en del av en uppdateringsåtgärd för arbetsytan, men den exponeras även för programmet som kanske vill tillhandahålla en anpassad ritningsfunktion och anropa standardikonen som ritar som anpassad ritningsbas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4515">This service is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default icon drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4516">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4516">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4517">**ikon** Kontrollblock för pekare till ikonwidget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4517">**icon** Pointer to icon widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4518">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4518">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4519">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4519">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4520">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4520">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4521">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4521">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4522">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4522">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom icon drawing function. */

VOID my_icon_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default icon draw. */
    gx_icon_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_image_reader_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4566">gx_image_reader_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4566">gx_image_reader_create</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4568">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4568">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_IMAGE_READER *image_reader,
    GX_CONST GX_UBYTE *data, 
    INT data_size,
    GX_UBYTE color_format, 
    GX_UBYTE mode);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4569">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4569">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4570">Den här funktionen skapar en raw-bildläsare/-avkodare för körning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4570">This function creates a runtime raw image reader / decoder.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4571">För närvarande stöds endast jpeg- och png-raw-bildtyper.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4571">Currently only jpeg and png raw image types are supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4572">Den här tjänsten GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT måste definieras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4572">This service requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4573">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4573">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4574">**image_reader** Kontrollblock för bildläsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4574">**image_reader** Image reader control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4575">**data** Pekare till råa indata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4575">**data** Pointer to raw input data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4576">**data_size** Storleken på indata i rådata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4576">**data_size** Size of raw input data.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4577">**color_format** Det begärda färgformatet för utdata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4577">**color_format** The requested output color format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4578">**läge** Komprimera, dithera och alfalägen flaggor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4578">**mode** Compress, dither and alpha modes flags.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4579">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4579">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4580">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Skapa en bildläsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4580">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful image reader create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4581">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4581">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4582">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Ogiltig datastorlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4582">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid data size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4583">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4583">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4584">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4584">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4585">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4585">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_IMAGE_READER my_image_reader;

“color format” could be set to:
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_32ARGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_24RGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_565RGB
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_8BIT_PALETTE

/* Create image reader “my_image_reader”. */
status = gx_image_reader_create(&my_image_reader, decoder_data,
    decoder_data_size,
    GX_COLOR_FORMAT_32ARGB,
    GX_IMAGE_READER_MODE_COMPRESS)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_image_reader” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_image_reader_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4609">gx_image_reader_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4609">gx_image_reader_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4610">Starta dekomprimerings- och konverteringsprocessen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4610">Start the decompress and conversion process</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4611">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4611">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_image_reader_start(
    GX_IMAGE_READER *image_reader, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *outmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4612">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4612">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4613">Den här tjänsten avkodar en raw-bild till ett angivet färgformat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4613">This service decodes a raw image to a specified color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4614">För närvarande stöds endast jpeg- och png-raw-bildtyper.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4614">Currently only jpeg and png raw image types are supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4615">Detta kräver GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT måste definieras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4615">This requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4616">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4616">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4617">**image_reader** Kontrollblock för bildläsare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4617">**image_reader** Image reader control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4618">**pixelkarta** Bildpunktskarta för utdata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4618">**pixelmap** Output pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4619">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4619">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4620">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad avbildningsavkodning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4620">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful image decoding</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4621">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Minnestilldelning har inte definierats eller så misslyckades minnesallokeringen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4621">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4622">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Bildtyp eller format för utdatafärg stöds inte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4622">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Input image type or output color format is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4623">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4623">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4624">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4624">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4625">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4625">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4626">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4626">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4627">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4627">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_IMAGE_READER my_image_reader;
GX_PIXELMAP output_map;

/* Create my_image_reader here. */

/* Decoding a raw image according to the settings of “my_image_reader”. */
status = gx_image_reader_start(&my_image_reader, output_map)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS “output_map” have been loaded with the requested pixelmap. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4634">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4634">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4637">Den här tjänsten anropas vanligtvis internt av gx_line_chart_draw-funktionen, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till att skriva anpassade ritningsfunktioner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4637">This service is normally called internally by the gx_line_chart_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom chart drawing function. */

VOID my_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart)
{
    /* Call default window draw. */
    gx_window_draw((GX_WINDOW *)chart);

    /* Draw the line chart axis. */
    gx_line_chart_axis_draw(&chart->gx_line_chart_info);

    /* Draw the data line */
    gx_line_chart_data_draw(&chart->gx_line_chart_info);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4675">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4675">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create a line chart */
GX_LINE_CHART chart;
GX_RECTANGLE chart_size;
GX_LINE_CHART_INFO gx_chart_info;
GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root_window;

chart_size = root_window->gx_widget_size;

/* Initialize params for the GUIX base chart. */
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_min_val = DATA_MIN_VAL;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_max_val = DATA_MAX_VAL;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_max_data_count = MAX_DATA_COUNT;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_active_data_count = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_axis_line_width = AXIS_LINE_WIDTH;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_data_line_width = DATA_LINE_WIDTH;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_data = chart_data;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_line_color = GX_COLOR_ID_DATA_LINE;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_axis_color = GX_COLOR_ID_AXIS_LINE;

/* Leave room for labels on bottom and right. */
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_left_margin = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_top_margin = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_right_margin = 80;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_bottom_margin = 32;

status = gx_line_chart_create(&chart, “Line Chart”, root_window,
    &gx_chart_info, GX_STYLE_NONE, &chart_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the “chart” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4740">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4740">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4741">Beräkna skalningsvärde för y-axeln med fast punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4741">Calculate fixed-point y axis scaling value</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate(
    GX_LINE_CHART *chart,
    INT *return_val);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4743">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4743">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4744">Den här tjänsten beräknar det skalningsvärde med fast punkt som används för att rita datavärden på diagrammets Y-axel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4744">This service calculates the fixed-point scaling value used to plot data values on the chart Y axis.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4745">Rektangeln chart_info och diagramrektangeln används för att beräkna det här skalningsvärdet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4745">The chart_info parameters and chart bounding rectangle are used to calculate this scaling value.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4748">**return_val** Adressen till värdet som ska innehålla returvärdet för fast punkt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4748">**return_val** Address of value to hold fixed-point return value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4749">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4749">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4750">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ett lyckat y-skalningsvärde beräknas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4750">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful y scale value calculate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4751">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4751">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_menu_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4760">gx_menu_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4760">gx_menu_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4761">Skapa en meny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4761">Create a menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4762">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4762">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_create(
    GX_MENU *menu,GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_id, 
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT menu_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4763">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4763">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4764">Den här tjänsten skapar en meny som anges och associerar menyn med den angivna överordnade widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4764">This service creates a menu as specified and associates the menu with the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4765">Den accepterar alla typer av widget som underordnade menyalternativ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4765">It accepts all types of widget as child menu item.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4766">Om du vill infoga en widget som ett underobjekt, **anropar du gx_menu_insert**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4766">To insert a widget as a child menu item, call **gx_menu_insert**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4767">GX_MENU härleds från GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT och stöder alla gx_pixelmap_prompt API-tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4767">GX_MENU is derived from GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT and supports all gx_pixelmap_prompt API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4768">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4768">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4769">**meny** Pekare till menykontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4769">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4770">**namn** Namnet på menyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4770">**name** Name of the menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4771">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4771">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4772">**text_id** Resurs-ID för text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4772">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4773">**fill_id** Resurs-ID för fyllning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4773">**fill_id** Resource ID of fill</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4774">**style** Widgetens format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4774">**style** Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4775">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widgetspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4775">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4776">**menu_id** Programdefinierat ID för menyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4776">**menu_id** Application-defined ID of the menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4777">**storlek** Menyns storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4777">**size** Size of the menu</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4778">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4778">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4779">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Menyn har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4779">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful menu creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4780">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4780">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4781">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4781">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4782">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** widgeten (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4782">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4783">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Ogiltig blockstorlek för widgetkontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4783">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4784">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4784">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4785">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4785">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4786">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4786">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_MENU my_menu;

/* Create “my_menu”. */
status = gx_menu_create(&my_menu, “my_menu”, parent, MY_TEXT_ID,
    MY_FILL_ID, GX_STYLE_ENABLED, MY_MENU_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the menu was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_menu_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4798">gx_menu_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4798">gx_menu_draw</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4800">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4800">Prototype</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4802">Den här tjänsten ritar den angivna menyn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4802">This service draws the specified menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4803">Den här funktionen anropas vanligtvis internt av GUIX-mekanismen för arbetsyteuppdatering, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till med implementeringen av anpassade ritningsfunktioner för anpassade menywidgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4803">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom menu widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4810">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4810">Example</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4837">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4837">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4838">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4838">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic menu event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_menu_event_process(GX_MENU *menu, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */

        /* Call default event process if this is a system event such as GX_EVENT_SHOW. */
        status = gx_menu_event_process(menu, event);
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default menu
           event processing */
        status = gx_menu_event_process(menu, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}

```

## <a name="gx_menu_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4898">gx_menu_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4898">gx_menu_text_draw</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4900">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4900">Prototype</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4901">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4901">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4902">Den här tjänsten ritar texten i en meny.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4902">This service draws the text of a menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4903">Den här funktionen anropas vanligtvis internt av GUIX-arbetsyteuppdateringsmekanismen, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till med implementeringen av anpassade ritningsfunktioner för anpassade menywidgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4903">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom menu widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4904">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4904">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4907">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4907">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4908">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4908">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4909">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4909">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4910">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4910">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom menu drawing function. */

VOID my_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default menu background draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_prompt_background_draw(
                            (GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *)menu);

    /* Draw menu text. */
    gx_menu_text_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4949">gx_multi_line_text_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4949">gx_multi_line_text_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4950">Knappen Skapa flerradstext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4950">Create multi line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4951">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4951">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT text_button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4952">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4952">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4953">Den här tjänsten skapar en widget med flerradig textknapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4953">This service creates a multi-line text button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4954">En textknapp med flera rader visar knapptexten över 1 n rader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4954">A multi-line text button displays the button text over 1-n lines.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4955">Det maximala antalet rader definieras av konstanten GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON_MAX_LINES, som standard är 4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4955">The maximum number of lines is defined by the constant GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON_MAX_LINES, which defaults to 4.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4956">Radbrytningarna anges med vagnretur och/eller vagnretur + radmatningspar i textsträngen som tilldelas till flerradstextknappen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4956">The line breaks are set by carriage return and/or carriage return + line feed pairs within the text string assigned to the multi-line text button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4957">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON härleds från GX_TEXT_BUTTON och stöder alla gx_text_button API-tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4957">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON and supports all gx_text_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4958">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4958">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4959">**text_button** Pekare till textknappkontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4959">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4960">**namn** Textknappens logiska namn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4960">**name** Logical name of text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4961">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget för knappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4961">**parent** Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4962">**text_id** Resurs-ID för text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4962">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4963">**style** Textknappstil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4963">**style** Text button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4964">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widgetspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4964">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4965">**text_button_id** Programdefinierat ID för textknappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4965">**text_button_id** Application-defined ID of the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4966">**storlek** Knappens storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4966">**size** Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4967">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4967">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4968">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Skapa en textknapp med flera linjer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4968">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi line text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4969">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4969">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4970">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4970">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4971">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** widgeten (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4971">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4972">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Ogiltig blockstorlek för widgetkontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4972">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4973">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4973">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4975">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4975">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create multi-line text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_create(&my_text_button, "my text button",
    &my_parent_window, MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE, MY_TEXT_BUTTON_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the multi-line text button “my_text_button” was created. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4983">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4983">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4984">Knappen Rita flerradstext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4984">Draw multi-line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4985">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4985">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4986">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4986">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4987">Den här tjänsten ritar textknappen med flera linjer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4987">This service draws the multi-line text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4988">Den här funktionen anropas vanligtvis internt av GUIX som en del av en uppdateringsåtgärd för arbetsytan, men den exponeras även för programmet som kanske vill tillhandahålla en anpassad ritningsfunktion och anropar standardritningen med flerradig textknapp som anpassad ritningsbas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4988">This function is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default multi-line text button drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4989">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4989">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4990">**knapp** Pekare till textknappkontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4990">**button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4991">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4991">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4992">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4992">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4993">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4993">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4994">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4994">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-4995">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-4995">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw the text button “my_text_button”. */
void MyButtonDraw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Do the normal drawing first */
    gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(&my_text_button);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5003">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5003">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5004">Standardhändelsehantering för textknapp med flera linjer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5004">Default event handling for multi-line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5005">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5005">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5006">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5006">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5007">Den här tjänsten är standardfunktionen för händelsehantering för widgeten för flerradig textknapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5007">This service is the default event handling function for the multi line text button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5008">Den här funktionen görs tillgänglig för program som vill tillhandahålla anpassad händelsehantering för en textknappwidget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5008">This function is made accessible to applications that want to provide custom event handling for a text button widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5009">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5009">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5010">**knapp** Pekare till textknappkontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5010">**button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5011">**event_ptr** Händelse som ska bearbetas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5011">**event_ptr** Event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5012">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5012">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5013">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Hanterad händelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5013">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully handled event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5014">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5014">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5015">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5015">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5016">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5016">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5017">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5017">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5018">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5018">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT MyEventHandler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(button, event_ptr);
        /* add custom actions here */
        break;
    default:
        gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(button, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```
