## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5026">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5026">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5027">Stödfunktion för ritning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5027">Drawing support function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5028">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5028">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5029">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5029">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5030">Den här stödfunktionen ritar textdelen av en flerradstextknapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5030">This support function draws the text portion of a multi-line text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5031">Den här funktionen anropas internt av gx_multi_line_text_button_draw() och tillhandahålls som ett separat API för program som definierar en anpassad funktion för att rita flerradiga textknapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5031">This function is called internally by gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom multi-line text button drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5032">Program som vill anpassa knappbakgrundsritningen kan tillhandahålla sin anpassade ritningsfunktion och anropa multi_line_text_button_text_draw-tjänsten som en del av sin anpassade ritning för att rita knapptexten över bakgrunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5032">Applications that want to customize the button background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the multi_line_text_button_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the button text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5033">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5033">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5034">**text_button** Pekare till textknappens kontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5034">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5035">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5035">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5036">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5036">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5037">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5037">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5038">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5038">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5039">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5039">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */
VOID my_button_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* insert code here to draw button background */

    /* call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw();

    /* draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) button);
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5058">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5058">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

```C
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string ID MY_STRING_ID was set to “my_text_button”. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5070">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5070">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5072">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5072">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_button_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5073">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5073">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5074">Den här tjänsten är inaktuell till förmån för gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5074">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5075">Den här tjänsten tilldelar den angivna strängen till textknappen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5075">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5076">Om text_button-widgeten har skapats med GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY skapar widgeten en privat kopia av textsträngen som tilldelats, och därför måste gx_system_memmory_allocate_set-API:et anropas en gång innan den här tjänsten begärs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5076">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5077">Om GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY inte är aktiv, gör widgeten inte en privat kopia av den inkommande strängen och därför måste strängen allokeras statiskt eller globalt, dvs. det kanske inte är en automatisk eller tillfällig variabel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5077">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5078">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5078">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5079">**text_button** Pekare till textknappens kontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5079">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5080">**text pekare** till den NULL-avslutade strängen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5080">**text** pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5081">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5081">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5082">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ange texten till knappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5082">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5083">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5083">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5084">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5084">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5085">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Minnes allocator har inte definierats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5085">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5086">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Ogiltig stränglängd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5086">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5087">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5087">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5088">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5088">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5089">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5089">Example</span></span>

```C
static GX_CHAR text[] = “myrstring”;

/* Set text to the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set(&my_text_button, text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text of “my_text_button” was set. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5101">Den här tjänsten tilldelar den angivna strängen till textknappen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5101">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5102">Om text_button-widgeten har skapats med format GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY skapar widgeten en privat kopia av den tilldelade textsträngen och därför måste gx_system_memmory_allocate_set-API:et anropas en gång innan den här tjänsten begärs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5102">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5103">Om GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY inte är aktiv, gör widgeten inte en privat kopia av den inkommande strängen och därför måste strängen vara statisk eller globalt allokerad, det vill säga det kanske inte är en automatisk eller tillfällig variabel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5103">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

```C
static GX_CHAR text[] = “myrstring”;
GX_STRING string;

string.gx_string_ptr = text;
string.gx_string_length = strlen(text);

/* Set text to the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext(&my_text_button, string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text of “my_text_button” was set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5262">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5262">gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5263">Infoga en teckensträng vid aktuell textindatamarkörposition med flera linjer (inaktuell)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5263">Insert a character string at current multi line text input cursor position (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5264">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5264">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_UBYTE *insert_str,
    UINT insert_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5265">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5265">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5266">Det här API:et är inaktuellt och ersätts av gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5266">This API is deprecated and replaced by gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5267">Den här tjänsten infogar en teckensträng i bufferten för textinmatningssträngar med flera linjer vid den aktuella markörpositionen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5267">This service inserts a character string into the multi line text input string buffer at the current cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5268">Den här tjänsten anropas internt när en specifik nyckel ned-händelse tas emot, men kan också anropas av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5268">This service is called internally when specific key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5269">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5269">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5270">**text_input** Kontrollblock för textinmatningswidget med flera linjer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5270">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5271">**insert_str** Teckensträng i UTF-8-format som ska infogas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5271">**insert_str** UTF-8 format character string to be inserted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5272">**insert_size** Antal byte som ska infogas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5272">**insert_size** Byte count to be inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5273">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5273">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5274">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Har infogat teckensträngen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5274">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully inserted the character string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5275">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5275">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5276">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5276">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5277">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5277">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5278">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Ogiltig strängstorlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5278">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid string size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5279">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Ogiltigt teckensnitt eller utanför buffertstorleken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5279">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Invalid font or out of buffer size</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5281">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5281">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Insert characters at current cursor position. */
GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert(&my_text_input,
    insert_text,
    GX_STRLEN(insert_text));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input widget has successfully insert the string. */
```

```C
/* Insert characters at current cursor position. */
GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
GX_STRING string;

string.gx_string_ptr = insert_text;
string.gx_string_length = strlen(insert_text);

status = gx_multi_line_text_input_char_insert_ext(&my_text_input, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the multi line text input widget has successfully inserted the string. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5336">gx_multi_line_text_input_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5336">gx_multi_line_text_input_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5337">Skapa textinmatning med flera linjer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5337">Create multi-line text input</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5338">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5338">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_CHAR *input_buffer, UINT buffer_size,
    ULONG style, USHORT text_input_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5339">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5339">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5340">Den här tjänsten skapar en widget för textinmatning med flera linjer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5340">This service creates a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5341">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT härleds från GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW och stöder alla gx_multi_line_text_view tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5341">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT is derived from GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW and supports all gx_multi_line_text_view services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5342">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5342">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5343">**text_input** Kontrollblock för textinmatningswidget med flera linjer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5343">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5344">**namn** Namn på textinmatningswidget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5344">**name** Name of text input widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5345">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5345">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5346">**input_buffer** Pekare till textindatabuffert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5346">**input_buffer** Pointer to text input buffer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5347">**buffer_size** Storleken på textindatabufferten i byte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5347">**buffer_size** Size of text input buffer in bytes</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5348">**style** Format för textinmatningswidget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5348">**style** Style of text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5349">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widgetspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5349">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5350">**text_input_id** Programdefinierat ID för textinmatning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5350">**text_input_id** Application-defined ID of text input</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5351">**storlek** Dimensioner för textinmatningswidget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5351">**size** Dimensions of text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5352">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5352">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5353">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad flerrads skapa textinmatning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5353">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text input create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5354">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5354">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5355">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5355">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5356">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** widgeten (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5356">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5359">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5359">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5360">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5360">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5361">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5361">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT my_text_input;
GX_CHAR my_buffer[100];
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 10, 10, 100, 200);

/* Create multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_create(&my_text_input,
    “my_text_input”, &my_parent,
    my_buffer, 100, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_TEXT_INPUT_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text input “my_text_input” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5440">gx_multi_line_text_input_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5440">gx_multi_line_text_input_delete</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5441">Ta bort tecknet vid markörpositionen för textinmatning på flera rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5441">Delete the character at the multi line text input cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5442">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5442">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_delete(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5443">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5443">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5444">Den här tjänsten tar bort tecknet efter markörpositionen för textinmatning med flera rader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5444">This service deletes the character after the multi line text input cursor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5445">Den här tjänsten anropas internt när en borttagningsnyckel nedåt-händelse tas emot, men kan även anropas av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5445">This service is called internally when a delete key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5450">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5450">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5451">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5451">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5488">gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5488">gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5490">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5490">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_down_arrow(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5491">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5491">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5492">Den här tjänsten placerar markören för flerradig textinmatningswidget till nästa rad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5492">This service positions the multi line text input widget cursor to the next line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5493">Den här tjänsten anropas internt när en nedåtpil nedåt-händelse tas emot, men kan också anropas av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5493">This service is called internally when a down arrow key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5494">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5494">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5496">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5496">Return Values</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_end"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5536">gx_multi_line_text_input_end</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5536">gx_multi_line_text_input_end</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5537">Flytta markören för textinmatning med flera linjer till slutet av den aktuella raden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5537">Move the multi line text input cursor to the end of the current line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5538">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5538">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_end(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5539">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5539">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5540">Den här tjänsten placerar markören för flerradig textinmatningswidget i slutet av den aktuella strängraden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5540">This service positions the multi line text input widget cursor to the end of the current string line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5541">Den här tjänsten anropas internt när en slutnyckel nedåt-händelse tas emot, men kan också anropas av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5541">This service is called internally when an end key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5543">**text_input** Kontrollblock för textinmatningswidget med flera linjer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5543">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5544">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5544">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5545">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Textinmatningsmarkören har flyttats till slutet av den aktuella raden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5545">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved text input cursor to end of the current line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5546">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5546">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5547">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5547">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5549">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5549">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the multi line text input cursor has been moved to the end of the current line. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5583">gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5583">gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5584">Standardhändelsehantering för textinmatning med flera linjer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5584">Default event handling for multi-line text input</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5585">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5585">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5586">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5586">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5587">Den här tjänsten är standardfunktionen för händelsehantering för flerradig textinmatningswidget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5587">This service is the default event handling function for the multi line text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5588">Den här funktionen görs tillgänglig för program som vill tillhandahålla anpassad händelsehantering för en flerradswidget för textinmatning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5588">This function is made accessible to applications that want to provide custom event handling for a multi line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5589">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5589">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5590">**knapp** Pekare till kontrollblock för textinmatning med flera linjer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5590">**button** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5591">**event_ptr** Händelse som ska bearbetas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5591">**event_ptr** Event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5592">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5592">Return Values</span></span>

```C
UINT MyEventHandler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic multi line text
            input event processing */
        gx_multi_line_text_input_event_process(input, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5631">gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5631">gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5632">Ange bakgrundsfärg för textinmatning med flera linjer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5632">Set multi line text input background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5633">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5633">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5634">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5634">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5635">Den här tjänsten tilldelar fyllningsfärger för flerradig textinmatningswidget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5635">This service assigns fill colors for the multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5636">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5636">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5637">**text_input** Kontrollblock för textinmatningswidget med flera linjer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5637">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5638">**normal_fill_color_id** Resurs-ID för den normala fyllningsfärgen som används i normalt tillstånd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5638">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the normal fill color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5639">**selected_fill_color_id** Resurs-ID för den valda fyllningsfärgen som används när widgeten får fokus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5639">**selected_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the selected fill color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5640">**disabled_fill_color_id** Resurs-ID för den inaktiverade fyllningsfärgen som används när GX_STYLE_ENABLED inte är aktiv</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5640">**disabled_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled fill color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5641">**readonly_fill_color_id** Resurs-ID för den skrivskyddade fyllningsfärg som används när både GX_STYLE_ENABLED och GX_STYLE_INPUT_READONLY är aktiva.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5641">**readonly_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the read only fill color that used when both GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_INPUT_READONLY are active.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5642">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5642">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5644">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5644">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5645">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5645">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5648">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5648">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set fill colors for the multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */

status = gx_multi_line_text_input_fill_color_set(&my_text_input,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL,
    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill color of “my_text_input” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_home"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5680">gx_multi_line_text_input_home</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5680">gx_multi_line_text_input_home</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5681">Flytta textindatamarkören till början av den aktuella raden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5681">Move the text input cursor to the start of the current line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5682">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5682">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_home(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5683">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5683">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5684">Den här tjänsten flyttar markörpositionen för textinmatning till början av den aktuella raden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5684">This service moves the text input cursor position to the start of the current line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5685">Den här tjänsten anropas internt när en startnyckel nedåt-händelse tas emot, men kan även anropas av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5685">This service is called internally when a home key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5824">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5824">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_style_add(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5825">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5825">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5826">Den här tjänsten lägger till format i en flerradig textinmatningswidget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5826">This service adds styles to a multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5834">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5834">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

```C
    GX_STYLE_CURSOR_ALWAYS);
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5963">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5963">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5964">Ange textfärg för textinmatning med flera linjer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5964">Set multi line text input text color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5965">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5965">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5966">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5966">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5967">Den här tjänsten tilldelar textfärger för flerradig textinmatningswidget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5967">This service assigns text colors for the multi-line text input widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5968">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5968">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5969">**text_input** Kontrollblock för textinmatningswidget med flera linjer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5969">**text_input** Multi-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5970">**normal_fill_color_id** Resurs-ID för den normala textfärgen som används i normalt tillstånd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5970">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5971">**selected_text_color_id** Resurs-ID för den valda textfärgen som används när widgeten får fokus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5971">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-5972">**disabled_text_color_id** Resurs-ID för den inaktiverade textfärg som används när GX_STYLE_ENABLED inte är aktiv</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-5972">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled text color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the multi-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_color_set(&my_text_input,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill colors of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6012">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6012">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6013">Välj text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6013">Select text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6014">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6014">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    UINT start_index, UINT end_index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6015">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6015">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6016">Den här tjänsten väljer textinmatningstext med flera linjer med angivet start- och slutmärkesindex och markerar den markerade texten med den markerade fyllningen och textfärgerna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6016">This service selects multi line text input text with specified start mark and end mark index and highlights the selected text with the selected fill and text colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6017">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6017">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6018">**text_input** Pekare till kontrollblock för textinmatning med flera linjer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6018">**text_input** Pointer to multi line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6019">**start_index** Index för det första markerade tecknet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6019">**start_index** Index of the first selected character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6020">**end_index** Index för det senast valda tecknet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6020">**end_index** Index of the last selected character</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6021">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6021">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6022">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad textinmatningstextmarkering med flera linjer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6022">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi line text input text selection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6023">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6023">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6024">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6024">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6025">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6025">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6026">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Indexvärdet är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6026">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Index value not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6027">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6027">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6028">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6028">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6029">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6029">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Select text between index [0, 9]. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_input_text_select(&my_text_input,
    0,9);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text between 
    index [0, 9] “my_text_input” was selected. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6061">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6061">gx_multi_line_text_input_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6062">Tilldela text till textinmatningen (inaktuell)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6062">Assign text to the text input (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6063">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6063">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_input_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

```C

```

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6139">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6139">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6140">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6140">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6176">gx_multi_line_text_view_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6176">gx_multi_line_text_view_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6177">Skapa flerradstextvy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6177">Create multi-line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6178">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6178">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WINDOW *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT text_view_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6179">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6179">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6180">Den här tjänsten skapar en GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6180">This service creates a GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6181">Den här widgettypen härleds från GX_WINDOW och därför kan alla gx_window API-tjänster också användas med den här widgettypen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6181">This widget type is derived from GX_WINDOW, and therefore all gx_window API services may also be utilized with this widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6182">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6182">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6183">**text_view** Kontrollblock för flerradswidget för textvy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6183">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6184">**namn** Namnet på textvywidgeten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6184">**name** Name of the text view widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6185">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6185">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6186">**text_id** Resurs-ID för textsträngen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6186">**text_id** Resource ID of the text string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6187">**style** Format för textvywidgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6187">**style** Style of text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6188">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widgetspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6188">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6189">**text_view_id** Programdefinierat ID för textvyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6189">**text_view_id** Application-defined ID of text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6190">**storlek** Dimensioner för textvywidget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6190">**size** Dimensions of text view widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6191">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6191">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6192">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Widgeten för flerradstextvy har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6192">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created multi-line text view widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6193">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6193">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6194">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6194">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6195">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** widgeten (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6195">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6196">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Ogiltig blockstorlek för widgetkontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6196">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6197">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6197">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6198">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6198">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6199">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6199">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_create(&my_text_view,
    “my_text_view”, &my_parent,
    TEXT_STRING_ID, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
    MY_TEXT_VIEW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text view “my_text_view” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6231">gx_multi_line_text_view_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6231">gx_multi_line_text_view_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6232">Rita en flerradswidget för textvy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6232">Draw a multi line text view widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6233">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6233">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_view_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW * text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6234">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6234">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6235">Den här tjänsten ritar en widget för textvyer med flera linjer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6235">This service draws a multi line text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6236">Den här tjänsten anropas vanligtvis internt under arbetsyteuppdateringen, men kan även anropas från anpassade ritningsfunktioner för flerradig textvy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6236">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom multi line text view drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6237">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6237">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6238">**text_view** Kontrollblock för flerradswidget för textvy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6238">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6239">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6239">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6240">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6240">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6241">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6241">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6242">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6242">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6243">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6243">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom multi line text view drawing function. */

VOID my_multi_line_text_view_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *view)
{
    /* Call default multi line text view draw. */
    gx_multi_line_text_view_draw(view);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6275">gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6275">gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6276">Bearbeta textvisningshändelse med flera rad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6276">Process multi-line text view event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6277">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6277">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6278">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6278">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6279">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för en flerradig textvisningswidget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6279">This service processes an event for a multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6280">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6280">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6281">**text_view** Kontrollblock för flerradswidget för textvy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6281">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6282">**händelse** Pekare till händelse som ska bearbetas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6282">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6283">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6283">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6284">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad flerradshändelseprocess för textvisning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6284">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi-line text view event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6285">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6285">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6286">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6286">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6287">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6287">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6288">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6288">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6289">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6289">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6290">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6290">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event handler. */
UINT my_event_handler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *view, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process(view, event_ptr);
        /* Add custom actions here. */
        break;
    default:
        gx_multi_line_text_view_event_process (view, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id);
```

```C
/* Set font ID FONT_ID to the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */

```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6368">gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6368">gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6369">Ange radutrymme för flerradsvy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6369">Set multi-line text view line space</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6370">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6370">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_BYTE line_space);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6371">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6371">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6372">Den här tjänsten anger avståndet mellan textrader för widgeten för flerradig textvy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6372">This service sets the spacing between lines of text for the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6373">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6373">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6374">**visa** Kontrollblock för flerradswidget för textvy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6374">**view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6375">**line_space** Värde att ange</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6375">**line_space** Value to set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6376">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6376">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6377">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ange radutrymmesvärde för flerradstextvyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6377">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set line space value for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6378">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6378">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6379">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6379">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6380">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6380">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6381">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6381">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* Set line space of “my_text_view” to 2. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_line_space_set(&my_text_view, 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the line space of “my_text_view” has been successfully set to 2. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6413">gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6413">gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6414">Hämta information om rullningslisten för flerradsvyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6414">Get multi-line text view scroll info</span></span>


### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6415">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6415">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6416">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6416">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6417">Den här tjänsten hämtar rullningsinformationen för flerradig textvy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6417">This service gets the multi-line text view scroll information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6418">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6418">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6419">**text_view** Kontrollblock för flerradswidget för textvy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6419">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6420">**Stil** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL eller GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6420">**Style** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL or GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6421">**Information** Pekare till mål för rullningsinformation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6421">**Info** Pointer to destination for scroll info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6422">**Bilaga I** innehåller en definition GX_SCROLL_INFO struktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6422">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6423">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6423">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6424">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Rullningsinformationen för textvyn har hämtats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6424">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved text view scroll info</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6425">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Widget är inte synlig eller textvisningens teckensnitts-ID är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6425">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Widget is not visible or text view font id is not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6426">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6426">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6427">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6427">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6428">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6428">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6429">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6429">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLL_INFO scroll_info;

/* Get scroll information for multi-line text view “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_scroll_info_get(&my_text_view,
    &scroll_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “scroll_info” contains the scroll information for multi-line text view “my_text_view”. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6461">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6461">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6462">Ange textfärgen för flerradstextvyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6462">Set the text color for the multi line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6463">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6463">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCe_ID disabled_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6464">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6464">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6465">Den här tjänsten tilldelar textfärg till flerradig textvisningswidget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6465">This service assigns text color to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6466">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6466">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6467">**text_view** Kontrollblock för flerradswidget för textvy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6467">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6468">**normal_text_color_id** Resurs-ID för den normala textfärgen som används i normalt tillstånd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6468">**normal_text_color_id** Resource ID of the normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6469">**selected_text_color_id** Resurs-ID för den valda textfärgen som används när widgeten får fokus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6469">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6470">**disabled_text_color_id** Resurs-ID för den inaktiverade textfärgen som GX_STYLE_ENABLED är inte aktiv</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6470">**disabled_text_color_id** Resource ID of the disabled text color that used GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6471">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6471">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6472">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Har angett färger för flerradstextvyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6472">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set colors for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6473">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6473">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6474">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6474">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6475">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6475">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6476">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6476">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6477">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6477">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_color_set(&my_text_view,
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text color of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_id_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6512">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6512">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6518">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ange sträng-ID för flerradstextvyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6518">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set string id for the multi-line text view</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6520">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6520">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6521">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Ogiltigt resurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6521">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6556">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6556">gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6557">Ange användardefinierad sträng i textvyn med flera linjer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6557">Set user-defined string in multi line text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6558">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6558">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6559">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6559">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6560">Den här tjänsten tilldelar en textsträng till widgeten för flerradig textvy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6560">This service assigns a text string to the multi-line text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6561">Om text_view-widgeten har skapats med format GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY skapar widgeten en privat kopia av den tilldelade textsträngen och därför måste gx_system_memory_allocate_set-API:et anropas en gång innan den här tjänsten begärs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6561">If the text_view widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6562">Om GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY inte är aktiv, gör widgeten inte en privat kopia av den inkommande strängen och därför måste den tilldelade strängen allokeras statiskt eller globalt, dvs. det kanske inte är en automatisk eller tillfällig variabel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6562">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the assigned string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6563">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6563">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6564">**text_view** Kontrollblock för flerradswidget för textvy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6564">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6565">**text** NULL-avslutad textsträng</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6565">**text** NULL-terminated text string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6566">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6566">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6567">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Har angett en sträng för flerradstextvyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6567">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set string for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6568">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Minnestilldelning har inte definierats eller minnesallokeringen misslyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6568">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6569">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6569">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6570">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6570">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6571">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6571">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6572">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6572">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6573">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6573">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set string “my string” to the multi-line text view widget “my_text_view”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_text_set(&my_text_view, “my string”);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text of “my_text_view” has been successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6605">gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6605">gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6606">Ange tomt utrymme för flerradstextvy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6606">Set multi-line text view whitespace</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6607">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6607">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_VIEW *text_view, 
    GX_UBYTE whitespace);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6608">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6608">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6609">Den här tjänsten anger avståndet mellan widgetens konturer och klientområdet för en flerradig textvywidget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6609">This service sets spacing between widget outlines and client area for a multi-line text view widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6610">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6610">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6611">**text_view** Kontrollblock för flerradswidget för textvy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6611">**text_view** Multi-line text view widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6612">**tomt utrymme** Bredd på marginalen mellan text_view widget och den visade texten, i bildpunkter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6612">**whitespace** Width of margin between text_view widget and the displayed text, in pixels.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6613">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6613">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6614">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Har angett tomt utrymme för flerradstextvyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6614">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set whitespace for the multi-line text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6615">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6615">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6616">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6616">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6617">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6617">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6618">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6618">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6619">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6619">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set whitespace of “my_text_view” to 2. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_view_whitespace_set(&my_text_view, 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the whitespace of “my_text_view” has been successfully set to 2. */
```

## <a name="gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6651">gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6651">gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6653">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6653">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_create(
    GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_id,
    ULONG style, USHORT pixelmap_prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6654">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6654">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6655">Den här tjänsten skapar en widget med en numerisk pixelkarta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6655">This service creates a numeric pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6656">En numeric_pixelmap_prompt är bara en pixelmap_prompt som behåller sin egen buffert och tillhandahåller ett GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT_VALUE_SET(INT)-API. Buffertstorleken definieras av konstanten GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE, som standard är 16.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6656">A numeric_pixelmap_prompt is just a pixelmap_prompt that keeps its own buffer and provides a gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_value_set(INT) API, the buffer size is defined by the constant GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE, which defaults to 16.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6657">GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT härleds från GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT och stöder alla gx_pixelmap_prompt API-tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6657">GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT is derived from GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT and supports all gx_pixelmap_prompt API services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6680">Funktionen Åsidosätt format i fråga om numerisk pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6680">Override format function of numeric pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6681">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6681">Prototype</span></span>

