```C
    GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    OID (*format_func)(GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *, INT));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6682">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6682">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6683">Den här tjänsten åsidosätter standardformatfunktionen för widgeten för numerisk pixlemap-prompt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6683">This service overrides the default format function of the numeric pixlemap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6684">Standardformatfunktionen konverterar det numeriska pixelkarta-promptvärdet till en sträng och lagrar det i widgetens privata buffert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6684">The default format function converts the numeric pixelmap prompt value to a string and stores it in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6685">Med den här tjänsten kan programmet definiera en egen formatfunktion för att formatera och lagra det numeriska pixelkarta-promptvärdet i widgetens privata buffert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6685">This service allows the application to define its own format function to format and store the numeric pixelmap prompt value in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6686">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6686">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6687">**prompt** Kontrollblock för numerisk pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6687">**prompt** Numeric pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6688">**format_func** Formatfunktion som ska anges</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6688">**format_func** Format function to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6689">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6689">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6690">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Funktionen för numeriskt pixlemap-format har angetts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6690">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set numeric pixlemap prompt format function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6691">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6691">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6692">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6692">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6693">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6693">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6694">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6694">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define my numeric pixelmap format function. */
VOID my_format_function(GX_NUMERIC_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    INT value)
{
    /* If the value is “1234”, the new format will be “12.34”. */

    INT length;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value / 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_ BUFFER_SIZE);
    Length = GX_STRLEN(prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer);
    prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer[length++] = ‘.’;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value % 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_buffer + length,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE - length);
}

/* Override default format function of “my_numeric_pix_prompt”. */
status = gx_numeric_pixelmap_prompt_format_function_set(
    &my_numeric_pix_prompt,
    my_format_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the format function of “my_numeric_pix_prompt” has been override. */
```

## <a name="gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6743">gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6743">gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6744">Funktionen Override format för numerisk prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6744">Override format function of numeric prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6745">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6745">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *prompt,
    VOID (*format_func)(GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *, INT));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6746">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6746">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6747">Den här tjänsten åsidosätter standardformatfunktionen för en widget för numerisk prompt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6747">This service overrides the default format function of a numeric prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6748">Standardformatfunktionen konverterar det numeriska promptvärdet till en sträng och lagrar det i widgetens privata buffert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6748">The default format function converts the numeric prompt value to a string and stores it in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6749">Med den här tjänsten kan programmet definiera en egen formatfunktion för att formatera och lagra det numeriska promptvärdet i widgetens privata buffert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6749">This service allows the application to define its own format function to format and store the numeric prompt value in the widget’s private buffer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6750">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6750">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6751">**prompt** Kontrollblock för numerisk prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6751">**prompt** Numeric prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6752">**format_func** Formatfunktion som ska anges</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6752">**format_func** Format function to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6753">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6753">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6754">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Funktionen för numerisk promptformat har angetts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6754">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set numeric prompt format function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6755">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6755">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6756">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6756">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6757">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6757">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6758">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6758">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define my numeric format function. */
VOID my_format_function(GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT *prompt, INT value)
{
    /* If the value is “1234”, the new format will be “12.34”. */

    INT length;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value / 100, prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_ BUFFER_SIZE);
    Length = GX_STRLEN(prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer);
    prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer[length++] = ‘.’;
    gx_utility_ltoa(value % 100,
        prompt->gx_numeric_prompt_buffer + length,
        GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE - length);
}

/* Override the default format function of “my_numeric_prompt”. */
status = gx_numeric_prompt_format_function_set(&my_numeric_prompt,
    my_format_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the format function of “my_numeric_prompt” has been override. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6784">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6784">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6785">Den här tjänsten skapar en widget för numeriska rullningshjul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6785">This service creates a numeric scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6786">Ett numeriskt rullningshjul är en typ av rullningshjulswidget som används specifikt för att visa ett intervall med siffror.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6786">A numeric scroll wheel is a type of scroll wheel widget that is specifically used for displaying a range of numbers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6787">Andra typer av widgetar för rullningshjul är också tillgängliga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6787">Other types of scroll wheel widgets are also available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6788">Mer information om widgethierarkin för rullningshjul, widgettyper och widgetar finns i API:et för gx_scroll_wheel_create().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6788">Refer to the gx_scroll_wheel_create() API for more information about the scroll wheel widget hierarchy, widget types, and widget derivation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6789">GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL härleds från GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL och stöder alla gx_text_scroll_wheel och gx_scroll_wheel tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6789">GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL is derived from GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL and supports all gx_text_scroll_wheel and gx_scroll_wheel services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6790">Alla typer av rullningshjul GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT händelser till sina överordnade när rullningshjulet rullas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6790">All scroll wheel types generate GX_EVENT_LIST_SELECT events to their parent when the scroll wheel is scrolled.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6791">Ett numeriskt rullningshjul har som standard abs(end_val – start_val) + 1 rader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6791">A numeric scroll wheel will default to having abs(end_val – start_val) + 1 rows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6792">Med andra ord visar rullningshjulet varje värde mellan start_val och end_val öka eller minska med 1 för varje rad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6792">In other words, the scroll wheel will display every value between start_val and end_val, incrementing or decrementing by 1 with each row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6793">Observera att start_val kan vara större eller mindre end_val, beroende på hur programmet vill att intervallet ska visas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6793">Note that start_val can be greater or less than end_val, depending on which way the application wants the range to appear.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6794">Om programmet vill ändra radökningen kan det göra detta genom att anropa gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() när du har skapat det numeriska rullningshjulet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6794">If the application wants to change the row increment, it can do this by calling gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() after creating the numeric scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6795">Till exempel kan ett program som vill skapa ett rullningshjul som visar värdena år 1980 till 2020, öka med 5, göra detta:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6795">For example, an application wanting to create a scroll wheel that displays the values years 1980 to 2020, incrementing by 5, might do this:</span></span>

```C
gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, GX_NULL, parent, 1980,
    2020, style, id, &size);

/* the years 1980 through 2020, inclusive, incrementing by 5 years,
yields 9 total rows */

gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set(&wheel, 9);
```

```C
/* Create “year_wheel”. */
status = gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create(&year_wheel,
    “year_selector””, &parent,
    1980, 2040,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER |
    GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT | GX_STYLE_WRAP |
    GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND,
    YEAR_WHEEL_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel “year_wheel” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6832">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6832">gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6833">Tilldela värdeintervall för numeriska rullningshjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6833">Assign value range of numeric scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6834">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6834">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT
gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_range_set(
    GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT start_val, INT end_val);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6835">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6835">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6836">Den här tjänsten ändrar det värdeintervall som tillåts och visas av en widget med numeriska rullningshjul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6836">This service modifies the range of values allowed and displayed by a numeric scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6837">Ett numeriskt rullningshjul är en typ av widget för rullningshjul som används specifikt för att visa ett intervall med siffror.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6837">A numeric scroll wheel is a type of scroll wheel widget that is specifically used for displaying a range of numbers.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6838">Andra typer av widgetar för rullningshjul är också tillgängliga.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6838">Other types of scroll wheel widgets are also available.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6839">Se API:et gx_scroll_wheel_create() för mer information om hierarkin för rullningshjulswidget, widgettyper och widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6839">Refer to the gx_scroll_wheel_create() API for more information about the scroll wheel widget hierarchy, widget types, and widget derivation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6840">När du anropar detta API återställs det totala antalet rader med rullningshjulet till abs(end_val – start_val) + 1, vilket innebär att rullningshjulet ökar med 1 för varje rad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6840">Invoking this API resets the scroll wheel total rows to abs(end_val – start_val) + 1, meaning the scroll wheel will increment by 1 for each row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6841">Om du vill ändra detta kan programmet anropa gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() för att ändra det totala antalet rader, vilket effektivt ändrar värdesteget mellan rader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6841">To change this, the application can call gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set() to change the total number of row, effectively changing the value increment between rows.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6844">**start_val** Starta numeriskt värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6844">**start_val** Starting numeric value</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6845">**end_val** Slut på numeriskt värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6845">**end_val** Ending numeric value</span></span>

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6871">gx_pixelmap_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6871">gx_pixelmap_button_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6918">gx_pixelmap_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6918">gx_pixelmap_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6919">Knappen Rita pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6919">Draw pixelmap button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6920">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6920">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6921">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6921">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6922">Den här tjänsten ritar en widget för pixelkarta-knappen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6922">This service draws a pixelmap button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6923">Den här funktionen anropas vanligtvis internt av GUIX-arbetsytans uppdateringsmekanism, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till med implementeringen av anpassade ritningsfunktioner för anpassade widgetar för pixelkarta.knappwidgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6923">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap button widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6924">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6924">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6925">**knapp** Pekare till pixelkartans knappkontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6925">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6926">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6926">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6927">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6927">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6928">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6928">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6929">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6929">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6930">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6930">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom pixelmap button drawing function. */

VOID my_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Call default pixelmap button draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_button_draw(button);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6988">gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6988">gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6989">Knappen Tilldela pixelkartor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6989">Assign pixelmaps to button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6990">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6990">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_PIXELMAP_BUTTON *button, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_id, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6991">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6991">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6992">Den här tjänsten anger pixelkartor till knappen pixelkarta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6992">This service sets pixelmaps to the pixelmap button.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6993">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6993">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6994">**knapp** Pekare till pixelkartans knappkontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6994">**button** Pointer to pixelmap button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6995">**normal_id** Resurs-ID för pixelkartan som ska användas som normalt tillstånd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6995">**normal_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used as normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6996">**selected_id** Resurs-ID för pixelkartan som ska användas när knappen väljs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6996">**selected_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used when the button is selected</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6997">**disabled_id** Resurs-ID för pixelkartan som ska användas när knappen är inaktiverad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6997">**disabled_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used when the button is disabled</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6998">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6998">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-6999">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckades anger pixelkartan till knappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-6999">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sets the pixelmap to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7000">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7000">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7001">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7001">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7002">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7002">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7003">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7003">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7004">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7004">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw “my_pixelmap_button”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_button_pixelmap_set (&my_pixelmap_button,
    NORMAL_ID, SELECTED_ID,
    DISABLED_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap button is properly configured with the specified pixelmaps. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7026">gx_pixelmap_prompt_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7026">gx_pixelmap_prompt_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7027">Uppmaning om att skapa pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7027">Create pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7028">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7028">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_prompt_create(
    GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_pixelmap_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT pixelmap_prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7029">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7029">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7030">Den här tjänsten skapar en widget för pixelkartan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7030">This service creates a pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7031">En pixelkarta skiljer sig från en standard GX_PROMPT på så sätt att den färgar bakgrunden i prompten med pixelkartor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7031">A pixelmap prompt differs from a standard GX_PROMPT in that it paints the background of the prompt using pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7032">Funktionen create accepterar ett pixelkarta-ID, det normala tillståndet fyllnings pixelkarta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7032">The create function accepts one pixelmap id, the normal state fill pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7033">Upp till sex pixelkartor kan tilldelas till pixelkartan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7033">Up to six pixelmaps may be assigned to the pixelmap prompt.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7034">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7034">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7035">**prompt** Pekare till kontrollblock för pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7035">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7036">**namn** Logiskt namn för widgeten för pixelkartan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7036">**name** Logical name of pixelmap prompt widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7037">**överordnad** Pekare till den överordnade widgeten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7037">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7038">**text_id** Resurs-ID för text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7038">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7039">**fill_id** Resurs-ID för fyllning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7039">**fill_id** Resource ID of fill</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7040">**style** Kryssrutans format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7040">**style** Style of checkbox.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7041">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widgetspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7041">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7042">**pixelmap_prompt_id** Programdefinierat ID för bildpunktskarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7042">**pixelmap_prompt_id** Application-defined ID of pixelmap prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7043">**storlek** Uppmaning om dimensioner för pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7043">**size** Dimensions of pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7044">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7044">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7045">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Skapa en lyckad pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7045">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7046">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7046">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7047">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7047">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7048">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Ogiltig blockstorlek för widgetkontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7048">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7049">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7049">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7050">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7050">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7051">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7051">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7052">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7052">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_pixelmap_prompt”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_prompt_create(&my_pixelmap_prompt,
    “my_pixelmap_prompt”, &my_parent,
    MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID, MY_LEFT_RESOURCE_ID,
    MY_FILL_RESOURCE_ID, MY_RIGHT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_PIXELMAP_PROMPT_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap prompt “my_pixelmap_prompt” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7068">gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7068">gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7069">Fråga efter bildpunktskarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7069">Draw pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7070">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7070">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7071">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7071">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7072">Den här tjänsten ritar en widget för pixelkartan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7072">This service draws a pixelmap prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7073">Den här funktionen anropas vanligtvis internt av GUIX-mekanismen för arbetsyteuppdatering, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till med implementeringen av anpassade ritningsfunktioner för anpassade widgetar för pixelkartan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7073">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap prompt widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7074">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7074">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7075">**prompt** Pekare till kontrollblock för pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7075">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7076">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7076">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7077">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7077">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7078">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7078">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7079">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7079">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7080">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7080">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom pixelmap prompt drawing function. */

VOID my_pixelmap_button_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt)
{
    /* Call default pixelmap prompt draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_prompt_draw(prompt);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7096">gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7096">gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7097">Tilldela pixelkartor för att fråga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7097">Assign pixelmaps to prompt</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7098">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7098">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_prompt_pixelmap_set(
    GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *prompt,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_left_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_right_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_left_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_pixelmap,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_right_pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7099">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7099">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7100">Den här tjänsten tilldelar pixelkartans ID:n till pixelkartan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7100">This service assigns pixelmap ids to the pixelmap prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7101">Id:n för vänster, fyllning och höger bildpunktskarta används för att tillåta att programmet använder en uppsättning pixelkartor för frågor med olika bredd men en gemensam höjd för att spara på lagringskraven.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7101">The left, fill, and right pixelmap ids are used to allow the application to use one set of pixelmaps for prompts of various widths but a common height to save on storage requirements.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7102">Om vänster- och höger-ID:erna inte används ska de anges till 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7102">If the left and right IDs are not used, they should be set to 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7103">Om uppmaningen ska rita sig själv på ett annat sätt när den får indatafokus används de valda pixelkartans ID:n för detta ändamål.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7103">If the prompt should draw itself differently when it gains input focus, the selected pixelmap ids are used for that purpose.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7104">Om de valda ID:na inte används eller är samma som de vanliga ID:na anger du dem till 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7104">If the selected ids are not used or are the same as the normal ids, set them to 0.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7105">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7105">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7106">**prompt** Pekare till kontrollblock för pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7106">**prompt** Pointer to pixelmap prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7107">**normal_left_id** Resurs-ID för pixelkartan som ska användas på vänster sida i normalt tillstånd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7107">**normal_left_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the left side in the normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7108">**normal_fill_id** Resurs-ID för pixelkartan som ska användas som en panelfyllning i det normala tillståndet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7108">**normal_fill_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used as a tiled fill in the normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7109">**normal_right_id** Resurs-ID för pixelkartan som ska användas på höger sida i normalt tillstånd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7109">**normal_right_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the right side in the normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7110">**selected_left_id** Resurs-ID för pixelkartan som ska användas på vänster sida i det valda tillståndet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7110">**selected_left_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the left side in the selected state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7111">**selected_fill_id** Resurs-ID för pixelkartan som ska användas som en panelfyllning i det valda tillståndet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7111">**selected_fill_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used as a tiled fill in the selected state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7112">**selected_right_id** Resurs-ID för pixelkartan som ska användas på höger sida i det valda tillståndet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7112">**selected_right_id** Resource ID of the pixelmap to be used on the right side in the selected state</span></span>

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7142">gx_pixelmap_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7142">gx_pixelmap_slider_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7143">Skapa skjutreglage för pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7143">Create pixelmap slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7144">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7144">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_slider_create(
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO *pixelmap_info, ULONG style,
    USHORT pixelmap_slider_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7145">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7145">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7146">Den här tjänsten skapar en skjutreglagewidget för pixelkarta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7146">This service creates a pixelmap slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7147">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7147">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7148">**skjutreglage** Pekare till skjutreglagets skjutreglage för pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7148">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7149">**namn** Logiskt namn på skjutreglagewidgeten för pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7149">**name** Logical name of pixelmap slider widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7150">**överordnad** Pekare till den överordnade widgeten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7150">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7151">**info** Pekare till en GX_SLIDER_INFO struktur som innehåller värden som definierar skjutreglagets lägsta värde, högsta värde, aktuellt värde och nålgränser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7151">**info** Pointer to a GX_SLIDER_INFO structure which contains values defining the slider minimum value, maximum value, current value, and needle limits.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7152">**Bilaga I** innehåller definition GX_SLIDER_INFO struktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7152">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7153">**pixelmap_info** Pekare till en GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO struktur som definierar pixelkartor som används för att dra skjutreglagets bakgrund och nål.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7153">**pixelmap_info** Pointer to a GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure which defines the pixelmaps used to draw the slider background and needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7154">**Bilaga I** innehåller definition för GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO struktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7154">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7155">Skjutreglagets bakgrund kan använda en eller två pixelkartor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7155">The slider background can use one or two pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7156">Om den ena ändras inte bakgrunden när nålen rör sig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7156">If one, the background does not change as the needle moves.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7157">Om två bakgrunder definieras använder bakgrunden före nålen den första pixelkartan i bakgrunden och bakgrunden efter nålen använder den andra pixelkartan i bakgrunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7157">If two backgrounds are defined, the background before the needle uses the first background pixelmap, and the background after the needle uses the second background pixelmap.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7158">**style (stil)** Skjutreglagets stil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7158">**style** Style of slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7159">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widgetspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7159">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7160">**pixelmap_slider_id** Programdefinierat ID för skjutreglaget pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7160">**pixelmap_slider_id** Application-defined ID of pixelmap slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7161">**storlek** Dimensions för bildpunktskarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7161">**size** Dimensions of pixelmap prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7162">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7162">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7163">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Skjutreglaget för pixelkartan har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7163">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created pixelmap slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7164">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7164">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7165">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7165">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7166">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** widgeten (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7166">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7167">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Ogiltig blockstorlek för widgetkontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7167">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7168">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7168">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7169">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7169">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7170">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7170">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SLIDER_INFO info;
GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO pixelmap_info;

/* Initiate slider information structure. */
info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_max_tralvel = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset;

/* Initiate pixelmap slider information structure. */
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_lower_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_ORANGE;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_upper_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_EMPTY;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_needle_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Create “my_pixelmap_slider”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_slider_create(&my_pixelmap_slider,
                            “my_pixelmap_slider”, &my_parent,
                            &info, &pixelmap_info,
                            GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED,
                            MY_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap slider “my_pixelmap_slider” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7190">gx_pixelmap_slider_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7190">gx_pixelmap_slider_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7191">Skjutreglaget Rita pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7191">Draw pixelmap slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7192">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7192">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_pixelmap_slider_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7193">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7193">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7194">Den här tjänsten ritar en skjutreglagewidget för pixelkarta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7194">This service draws a pixelmap slider widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7195">Den här funktionen anropas vanligtvis internt av GUIX-arbetsytans uppdateringsmekanism, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till med implementeringen av anpassade ritningsfunktioner för anpassade skjutreglagewidgetar för pixelkarta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7195">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom pixelmap slider widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7196">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7196">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7197">**skjutreglage** Pekare till skjutreglagets skjutreglage för pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7197">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7198">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7198">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7199">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7199">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7200">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7200">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7201">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7201">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7202">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7202">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom pixelmap slider drawing function. */

VOID my_pixelmap_slider_draw(GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *pixelmap_slider)
{
    /* Call default pixelmap slider draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_slider_draw(pixelmap_slider);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7223">gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7223">gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7224">Skjutreglagehändelse för process pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7224">Process pixelmap slider event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7225">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7225">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7226">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7226">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7227">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för den angivna skjutreglagewidgeten för pixelkarta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7227">This service processes an event for the specified pixelmap slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7228">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7228">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7229">**skjutreglage** Pekare till pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7229">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7230">**skjutreglage** för blockhändelse Pekare till händelse att bearbeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7230">**slider** control block event Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7231">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7231">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7232">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad händelseprocess för bildpunktskarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7232">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap slider event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7233">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7233">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7234">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7234">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7235">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7235">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7236">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7236">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7237">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7237">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7238">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7238">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */
UINT my_event_hanlder(GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *pixelmap_slider, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(pixelmap_slider,
                                                    event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_pixelmap_slider_event_process(pixelmap_slider,
                                                  event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7259">gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7259">gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7260">Tilldela pixelkartor till skjutreglaget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7260">Assign pixelmaps to slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7261">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7261">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_pixelmap_slider_pixelmap_set(
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO *pixinfo);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7262">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7262">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7263">Den här tjänsten anger pixelkartor till skjutreglaget för pixelkarta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7263">This service sets pixelmaps to the pixelmap slider.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7264">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7264">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7265">**skjutreglage** Pekare till skjutreglagets pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7265">**slider** Pointer to pixelmap slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7266">**pixinfo** Pekare till en GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO struktur som definierar pixelkartor som används för att rita skjutreglagets bakgrund och nål.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7266">**pixinfo** Pointer to a GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure which defines the pixelmaps used to draw the slider background and needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7267">**Bilaga I** innehåller definition GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO struktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7267">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7268">Skjutreglagets bakgrund kan använda en eller två pixelkartor.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7268">The slider background can use one or two pixelmaps.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7269">Om det finns en sådan ändras inte bakgrunden när nålen rör sig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7269">If one, the background does not change as the needle moves.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7270">Om två bakgrunder definieras använder bakgrunden före nålen den första pixelkartan i bakgrunden och bakgrunden efter nålen använder den andra pixelkartan i bakgrunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7270">If two backgrounds are defined, the background before the needle uses the first background pixelmap, and the background after the needle uses the second background pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7271">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7271">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7272">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Anger pixelkartan till skjutreglaget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7272">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful sets the pixelmap to the slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7273">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7273">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7274">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7274">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7275">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7275">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7276">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7276">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7277">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7277">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP_SLIDER_INFO pixelmap_info;

/* Initiate pixelmap slider information structure. */
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_lower_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_ORANGE;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_upper_background_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_EMPTY;
pixelmap_info.gx_pixelmap_slider_info_needle_pixelmap =
                                        GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Draw “my_pixelmap_button”. */
status = gx_pixelmap_slider _pixelmap_set (&my_pixelmap_slider,
                                &pixelmap_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap slider is properly configured with “pixelmap_info”. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7301">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7301">Prototype</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7302">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7302">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7303">Den här tjänsten ritar bakgrunden till den angivna förloppsfältet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7303">This service draws the background of the specified progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7304">Den här funktionen anropas internt som en del av gx_progress_bar_draw(), men exponeras för programmet för att stödja de fall där programmet definierar en anpassad förloppsritning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7304">This function is called internally as part of the gx_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7305">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7305">Parameters</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
{
    /* Call default progress bar background draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_background_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Call default progress bar text draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_text_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7322">gx_progress_bar_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7322">gx_progress_bar_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7323">Skapa en förloppsstapel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7323">Create a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7324">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7324">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_create(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO *progress_bar_info,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT progress_bar_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7325">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7325">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7333">**style (stil)** Förloppsfältets format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7333">**style** Style of progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7334">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widgetspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7334">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7346">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7346">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

info.gx_progress_bar_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_current_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM_FONT;
info.gx_progress_bar_normal_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_WHITE;
info.gx_progress_bar_selected_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_BLUE;
info.gx_progress_bar_fill_pixelmap = 0;

size.gx_rectangle_left = 10;
size.gx_rectangle_top = 10;
size.gx_rectangle_right = 110;
size.gx_rectangle_bottom = 140;

/* Create a progress bar with the specified information. */
status = gx_progress_bar_create(&my_progress_bar, GX_NULL, GX_NULL,
                        &info, GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN,
                        0, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCSESS the progress bar “my_progress_bar” has been successfully created. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7360">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7360">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7361">Den här tjänsten ritar en widget för förloppsfältet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7361">This service draws a progress bar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7362">Den här funktionen anropas vanligtvis internt av GUIX-mekanismen för arbetsyteuppdatering, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till med implementeringen av anpassade ritningsfunktioner för anpassade förloppslistwidgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7362">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom progress bar widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7383">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7383">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7384">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en förloppshändelse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7384">This service processes a progress bar event.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7388">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7388">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7389">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Prompten skapas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7389">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7390">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7390">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7392">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Ogiltig widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7392">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7393">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7393">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7394">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7394">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7395">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7395">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_progress_bar_event_process(progress_bar,
                                                event_ptr);
        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_progress_bar_event_process(progress_bar,
                                                event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7433">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7433">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_info_set(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7434">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7434">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7435">Den här tjänsten återställer informationsstrukturen för en förloppsfältwidget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7435">This service resets the information structure of a progress bar widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7436">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7436">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7437">**progress_bar** Förloppsfältets kontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7437">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7438">**info** Pekare till en GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO struktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7438">**info** Pointer to a GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7439">**Bilaga I** innehåller definition GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO struktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7439">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7440">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7440">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7441">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Information om återställning av förloppsfältet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7441">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully reset progress bar info</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7442">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7442">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7443">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7443">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7444">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7444">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7445">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7445">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7446">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7446">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_progress_bar_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_progress_bar_info_current_val = 0;
info.gx_progress_bar_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM_FONT;
info.gx_progress_bar_normal_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_WHITE;
info.gx_progress_bar_selected_text_color = GX_COLOR_ID_BLUE;
info.gx_progress_bar_fill_pixelmap = 0;

status = gx_progress_bar_info_set(&progress_bar, &info);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the progress bar info was re-assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7508">gx_progress_bar_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7508">gx_progress_bar_text_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7509">Ange textfärgen för en förloppsstapel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7509">Set the text color of a progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7510">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7510">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_progress_bar_text_color_set(
    GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7511">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7511">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7512">Den här tjänsten anger textfärgen för en förloppsfältwidget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7512">This service sets the text color of a progress bar widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7513">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7513">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7514">**progress_bar** Kontrollblock för förloppskontroller</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7514">**progress_bar** Progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7515">**normal_text_color** Resurs-ID för normal textfärg som används i normalt tillstånd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7515">**normal_text_color** Resource ID of normal text color that used in normal state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7516">**selected_text_color** Resurs-ID för vald textfärg som används när widgeten får fokus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7516">**selected_text_color** Resource ID of selected text color that used when the widget gain focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7517">**disabled_text_color** Resurs-ID för inaktiverad textfärg som används när GX_STYLE_ENABLED inte är aktiv</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7517">**disabled_text_color** Resource ID of disabled text color that used when GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not active</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7518">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7518">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7519">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Textfärguppsättning för lyckad förloppsstapel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7519">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful progress bar text color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7520">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7520">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7521">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7521">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7522">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7522">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7523">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7523">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7524">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7524">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text colors for the progress bar “my_progress_bar”*/
UINT status = gx_progress_bar_text_color_set(&my_progress_bar,
                        GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,
                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_TEXT,
                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

/* if status is GX_SUCCESS, the progress bar text colors were successfully assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_progress_bar_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7535">gx_progress_bar_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7535">gx_progress_bar_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7536">Rita förloppsfälttext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7536">Draw progress bar text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7537">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7537">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_progress_bar_text_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7538">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7538">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7539">Den här tjänsten ritar texten i den angivna förloppsstapeln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7539">This service draws the text of specified progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7540">Den här funktionen anropas internt som en del av gx_progress_bar_draw(), men exponeras för programmet för att stödja de fall där programmet definierar en anpassad förloppsritning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7540">This function is called internally as part of the gx_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7541">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7541">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7542">**förloppsfält** Pekare till förloppsfältets kontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7542">**progress bar** Pointer to progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7543">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7543">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7544">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7544">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7545">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7545">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7546">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7546">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7547">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7547">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_progress_bar_draw(GX_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar)
{
    /* Call default progress bar background draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_background_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Call default progress bar text draw. */
    gx_progress_bar_text_draw(progress_bar);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7570">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7570">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_prompt_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7584">gx_prompt_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7584">gx_prompt_create</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7586">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7586">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_create(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT prompt_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7587">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7587">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7588">Den här tjänsten skapar en promptwidget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7588">This service creates a prompt widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7589">GX_PROMPT härleds från GX_WIDGET och stöder alla gx_widget tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7589">GX_PROMPT is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7590">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7590">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7591">**Pekare** till den överordnade widgeten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7591">**Pointer** to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7592">**text_id** Resurs-ID för prompttext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7592">**text_id** Resource ID of prompt text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7593">**style (stil)** Promptformat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7593">**style** Style of prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7594">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widgetspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7594">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7595">**prompt_id** Programdefinierat ID för prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7595">**prompt_id** Application-defined ID of prompt</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7596">**storlek** Dimensioner för prompt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7596">**size** Dimensions of prompt</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7597">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7597">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7598">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Skapa en kommandotolk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7598">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7599">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7599">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7600">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7600">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7619">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7619">Prototype</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7620">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7620">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7621">Den här tjänsten ritar en promptwidget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7621">This service draws a prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7622">Den här tjänsten anropas internt av GUIX under uppdatering av arbetsytan, men kan även anropas av anpassade ritningsfunktioner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7622">This service is called internally by GUIX during canvas refresh, but can also be called by custom drawing functions.</span></span>
