## <a name="gx_prompt_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7641">gx_prompt_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7641">gx_prompt_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7642">Händelse för processuppfråga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7642">Process prompt event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7643">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7643">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_event_process(GX_PROMPT *prompt, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7644">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7644">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7645">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för den angivna prompten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7645">This service processes an event for the specified prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7646">Den här tjänsten ska anropas som standardhändelsehanterare av alla anpassade funktioner för händelsebearbetning av prompter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7646">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom prompt event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7647">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7647">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7648">**prompt** Pekare för att fråga efter kontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7648">**prompt** Pointer to prompt control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7649">**event_ptr** Pekare till den händelse som ska bearbetas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7649">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7650">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7650">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7651">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad prompthändelseprocess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7651">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7652">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7652">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7653">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7653">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7654">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7654">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7655">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7655">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7656">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7656">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7657">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7657">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic prompt event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_prompt_event_process(GX_PROMPT *prompt, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default prompt event processing */
        status = gx_prompt_event_process(prompt, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

```C
/* Set the text color of “my_prompt”. */
status = gx_prompt_text_color_set(&my_prompt,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_BLACK,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_LIGHTGRAY,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

```

## <a name="gx_prompt_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7731">gx_prompt_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7731">gx_prompt_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7732">Stödfunktion för ritning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7732">Drawing support function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7733">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7733">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_prompt_text_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7734">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7734">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7735">Den här stödfunktionen ritar textdelen av en prompt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7735">This support function draws the text portion of a prompt.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7736">Den här funktionen anropas internt av gx_prompt_draw() och tillhandahålls som ett separat API som en bekvämlighet för program som definierar en anpassad promptritningsfunktion.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7736">This function is called internally by gx_prompt_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom prompt drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7737">Program som vill anpassa promptens bakgrundsritning kan tillhandahålla sin anpassade ritningsfunktion och anropa gx_prompt_text_draw-tjänsten som en del av sin anpassade ritning för att rita prompttexten över bakgrunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7737">Applications that want to customize the prompt background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_prompt_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the prompt text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7738">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7738">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7739">**prompt** Pekare till promptkontrollblocket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7739">**prompt** Pointer to the prompt control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7740">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7740">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7741">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7741">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7742">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7742">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7743">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7743">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7744">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7744">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */
VOID my_prompt_draw(GX_PROMPT *prompt)
{
    /* insert code here to draw prompt background */

    /* call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_prompt_text_draw();

    /* draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) prompt);
}
```

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_get(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CHAR **return_text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7759">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7759">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7760">Den här tjänsten är inaktuell till förmån för gx_prompt_text_get_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7760">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_prompt_text_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7761">Den här tjänsten hämtar texten i en promptwidget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7761">This service gets the text of a prompt widget.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7764">**return_text** Pekare till mål för text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7764">**return_text** Pointer to destination for text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7765">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7765">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7766">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Kommandotolken hämta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7766">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7767">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7767">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7768">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7768">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7769">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7769">Allowed From</span></span>

```C

GX_CHAR *my_prompt_text;

/* Get the text of “my_prompt”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pointer “my_prompt_text” points to the text displayed by “my_prompt”. */
```

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7795">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7795">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7837">Ange prompttext (inaktuell)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7837">Set prompt text (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7838">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7838">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_prompt_text_set(
    GX_PROMPT *prompt, 
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7839">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7839">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7840">Den här tjänsten har gjorts inaktuell och ersatts av gx_prompt_text_set_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7840">This service has been deprecated in favor of gx_prompt_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7841">Den här tjänsten anger texten för en promptwidget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7841">This service sets the text of a prompt widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7842">Om promptwidgeten skapades med GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY skapar widgeten en privat kopia av den tilldelade textsträngen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7842">If the prompt widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7843">Om GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY inte är aktiv, gör widgeten inte en privat kopia av den inkommande strängen och därför måste strängen vara statisk eller globalt allokerad, det vill säga det kanske inte är en automatisk eller tillfällig variabel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7843">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7844">GX_PROMPT härleds från GX_WIDGET och därför kan alla GX_WIDGET API-tjänster användas med GX_PROMPT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7844">GX_PROMPT is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_PROMPT.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7845">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7845">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7846">**prompt** Pekare för att uppmana widgetkontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7846">**prompt** Pointer to prompt widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7847">**text** Pekare till text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7847">**text** Pointer to text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7848">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7848">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7849">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Prompttextuppsättningen lyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7849">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful prompt text set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7850">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7850">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7851">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7851">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7852">**funktionen GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Minnes allokera har inte definierats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7852">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocate function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7853">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Ogiltig stränglängd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7853">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7854">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7854">Allowed From</span></span>


```C
VOID gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7928">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7928">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7929">Den här tjänsten ritar en bakgrund för radiell förloppsstapel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7929">This service draws a radial progress bar background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7930">Den här tjänsten refereras internt av gx_radial_progress_bar_draw-funktionen, men exponeras för användning av programmet i de fall där programmet definierar en anpassad förloppsstapel för radiell ritningsfunktion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7930">This service is internally referenced by the gx_radial_progress_bar_draw function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom radial progress bar drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7931">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7931">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7932">**förloppsfält** Pekare till kontrollblock för radiell förloppsfält</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7932">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7933">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7933">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7934">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7934">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7935">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7935">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7936">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7936">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7937">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7937">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom radial progress bar drawing function. */

VOID my_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress)
{
    /* Call default radial progress bar background draw. */
    gx_radial_progress_bar_background_draw(radial_progress);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radial_progress);
}
```

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_create(

    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,

    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO *info,

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7951">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7951">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7952">Den här tjänsten skapar en radiell förloppsstapel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7952">This service creates a radial progress bar.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7953">Om widgetformatet GX_STYLE_ENABLED tillämpas på förloppsfältet accepterar förloppsfältet pen_down, pen_drag och pen_up indata för att ändra det aktuella värdet för förloppsfältet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7953">If the widget style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is applied to the progress bar, the progress bar will accept pen_down, pen_drag, and pen_up input to modify the progress bar current value.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7954">Widgetstilen GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW användas för att aktivera ritning av förloppsstapelvärdet som text i förloppsfältet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7954">The widget style GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW can be used to enable drawing the progress bar value as text within the progress bar area.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7955">Om det här formatet används i kombination med GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_PERCENT visas förloppsfältets värde i procent.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7955">If this style is used in combination with the style GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_PERCENT, the progress bar value is displayed as a percentage.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7956">Annars visas förloppsfältets värde som det aktuella angular-värdet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7956">Otherwise the progress bar value is displayed as the current angular value.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7958">**förloppsfält** Pekare till kontroll av radiell förloppsstapel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7958">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7959">**förloppsfält** Pekare till kontrollblock för radiell förloppsstapel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7959">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7960">**namn** Namn på radiell förloppsstapel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7960">**name** Name of radial progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7961">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7961">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7962">**info** Pekare till en GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR struktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7962">**info** Pointer to a GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7963">**Bilaga I** innehåller definition GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR struktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7963">**Appendix I** contains definition for GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7964">**style** Format för radiell förloppsstapel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7964">**style** Style of radial progress bar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7965">**id** Programdefinierad ID för förloppsfältet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7965">**id** Application-defined ID of progress bar</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7966">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7966">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7967">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad radiell förloppsstapel skapa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7967">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7968">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7968">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7969">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7969">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7970">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7970">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7971">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Ogiltig överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7971">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7972">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7972">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7973">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7973">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7974">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7974">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RAIDAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_xcenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_ycenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_radius = 100;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_current_angle = 180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_anchor_val = -180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_normal_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_disabled_text_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_width = 20;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_width = 16;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_WIDGET_FILL;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_color =
                                        GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL;

/* Create a radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_create(&my_progress_bar,
                    “my_progress_bar”, parent, &info,
                    GX_STYLE_ENABLED | GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT |
                    GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW,
                    ID_MY_RADIAL_PROGRESS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial progress bar “my_progress_bar” has been created. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-7988">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-7988">Description</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8023">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8023">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8025">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8025">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
        case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process(
                            radial_progress, event_ptr);
        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_radial_progress_bar_event_process(
                            radial_progress, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8079">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8079">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RAIDAL_PROGRESS_BAR_INFO info;

info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_xcenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_ycenter = 200;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_radius = 100;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_current_angle = 180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_anchor_val = -180;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_font_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_normal_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_disabled_text_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_width = 20;
info.gx_raidal_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_width = 16;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_normal_brush_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_WIDGET_FILL;
info.gx_radial_progress_bar_info_selected_brush_color =
                                GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL;

/* Set appearance information for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_info_set(&my_progress_bar, &info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the appearance information of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8090">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8090">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_color_set</span></span>

```C
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8093">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8093">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8094">Den här tjänsten anger textfärgen för radiell förloppsstapel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8094">This service sets the text color of radial progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8095">Det här värdet används bara om GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW har angetts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8095">This value is only used if the style GX_STYLE_PROGRESS_TEXT_DRAW is set.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8101">**selected_color** Resurs-ID för textfärg när widgeten får fokus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8101">**selected_color** Resource ID of text color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8102">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färgresurs-ID:er.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8102">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8103">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade resurs-ID:n för färg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8103">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8104">**disabled_color** Resurs-ID för textfärg när GX_STYLE_ENABLED inte har angetts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8104">**disabled_color** Resource ID of text color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8105">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färgresurs-ID:er.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8105">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8106">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade resurs-ID:n för färg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8106">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8125">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8125">gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8126">Rita radiell förloppsfälttext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8126">Draw radial progress bar text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8127">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8127">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8128">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8128">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8129">Den här tjänsten ritar texten i angiven radiell förloppsstapel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8129">This service draws the text of specified radial progress bar.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8130">Den här funktionen anropas internt som en del av gx_radial_progress_bar_draw(), men exponeras för programmet för att stödja de fall där programmet definierar en anpassad förloppsritning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8130">This function is called internally as part of the gx_radial_progress_bar_draw(), but is exposed to the application to support those cases where the application defines a custom progress bar drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8131">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8131">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8132">**förloppsfält** Pekare till kontrollblock för radiell förloppsfält</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8132">**progress bar** Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8133">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8133">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8134">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8134">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8135">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8135">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8136">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8136">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8137">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8137">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw text for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw (&my_progress_bar);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text of “my_progress_bar” has been drawn. */

/* Write a custom radial progress bar drawing function. */
VOID my_radial_progress_bar_draw(GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *radial_progress)
{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    /* Call default radial progress bar text draw. */
    gx_radial_progress_bar_text_draw(radial_progress);

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radial_progress);
}
```

## <a name="gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8148">gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8148">gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8149">Ange värde för radiell förloppsstapel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8149">Set radial progress bar value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8150">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8150">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set(
    GX_RADIAL_PROGRESS_BAR *progress_bar, 
    GX_VALUE value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8151">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8151">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8152">Den här tjänsten anger värdet för radiell förloppsstapel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8152">This service sets radial progress bar value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8153">Det tilldelade värdet är begränsat till intervallet [-360, 360] och definierar det möjliga intervallet för angularvärden för den aktuella platsen i förloppsfältet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8153">The assigned value is limited to the range [-360, 360], defining the possible range of angular values for the progress bar current location.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8154">Programmet måste skala det verkliga värdet som anges för att tilldela ett angular-värde till förloppsfältets widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8154">The application must scale the real-world value being indicated to assign an angular value to the progress bar widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8155">Förloppsfältet ritas så att det aktuella värdet anger vinkeldeltan mellan fästpunkten och slutpunkten för den övre bågen. Negativa värden gör att bågen ritas i en medurs riktning med början vid fästpunktspositionen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8155">The progress bar is drawn such that the current value indicates the angular delta between the anchor position and the end point of the upper arc. Negative values cause the arc to be drawn in a clockwise direction starting at the anchor position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8156">Ett positivt aktuellt värde gör att bågen ritas i en moturs riktning med början vid fästpunktspositionen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8156">Positive current value causes the arc to be drawn in a counter-clockwise direction starting at the anchor position.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8157">Om du till exempel vill rita en båge som börjar överst i bågen (klockan 12) och slutar till höger (klockan tre), tilldelar du ett ankarvärde på 90 grader och ett aktuellt värde på -90 grader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8157">For example, to draw an arc starting at the top of the arc (12 o’clock position) and ending at the right (three o’clock position), assign an anchor value of 90 degrees and a current value of -90 degrees.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8158">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8158">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8159">**förloppsfält** Pekare till kontrollblock för radiell förloppsstapel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8159">**progress** bar Pointer to radial progress bar control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8160">**värde** Nytt förloppsfältvärde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8160">**value** New progress bar value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8161">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8161">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8162">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Värdet för lyckad radiell förloppsstapel har angetts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8162">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial progress bar value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8163">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8163">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8164">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltiga pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8164">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8165">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Ogiltig widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8165">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8166">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8166">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8167">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8167">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8168">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8168">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE new_value = 180;

/* Set value for radial progress bar “my_progress_bar”. */
status = gx_radial_progress_bar_value_set(&my_progress_bar,
                                        new_value);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the value of “my_progress_bar” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radio_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8179">gx_radio_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8179">gx_radio_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8180">Alternativknappen Skapa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8180">Create radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8181">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8181">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radio_button_create(
    GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, ULONG style,
    USHORT radio_button_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8182">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8182">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8183">Den här tjänsten skapar en alternativknappswidget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8183">This service creates a radio button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8184">GX_RADIO_BUTTON härleds från GX_TEXT_BUTTON, och därför stöds gx_text_button tjänster också av den här widgettypen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8184">GX_RADIO_BUTTON is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON, and therefore all gx_text_button services are also supported by this widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8185">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8185">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8186">**knapp** Pekare till alternativknappskontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8186">**button** Pointer to radio button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8187">**namn** Logiskt namn på alternativknappswidget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8187">**name** Logical name of radio button widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8188">**överordnad** Pekare till den överordnade widgeten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8188">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8189">**text_id** Alternativknappens resurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8189">**text_id** Resource ID of radio button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8190">**style** Alternativknappsformat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8190">**style** Style of radio button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8191">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widgetspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8191">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8192">**radio_button_id** Programdefinierat ID för alternativknappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8192">**radio_button_id** Application-defined ID of radio button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8193">**storlek** Alternativknappen Dimensioner</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8193">**size** Dimensions of radio button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8194">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8194">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8195">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Skapa en lyckad alternativknapp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8195">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radio button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8196">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8196">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8197">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8197">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8198">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** widgeten (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8198">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8199">**GX_INVALID_** STORLEK (0x19) Ogiltig blockstorlek för widgetkontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8199">**GX_INVALID_** SIZE (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8200">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Ogiltigt resurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8200">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8201">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Ogiltig widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8201">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8202">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8202">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8204">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8204">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create “my_radio_button”. */
status = gx_radio_button_create(&my_radio_button, “my_radio_button”, &my_parent,
                    MY_RADIO_BUTTON_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
                    GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_RADIO_BUTTON_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radio button “my_radio_button” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_radio_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8219">gx_radio_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8219">gx_radio_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8220">Alternativknappen Rita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8220">Draw radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8221">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8221">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_radio_button_draw(GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8222">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8222">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8223">Den här tjänsten ritar en alternativknappswidget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8223">This service draws a radio button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8224">Den här tjänsten anropas internt av GUIX-arbetsytans uppdatering, men kan även anropas av åsidosatta ritningsfunktioner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8224">This service is called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh, but can also be called by overridden drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8225">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8225">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8226">**knapp** Pekare till kontrollblock för alternativknappswidget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8226">**button** Pointer to radio button widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8227">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8227">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8228">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8228">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8229">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8229">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8230">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8230">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8231">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8231">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom radio button drawing function. */

VOID my_radio_button_draw(GX_RADIO_BUTTON *radio_button)
{
    /* Call default radio button draw. */
    gx_radio_button_draw(radio_button);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *)radio_button);
}
```

## <a name="gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8246">gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8246">gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8247">Ange pixelkartor för alternativknappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8247">Set pixelmaps for radio button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8248">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8248">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set(
    GX_RADIO_BUTTON *button,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID off_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID on_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID off_disabled_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID on_disabled_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8249">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8249">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8250">Den här tjänsten tilldelar pixelkartor som ska visas med den angivna alternativknappen för varje knapptillstånd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8250">This service assigns the pixelmaps to be displayed by the specified radio button for each button state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8251">Resurs-ID:erna kan dupliceras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8251">The resource IDs can be duplicated.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8252">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8252">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8253">**off_id** Pixelkarta som används för alternativknappens inaktiverade tillstånd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8253">**off_id** Pixelmap used for radio button off state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8254">**on_id** Pixelkarta som används för alternativknapp i tillstånd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8254">**on_id** Pixelmap used for radio button on state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8255">**off_disabled_id** Pixelkarta som används för alternativknappen inaktiverat och inaktiverat tillstånd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8255">**off_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for radio button disabled and off state</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8256">**on_disabled_id** Pixelkarta som används för alternativknappen inaktiverad och i tillstånd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8256">**on_disabled_id** Pixelmap used for radio button disabled and on state</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8257">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8257">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8258">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) En lyckad pixelkarta med alternativknapp har angetts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8258">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radio button pixelmaps set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8259">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8259">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8260">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8260">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8261">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Ogiltig widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8261">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8262">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8262">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8263">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8263">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8264">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8264">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set pixelmap for “my_radio_button”. */
status = gx_radio_button_pixelmap_set(&my_radio_button,
                                MY_OFF_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_ON_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_OFF_DISABLED_PIXELMAP,
                                MY_ON_DISABLED_PIXELMAP);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmaps for radio button “my_radio_button” has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8279">gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8279">gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8280">Ange radiellt skjutreglage för fästpunktslista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8280">Set radial slider anchor list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8281">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8281">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_VALUE *anchor_angles, 
    USHORT anchor_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8282">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8282">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8283">Den här tjänsten anger fästvinklar för radiellt skjutreglage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8283">This service sets anchor angles for radial slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8284">Om listan med fästpunktsvinklar har angetts är den radiella skjutreglagets vinkel en av definierade fästpunktsvinklar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8284">If anchor angle list is set, the radial slider angle will be one of defined anchor angles.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8285">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8285">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8286">**skjutreglage** Kontrollblock för radiellt skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8286">**slider** Radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8287">**anchor_angles** Vinkellista att ställa in</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8287">**anchor_angles** Angle list to set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8288">**anchor_count** Antal fästpunktsvinklar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8288">**anchor_count** Count of the anchor angles</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8289">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8289">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8290">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckade ankarvinklar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8290">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful anchor angles set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8291">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8291">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8292">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Ogiltig widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8292">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8293">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Ogiltig fästpunktslista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8293">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid anchor list</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8294">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8294">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8295">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8295">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8296">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8296">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE anchor_angles[]={0, 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180};
USHORT anchor_count = 7;

/* Set anchor angles for radial slider. */
status = gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(&my_radial_slider,
                                anchor_angles, anchor_count);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the anchor angles have been set for “my_radial_slider”. */

/* Set anchor angles for radial slider. */
status = gx_radial_slider_anchor_angles_set(&my_radial_slider,
                                GX_NULL, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the anchor angles have been removed from “my_radial_slider”. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_angle_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8307">gx_radial_slider_angle_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8307">gx_radial_slider_angle_set</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8309">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8309">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_angle_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_VALUE new_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8310">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8310">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8311">Den här tjänsten anger nytt vinkelvärde för radiellt skjutreglage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8311">This service sets new angle value for radial slider.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8312">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8312">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8313">**skjutreglage** Pekare till kontrollblock för radiell skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8313">**slider** Pointer to radial slider control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8314">**new_angle** Nytt vinkelvärde som ska anges</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8314">**new_angle** New angle value to be set</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8315">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8315">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8316">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad radiell skjutreglagets vinkeluppsättning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8316">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider angle set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8317">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8317">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8318">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8318">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8319">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Ogiltig widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8319">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8320">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8320">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8321">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8321">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8322">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8322">Example</span></span>


## <a name="gx_radial_slider_animation_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8333">gx_radial_slider_animation_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8333">gx_radial_slider_animation_set</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_animation_set(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    USHORT steps, USHORT delay, 
    USHORT animation_style,
    VOID (*animation_update_callback)(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider));
```

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8337">Den här tjänsten anger animeringssteg, fördröjningstid och animeringsstilar för animering med radiella skjutreglage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8337">This service sets animation steps, delay time and animation styles for radial slider needle animation.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8340">**steg** Totalt antal steg för en animering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8340">**steps** Total steps for one animation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8341">**fördröjning** Fördröjningstid för varje animeringssteg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8341">**delay** Delay time for each animation step</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8342">**animation_style** Easing function type (Underlätta funktionstypen) innehåller:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8342">**animation_style** Easing function type, includes:</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8381">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8381">Example</span></span>

```C
VOID animation_callback(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* This function will be called after each animation step,
    add custom code here. */
}

/* Set animation info for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_animation_set(&my_radial_slider, 15, 2,
                                GX_ANIMATION_CIRC_EASE_IN_OUT,
                                animation_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider needle will move with specified animation. */

/* Disable animation for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_animation_set(&my_radial_slider, 0, 0,
                                        0, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider needle will move without animation. */
```

## <a name="gx_radial_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8418">gx_radial_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8418">gx_radial_slider_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8419">Skapa radiellt skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8419">Create radial slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8420">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8420">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_create(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT slider_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8421">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8421">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8425">**namn** Logiskt namn på widget för radiellt skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8425">**name** Logical name of radial slider widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8426">**överordnad** Pekare till den överordnade widgeten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8426">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8427">**info** Utseendedefinition för radiellt **skjutreglage, bilaga I** innehåller definition GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8427">**info** Radial slider appearance definition, **Appendix I** contains definition to GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8428">**style** Alternativknappsformat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8428">**style** Style of radio button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8429">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widgetspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8429">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8430">**radio_button_id** Programdefinierat ID för radiellt skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8430">**radio_button_id** Application-defined ID of radial slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8431">**storlek** Skjutreglagets dimensioner</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8431">**size** Dimensions of radial slider</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8432">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8432">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8433">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Skapa ett lyckat radiellt skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8433">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8434">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8434">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8435">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8435">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8436">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** widgeten (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8436">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8437">**GX_INVALID_** STORLEK (0x19) Ogiltig blockstorlek för widgetkontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8437">**GX_INVALID_** SIZE (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8438">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Ogiltig överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8438">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8439">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8439">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8440">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8440">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8441">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8441">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO info;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Distance from left side of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_xcenter = 100;

/* Distance from top size of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_ycenter = 100;

/* Radius of rotating circle. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_radius = 100;

/* Widget of rotating track. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_track_width = 40;

/* Current angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_current_angle = 0;

/* Minimum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_min_anlge = -60;

/* Maximum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_max_angle = 240;

/* Anchor value list. */
info.gx_radial_slider_angle_list = GX_NULL;

/* Anchor value count. */
info.gx_radial_slider_list_count = 0;

/* Resource ID of background pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_background_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_BKGRD;

/* Resource ID of needle pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 200, 200);

/* Create “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_create(&my_radial_slider,
                                “my_radial_slider”, &my_parent,
                                &info, GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                MY_RADIAL_SLIDER_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider “my_radial_slider” has been created. */
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8455">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8455">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8456">Den här tjänsten drar ett radiellt skjutreglage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8456">This service draws a radial slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8457">Den här tjänsten anropas internt av GUIX-arbetsytans uppdatering, men kan även anropas av åsidosatta ritningsfunktioner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8457">This service is called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh, but can also be called by overridden drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8478">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8478">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_radial_slider_event_process(
    GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8479">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8479">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8480">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en radiell skjutreglagehändelse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8480">This service processes a radial slider event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8481">Den här tjänsten ska anropas som standardhändelsehanterare av alla anpassade funktioner för radiell skjutreglage för händelsebearbetning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8481">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom radial slider event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8482">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8482">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8484">**event_ptr** Pekare till händelse som ska bearbetas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8484">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8485">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8485">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8486">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad radiell skjutreglagehändelseprocess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8486">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful radial slider event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8487">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8487">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8488">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8488">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8489">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Ogiltig widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8489">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8490">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8490">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8491">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8491">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8492">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8492">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process(GX_RADIAL_SLIDER *slider,
                    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_radial_slider_event_process(slider, event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_radial_slider_event_process(slider, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8538">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8538">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8539">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8539">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8541">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8541">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8543">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8543">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RADIAL_SLIDER_INFO info;

/* Distance from left side of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_xcenter = 100;

/* Distance from top size of widget to rotating center. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_ycenter = 100;

/* Radius of rotating circle. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_radius = 100;

/* Widget of rotating track. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_track_width = 40;

/* Current angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_info_current_angle = 0;

/* Minimum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_min_anlge = -60;

/* Maximum angle value. */
info.gx_radial_slider_max_angle = 240;

/* Anchor value list. */
info.gx_radial_slider_angle_list = GX_NULL;

/* Anchor value count. */
info.gx_radial_slider_list_count = 0;

/* Resource ID of background pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_background_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_BKGRD;

/* Resource ID of needle pixelmap. */
info.gx_radial_slider_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Reset radial slider info for “my_radial_slider”. */
status = gx_radial_slider_info_set(&my_radial_slider, &info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the radial slider info of “my_radial_slider” has been reset. */
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8584">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8584">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8586">**Formateringstaggar används för att visa särskilda typer av text:**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8586">**Formatting tags are used to display special types for text:**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8587">**\<b>\</b>** Ange textteckensnitt med användarens angivna fetstils-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8587">**\<b>\</b>** Set text font with user specified bold font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8588">**\<i>\</i>** Ange textteckensnitt med användarangivet kursivt teckensnitts-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8588">**\<i>\</i>** Set text font with user specified italic font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8589">**\<u>\</u>** Aktivera textunderstrykning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8589">**\<u>\</u>** Enable text underline</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8590">**\<f GX_FONT_ID>\</f>** Ange textteckensnitt med angivet teckensnitts-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8590">**\<f GX_FONT_ID>\</f>** Set text font with specified font id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8591">**\<c GX_COLOR_ID>\</c>** Ange textteckensnitt med angivet färg-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8591">**\<c GX_COLOR_ID>\</c>** Set text font with specified color id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8592">**\<hc GX_COLOR_ID>\</hc>** Ange färg för markeringsfärg för text angiven färg-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8592">**\<hc GX_COLOR_ID>\</hc>** Set text highlight color specified color id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8593">**\<align left/right/center>\</align>** Ange textjustering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8593">**\<align left/right/center>\</align>** Set text alignment</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8594">**Exempel på formatering av tagganvändning:**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8594">**Examples of formatting tag usage:**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8595">\<b>Det här är fet text<\b></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8595">\<b>This is bold text<\b></span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8597">\<u>Det här är text med understrykning<\u></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8597">\<u>This is text with underline<\u></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8598">\<f 0>Textteckensnitts-ID:t är inställt på 0<\f></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8598">\<f 0>This text font id is set to 0<\f></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8599">\<c 1>Det här textfärgs-ID:t är inställt på 1<\c></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8599">\<c 1>This text color id is set to 1<\c></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8600">\<hc 2>Det här färg-ID:t för markering av text är inställt på 2<\hc></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8600">\<hc 2>This text highlight color id is set to 2<\hc></span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8601">\<align left> Den här texten är vänsterjusterad<\align></span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8601">\<align left> This text is left aligned<\align></span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8609">**style (stil)** Widgetens stil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8609">**style** Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8610">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widgetspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8610">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8611">**id** Programdefinierat ID för RTF-vyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8611">**id** Application-defined ID of the rich text view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8612">**storlek** Storlek på RTF-vyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8612">**size** Size of the rich text view</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8613">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8613">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8614">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad generering av RTF-vy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8614">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful rich text view creation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8616">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8616">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8617">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** widgeten (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8617">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8619">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8619">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8620">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8620">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8621">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8621">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW rich_view;
GX_RCIH_TEXT_FONTS fonts;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Defined widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 100, 100, 300, 150);

/* Define font information. */
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_normal_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;

/* Create rich text view widget. */
status = gx_rich_text_view_create(&rich_view, “my_rich_view”,
                                  parent, GX_STRING_ID_TEST_STRING,
                                  &fonts,
                                  GX_STYLE_ENABLED,
                                  MY_RICH_VIEW_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the rich text view was successfully created. */

```
