<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8628">Rita RTF-vy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8628">Draw rich text view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8629">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8629">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8630">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8630">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8631">Den här tjänsten ritar den angivna RTF-widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8631">This service draws the specified rich text view widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8632">Den här tjänsten anropas vanligtvis internt av GUIX som en del av en uppdateringsåtgärd för arbetsytan, men den exponeras även för programmet som kanske vill tillhandahålla en anpassad ritningsfunktion och anropa standardritningen för RTF-vyn som anpassad ritningsbas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8632">This service is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default rich text view drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8633">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8633">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8634">**text_view** Pekare till kontrollblock för rtf-textvywidget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8634">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8635">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8635">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8636">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8636">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8637">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8637">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8638">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8638">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8639">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8639">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom rich text view drawing function. */

VOID my_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view)
{
    /* Call default rich text view draw. */
    gx_rich_text_view_draw(text_view);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

```C
/* Replace the font ids as needed. */

fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
fonts.gx_rich_text_fonts_bold_italic_id = GX_FONT_ID_SYSTEM;
```

## <a name="gx_rich_text_view_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8665">gx_rich_text_view_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8665">gx_rich_text_view_text_draw</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8667">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8667">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_rich_text_view_text_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8668">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8668">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8669">Den här stödfunktionen ritar textdelen av en RTF-vy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8669">This support function draws the text portion of a rich text view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8670">Den här funktionen anropas internt av gx_rich_text_view_draw() och tillhandahålls som ett separat API för program som definierar en anpassad funktion för rtf-vyritning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8670">This function is called internally by gx_rich_text_view_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom rich text view drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8671">Program som vill anpassa bakgrundsritningen för RTF-vyn kan tillhandahålla sin anpassade ritningsfunktion och anropa gx_rich_text_view_text_draw-tjänsten som en del av sin anpassade ritning för att rita rtf-textvyns text över bakgrunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8671">Applications that want to customize the rich text view background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_rich_text_view_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the rich text view text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8672">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8672">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8673">**text_view** Pekare till kontrollblock för rtf-textvywidget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8673">**text_view** Pointer to rich text view widget control block</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8675">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8675">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8676">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8676">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8677">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8677">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8678">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8678">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom rich text view drawing function. */

VOID my_rich_text_view_draw(GX_RICH_TEXT_VIEW *text_view)
{
    /* Insert code here to draw rich text view background. */

    /* Call support function to do text drawing. */
    gx_rich_text_view_text_draw();

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) rich_text_view);
}
```

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8683">gx_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8683">gx_screen_stack_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8684">Initiera en skärmstack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8684">Initialize a screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8685">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8685">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_create(
    GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control,
    GX_WIDGET **memory_buffer, 
    INT buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8686">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8686">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8687">Den här tjänsten initierar en skärmstack.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8687">This service initializes a screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8688">Programmet måste definiera minnesblocket och buffertstorleken som används för att implementera skärmstacksfunktionen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8688">The application must define the memory block and buffer size used to implement the screen stack feature.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8689">*Detta API är inaktuellt och ersätts med gx_system_screen_stack_create(). Den här versionen tillhandahålls endast för bakåtkompatibilitet med tidigare biblioteksutgåningar..*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8689">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_create(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8690">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8690">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8691">**kontroll** Kontrollblock för skärmstack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8691">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8692">**memory_buffer** Pekare till en minnesbuffert som används som en skärmstack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8692">**memory_buffer** Pointer to a memory buffer that used as a screen stack</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8693">**buffer_size** Minnesstorlek i byte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8693">**buffer_size** Memory size in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8694">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8694">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8695">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Skapa en lyckad skärmstack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8695">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8696">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8696">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8697">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Ogiltig buffertstorlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8697">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8698">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8698">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8699">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8699">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8700">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8700">Example</span></span>

```C
#define SCREEN_STACK_SIZE 10

GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL my_stack_control;
GX_WIDGET *screen_stack[SCREEN_STACK_SIZE];

/* Initialize “my_stack_control”. */
status = gx_screen_stack_create(&my_stack_control, screen_stack,
                        SCREEN_STACK_SIZE * sizeof(GX_WIDGET *));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the screen control block “my_stack control” has been initialized. */
```

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_pop"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8705">gx_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8705">gx_screen_stack_pop</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8706">Ta bort posten längst upp från skärmstacken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8706">Remove the topmost entry from the screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8707">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8707">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_screen_stack_pop(GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8708">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8708">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8709">Den här tjänsten tar bort posten längst upp från skärmstacken och kopplar den skärm som visas till dess föregående överordnade.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8709">This service removes the topmost entry from the screen stack, and attaches the popped screen to its previous parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8710">Det här API:et tar även bort eventuella befintliga underordnade objekt från den överordnade.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8710">This API also detaches any existing children from the parent.</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8711">*Detta API är inaktuellt och ersätts med gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). Den här versionen tillhandahålls endast för bakåtkompatibilitet med tidigare biblioteksversion.*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8711">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8712">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8712">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8713">**kontroll** Kontrollblock för skärmstack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8713">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8714">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8714">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8715">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckat popup-fönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8715">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful screen stack pop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8716">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8716">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8717">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8717">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8718">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8718">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8719">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8719">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8720">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8720">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove the topmost entry from the screen stack. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the topmost entry has been removed from the screen stack, 
    and the popped screen has been attached to its parent. */
```

## <a name="gx_screen_stack_push"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8725">gx_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8725">gx_screen_stack_push</span></span>

```C

    GX_SCREEN_STACK_CONTROL *control,
    GX_WIDGET *screen,
    GX_WIDGET *new_screen);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8728">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8728">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8729">Den här tjänsten tar bort skärmen från dess överordnade objekt och flyttar skärmpekaren och den överordnade pekaren till skärmstacken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8729">This service detaches screen from its parent, and pushes the screen pointer and the parent pointer onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8730">Den nya skärmpekaren kopplas sedan till den överordnade.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8730">The new screen pointer is then attached to the parent.</span></span>


> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8731">*Detta API är inaktuellt och ersätts med gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). Den här versionen tillhandahålls endast för bakåtkompatibilitet med tidigare biblioteksutgåningar..*</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8731">*This API is obsoleted, and is replaced with gx_system_screen_stack_pop(). This version is provided only for backwards compatibility with previous library releases..*</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8732">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8732">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8733">**kontroll** Kontrollblock för skärmstack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8733">**control** Screen stack control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8734">**skärm** Skärmbild som ska push-flyttas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8734">**screen** Screen pointer to push</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8735">**new_screen** Pekare över den nya skärmen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8735">**new_screen** Pointer of the new screen</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8736">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8736">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8738">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8738">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8742">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8742">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Push “screen” and its parent to screen stack, Dettach “screen” from its parent, and attach “new screen” to the parent. */
status = gx_screen_stack_push(&my_stack_control,
                                screen, new_screen);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “screen” and its parent have been pushed to screen stack, “screen” has been detached from its parent, “new_screen” has been attached to the parent. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8806">Process för bläddringstumhändelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8806">Process scroll thumb event</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8808">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8808">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8809">Den här tjänsten hanterar händelser som skickas till ett tumhjul i rullningslisten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8809">This service handles events sent to a scrollbar thumbwheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8810">Den här tjänsten används vanligtvis internt av GUIX, men görs offentlig för att underlätta implementeringen av anpassade rullningslistsbeteenden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8810">This service is normally used internally by GUIX, but is made public to assist with implementing custom scrollbar behaviors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8811">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8811">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8812">**scroll_thumb** Kontrollblock för bläddringswidget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8812">**scroll_thumb** Scroll thumb widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8813">**händelse** Pekare till händelse att bearbeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8813">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8814">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8814">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8815">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad process för bläddringstumhändelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8815">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scroll thumb event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8816">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8816">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8817">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8817">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8818">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8818">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8819">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8819">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8820">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8820">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8821">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8821">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom event processing function. */

UINT my_event_process (GX_SCROLL_THUMB *thumb, GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event_ptr->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        /* Do default handling. */
        status = gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(thumb, event_ptr);

        /* add my own handling here */
        break;
    default:
        status = gx_scroll_thumb_event_process(thumb, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8828">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8828">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8829">Den här tjänsten skapar en widget för basrullningshjul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8829">This service creates a base scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8830">Ett grundläggande rullningshjul är baswidgeten för alla typer av rullningshjulswidgetar, inklusive **gx_generic_scroll_wheel** och **gx_text_scroll_wheel** som är basen för gx_numeric_scroll_wheel **och gx_string_ scroll_wheel** widgetar. </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8830">A base scroll wheel is the base widget for all scroll wheel widget types, including the **gx_generic_scroll_wheel** and **gx_text_scroll_wheel** which is the base for **gx_numeric_scroll_wheel** and **gx_string_ scroll_wheel** widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8831">Widgeten för basrullningshjul ger händelsehantering, rullningsanimering och vald radberäkning för alla typer av rullningshjulswidgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8831">The base scroll wheel widget provides event handling, scrolling animation, and selected row calculation for all scroll wheel widget types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8832">Program skulle normalt inte skapa en instans av en allmän widget för rullningshjul, eftersom den här widgettypen inte har någon ritningsfunktion.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8832">Applications would not normally create an instance of a generic scroll wheel widget, since this widget type provides no drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8833">Åtkomst till detta API tillhandahålls dock för att hjälpa program som behöver skapa en anpassad typ av rullningshjulswidget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8833">However access to this API is provided to assist applications which need to create a custom scroll wheel widget type.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8834">GX_SCROLL_WHEEL baseras på GX_WINDOW, och därför kan alla GX_WINDOW API:er användas med GX_SCROLL_WHEEL och widgetar som härletts från GX_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8834">GX_SCROLL_WHEEL is based on GX_WINDOW, and therefore all GX_WINDOW APIs may be used with GX_SCROLL_WHEEL and widgets derived from GX_SCROLL_WHEEL.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8837">**namn** Namn på program tilldelad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8837">**name** Application assigned widget name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8838">**överordnad** Överordnad widget eller GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8838">**parent** Parent widget, or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8839">**total_rows** Totalt antal tillgängliga rader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8839">**total_rows** Total available rows</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8840">**style** Flaggor för widgetformat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8840">**style** Widget style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8841">**id Program-ID** för tilldelad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8841">**id** Application assigned widget ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8842">**storlek** Rektangel som definierar den inledande widgetstorleken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8842">**size** Rectangle defining initial widget size.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8844">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Rullningshjulet har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8844">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created scroll wheel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8848">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** widget (0x13) har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8848">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget created</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8852">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8852">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic create function during custom widget createl. */

UINT custom_scroll_wheel_create(CUSTOM_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
                    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
                    GX_WIDGET *parent,
                    INT total_rows, ULONG style,
                    USHORT id,
                    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
{
    /* create base widget as part of custom create */
    status = gx_scroll_wheel_create(wheel, name, parent,
                            total_rows, style, id, size);

    /* If status is GX_SUCCESS the base scroll wheel has been created. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8872">gx_scroll_wheel_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8872">gx_scroll_wheel_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8873">Händelsebearbetningsfunktion för allmän widget för rullningshjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8873">Event processing function for generic scroll wheel widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8874">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8874">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_event_process(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8875">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8875">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8876">Den här tjänsten tillhandahåller grundläggande hantering av indatahändelse för alla typer av rullningshjulswidgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8876">This service provides the basic input event handling for all scroll wheel widget types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8877">Den här funktionen exponeras för programprogramvaran för att hjälpa till med program som behöver skapa en anpassad typ av rullningshjulswidget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8877">This function is exposed to the application software to assist with applications which need to create a custom scroll wheel widget type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8878">Program tillhandahåller ofta en egen händelsebearbetningsfunktion, men anropar den allmänna händelsebearbetningen för hjulwidgetar för händelser som de inte behöver anpassa.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8878">Applications would often provide their own event processing function, but invoke the generic event processing for wheel widgets for events that they do not need to customize.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8879">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8879">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8880">**hjul** Pekare till allmänt kontrollblock för rullningshjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8880">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8881">**händelse** GX_EVENT pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8881">**event** GX_EVENT pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8882">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8882">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8883">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Händelseprocess för rullningshjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8883">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully scroll wheel event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8884">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8884">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8885">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8885">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8886">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8886">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8887">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8887">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8888">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8888">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8889">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8889">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic scroll wheel event processing 
    as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_scroll_wheel_event_process(CUSTOM_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
                    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic scroll wheel
            event processing */
        gx_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8909">gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8909">gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8910">Tilldela tonade alfavärden för valfri överläggstoning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8910">Assign gradient alpha values for optional overlay gradient</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8911">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8911">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_gradient_alpha_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_UBYTE start_alpha,
    GX_UBYTE end_alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8912">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8912">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8913">Den här tjänsten definierar start- och slutvärdena för alfavärden för ett valfritt toningsöverlägg för widgeten för rullningshjul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8913">This service defines the starting and ending alpha values for an optional gradient overlay of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8914">Alla rullningshjulswidgetar stöder en "tona"-effekt av rullningshjulsraderna som raderna nära den övre och nedre kanten av rullningshjulswidgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8914">All scroll wheel widgets support a “fade” effect of the scroll wheel rows as the rows near the top and bottom edge of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8915">Den här tonande effekten uppnås genom att rita en gradient pixelkarta över rullningshjulsraderna, vilket gör att raderna verkar tona ut när raderna ritas upptill och längst ned i widgeten för rullningshjul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8915">This fade effect is accomplished by drawing a gradient pixelmap over the scroll wheel rows, which make the rows appear to fade out as the rows are drawn near the top and bottom of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8916">Med den här API-tjänsten kan programmet ändra den tonande effektens intensitet eller inaktivera den här effekten helt genom att ange start- och slutvärdena för alfa till 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8916">This API service allows the application to modify the fading effect intensity, or disable this effect entirely by setting the start and end alpha values to 0.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8917">Den tonade pixelkartan skapas vid körning när rullningshjulet först blir synligt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8917">The gradient pixelmap is created at runtime when the scroll wheel initially becomes visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8918">Detta kräver att en minnesallokeringstjänst för körning har definierats med hjälp av _gx_system_memory_allocator_set().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8918">This requires that a runtime memory allocation service has been defined using _gx_system_memory_allocator_set().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8919">Om ingen minnesbetoningsfunktion har definierats skapas inte toningsbilden och ingen toningseffekt blir tillgänglig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8919">If no memory allocator function has been defined, the gradient image will not be created and no fade effect will be available.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8920">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8920">Parameters</span></span>

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8951">gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8951">gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8952">Tilldela radhöjden för varje hjulrad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8952">Assign the row height for each wheel row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8953">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8953">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_VALUE row_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8954">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8954">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8955">Den här tjänsten tilldelar radhöjden för varje rad i rullningshjulet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8955">This service assigns the row height for each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8956">Observera att om rullningshjulet har GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND passerar radhöjden genom en transformering som effektivt minskar radhöjden när raden närmar sig hjulets övre eller nedre kant.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8956">Note that if the scroll wheel has style GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND, the row height passes through a transform which effectively reduces the row height as the row nears the top or bottom edge of the wheel.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8957">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8957">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8958">**hjul** Pekare till allmänt kontrollblock för rullningshjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8958">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8959">**row_height** Radhöjdsvärde i bildpunkter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8959">**row_height** Row height value, in pixels.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8960">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8960">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8961">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Har ställt in rullningshjulets höjd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8961">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel height</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8962">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8962">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8963">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8963">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8964">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8964">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8965">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8965">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8966">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8966">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8967">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8967">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_row_height_set(&wheel, 40);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the wheel row height has been set to 40
pixels. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8987">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8987">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8988">Tilldela bakgrundsbild för rad som har valts med hjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8988">Assign background image for wheel selected row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8989">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8989">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL*wheel, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID image_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8990">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8990">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8991">Den här tjänsten tilldelar ett valfritt pixelkarta-ID som ritas bakom den valda raden i rullningshjulet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8991">This service assigns an optional pixelmap ID that is drawn behind the selected row of the scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8992">Detta kan användas för att markera den markerade raden så att användaren enkelt kan se vilken rad i rullningshjulet som har valts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8992">This can be used to highlight the selected row so that the user can easily distinguish which row of the scroll wheel is selected.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8993">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8993">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8994">**hjul** Pekare till allmänt kontrollblock för rullningshjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8994">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8995">**image_id** Pixelkarta-ID som ska användas som vald radbakgrundsbild.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8995">**image_id** Pixelmap ID to use as the selected row background image.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8996">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8996">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8997">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Konfigurera rullningshjulsbakgrunden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8997">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel background</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8998">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8998">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-8999">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-8999">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9000">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9000">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9001">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9001">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9002">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9002">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9003">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9003">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_selected_background_set(&wheel,
GX_PIXELMAP_ID_SELECTED_ROW);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the background image has been
assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9023">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9023">gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9024">Hämta den markerade hjulraden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9024">Retrieve the currently selected wheel row</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9025">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9025">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT *row);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9026">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9026">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9027">Den här tjänsten frågar rullningshjulet för att hämta den markerade raden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9027">This service will query the scroll wheel to retrieve the currently selected row.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9028">Anroparen måste skicka platsen för att returnera det valda radindexet som den andra parametern till den här funktionen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9028">The caller must pass the location to return the selected row index as the second parameter to this function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9029">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9029">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9030">**hjul** Pekare till allmänt kontrollblock för rullningshjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9030">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9031">**rad** Den plats där det valda radvärdet returneras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9031">**row** Location in which selected row value will be returned.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9032">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9032">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9033">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Den valda hjulraden har hämtats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9033">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved selected wheel row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9034">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9034">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9035">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9035">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9036">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x19) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9036">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x19) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9037">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9037">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9038">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9038">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9039">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9039">Example</span></span>

```C
INT row;
status = gx_scroll_wheel_selected_get(&wheel, &row);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the selected row has been returned in
the row variable. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9094">gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9094">gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9095">Tilldela rullningshastighet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9095">Assign scrolling speed</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9096">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9096">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_FIXED_VAL start_speed_rate,
    GX_FIXED_VAL end_speed_rate,
    GX_VALUE max_steps,
    GX_VALUE delay);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9097">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9097">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9098">Den här tjänsten tilldelar rullningshastigheten för widgeten för rullningshjul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9098">This service assigns the scrolling speed for the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9099">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9099">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9100">**hjul** Pekare till allmänt kontrollblock för rullningshjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9100">**wheel** Pointer to generic scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9101">**start_speed_rate** Hastigheten för att rulla starthastighet till hastighet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9101">**start_speed_rate** The rate of scrolling start speed to flick speed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9102">**end_speed_rate** Hastigheten för att rulla sluthastighet till hastighet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9102">**end_speed_rate** The rate of scrolling end speed to flick speed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9103">**max_steps** Maximalt antal steg för rullning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9103">**max_steps** Max steps for scrolling.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9104">**fördröjning** Fördröjningstid för varje steg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9104">**delay** Delay time of each step.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9105">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9105">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9106">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Har angett hjulhastighet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9106">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set wheel speed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9107">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9107">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9108">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9108">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9109">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9109">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9110">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Ogiltigt värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9110">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9111">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9111">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9112">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9112">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9113">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9113">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_scroll_wheel_speed_set(&wheel, GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(2),
                                GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2, 10, 2);

/* if status == GX_SUCCESS the scroll wheel speed has been
successfully set. */
```

## <a name="gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9133">gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9133">gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9135">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9135">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scroll_wheel_total_rows_set(
    GX_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    INT total_rows);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9136">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9136">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9137">Den här tjänsten tilldelar antalet rader som är tillgängliga i det angivna rullningshjulet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9137">This service assigns the number of rows available in the indicated scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9138">Widgeten för rullningshjul tar vanligtvis emot radinnehållet från programmet i form av en matris med strängar eller strängdata som användaren har angett.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9138">The scroll wheel widget usually receives the row content from the application in the form of an array of strings or user supplied string data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9139">Detta API informerar rullningshjulet om det totala antalet rader som ska visas för användaren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9139">This API informs the scroll wheel of the total number of rows that should be presented to the user.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9140">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9140">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9142">**total_rows** Totalt antal hjulrader som ska visas för användaren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9142">**total_rows** Total number of wheel rows to present to the user.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9144">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ange totalt antal rader med rullningshjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9144">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set scroll wheel total row</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9145">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9145">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9146">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9146">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9147">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9147">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9148">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Ogiltigt värde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9148">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9172">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9172">Prototype</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9173">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9173">Description</span></span>

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9190">gx_scrollbar_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9190">gx_scrollbar_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9191">Bearbeta rullningslistshändelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9191">Process scrollbar event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9192">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9192">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scrollbar_event_process(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9193">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9193">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9194">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en rullningslistshändelse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9194">This service processes a scrollbar event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9195">En vanlig händelsehanteringsfunktion som används för både lodräta och vågräta rullningslistswidgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9195">A common event handling function used for both vertical and horizontal scrollbar widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9196">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9196">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9197">**rullningslist** Kontrollblock för rullningslistswidget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9197">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9198">**händelse** Pekare till händelse att bearbeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9198">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9199">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9199">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9200">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad rullningslisthändelseprocess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9200">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9201">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9201">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9202">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9202">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9203">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9203">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9204">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9204">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9205">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9205">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9206">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9206">Example</span></span>

```C
Call generic scrollbar event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_scrollbar_event_process(GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
                                    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* pass all other events to the generic scrollbar
            event processing */
        gx_scrollbar_event_process(scrollbar, event);
        break;
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_limit_check"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9213">gx_scrollbar_limit_check</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9213">gx_scrollbar_limit_check</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9215">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9215">Prototype</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9216">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9216">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9217">Den här tjänsten kontrollerar rullningslistens gräns och förhindrar att tumhjulet för rullningslisten rör sig utanför de fördefinierade gränserna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9217">This service checks the limit of the scrollbar and prevents the scrollbar thumbwheel from traveling beyond the predefined limits.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_scrollbar_reset"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9234">gx_scrollbar_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9234">gx_scrollbar_reset</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9235">Återställ rullningslist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9235">Reset scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9236">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9236">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_scrollbar_reset(
    GX_SCROLLBAR *scrollbar,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9237">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9237">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9238">Den här tjänsten återställer rullningslisten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9238">This service resets the scrollbar.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9239">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9239">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9240">**rullningslist** Kontrollblock för rullningslistswidget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9240">**scrollbar** Scrollbar widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9241">**info** Pekare till GX_SCROLL_INFO struktur som definierar rullningslistens gränser, aktuellt värde och steg eller ökning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9241">**info** Pointer to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure that defines the scrollbar limits, current value, and step or increment.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9242">**Bilaga I** innehåller definition för GX_SCROLL_INFO struktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9242">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLL_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9243">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9243">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9244">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad återställning av rullningslisten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9244">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful scrollbar reset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9245">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9245">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9246">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9247">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9247">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9248">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Rullningsinformationen är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9248">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9249">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9249">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9250">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9250">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9251">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9251">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Reset scrollbar “my_scrollbar”. */

GX_SCROLL_INFO my_info;

my_info.gx_scroll_value = 0;
my_info.gx_scroll_minimum = 0;
my_info.gx_scroll_maximum = 100;
my_info.gx_scroll_visible = 10;
my_info.gx_scroll_increment = 1;

status = gx_scrollbar_reset(&my_scrollbar, &my_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scrollbar “my_scrollbar” has been reset. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9431">gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9431">gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9432">Infoga en teckensträng vid aktuell markörposition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9432">Insert a character string at current cursor position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9433">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9433">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_UBYTE *insert_str,
    UINT insert_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9434">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9434">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9435">Den här tjänsten infogar en teckensträng i strängbufferten för textinmatning vid den aktuella markörpositionen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9435">This service inserts a character string into the text input string buffer at the current cursor position.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9436">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9436">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9437">**text_input** Kontrollblock för enradswidget för textinmatning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9437">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9438">**insert_str** Teckensträng som ska infogas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9438">**insert_str** Character string to be inserted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9439">**insert_size** Antal byte som ska infogas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9439">**insert_size** Byte count to be inserted</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9440">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9440">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9441">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Har infogat tecknet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9441">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully inserted the character</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9442">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9442">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9443">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9443">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9444">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9444">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9445">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9445">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9446">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9446">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9447">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9447">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Insert characters at current cursor position. */

GX_CHAR insert_text[10] = “insert”;
status = gx_single_line_text_input_character_insert(&my_text_input,
                                            insert_text,
                                            GX_STRLEN(insert_text));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text input widget has successfully insert the string. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9469">gx_single_line_text_input_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9469">gx_single_line_text_input_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9470">Skapa en textinmatningswidget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9470">Create a text input widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9471">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9471">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_create(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_CHAR *input_buffer, UINT buffer_size,
    UINT style, USHORT text_input_id, GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9472">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9472">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9473">Den här tjänsten skapar en textinmatningswidget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9473">This service creates a text input widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9474">Anroparen måste ange lagring för indatasträngen och ange strängens maximala längd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9474">The caller must provide storage for the input string and indicate the maximum length of the string.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9475">GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT härleds från GX_PROMPT och därför kan alla gx_prompt-tjänster användas med GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9475">GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT is derived from GX_PROMPT and therefore all gx_prompt services may be used with GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9476">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9476">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9477">**text_input** Kontrollblock för enradswidget för textinmatning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9477">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9478">**namn** Valfritt logiskt widgetnamn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9478">**name** Optional widget logical name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9479">**överordnad** Valfri överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9479">**parent** Optional parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9480">**input_buffer** Lagring för indatasträng</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9480">**input_buffer** Storage for input string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9481">**buffer_size** Storlek på lagringsområdet för indatasträngen, i byte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9481">**buffer_size** Size of input string storage area, in bytes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9482">**style (stil)** Formatflaggor för textinmatning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9482">**style** Text input style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9483">**text_input_id** Valfritt ID för indatawidgeten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9483">**text_input_id** Optional ID of the input widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9484">**storlek** Rektangel som definierar den inledande widgetstorleken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9484">**size** Rectangle defining initial widget size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9485">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9485">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9486">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad textinmatning med en rad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9486">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single-line text input create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9487">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9487">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9488">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9488">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9489">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** widgeten (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9489">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9490">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Ogiltig blockstorlek för widgetkontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9490">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9491">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9491">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9492">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9492">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9493">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9493">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9494">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9494">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT my_text_input;
static GX_CHAR           text_input_buffer[100];
GX_RECTANGLE             size;

/* Define widget size. */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 10, 10, 110, 40);

/* Create single-line text input widget “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_create(&my_text_input,
                        “text_input”, GX_NULL, text_input_buffer, 100,
                        GX_STYLE_ENABLED, 0, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text input widget has been created. */
```

```C
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9551">Hämta startpositionen för text draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9551">Retrieve text draw start position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9552">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9552">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_VALUE *xpos, GX_VALUE *ypos);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9553">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9553">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9554">Den här tjänsten hämtar startpositionen för att rita textinmatningstext.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9554">This service retrieves the draw start position of text input text.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9555">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9555">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9556">**text_input** Kontrollblock för enradswidget för textinmatning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9556">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9557">**xpos** Hämtade startpositionen för rita i x koordinat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9557">**xpos** Retrieved draw start position in x coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9558">**ypos** Hämtade startpositionen för rita i y-koordinaten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9558">**ypos** Retrieved draw start position in y coordinate</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9559">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9559">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9560">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Flytta textinmatningsmarkören till slutet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9560">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully move text input cursor to end</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9561">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9561">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9562">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9562">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9563">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9563">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9564">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9564">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9565">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9565">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom single line text input draw function. */

VOID my_sl_text_input_draw(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input)
{
GX_VALUE xpos;
GX_VALUE ypos;

    /* Draw background. */
    gx_widget_border_draw(input, border_color, upper_fill_color,
                          lower_fill_color, GX_TRUE);

    /* Retrieve text draw start position. */
    gx_single_line_text_input_draw_position_get(input, xpos,
                                                ypos);

    /* Add your text drawing here. */
}
```


## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9623">gx_single_line_text_input_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9623">gx_single_line_text_input_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9624">Funktion för händelsebearbetning av textinmatningswidget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9624">Text input widget event processing function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9625">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9625">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_event_process(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9626">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9626">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9627">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en textindatahändelse med en rad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9627">This service processes a single line text input event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9628">Den här funktionen refereras internt av gx_single_line_text_input_create-funktionen, men exponeras för användning av programmet i de fall där programmet definierar en anpassad händelsebearbetningsfunktion för textinmatning på en rad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9628">This function is internally referenced by the gx_single_line_text_input_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom single line text input event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9629">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9629">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9630">**text_input** Kontrollblock för enradswidget för textinmatning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9630">**text_input** Single-line text input widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9631">**event_ptr** Pekare till GX_EVENT struktur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9631">**event_ptr** Pointer to GX_EVENT structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9632">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9632">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9633">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Korrekt bearbetad textinmatningshändelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9633">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed text input event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9634">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9634">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9635">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9635">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9636">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9636">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9637">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9637">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9638">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9638">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9639">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9639">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic single line text input event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_sl_text_input_event_process(
                                GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *input,
                                GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default single line
            text input event processing */
        status =
        gx_single_line_text_input_event_process(input, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```
