## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9661">gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9661">gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9662">Ange bakgrundsfärg för textinmatning med en rad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9662">Set single line text input background color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9663">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9663">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_fill_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9664">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9664">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9665">Den här tjänsten anger fyllningsfärgen för textinmatningen på en rad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9665">This service sets the fill color of the single line text input.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9666">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9666">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9667">**text_input** Pekare till kontrollblock för textinmatning med en rad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9667">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9668">**normal_fill_color_id** Resurs-ID för widgeten fyller färgen i normalt tillstånd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9668">**normal_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9669">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade resurs-ID:er för färg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9669">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9670">Observera att programmet kan lägga till anpassade resurs-ID:n för färg också.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9670">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9671">**selected_fill_color_id** Resurs-ID för widgetens fyllningsfärg när widgeten får fokus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9671">**selected_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9672">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade resurs-ID:er för färg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9672">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9673">Observera att programmet kan lägga till anpassade resurs-ID:n för färg också.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9673">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9674">**disabled_fill_color_id** Resurs-ID för widgetens fyllningsfärg när GX_STYLE_ENABLED inte har angetts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9674">**disabled_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9675">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färgresurs-ID:er.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9675">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9676">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade resurs-ID:n för färg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9676">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9677">**readonly_fill_color_id** Resurs-ID för widgetens fyllningsfärg när både GX_STYLE_ENABLED och GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READYONLY har angetts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9677">**readonly_fill_color_id** Resource ID of the widget fill color when both style GX_STYLE_ENABLED and GX_STYLE_TEXT_INPUT_READYONLY are set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9678">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färgresurs-ID:er.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9678">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9679">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade resurs-ID:n för färg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9679">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9680">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9680">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9681">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad färguppsättning för textinmatning med en rad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9681">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful single line text input fill color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9682">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9682">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9683">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9683">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9684">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9684">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9685">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9685">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9686">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9686">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9687">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9687">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set fill colors for single line text input “my_text_input”. */
status = gx_single_line_text_input_fill_color_set(&my_text_input,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_READONLY_FILL);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the fill color of “my_text_input” was
set. */
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_home"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9709">gx_single_line_text_input_home</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9709">gx_single_line_text_input_home</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9710">Flytta textinmatningsmarkören till hempositionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9710">Move the text input cursor to the home position</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9711">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9711">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_home(GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9712">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9712">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9713">Den här tjänsten flyttar markörpositionen för textinmatning till början av indatasträngen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9713">This service moves the text input cursor position to the start of the input string.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9714">Den här tjänsten anropas internt när en hemnyckel nedåt-händelse tas emot, men kan även anropas av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9714">This service is called internally when a home key down event is received, but can also be invoked by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9717">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9717">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9718">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Markören har flyttats till hempositionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9718">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully moved cursor to the home position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9719">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9719">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9720">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9720">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9721">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9721">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9722">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9722">Allowed From</span></span>

```C

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the cursor has been moved to the home position */
```

```C
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input);
```

```C
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    ULONG style);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9869">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9869">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9871">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9871">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9872">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9872">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_style_remove(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input, 
    ULONG style);
```

## <a name="gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9966">gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9966">gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9968">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9968">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_single_line_text_input_text_color_set(
    GX_SINGLE_LINE_TEXT_INPUT *text_input,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_text_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID readonly_text_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9969">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9969">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9972">**text_input** Pekare till kontrollblock för textinmatning med en rad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9972">**text_input** Pointer to single line text input control block</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9976">**selected_text_color_id** Resurs-ID för textfärgen när widgeten får fokus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9976">**selected_text_color_id** Resource ID of the text color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9977">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade resurs-ID:er för färg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9977">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-9978">Observera att programmet kan lägga till anpassade resurs-ID:n för färg också.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-9978">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_slider_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10109">gx_slider_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10109">gx_slider_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10110">Skapa skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10110">Create slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10111">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10111">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_create(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, INT tick_count,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *slider_info,
    ULONG style, USHORT slider_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10112">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10112">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10113">Den här tjänsten skapar en skjutreglagewidget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10113">This service creates a slider widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10114">GX_SLIDER härleds från GX_WIDGET, och därför kan alla GX_WIDGET API-tjänster användas med GX_SLIDER-widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10114">GX_SLIDER is derived from GX_WIDGET, and therefore all gx_widget API services may be used with GX_SLIDER type widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10115">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10115">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10116">**slider**: Kontrollblock för skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10116">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10117">**name**: Namnet på skjutreglaget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10117">**name**: Name of slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10118">**överordnad:** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10118">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10119">**tick_count:** Antal tick för skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10119">**tick_count**: Number of slider ticks</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10120">**slider_info: Pekare** till skjutreglagets information som är en struktur som används för att överföra gränserna för skjutreglagets värde, skjutreglagets nålstorlek och position samt andra skjutreglageparametrar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10120">**slider_info**: Pointer to slider info which is a structure used to pass the slider value limits, slider needle size and position, and other slider parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10121">**Bilaga I** innehåller definition för GX_SLIDER_INFO struktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10121">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10122">**style**: Skjutreglagets format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10122">**style**: Style of slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10123">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widgetspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10123">**Appendix D** contains predefined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10124">**slider_id:** Programdefinierat ID för skjutreglaget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10124">**slider_id**: Application-defined ID of slider</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10125">**storlek:** Skjutreglagets dimensioner</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10125">**size**: Dimensions of slider</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10126">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10126">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10127">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Skapa skjutreglaget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10127">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10128">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10128">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10129">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10129">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10130">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10130">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10131">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Ogiltig blockstorlek för widgetkontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10131">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10132">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Överordnad widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10132">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10133">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10133">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10134">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10134">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10135">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10135">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create slider “my_slider”. */

GX_SLIDER my_slider;
GX_SLIDER_INFO info;

info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
info.gx_slider_info_increment = 1;
info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 20;
info.gx_slider_info_max_travel = 20;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;
info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset = 5;

status = gx_slider_create(&my_slider, “my_slider”,
    &my_parent, 10, info, GX_STYLE_ENABLED, ID_MY_SLIDER, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the slider “my_slider” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10150">gx_slider_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10150">gx_slider_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10151">Dra skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10151">Draw slider</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10152">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10152">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10153">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10153">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10154">Den här tjänsten drar ett skjutreglage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10154">This service draws a slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10155">Den här tjänsten används internt av gx_slider_create-funktionen, men exponeras även för användning av programmet i dessa instanser när en anpassad skjutreglageritningsfunktion definieras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10155">This service is used internally by the gx_slider_create function, but is also exposed for use by the application in those instances when a custom slider drawing function is defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10156">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10156">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10157">**slider**: Kontrollblock för skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10157">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10158">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10158">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10159">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10159">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10160">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10160">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10161">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10161">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10162">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10162">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom slider draw function. */
VOID my_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* Call default slider draw. */
    gx_slider_draw(slider);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

```C
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10180">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10180">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10181">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en skjutreglagehändelse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10181">This service processes a slider event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10182">Den här funktionen refereras internt av gx_slider_create-funktionen, men exponeras för användning av programmet i de fall där programmet definierar en anpassad funktion för händelsebearbetning av skjutreglage.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10182">This function is internally referenced by the gx_slider_create function, but is exposed for use by the application in those cases where the application defines a custom slider event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10183">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10183">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10187">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Händelseprocess med lyckat skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10187">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10188">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10188">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10189">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10189">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10190">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10190">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10191">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10191">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10193">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10193">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic slider event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_slider_event_process(GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default slider event processing */
            status = gx_slider_event_process(slider, event);
            break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_info_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10208">gx_slider_info_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10208">gx_slider_info_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10209">Ange informationsblock för skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10209">Set slider information block</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10210">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10210">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_info_set(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10211">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10211">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10212">Den här tjänsten tilldelar den angivna skjutreglageinformationen, till exempel lägsta skjutreglage, högsta skjutreglage och aktuellt skjutreglagevärde till det angivna skjutreglaget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10212">This service assigns the specified slider information such as slider minimum, slider maximum, and slider current value to the indicated slider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10213">Skjutreglaget uppdaterar nålpositionen och ritar om baserat på den nya skjutreglageinformationen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10213">The slider will update the needle position and redraw based on the new slider information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10214">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10214">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10215">**slider**: Kontrollblock för skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10215">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10216">**info**: Pekare till skjutreglagets informationsstruktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10216">**info**: Pointer to the slider information structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10217">**Bilaga I** innehåller definition för GX_SLIDER_INFO struktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10217">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10218">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10218">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10219">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Information om skjutreglaget har ställts in</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10219">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set slider information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10220">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10220">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10221">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10221">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10222">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10222">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10223">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10223">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10224">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10224">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10225">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10225">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SLIDER_INFO my_slider_info;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_min_val = 0;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_max_val = 100;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_current_val = 50;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_increment = 1;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_min_travel = 20;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_max_travel = 20;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_width = 10;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_height = 10;
my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_inset = 5;

my_slider_info.gx_slider_info_needle_hotspot_offset = 5;

/* Set slider information for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_info_set (&my_slider, &my_slider_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “my_slider” is configured with my_slider_info. */
```

## <a name="gx_slider_needle_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10240">gx_slider_needle_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10240">gx_slider_needle_draw</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10242">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10242">Prototype</span></span>

```C

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10243">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10243">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10244">Den här tjänsten drar ett skjutreglage med en nål.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10244">This service draws a slider needle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10245">Den här tjänsten anropas automatiskt av gx_slider_draw,men kan också anropas av programmet som en del av en anpassad skjutreglageritningsfunktion.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10245">This service is automatically called by the gx_slider_draw function, but may also be invoked by the application as part of a customized slider drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10252">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10252">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom slider draw function. */
VOID my_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    /* Call default tickmarks draw. */
    gx_slider_tickmarks_draw(slider);

    /* Call default slider needle draw. */
    gx_slider_needle_draw(slider);
}
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10270">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10270">Description</span></span>

## <a name="gx_slider_tickmarks_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10300">gx_slider_tickmarks_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10300">gx_slider_tickmarks_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10301">Bockmarkeringar för skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10301">Draw slider tickmarks</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10302">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10302">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_slider_tickmarks_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10303">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10303">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10304">Den här tjänsten ritar reglagets bockmarkeringar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10304">This service draws the slider tickmarks.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10305">Den här funktionen anropas internt av gx_slider_draw,men exponeras för användning av program som kan implementera en anpassad skjutreglageritningsfunktion.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10305">This function is called internally by the gx_slider_draw function, but is exposed for use by applications that might implement a custom slider drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10306">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10306">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10307">**slider**: Kontrollblock för skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10307">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10308">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10308">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10309">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10309">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10310">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10310">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10311">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10311">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10312">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10312">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom slider draw function. */
VOID my_slider_draw(GX_SLIDER *slider)
{
    /* Add your own background draw here. */

    /* Call default tickmarks draw. */
    gx_slider_tickmarks_draw(slider);

    /* Call default slider needle draw. */
    gx_slider_needle_draw(slider);
}
```

## <a name="gx_slider_value_calculate"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10361">gx_slider_value_calculate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10361">gx_slider_value_calculate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10362">Beräkna skjutreglagevärde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10362">Calculate slider value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10363">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10363">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_value_calculate(
    GX_SLIDER *slider, 
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info,
    INT new_position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10364">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10364">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10365">Den här tjänsten beräknar skjutreglagets värde baserat på skjutreglagets nålposition.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10365">This service calculates the slider value based on the slider needle position.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10366">Den här funktionen anropas internt av GUIX när användaren flyttar skjutreglagets nål, men kan även anropas av programmet när en anpassad skjutreglagewidget implementeras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10366">This function is called internally by GUIX when the user moves the slider needle, but can also be invoked by the application when implementing a custom slider widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10367">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10367">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10368">**slider**: Kontrollblock för skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10368">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10369">**info**: Pekare till skjutreglagets information.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10369">**info**: Pointer to slider info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10370">**Bilaga I** innehåller definition för GX_LISDER_INFO struktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10370">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_LISDER_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10371">**new_position: Ny** position för skjutreglaget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10371">**new_position**: New slider position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10372">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10372">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10373">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Skjutreglagets värde beräknas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10373">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider value calculate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10374">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10374">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10375">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10375">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10376">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10376">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10377">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) Skjutreglageinformation är ogiltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10377">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Slider info not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10378">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10378">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10379">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10379">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10380">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10380">Example</span></span>

```C

status = gx_slider_value_calculate(&my_slider,
    &my_slider.gx_slider_info, new_slider_position);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the slider value of “my_slider” has been calculated. */

```

## <a name="gx_slider_value_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10395">gx_slider_value_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10395">gx_slider_value_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10396">Ange skjutreglagevärde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10396">Set slider value</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10397">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10397">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_slider_value_set(
    GX_SLIDER *slider,
    GX_SLIDER_INFO *info, 
    INT new_value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10398">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10398">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10399">Den här tjänsten anger skjutreglagets värde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10399">This service sets the slider value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10400">Det här API:et kan anropas av programmet för att flytta en nål med skjutreglaget under programkontrollen, vilket kringgår behovet av användarindata för att dra skjutreglagets nål.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10400">This API can be called by the application to move a slider needle under program control, bypassing the need for user input to drag the slider needle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10401">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10401">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10402">**slider**: Kontrollblock för skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10402">**slider**: Slider widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10403">**info**: Pekare till skjutreglagets informationsstruktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10403">**info**: Pointer to slider info structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10404">**Bilaga I** innehåller definition för GX_SLIDER_INFO struktur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10404">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SLIDER_INFO structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10405">**new_value:** Nytt skjutreglagevärde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10405">**new_value**: New slider value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10406">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10406">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10407">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Värdeuppsättning för lyckat skjutreglage</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10407">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful slider value set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10408">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10408">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10409">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10409">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10410">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10410">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10411">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10411">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Set new value for slider “my_slider”. */
status = gx_slider_value_set(&my_slider,
    &my_slider.gx_slider_info, new_value);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new value has been set for slider “my_slider”. */
```

##  <a name="gx_sprite_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10428">gx_sprite_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10428">gx_sprite_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10429">Skapa en widget för din widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10429">Create a sprite widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10430">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10430">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_create(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite, GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_SPRITE_FRAME *frame_list,
    USHORT frame_count,
    ULONG style, USHORT sprite_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10431">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10431">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10432">Den här tjänsten skapar en GX_SPRITE widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10432">This service creates a GX_SPRITE widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10433">En webbplats används för att visa en sekvens med pixelkartor som i en animering, eller kan användas som en widget för visning av pixelkartor med flera tillstånd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10433">A sprite is used to display a sequence of pixelmaps as in an animation, or can be used as a multi-state pixelmap display widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10434">GX_SPRITE härleds från GX_WIDGET och stöder alla gx_widget API-tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10434">GX_SPRITE is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget API services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10435">Widgeten GX_SPRITE kräver en matris med GX_SPRITE_FRAME strukturer för att definiera den första animeringen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10435">The GX_SPRITE widget requires an array of GX_SPRITE_FRAME structures to define the sprite animation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10436">**Bilaga I** innehåller definition GX_PRITE_FRAME struktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10436">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_PRITE_FRAME structure.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10437">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10437">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10438">**widgete:** Kontrollblock för Widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10438">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10439">**name**: Valfritt tilläggsnamn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10439">**name**: Optional sprite name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10440">**överordnad:** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10440">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10441">**frame_list:** En matris med GX_SPRITE_FRAME strukturer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10441">**frame_list**: An array of GX_SPRITE_FRAME structures</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10442">**frame_count**: anger antalet poster i matrisen för bildrutelistan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10442">**frame_count**: specifies the number of entries in the frame list array</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10443">**style**: Stil på ditten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10443">**style**: Style of sprite.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10444">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widgetspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10444">**Appendix D** contains predefined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10445">**sprite_id:** Programdefinierat ID för ditt program</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10445">**sprite_id**: Application-defined ID of sprite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10446">**size**: Dimensions of ditte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10446">**size**: Dimensions of sprite</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10447">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10447">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10448">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Lyckat att skapa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10448">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful sprite create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10449">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10449">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10450">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10450">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10451">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10451">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10452">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Överordnad widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10452">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10453">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10453">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10454">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10454">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10455">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10455">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create sprite “my_sprite”. */

status = gx_sprite_create(&my_sprite, “my_sprite”,
    &my_parent,
    sprite_frame_list, frame_count,
    GX_STYLE_SPRITE_AUTO|GX_STYLE_SPRITE_LOOP,
    ID_MY_SPRITE, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_sprite_current_frame_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10461">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10461">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10462">Tilldela en stomme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10462">Assign sprite frame</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10463">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10463">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_current_frame_set(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite, 
    USHORT frame);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10464">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10464">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10465">Den här tjänsten tilldelar den aktuella ramen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10465">This service assigns the current sprite frame.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10466">Om en GX_SPRITE widget inte körs automatiskt kan den användas som ett programkontrollerat tillståndsbelysning som visar den kommandoterade bildpunktskartan för bildpunkter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10466">If a GX_SPRITE widget is not auto-running, it can be used as a program controlled state light, displaying the commanded frame pixelmap.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10467">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10467">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10468">**widgete:** Widget widget kontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10468">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10469">**frame**: Utsmå bildruta som ska visas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10469">**frame**: Sprite frame to display</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10470">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10470">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10471">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Lyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10471">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10472">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10473">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10473">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10474">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10474">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10475">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10475">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10476">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10476">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10477">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10477">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign frame number 3 as the current sprite frame */
status = gx_sprite_current_frame_set(&my_sprite, 3);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” will display frame index 3. */
```

## <a name="gx_sprite_frame_list_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10483">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10483">gx_sprite_frame_list_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10484">Tilldela eller ändra en listruta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10484">Assign or alter a sprite frame list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10485">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10485">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_frame_list_set(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite,
    GX_SPRITE_FRAME *frame_list,
    USHORT frame_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10486">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10486">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10487">Den här tjänsten kan användas för att tilldela eller tilldela om bildrutelistan som används av en widget för att hitta efter att widgeten har skapats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10487">This service can be used to assign or re-assign the frame list used by a sprite widget after the sprite widget has been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10488">Information om innehållet i en webbplatsramlista finns i dokumentationen gx_sprite_create API.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10488">For information about the contents of a sprite frame list, refer to the gx_sprite_create API documentation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10489">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10489">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10490">**widgete:** Kontrollblock för Widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10490">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10491">**frame_list:** Matris med GX_SPRITE_FRAME strukturer eller GX_NULL om det inte finns någon ramlista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10491">**frame_list**: Array of GX_SPRITE_FRAME structures or GX_NULL if no frame list.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10492">**frame_count:** Antal bildrutor i matrisen med bildrutor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10492">**frame_count**: Number of frames in frame list array</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10493">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10493">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10494">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Lyckad fördrutelisteuppsättning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10494">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful sprite frame list set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10495">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10495">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10496">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10496">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10497">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10497">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10498">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10498">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10499">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10499">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10500">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10500">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign framelist_1, which has 10 frames, to my_sprite */
status = gx_sprite_frame_list_set(&my_sprite, framelist_1, 10);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new frame list is now associated with this sprite */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10501">Se även</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10501">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10502">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10502">gx_sprite_current_frame_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_sprite_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10506">gx_sprite_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10506">gx_sprite_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10507">Starta en startkörningssekvens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10507">Start a sprite run sequence</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10508">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10508">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_start(
    GX_SPRITE *sprite, 
    USHORT frame);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10509">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10509">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10510">Den här tjänsten startar en automatisk körningssekvens.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10510">This service starts a sprite auto-run sequence.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10511">Den här widgeten går igenom de första bildrutorna tills den sista bildrutan har nåtts, eller körs kontinuerligt om GX_SPRITE_LOOP har angetts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10511">The sprite widget will cycle through the sprite frames until the last frame is reached, or will run continuously if the GX_SPRITE_LOOP style is set.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10512">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10512">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10513">**widgete:** Widget widget kontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10513">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10514">**frame**: Inledande stomme som ska visas, vanligtvis bildruta 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10514">**frame**: Initial sprite frame to display, usually frame 0</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10515">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10515">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10516">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Har startats och körts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10516">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully started sprite run</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10517">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10518">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10518">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10519">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10519">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10520">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10520">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10521">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10521">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10522">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10522">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start the sprite “my_sprite” */
status = gx_sprite_start(&my_sprite, 0);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” will start running */
```

## <a name="gx_sprite_stop"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10528">gx_sprite_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10528">gx_sprite_stop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10529">Stoppa en startkörningssekvens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10529">Stop a sprite run sequence</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10530">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10530">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_sprite_stop(GX_SPRITE *sprite);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10531">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10531">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10532">Den här tjänsten stoppar en automatisk körningssekvens.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10532">This service stops a sprite auto-run sequence.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10533">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10533">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10534">**widgete:** Kontrollblock för Widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10534">**sprite**: Sprite widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10535">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10535">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10536">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Har stoppat körningen av ditt resultat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10536">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully stopped sprite run</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10537">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10537">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10538">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10538">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10539">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10539">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10540">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10540">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10541">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10541">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10542">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10542">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Stop the sprite sequence */
status = gx_sprite_stop(&my_sprite);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the sprite “my_sprite” is stopped. */
```

## <a name="gx_string_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10548">gx_string_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10548">gx_string_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10549">Skapa ett rullningshjul av strängtyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10549">Create a string type scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10550">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10550">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_string_scroll_wheel_create(
    GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **string_list, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT Id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10551">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10551">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10552">Den här tjänsten skapar ett rullningshjul av strängtyp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10552">This service creates a string type scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10553">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL härleds från GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL, och därför kan alla API gx_text_scroll_wheel funktioner användas med GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10553">GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL is derived from GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL, and therefore all gx_text_scroll_wheel API functions maybe be used with GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL widgets.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10554">Programmet kan skicka en enkel strängmatris till funktionen create som definierar de strängar som ska visas av rullningshjulet, eller så kan programmet skicka GX_NULL som string_list-parameter och anropa API:et för att tillhandahålla en matris med `gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set()` sträng-ID:n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10554">The application can pass in a simple string array to the create function which defines the strings that will be displayed by the scroll wheel, or the application can pass GX_NULL as the string_list parameter and call the `gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set()` API to provide an array of String IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10555">Om den senare metoden används växlar strängrullningshjulet automatiskt de visade strängarna om det aktiva programspråket ändras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10555">If the latter method is used the string scroll wheel will automatically switch the displayed strings if the active application language is modified.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10556">Alternativt, om de strängar som ska visas inte definieras statiskt eller inte vet när rullningshjulet skapas, kan programmet skicka GX_NULL som stränglistparameter och anropa API-funktionen gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set() för att definiera en återanropsfunktion som tillhandahåller de strängar som ska visas i realtid efter behov..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10556">As an alternative, if the strings to be displayed are not statically defined or not know at the time the scroll wheel is created, the application can pass GX_NULL as the string list parameter, and call the API function gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set() to define a callback function which will provide the strings to be displayed in a real-time as-needed basis..</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10557">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10557">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10558">**wheel**: Blockadress för kontroll av rullningshjul för strängar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10558">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10559">**name**: Programdefinierat widgetnamn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10559">**name**: Application defined widget name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10560">**överordnad:** Överordnat eller GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10560">**parent**: Wheel parent or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10561">**total_rows:** Totalt antal rader som ska visas för användaren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10561">**total_rows**: Total rows to be presented to user</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10562">**string_list:** Statiskt definierad strängmatris eller GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10562">**string_list**: Statically defined string array, or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10563">**style**: Önskade formatflaggor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10563">**style**: Desired style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10564">**Id:** Programdefinierade flaggor för hjulformat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10564">**Id**: Application defined wheel style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10565">**storlek:** Ursprunglig storlek på rullningshjulet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10565">**size**: Initial scroll wheel size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10566">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10566">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10567">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Strängrullningshjulet har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10567">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully created string scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10568">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10568">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10569">**GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)**: Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10569">**GX_PTR_ERROR (0x07)**: Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10570">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10570">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10571">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10571">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10572">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10572">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10573">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10573">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10574">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10574">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR *days[] = {
    “Sunday”,
    “Monday”,
    “Tuesday”,
    “Wednesday”,
    “Thursday”,
    “Friday”,
    “Saturday”
};

GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

/* Create the string scroll wheel. */

status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “Day Wheel”,
    root, 7, days,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|GX_STYLE_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL_ROUND,
    ID_SCROLL_WHEEL_DAY, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string scroll wheel has been created. */
```

```C

    GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_RESOURCE_ID *string_id_list, 
    INT id_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10596">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10596">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10597">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för det angivna rullningshjulet för strängar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10597">This service processes an event for the specified string scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10598">Den här tjänsten ska anropas som standardhändelsehanterare av anpassade funktioner för bearbetning av rullningshjulssträngar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10598">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom string scroll wheel event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10599">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10599">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10600">**hjul** Pekare till kontrollblock för strängrullningshjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10600">**wheel** Pointer to string scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10601">**event_ptr** Pekare till den händelse som ska bearbetas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10601">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10602">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10602">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10603">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Händelseprocess för strängrullningshjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10603">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful string scroll wheel event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10604">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10604">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10605">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10605">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10606">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10606">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10607">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10607">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10608">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10608">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10609">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10609">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic string scroll wheel event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_string_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default string scroll wheel event processing */
        status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

```C
UINT gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set(
    GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_RESOURCE_ID *string_id_list, INT id_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10631">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10631">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10632">Den här tjänsten tilldelar en matris med sträng-ID:er till en widget med rullningshjul för strängar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10632">This service assigns an array of string IDs to a string scroll wheel widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10633">Den här metoden för att tilldela strängar till ett rullningshjul för strängar rekommenderas om strängarna har definierats statiskt och widgeten måste fungera på flera språk.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10633">This method of assigning strings to a string scroll wheel is recommended if the strings are statically defined and the widget must operate in multiple languages.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10634">Om detta API ska användas bör widgeten för rullningshjul först skapas med en GX_NULL stränglista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10634">If this API is to be used, the scroll wheel widget should first be created with a GX_NULL string list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10635">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10635">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10636">**wheel**: Adress till kontrollblock för rullningshjulssträng</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10636">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10637">**string_id_list:** Matris med sträng-ID:er</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10637">**string_id_list**: Array of String IDs</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10638">**id_count:** ID-listans storlek.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10638">**id_count**: Size of the ID list.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10639">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10639">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10640">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Ange sträng-ID-matris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10640">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set string ID array</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10641">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10641">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10642">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10642">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10644">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: 0x22) Ogiltig ID-liststorlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10644">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: 0x22) Invalid ID list size</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10647">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10647">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST RESOURCE_ID wheel_ids[] = {
    GX_STRING_ID_SUNDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_MONDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_TUESDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_WEDNESDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_THURSDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_FRIDAY,
    GX_STRING_ID_SATURDAY
};

GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

/* Stop the sprite sequence */

status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_id_list_set(&wheel, wheel_ids, 7);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the ID list has been assigned. */
```
