### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10668">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10668">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set(
    GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *string_list, 
    INT string_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10669">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10669">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10670">Detta tilldelar en matris med strängar till en widget med rullningshjul för strängar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10670">This assigns an array of strings to a string scroll wheel widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10671">Detta kan användas för att ändra de strängar som visas när widgeten har skapats från början.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10671">This can be used to modify the strings displayed after the widget has initially been created.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10672">Observera att string_scroll_wheel inte stöder GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, och därför bör matrisen med strängar som skickas till den här funktionen statiskt definieras av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10672">Note that string_scroll_wheel does not support GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, and therefore the array of strings passed into this function should be statically defined by the application.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10673">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10673">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10674">**wheel**: Adress till kontrollblock för rullningshjulssträng</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10674">**wheel**: String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10675">**string_list:** Matris med strängpekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10675">**string_list**: Array of string pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10676">**string_count:** Strängmatrisens storlek.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10676">**string_count**: Size of the string array.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10677">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10677">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10678">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Har ändrat strängar för rullningshjulet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10678">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully changed strings for scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10679">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10679">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10680">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10680">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10681">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10681">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10682">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Ogiltig strängliststorlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10682">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Invalid string list size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10683">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10683">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10684">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10684">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10685">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10685">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CONST GX_CHAR *days[] = {
    “Sunday”,
    “Monday”,
    “Tuesday”,
    “Wednesday”,
    “Thursday”,
    “Friday”,
    “Saturday”
};

GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

/* Set the array of strings to the scroll wheel. */

status = gx_string_scroll_wheel_string_list_set(&wheel, days, 7);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the string array has been assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_studio_widget_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10704">gx_studio_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10704">gx_studio_widget_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10705">Skapa widget definierad i Studio-genererad specifikationsfil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10705">Create widget defined in Studio generated specifications file</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10706">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10706">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *gx_studio_widget_create(
    GX_BYTE *control,
    GX_CONST GX_STUDIO_WIDGET *definition, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10707">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10707">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10708">Den här tjänsten skapar en widget och widgetens underordnade med hjälp av en widgetspecifikation som definierats i den GUIX Studio-genererade specifikationsfilen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10708">This service creates a widget and the widget’s children using a widget specification defined within the GUIX Studio generated specifications file.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10709">Den här funktionen undviker sökning efter "efter namn" för den liknande funktionen `gx_studio_named_widget_create()` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10709">This function avoids the “by name” lookup of the similar function `gx_studio_named_widget_create()`.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10710">Den GX_STUDIO_WIDGET strukturen definieras i programspecifikationens rubrikfil som genereras av GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10710">The GX_STUDIO_WIDGET structure is defined in the application specifications header file generated by GUIX Studio.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10711">För statiskt allokerade widgetar definieras widgetkontrollblocket i den genererade specifications.c-filen och ges widgetnamnet som definierats i GUIX Studio.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10711">For statically allocated widgets, the widget control block is defined in the generated specifications.c file, and given the widget name defined within GUIX Studio.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10712">För dynamiskt allokerade widgetar ska programmet skicka GX_NULL som widgetkontrollblockets adress och funktionen försöker dynamiskt allokera widgetkontrollblocket med hjälp av funktionen , som också definieras av och tillhandahålls av `gx_system_memory_allocate()` programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10712">For dynamically allocated widgets, the application should pass GX_NULL as the widget control block address and the function will attempt to dynamically allocate the widget control block using the `gx_system_memory_allocate()` function, which is also defined by and provided by the application.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10713">För att ett program ska kunna referera direkt till GUIX Studio-widgetdefinitionen i den genererade specifikationsfilen måste du följa namngivningskonventionen som används av GUI Studio-kodgeneratorn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10713">For an application to directly reference the GUIX Studio widget definition within the generated specifications file, it is necessary to follow the naming convention utilized by the GUI Studio code generator.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10714">Den GX_STUDIO_WIDGET struktur som genereras i filen specifications.c namnges alltid enligt den här konventionen: <widget_name>_define, där <widget_name>-fältet kan upprepas flera gånger om widgeten är underordnad en underordnad widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10714">The GX_STUDIO_WIDGET structure generated within the specifications.c file is always named according to this convention: <widget_name>_define, where the <widget_name> field may be repeated multiple times if the widget is child of a child widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10715">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10715">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10716">**kontroll** Pekare till widgetkontrollblock eller GX_NULL tilldelas dynamiskt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10716">**control** Pointer to widget control block, or GX_NULL if dynamically allocated.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10717">**definition** Definitionsstruktur för Studio-genererad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10717">**definition** Studio generated widget definition structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10718">**överordnad** pekare till widgetens överordnade, om det finns någon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10718">**parent** pointer to the widget parent, if any</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10719">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10719">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10720">Pekare till det skapade widgetkontrollblocket eller GX_NULL om skapandet inte lyckades.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10720">Pointer to the created widget control block, or GX_NULL if the creation was not successful.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10721">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10721">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10722">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10722">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10723">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10723">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create the widget “playlist_screen”, which is statically allocated. */

widget = gx_studio_widget_create(&playlist_screen,
    &playlist_screen_define,
    root_window);

/* If widget != GX_NULL the widget was created. */

/* create the widget “songs_screen”, which is dynamically allocated */

widget = gx_studio_widget_create(GX_NULL,
    &songs_screen_define, root_window);
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10724">Se även</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10724">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10725">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10725">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_studio_named_widget_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10726">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10726">gx_studio_named_widget_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10727">Skapa widget definierad i Studio-genererad specifikationsfil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10727">Create widget defined in Studio generated specifications file</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10728">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10728">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT *gx_studio_named_widget_create(
    char *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **new_widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10729">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10729">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10730">Den här tjänsten skapar en widget och widgetens underordnade med hjälp av en widgetspecifikation som definierats i den GUIX Studio-genererade specifikationsfilen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10730">This service creates a widget and the widget’s children using a widget specification defined within the GUIX Studio generated specifications file.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10731">Den här API-funktionen används för att skapa skärmar på den översta nivån med det skärmnamn som anges i GUIX Studio-programmet som widgetdefinitionsidentifierare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10731">This API function is used to create top-level screens using the screen name specified within the GUIX Studio application as the widget definition identifier.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10732">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10732">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10733">**name**: Skärmnamn enligt definitionen i GUIX Studio-programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10733">**name**: Screen name as defined within GUIX Studio application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10734">**överordnad:** pekare till widgetens överordnade, om det finns någon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10734">**parent**: pointer to the widget parent, if any</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10735">**new_widget: plats** för att returnera en skapad widget-pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10735">**new_widget**: location to return created widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10736">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10736">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10737">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Lyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10737">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10738">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x11) Det gick inte att hitta den namngivna widgeten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10738">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x11) Named widget could not be found</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10739">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10739">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10740">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10740">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10741">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10741">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create the widget named “child_popup”,
   which is a child of the top-level screen “main_screen”. */

GX_WIDGET *menu_screen;

status = gx_studio_named_widget_create(“main_menu”,
    &root_window, &menu_screen);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the screen was created
   and linked to the root window. */
```

## <a name="gx_studio_display_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10744">gx_studio_display_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10744">gx_studio_display_configure</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10745">Konfigurera visning definierad i GUIX Studio-projekt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10745">Configure display defined in GUIX Studio project</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10746">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10746">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT *gx_studio_display_configure(
    USHORT display,
    UINT (*driver)(GX_DISPLAY *),
    USHORT language, 
    USHORT theme,
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT **return_root);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10747">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10747">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10748">Den här tjänsten initierar en GX_DISPLAY så att den är redo att användas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10748">This service initializes a GX_DISPLAY so that it is ready for use.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10749">Den här funktionen konsoliderar funktionerna för att initiera ett GX_DISPLAY-kontrollblock, skapa en arbetsyta som passar visningen och skapa ett rotfönster för arbetsytan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10749">This function consolidates the functions to initialize a GX_DISPLAY control block, create a canvas to fit the display, and create a root window for the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10750">Den här funktionen installerar även det språk och det resurstema som efterfrågas när visningen har initierats.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10750">This function also installs the language and resource theme requested after the display has been initialized.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10751">Den här funktionen konsoliderar det programmeringsarbete som oftast krävs för att förbereda en visning för användning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10751">This function consolidates the programming effort most commonly required to prepare a display for use.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10752">Funktionen anropar funktionerna gx_display_create(), gx_display_color_table_set, gx_display_font_table_set, gx_display_pixelmap_table_set, gx_system_language_table_set, gx_system_active_language_set, gx_system_scroll_appearance_set, gx_canvas_create och gx_window_root_create, som annars skulle krävas av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10752">The function invokes the gx_display_create(), gx_display_color_table_set, gx_display_font_table_set, gx_display_pixelmap_table_set, gx_system_language_table_set, gx_system_active_language_set, gx_system_scroll_appearance_set, gx_canvas_create, and gx_window_root_create functions, all or some of which would otherwise be required by the application program.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10753">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10753">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10754">**display**: Indexera till visningstabellen, vilket motsvarar visningsdefinitionerna i Studio-projektfilen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10754">**display**: Index into the display table, which corresponds to the display definitions in the Studio project file.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10755">**driver**: pekare för att visa initieringsfunktionen för drivrutinen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10755">**driver**: pointer to display driver initialization function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10756">Den här funktionen anropas för att initiera de indirekta funktions pekarna för GX_DISPLAY-kontrollblocket, samt utföra alla maskinvaruinställningar som krävs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10756">This function is invoked to initialize the indirect function pointers of the GX_DISPLAY control block, as well as perform any required hardware setup.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10757">**language**: initial language table index</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10757">**language**: initial language table index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10758">**språk:** initialt temaindex</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10758">**language**: initial theme index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10759">**root**: pekare till variabel där du vill returnera rotfönsteradressen eller GX_NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10759">**root**: pointer to variable in which to return root window address, or GX_NULL.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10760">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10760">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10761">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Lyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10761">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10762">**GX_FAILURE:**(0x11) Det gick inte att initiera visningen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10762">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x11) Display could not be initialized</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10763">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10763">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10764">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10764">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10765">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10765">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create the widget named “child_popup”, which is a child of the
   top-level screen “main_screen”. */

GX_WIDGET *menu_screen;

status = gx_studio_display_configure(MAIN_DISPLAY,
    my_driver_setup, LANGUAGE_ENGLISH, DEFAULT_THEME, GX_NULL);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS the display was initialized, a canvas was
created for the display, a root window was created for the canvas, and
the requested language and theme have been installed.
*/
```

## <a name="gx_system_active_language_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10776">gx_system_active_language_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10776">gx_system_active_language_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10777">Ange aktivt språk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10777">Set active language</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10778">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10778">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_active_language_set(GX_UBYTE language);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10779">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10779">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10780">Den här tjänsten anger det aktuella språket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10780">This service set the current language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10781">Språkindexet måste vara mindre än antalet kolumner i programsträngstabellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10781">The language index must be less than the number of columns in the application string table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10782">Den här funktionen har gjorts inaktuell och ersatts av gx_display_active_language_set.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10782">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_active_language_set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10783">Alla nya program bör använda gx_display_active_langauge_set.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10783">All new applications should use gx_display_active_langauge_set.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10784">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10784">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10785">**language**: Språkindex, definierat i resurshuvudfilen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10785">**language**: Language index, defined in resource header file.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10786">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10786">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10787">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Har angetts aktivt språk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10787">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set active language</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10788">\*\*GX_CALLER_ERROR:\*\*\*\* (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10788">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: \*\* (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10789">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: \*\* (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10789">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: \*\* (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10790">\*\*GX_INVALID_VALUE:\*\*\*\* (0x22) Ogiltigt språkindex</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10790">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: \*\* (0x22) Invalid language index</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10791">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10791">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10792">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10792">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10793">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10793">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set active language and mark widget canvas as dirty. */
status = gx_system_active_language_set(ID_LANGUAGE_ENGLISH);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the active language has been assigned. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_animation_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10798">gx_system_animation_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10798">gx_system_animation_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10799">Hämta animeringskontrollblock från systempoolen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10799">Obtain animation control block from system pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10800">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10800">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_animation_get(GX_ANIMATION **animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10801">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10801">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10802">Den här tjänsten kan användas för att hämta ett animeringskontrollblock från en pool med sådana kontrollblock som underhålls av gx_system komponenten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10802">This service can be used to obtain an animation control block from a pool of such control blocks maintained by the gx_system component.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10803">Animeringskontrollblockpoolen och relaterade API-tjänster tillhandahålls bara om konstanten GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE definieras med värdet 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10803">The animation control block pool and related API services are only provided if the constant GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE is defined with a value 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10804">Standardinställningen för det här värdet är 6, vilket innebär att systemanimeringskontrollens blockpool innehåller storlek GX_ANIMATION kontrollblocket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10804">The default setting for this value is 6, meaning that the system animation control block pool contains size GX_ANIMATION control block.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10805">Ett animeringskontrollblock som allokerats med hjälp av det här API:et returneras automatiskt till den kostnadsfria poolen om animeringen har slutförts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10805">An animation control block allocated using this API is automatically returned to the free pool if the animation runs to completion.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10806">Om animeringen stoppas med gx_animation_stop eller inte kan startas på grund av ett returnerat fel, ska animeringskontrollblocket returneras till den kostnadsfria poolen av programmet med hjälp av gx_system_animation_free.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10806">If the animation is stopped using gx_animation_stop, or fails to be started due to some returned error, the animation control block should be returned to the free pool by the application using gx_system_animation_free.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10807">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10807">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10808">**animering:** Adressen till pekaren som ska GX_ANIMATION pekaren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10808">**animation**: Address of pointer to receive GX_ANIMATION pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10809">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10809">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10810">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Animeringskontrollblocket har erhållits</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10810">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully obtained animation control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10811">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10811">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10812">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig animeringspekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10812">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid animation pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10813">**GX_OUT_OF_ANIMATIONS**: (0x31) Systemanimeringspoolen är slut</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10813">**GX_OUT_OF_ANIMATIONS**: (0x31) System animation pool exhausted</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10814">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10814">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10815">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10815">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10816">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10816">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

UINT status = gx_system_animation_get(&animation);

if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    gx_animation_start(animation, animation_info);
}
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10817">Se även</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10817">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10818">gx_animation_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10818">gx_animation_create</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10820">gx_animation_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10820">gx_animation_stop</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10821">gx_system_animation_free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10821">gx_system_animation_free</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_animation_free"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10822">gx_system_animation_free</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10822">gx_system_animation_free</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10823">Returnera ett animeringskontrollblock till systempoolen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10823">Return an animation control block to the system pool</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10824">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10824">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_animation_free(GX_ANIMATION *animation);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10825">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10825">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10826">Den här tjänsten kan användas för att returnera ett kontrollblock för animering till systempoolen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10826">This service can be used to return an animation control block to the system pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10827">Animeringskontrollblockpoolen och relaterade API-tjänster tillhandahålls endast om konstanten GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE definieras med värdet 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10827">The animation control block pool and related API services are only provided if the constant GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE is defined with a value 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10828">Standardinställningen för det här värdet är 6, vilket innebär att blockpoolen för systemanimeringskontrollen innehåller GX_ANIMATION kontrollblocket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10828">The default setting for this value is 6, meaning that the system animation control block pool contains size GX_ANIMATION control block.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10829">Ett kontrollblock för animering som allokerats med gx_system_animation_get() returneras automatiskt till den kostnadsfria poolen om animeringen har slutförts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10829">An animation control block allocated using gx_system_animation_get() is automatically returned to the free pool if the animation runs to completion.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10830">Det har ingen effekt att försöka returnera ett kontrollblock för animering till den kostnadsfria poolen som redan har returnerats till den kostnadsfria poolen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10830">Attempting to return an animation control block to the free pool that has already been returned to the free pool has no effect.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10831">Om animeringen stoppas med gx_animation_stop eller inte kan startas på grund av ett returnerat fel, ska animeringskontrollblocket som har erhållits med gx_system_animation_get() returneras till den kostnadsfria poolen av programmet med hjälp av gx_system_animation_free().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10831">If the animation is stopped using gx_animation_stop, or fails to be started due to some returned error, the animation control block that has been obtained using gx_system_animation_get() should be returned to the free pool by the application using gx_system_animation_free().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10832">Animeringen måste vara i inaktivt tillstånd innan den kan returneras till den kostnadsfria poolen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10832">An animation must be in IDLE state before it can be returned to the free pool.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10833">En animering är i viloläge när den inte har startats, när den har stoppats eller när den har slutförts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10833">An animation is in the IDLE state when it has not been started, when it is stopped, or when it runs to completion.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10834">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10834">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10835">**animering:** Pekare GX_ANIMATION kontrollblocket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10835">**animation**: Pointer to the GX_ANIMATION control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10836">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10836">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10837">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) har publicerat animeringsblocket</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10837">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) uccessfully released animation block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10838">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10838">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10839">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig animeringspekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10839">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid animation pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10840">**GX_INVALID_ANIMATION**: (0x32) Animeringen är inte inaktiv eller har inte allokerats från systempoolen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10840">**GX_INVALID_ANIMATION**: (0x32) The animation is not IDLE, or it has not been allocated from the system pool</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10841">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10841">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10842">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10842">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10843">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10843">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_ANIMATION *animation;

UINT status = gx_system_animation_get(&animation);

if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
    status = gx_animation_start(animation, animation_info);

    if (status != GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* animation did not start, return it to the free pool */
        gx_system_animation_free(animation);
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_system_bidi_text_disable"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10849">gx_system_bidi_text_disable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10849">gx_system_bidi_text_disable</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10851">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10851">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_bidi_text_disable(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10852">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10852">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10853">Den här tjänsten inaktiverar dynamiskt dubbelriktad textstöd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10853">This service disables dynamic bi-directional text support.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10854">Den här GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT måste definieras när GUIX-biblioteket byggs och krävs endast om du behöver ändra ordning på BiDi-strängdata under körningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10854">This service requires GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT to be defined when building the GUIX library, and is only required if runtime reordering of BiDi string data is needed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10855">De flesta program använder GUIX Studio för att skapa korrekt sorterade BiDi-textsträngar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10855">Most applications utilize GUIX Studio to produce correctly reorderd BiDi text strings.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10856">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10856">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10857">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10857">**None**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10859">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Har inaktiverat stöd för bidi-text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10859">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully disabled bidi text support</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10860">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10860">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10861">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10861">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C
/* GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT is defined. */

/* Diable bidi text support. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, bidi text support was disabled. */
```

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10869">Den här tjänsten möjliggör stöd för dynamisk dubbelriktad text.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10869">This service enables dynamic bi-directional text support.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10870">Den här GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT måste definieras när GUIX-biblioteket byggs och krävs endast om du behöver ändra ordning på BiDi-strängdata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10870">This service requires GX_DYNAMIC_BIDI_TEXT_SUPPORT to be defined when building the GUIX library, and is only required if runtime reordering of BiDi string data is needed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10871">De flesta program använder GUIX Studio för att skapa korrekt sorterade BiDi-textsträngar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10871">Most applications utilize GUIX Studio to produce correctly reordered BiDi text strings.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_canvas_refresh"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10881">gx_system_canvas_refresh</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10881">gx_system_canvas_refresh</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10883">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10883">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_canvas_refresh(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10884">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10884">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10885">Den här tjänsten tvingar fram en omedelbar omritning av alla felgrafiska widgetar och arbetsyta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10885">This service forces an immediate redrawing of all dirty widgets and canvases.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10886">Den här tjänsten anropas vanligtvis internt av GUIX-systemkomponenten, men kan anropas av programmet för att tvinga fram en omedelbar systemredrareringsåtgärd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10886">This service is normally invoked internally by the GUIX system component, but can be called by the application to force an immediate system redrawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10887">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10887">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10888">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10888">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10889">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10889">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10890">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Animeringsblock har släppts</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10890">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully released animation block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10891">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS**: (0x20) Ingen arbetsyta har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10891">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS**: (0x20) No canvas created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10892">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10892">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10893">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10893">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Force immediate redraw operation. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, canvas has been redraw. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_dirty_mark"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10920">gx_system_dirty_mark</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10920">gx_system_dirty_mark</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10921">Markera område som är grovt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10921">Mark area dirty</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10922">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10922">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_dirty_mark(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10923">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10923">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10924">Den här tjänsten markerar området för den här widgeten som grovt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10924">This service marks the area of this widget as dirty.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10925">Detta köar i praktiken widgeten för att rita om när systemhändelsebearbetningen har slutförts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10925">This effectively queues the widget for redrawing when the system event processing has been completed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10926">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10926">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10927">**widget:** Pekare till widgetkontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10927">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10928">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10928">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10929">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Widgeten har markerats som felig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10929">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully marked widget dirty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10930">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10930">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10931">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10931">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10932">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10932">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10933">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10933">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10934">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10934">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10935">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10935">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Mark widget “my_widget” as dirty. */
status = gx_system_dirty_mark(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the area associated
   with “my_widget” has been marked as dirty. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_dirty_partial_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10960">gx_system_dirty_partial_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10960">gx_system_dirty_partial_add</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10961">Markera partiellt område som grovt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10961">Mark partial area dirty</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10962">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10962">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_dirty_partial_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RECTANGLE *dirty_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10963">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10963">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10964">Den här tjänsten markerar det partiella området för den här widgeten som grovt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10964">This service marks the partial area of this widget as dirty.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10965">Detta köar widgeten för att rita om av GUIX-arbetsytans uppdateringsåtgärd när systemhändelsebearbetningen har slutförts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10965">This queues the widget for redrawing by the GUIX canvas refresh operation when the system event processing has been completed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10966">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10966">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10967">**widget:** Pekare till widgetkontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10967">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10968">**dirty_area:** Dirty area of widget to mark dirty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10968">**dirty_area**: Dirty area of widget to mark dirty</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10969">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10969">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10970">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Lyckades partiella dirty area mark</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10970">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful partial dirty area mark</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10971">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10971">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10972">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10972">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10973">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10973">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10974">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Ogiltig storlek på felaktigt område</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10974">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid size of dirty area</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10975">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10975">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10976">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10976">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-10977">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-10977">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Mark widget “my_widget” partial area as dirty. */

status = gx_system_dirty_partial_add(&my_widget,
    &partial_area);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the partial area “partial_area”
associated with “my_widget” has been marked as dirty. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_draw_context_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11002">gx_system_draw_context_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11002">gx_system_draw_context_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11003">Hämta ritningskontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11003">Get drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11004">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11004">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_draw_context_get(GX_DRAW_CONTEXT **current_context);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11005">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11005">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11006">Den här tjänsten returnerar en pekare till den aktuella ritningskontexten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11006">This service returns a pointer to the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11007">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11007">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11008">**current_context: Pekare** till mål för aktuell pekare för ritningskontext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11008">**current_context**: Pointer to destination for current drawing context pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11009">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11009">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11010">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Lyckad aktuell kontext hämta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11010">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful current context get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11011">**GX_PTR_ERROR**:0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11011">**GX_PTR_ERROR**:0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11012">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11012">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11013">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11013">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11014">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11014">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_DRAW_CONTEXT *current_context;

/* Get current drawing context. */

status = gx_system_draw_context_get(&current_context);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the current drawing context
   is contained in “current_context”. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_event_fold"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11039">gx_system_event_fold</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11039">gx_system_event_fold</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11040">Skicka händelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11040">Send event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11041">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11041">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_event_fold(GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11042">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11042">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11043">Den här tjänsten söker i GUIX-händelsekön efter en händelse av samma typ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11043">This service searches the GUIX event queue for an event of the same type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11044">Om det finns en händelse av samma typ uppdateras händelsenyttolasten så att den matchar den nya händelsen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11044">If an event of the same type exists, the event payload is updated to match the new event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11045">Om ingen matchande händelse hittas anropas gx_system_event_send för att lägga till den nya händelsen i slutet av händelsekön.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11045">If no matching event is found, the gx_system_event_send function is called to add the new event to the end of the event queue.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11046">Den här funktionen används ofta av fast touch-indatadrivrutiner för att förhindra att händelsekön fylls med flera PEN_DRAG händelser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11046">This function is commonly used by fast touch input drivers to prevent filling the event queue with multiple PEN_DRAG events.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11047">Den här funktionen kan också anropas av programmet för att förhindra att flera händelser av samma typ läggs till i GUIX-händelsekön.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11047">This function can also be called by the application to prevent multiple events of the same type from being added to the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11048">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11048">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11049">**event**: Pekare till händelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11049">**event**: Pointer to event</span></span>

```C
GX_EVENT my_event;

memset(&my_event, 0, sizeof(GX_EVENT));

my_event.gx_event_type = GX_EVENT_PEN_DOWN;

my_event.gx_event_payload.gx_event_pointdata.gx_point_x = 100;
my_event.gx_event_payload.gx_event_pointdata.gx_point_y = 200;

/* Send “my_event” for processing. */
status = gx_system_event_fold(&my_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been sent for processing. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_event_send"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11081">gx_system_event_send</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11081">gx_system_event_send</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11082">Skicka händelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11082">Send event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11083">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11083">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_event_send(GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11084">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11084">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11085">Den här tjänsten skickar den angivna händelsen till GUIX-systemhändelsekön.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11085">This service sends the specified event into the GUIX system event queue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11086">Den nya händelsen placeras i slutet av kön.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11086">The new event is placed at the end of the queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11087">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11087">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11088">**event**: Pekare till händelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11088">**event**: Pointer to event</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11089">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11089">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11090">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Lyckad händelsesändning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11090">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful event send</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11091">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11091">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11092">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11092">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11093">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11093">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11094">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11094">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11095">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11095">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Send “new_event” for processing. */

GX_EVENT new_event;

new_event.gx_event_target = widget ->gx_widget_parent;
new_event.gx_event_type = MY_EVENT_TYPE;

/* Set optional param. */
new_event.gx_event_payload.xxxx = yyyy
new_event.gx_event_sender = widget->gx_widget_id;

/* Push the event to event pool. */
status = gx_system_event_send(&new_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event has been sent for processing. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_focus_claim"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11120">gx_system_focus_claim</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11120">gx_system_focus_claim</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11121">Anspråksfokus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11121">Claim focus</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11122">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11122">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_focus_claim(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11123">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11123">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11124">Den här tjänsten gör anspråk på fokus för den angivna widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11124">This service claims the focus for the specified widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11125">Om widgeten inte har fokus tidigare får den en GX_EVENT_FOCUS_GAINED händelse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11125">If the widget did no previously have focus, it will receive a GX_EVENT_FOCUS_GAINED event.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11126">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11126">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11127">**widget:** Pekare till widgetkontrollblock till anspråksfokus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11127">**widget**: Pointer to widget control block to claim focus</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11128">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11128">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11129">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Lyckades fokusanspråk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11129">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful focus claim</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11130">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11130">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11131">**GX_NO_CHANGE**: (0x08) Widget äger redan fokus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11131">**GX_NO_CHANGE**: (0x08) Widget already owns focus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11132">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11132">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11133">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12 Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11133">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12 Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11134">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11134">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_initialize"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11161">gx_system_initialize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11161">gx_system_initialize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11162">Initiera GUIX</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11162">Initialize GUIX</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11163">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11163">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_initialize(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11164">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11164">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11165">Den här tjänsten initierar GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11165">This service initializes GUIX.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11166">Den här tjänsten måste anropas före någon annan GUIX API-tjänst och bör endast anropas en gång vid systemstart.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11166">This service must be invoked before any other GUIX API service, and should only be invoked once at system startup.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11167">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11167">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11168">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11168">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11169">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11169">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11170">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Ett lyckat system initieras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11170">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful system initialize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11171">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR**: (0xFE) Ogiltig GX_EVENT för blockstorlek för kontroll eller händelsekö/mutex/thread create misslyckades.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11171">**GX_SYSTEM_ERROR**: (0xFE) Invalid GX_EVENT control block size or event queue/mutex/thread create failed.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11172">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11172">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11173">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11173">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11174">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11174">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11175">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11175">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Initialize GUIX. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, GUIX has been initialized. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_language_table_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11200">gx_system_language_table_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11200">gx_system_language_table_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11201">Hämta aktiv språktabell</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11201">Retrieve active language table</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11202">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11202">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_language_table_get( 
    GX_CHAR ****language_table,
    GX_UBYTE *languages_count, 
    UINT *string_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11203">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11203">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11204">Den här tjänsten hämtar den aktiva språktabellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11204">This service retrieves the active language table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11205">Den här funktionen är inaktuell till förmån för gx_display_language_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11205">This function is deprecated in favor of gx_display_language_table_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11206">Alla nya program bör använda gx_display_language_table_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11206">All new applications should use gx_display_language_table_get.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11207">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11207">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11208">**language_table:** Adressen till pekaren som ska returnera språktabellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11208">**language_table**: Address of pointer to return language table.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11209">**languages_count:** Adressen till variabeln som ska returnera tabellkolumner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11209">**languages_count**: Address of variable to return table columns.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11210">**string_count:** Adressen till pekaren för att returnera tabellrader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11210">**string_count**: Address of pointer to return table rows.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11211">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11211">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11212">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Aktiv språktabell har hämtats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11212">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully retrieved active language table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11213">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11213">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11214">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11214">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11215">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11215">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11216">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11216">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11217">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11217">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CHAR ***language_table;

GX_UBYTE language_count;

UINT string_count;

/* Retrieve the language table */

status = gx_system_language_table_get(&language_table,
    &language_count, &string_count);
```

## <a name="gx_system_language_table_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11221">gx_system_language_table_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11221">gx_system_language_table_set</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11223">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11223">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_language_table_set(
    GX_CHAR ***language_table,
    GX_UBYTE languages_count, 
    UINT string_count);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11224">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11224">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11225">Den här tjänsten installerar den aktiva språktabellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11225">This service installs the active language table.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11226">Den här funktionen har gjorts inaktuell till förmån för gx_display_language_table_set.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11226">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_language_table_set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11227">Alla nya program bör använda gx_display_language_table_set.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11227">All new applications should use gx_display_language_table_set.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11228">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11228">Parameters</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11232">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11232">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11233">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Har angett språktabell</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11233">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set language table</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11234">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11234">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11235">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11235">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11236">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11236">Allowed From</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_memory_allocator_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11243">gx_system_memory_allocator_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11243">gx_system_memory_allocator_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11244">Tilldela funktioner för minnesallokering, avallokering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11244">Assign functions for memory allocation, de-allocation</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11245">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11245">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_memory_allocator_set(VOID *(allocate)(ULONG size),
    VOID(*release)(VOID *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11246">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11246">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11247">Den här tjänsten tilldelar programmet en återanropsfunktion för dynamisk minnesallokering och avallokering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11247">This service assigns the application supplied callback function for dynamic memory allocation and de-allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11248">Om ingen GUIX-tjänst som använder dynamisk minnesallokering krävs av programmet behöver den här tjänsten inte anropas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11248">If no GUIX service that uses dynamic memory allocation is needed by the application, this service does not need to be called.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11249">Om den här tjänsten används ska den anropas efter gx_system_initialize() som rensar GUIX-tjänst pekare och före en GUIX-tjänst som kräver användning av dynamisk minnesallokering.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11249">If used, this service should be called after gx_system_initialize() which clears the GUIX service pointers, and before any GUIX service that requires use of dynamical memory allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11250">GUIX-tjänster som kräver en minnesallokerings- och avallokeringstjänst för körning inkluderar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11250">GUIX services which require a runtime memory allocation and de-allocation service include:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11251">Läsa in binära resurser från extern lagring i GUIX-körningsmiljön.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11251">Loading binary resources from external storage into the GUIX runtime environment.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11252">Jpeg-bildavkodaren för programkörning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11252">The software runtime jpeg image decoder.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11253">Png-bildavkodaren för programkörning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11253">The software runtime png image decoder.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11254">Använda textwidgetar med GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11254">Using text widgets with GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11255">Funktioner för storleksändring och rotationsverktyg för runtime pixemap.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11255">Runtime pixemap resize and rotation utility functions.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11256">Körningsskärmen och widgeten styr blockallokeringen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11256">Runtime screen and widget control block allocation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11257">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11257">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11258">**allocator:** Funktionen Minnes allocator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11258">**allocator**: Memory allocator function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11259">**release**: Minnesfri funktion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11259">**release**: Memory free function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11260">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11260">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11261">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Funktionen allokera minne har tilldelats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11261">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully assigned memory allocate function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11262">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11262">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11263">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11263">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11264">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11264">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11265">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11265">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11266">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11266">Example</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11267">I följande exempel används en ThreadX-bytepool för att implementera en threadsafe dynamisk minnesallokering och minnes-avallokeringstjänst.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11267">The following example utilizes a ThreadX byte pool to implement a threadsafe dynamic memory allocation and memory de-allocation service.</span></span>

```C
TX_BYTE_POOL memory_pool;

#define SCRATCHPAD_SIZE (1024 * 4)

ULONG scratchpad[SCRATCHPAD_SIZE];

/* define memory allocation service */

VOID *memory_allocate(ULONG size)
{
    VOID *memptr;

    if (tx_byte_allocate(&memory_pool, &memptr, size, TX_NO_WAIT) == TX_SUCCESS)
    {
        return memptr;
    }
    return NULL;
}

/* define memory de-allocation service */
void memory_free(VOID *mem)
{
    tx_byte_release(mem);
}

/* create byte pool and install our dynamic memory services with GUIX
*/

VOID tx_application_define(void *first_unused_memory)
{
    /* create byte pool for GUIX to use */
    tx_byte_pool_create(&memory_pool, "scratchpad", scratchpad,
        SCRATCHPAD_SIZE * sizeof(ULONG));

    guix_setup();

    /* install our memory allocator and de-allocator */
    gx_system_memory_allocator_set(memory_allocate, memory_free);
}
```
