## <a name="gx_system_pen_configure"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11292">gx_system_pen_configure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11292">gx_system_pen_configure</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11293">Ange pennkonfiguration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11293">Set pen configuration</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11294">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11294">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_pen_configure(GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION *pen_configuration);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11295">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11295">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11296">Den här tjänsten anger pennkonfigurationen för att styra pennhastigheten och avståndsparametrarna som används för att utlösa genereringen GX_EVENT_FLICK av händelsetyper.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11296">This service sets pen configuration to control the pen speed and distance parameters used to trigger the generation of GX_EVENT_FLICK event types.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11297">Den gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist medlem i GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION är en datatyp med fast punkt och du bör använda GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(value) för att konvertera från INT till GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11297">The gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist member of GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION is a fixed point data type, and you should use GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(value) to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11298">Om du till exempel vill ange ett minsta dra avstånd till 0,5 bildpunkt per tick måste du ange gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist till `GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11298">For example, if you want to set minimum drag distance to 0.5 pixel per tick, you have to set the gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist to `GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2`.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11299">I GUIX-versionerna 5.4.0 och äldre var gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist-medlemmen i GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION av typen (INT << 8) i stället för GX_FIXED_VAL typ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11299">In GUIX releases 5.4.0 and older, the gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist member of GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION was of (INT << 8) type rather than GX_FIXED_VAL type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11300">Om ditt projekt med GUIX-biblioteket i version 5.4.0 använder det här API:et måste du ändra min_drag_dist-parametern eller #define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY när du skapar GUIX-biblioteket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11300">If your project with 5.4.0 version GUIX library is using this API, you will need to modify the min_drag_dist parameter or #define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY when building the GUIX library.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11301">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11301">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11302">**pen_configuration** Pekare till pennkonfigurationsstrukturen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11302">**pen_configuration** Pointer to pen configuration structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11303">**Bilaga I** innehåller definition GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION struktur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11303">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11304">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11304">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11305">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Korrekt inställning av pennkonfiguration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11305">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set pen configuration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11306">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11306">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11307">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11307">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11308">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11308">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11309">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11309">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define pen configuration, set minimum drag distance to 0.5 pixel
per tick, maximum pen speed to 10 ticks. That means GUIX will trigger
a vertical or horizontal flick event if the drag time is smaller than
10 ticks and the drag distance is bigger than 0.5 * drag_ticks. */

GX_PEN_CONFIGURATION pen_configuration;

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
Pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist = (1 << 8)/ 2;
#else
pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_min_drag_dist = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

pen_configuration.gx_pen_configuration_max_pen_speed_ticks = 10;

/* Set the pen configuration. */
status = gx_system_pen_configure(&pen_configuration);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the touch configure has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11310">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11310">gx_system_screen_stack_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11311">Skapa och initiera systemskärmstacken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11311">Create and initialize the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11312">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11312">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_create(
    GX_WIDGET **memory, 
    INT size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11313">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11313">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11314">Den här tjänsten definierar en minnespool som ska användas för systemskärmstacken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11314">This service defines a memory pool to be used for the system screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11315">Systemskärmstacken är en valfri funktion som kan användas av programmet för att hantera programmets skärmflödesutseende.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11315">The system screen stack is an optional feature that can be used by the application to manage application screen flow appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11316">Om programmet har för avsikt att använda tjänsterna för skärmstackar måste gx_system_screen_stack_create först anropas för att konfigurera skärmstackens minnesregion.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11316">If the application intends to utilize the screen stack services, the gx_system_screen_stack_create function must first be called to setup the screen stack memory region.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11317">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11317">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11318">**memory**: Pekare till det reserverade minnesblocket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11318">**memory**: Pointer to the reserved memory block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11319">**storlek:** Storleken i byte för det reserverade minnesblocket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11319">**size**: Size, in bytes, of the reserved memory block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11320">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11320">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11321">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11321">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11322">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11322">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11323">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11323">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11324">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11324">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11325">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11325">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11326">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11326">Example</span></span>

```C
#define SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH 8
GX_WIDGET *screen_stack[SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH * 2];

UINT status;

/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */

status = gx_system_screen_stack_create(screen_stack,
    sizeof(GX_WIDGET *) * SCREEN_STACK_DEPTH * 2);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the system screen stack is initialized
and ready for use. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11332">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11332">gx_system_screen_stack_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11333">Pop the topmost screen stack pointers (Öppna stackpekaren längst upp på skärmen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11333">Pop the topmost screen stack pointers</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11334">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11334">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_get(
    GX_WIDGET **popped_parent,
    GX_WIDGET **popped_screen);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11335">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11335">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11336">Den här funktionen visar stackpekaren över den översta skärmen och returnerar pekarna till anroparen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11336">This function pops the topmost screen stack pointers and returns those pointers to the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11337">Den här funktionen skiljer sig från gx_system_screen_stack_pop() på så sätt att skärmen inte automatiskt återansluts till föregående överordnade skärm.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11337">This function differs from gx_system_screen_stack_pop() in that the popped screen is not automatically reattached to the previous parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11338">I stället visas pekarna från stacken och returneras till anroparen, så att anroparen kan koppla eller ta bort den returnerade skärmen efter behov.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11338">Instead, the pointers are popped from the stack and returned to the caller, allowing the caller to attach the or discard the returned screen as desired.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11339">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11339">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11340">**popped_parent: Plats** där den överordnade widgetens pekare ska lagras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11340">**popped_parent**: Location to store the parent widget pointer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11341">**popped_screen:** Plats för att lagra pekaren på den överskärmade skärmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11341">**popped_screen**: Location to store the popped screen pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11342">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11342">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11343">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Hämtning av pekare för skärmstackar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11343">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully retrieval of screen stack pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11344">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11344">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11345">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11345">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11346">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Ogiltig eller tom skärmstack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11346">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Invalid or empty screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11347">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11347">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11348">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11348">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11349">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11349">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_WIDGET *parent_screen;

GX_WIDGET *popped_screen;

/* Pop a screen stack entry. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_get(&parent_screen, &popped_screen);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, parent_screen and
popped_screen hold the topmost screen stack pointers. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_pop"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11355">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11355">gx_system_screen_stack_pop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11356">Pop the topmost entry from the system screen stack (Öppna posten längst upp från systemskärmstacken)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11356">Pop the topmost entry from the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11357">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11357">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_pop();
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11358">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11358">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11359">Den här funktionen pops the topmost entry for the screen stack and automatically attaches the poped screen to the poped parent widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11359">This function pops the topmost entry fo the screen stack and automatically attaches the popped screen to the popped parent widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11360">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11360">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11361">**inget**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11361">**none**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11362">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11362">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11363">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Lyckad hämtning av pekare för skärmstackar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11363">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfull retrieval of screen stack pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11364">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11364">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11365">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11365">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11366">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Ogiltig eller tom skärmstack</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11366">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Invalid or empty screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11367">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11367">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11368">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11368">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11369">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11369">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Pop a screen stack entry. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_pop();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the topmost screen stack entry has been
popped from the stack and re-attached to the previous parent. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_push"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11375">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11375">gx_system_screen_stack_push</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11376">Skicka en widget och en överordnad pekare till skärmstacken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11376">Push a widget and parent pointer to the screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11377">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11377">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_push(GX_WIDGET *screen)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11378">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11378">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11379">Den här tjänsten placerar en pekare till den angivna widgeten, som vanligtvis är en skärm på den översta nivån, på skärmstacken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11379">This service places a pointer to the indicated widget, which is usually a top-level screen, onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11380">Om widgeten har ett överordnat objekt är den frånkopplad från den överordnade widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11380">If the widget has a parent it is detached from the parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11381">Den överordnade widgetens pekare skickas också till skärmstacken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11381">The parent widget pointer is also pushed to the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11382">Den överordnade widgeten kan vara NULL, vilket innebär att en skärm som inte är synlig eller ansluten till någon överordnad kan push-kopplas till skärmstacken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11382">The parent widget may be NULL, meaning a screen that is not visible or attached to any parent may be pushed onto the screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11383">Om en widget utan överordnad push-skickas till skärmstacken ska API:et screen_stack_get() användas för att hämta pekaren för push-skärmen i stället för att använda API:et screen_stack_pop() som försöker återansluta widgeten till den föregående överordnade widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11383">If a widget with no parent is pushed to the screen stack, the screen_stack_get() API should be used to retrieve the pushed screen pointer, rather than using the screen_stack_pop() API, which attempts to reattached the popped widget to its previous parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11384">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11384">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11385">**screen**: Pekare till widgeten som ska push-skickas till skärmstacken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11385">**screen**: Pointer to the widget to be pushed to the screen stack.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11386">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11386">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11387">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Får rullningslistens utseende</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11387">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get scrollbar appearance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11388">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11388">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11389">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11389">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11390">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11390">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11391">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11391">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11392">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11392">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_push(window);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the widget pointed to by “window” has
been pushed to the screen stack, along with the widget’s parent
ponter. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11393">Se även</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11393">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_screen_stack_reset"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11398">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11398">gx_system_screen_stack_reset</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11399">Återställa systemskärmstacken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11399">Reset the system screen stack</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11400">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11400">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_screen_stack_reset();
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11401">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11401">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11402">Den här funktionen tar bort alla poster från systemskärmstacken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11402">This function removes all entries from the system screen stack.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11403">Om skärmarna som visas från stacken har dynamiskt allokerade kontrollblock som allokerats av GUIX Studio frigörs minnet för dessa kontrollblock.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11403">If the screens popped from the stack have dynamically allocated control blocks allocated by GUIX Studio, the memory for those control blocks is freed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11404">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11404">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11405">**inget**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11405">**none**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11406">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11406">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11407">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Får rullningslistens utseende</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11407">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get scrollbar appearance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11408">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11408">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11409">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11409">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11410">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11410">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11411">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11411">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11412">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11412">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Get the scrollbar appearance. */
status = gx_system_screen_stack_reset();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the system screen stack has been cleared
of entries. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_scroll_appearance_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11418">gx_system_scroll_appearance_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11418">gx_system_scroll_appearance_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11419">Hämta rullningsutseende</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11419">Get scroll appearance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11420">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11420">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *return_appearance);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11421">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11421">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11422">Den här tjänsten får rullningslistens utseende.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11422">This service gets the scrollbar appearance.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11423">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11423">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11424">**style**: Rullningsliststil: `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` eller `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11424">**style**: Scrollbar style: `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` or `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11425">**return_appearance**: Pekare till mål för utseende.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11425">**return_appearance**: Pointer to destination for appearance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11426">**Bilaga I** innehåller definition för GX_SCROLLBAR_APPERANCE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11426">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_SCROLLBAR_APPERANCE</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11427">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11427">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11428">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Får rullningslistens utseende</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11428">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully get scrollbar appearance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11429">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11429">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11430">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11430">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11431">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11431">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11433">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11433">Example</span></span>


## <a name="gx_system_scroll_appearance_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11458">gx_system_scroll_appearance_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11458">gx_system_scroll_appearance_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11459">Ange rullningsutseende</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11459">Set scroll appearance</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11460">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11460">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_scroll_appearance_set(
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11461">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11461">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11462">Den här tjänsten anger standardutseendet för rullning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11462">This service sets the default scroll appearance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11463">När en rullning skapas används den här utseendestrukturen om inte programmet tillhandahåller en anpassad version.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11463">When a scroll is created, this appearance structure is used unless the application provides a custom version.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11464">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11464">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11465">**style**: Rullningsstil `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` eller `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11465">**style**: Scroll style `GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL` or `GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL`</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11466">**appearance**: Pekare till utseendestruktur initierad med olika attribut för rullningslistens utseende.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11466">**appearance**: Pointer to appearance structure initialized with various scrollbar appearance attributes.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11467">Se bilaga **I för** definitionen av GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE struktur.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11467">Refer to **Appendix I** for the definition of the GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11468">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11468">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11469">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Konfigurera rullningsutseende</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11469">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set scroll appearance set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11470">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11470">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11471">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11471">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11472">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11472">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11473">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11473">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11474">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11474">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE my_appearance;

memset(&my_appearance, 0, sizeof(GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE));

my_appearance.gx_scroll_width = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_width = 18;

my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_button_color = GX_COLOR_ID_SCROLL_BUTTON;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_min = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_travel_max = 20;
my_appearance.gx_scroll_thumb_border_style = GX_STYLE_BORDER_THIN;

/* Set the scroll appearance. */

status = gx_system_scroll_appearance_set(GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL, &my_appearance);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the scroll appearance has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11498">gx_system_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11498">gx_system_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11499">Starta GUIX</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11499">Start GUIX</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11500">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11500">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_start(VOID);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11501">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11501">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11502">Den här tjänsten startar GUIX-bearbetning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11502">This service starts GUIX processing.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11503">Under normala omständigheter returnerar den här funktionen aldrig, utan börjar i stället bearbeta GUIX-händelsekön.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11503">Under normal circumstances this function never returns, but instead begins processing the GUIX event queue.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11504">När GUIX-händelsekön är tom pausar den här tjänsten den anropande tråden tills nya händelser tas emot i GUIX-händelsekön.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11504">When the GUIX event queue is empty, this service suspends the calling thread until new events arrive in the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11505">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11505">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11506">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11506">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11507">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11507">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11508">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Systemstart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11508">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful system start</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11509">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11509">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11510">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11510">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11511">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11511">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11512">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11512">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Start GUIX. */
status = gx_system_start();

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . GUIX has been started. */
```

## <a name="gx_system_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11537">gx_system_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11537">gx_system_string_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11538">Hämta sträng</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11538">Get string</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11539">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11539">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CHAR **return_string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11540">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11540">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11541">Den här tjänsten hämtar strängen för det angivna resurs-ID:t med hjälp av den första definierade visningen och det aktiva språket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11541">This service gets the string for the specified resource ID, using the first defined display and the currently active language.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11542">Den här funktionen har gjorts inaktuell och ersatts av gx_display_string_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11542">This function has been deprecated in favor of gx_display_string_get.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11543">Alla nya program bör använda gx_display_string_get.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11543">All new applications should use gx_display_string_get.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11544">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11544">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11545">**string_id:** Strängresurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11545">**string_id**: String resource ID</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_string_table_get(
    GX_UBYTE language,
    GX_CHAR ***string_table,
    UINT *get_size);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11569">**get_size:** Pekare till lagringen för antalet strängar i strängtabellen, eller NULL om anroparen inte behöver hämta antalet strängar i strängtabellen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11569">**get_size**: Pointer to the storage for the number of strings in string table, or NULL if the caller does not need to get the number of strings in the string table.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11572">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11572">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11584">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11584">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11586">Den här tjänsten beräknar visningsbredden för den angivna strängen i bildpunkter med det angivna teckensnittet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11586">This service computes the display width of the supplied string in pixels using the specified font.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11587">Om parametern string_length är >= 0 inkluderas endast antalet tecken för begäran i beräkningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11587">If the string_length parameter is >= 0, only the request count of characters are included in the calculation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11588">Om parametern string_length -1 används hela strängen upp till NULL-terminatorn i beräkningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11588">If the string_length parameter is -1, the entire string up to the NULL terminator is used in the calculation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11589">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11589">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11590">**font**: Pekare till strängens teckensnitt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11590">**font**: Pointer to string’s font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11591">**string**: Pekare till sträng</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11591">**string**: Pointer to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11592">**string_length:** Strängens längd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11592">**string_length**: Length of string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11593">**return_width:** Mål för strängbredd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11593">**return_width**: Destination for width of string</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11595">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Lyckad strängbredd get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11595">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful string width get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11596">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11596">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11597">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11597">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_timer_stop"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11679">gx_system_timer_stop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11679">gx_system_timer_stop</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11681">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11681">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_timer_stop(
    GW_WIDGET *owner, 
    UINT timer_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11682">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11682">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11683">Den här tjänsten stoppar timern med den angivna timer_id som är associerad med den anropande widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11683">This service stops the timer with the specified timer_id associated with the calling widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11684">För att stoppa alla timers som är länkade till en viss widget kan programmet skicka timer_id värdet 0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11684">To stop all timers linked to a particular widget, the application can pass the timer_id value of 0.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11687">**timer_id:** ID för timer eller 0 för alla timers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11687">**timer_id**: ID of timer, or 0 for all timers</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11688">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11688">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11690">**GX_NOT_FOUND:**(0x09) Timer-ID hittades inte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11690">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) Timer ID not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11691">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11691">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11692">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11692">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11693">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11693">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_system_widget_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11768">gx_system_widget_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11768">gx_system_widget_find</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11769">Hitta widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11769">Find widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11770">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11770">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_system_widget_find(
    USHORT widget_id,
    INT search_level, 
    GX_WIDGET **return_search_result);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11771">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11771">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11772">Den här tjänsten söker efter det angivna widget-ID:t.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11772">This service searches for the specified widget ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11773">Till skillnad gx_widget_find() söker den här funktionen efter underordnade till alla rotfönster som definierats i systemet, vilket innebär att det här är en fullständig sökning av alla synliga widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11773">Unlike gx_widget_find(), this function searches the children of all root windows defined in the system, meaning this is an exhaustive search of all visible widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11774">Om du känner till den överordnade widgeten som du söker efter använder du gx_widget_find() i stället.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11774">If you know the parent of the widget you are searching for, use gx_widget_find() instead.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11775">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11775">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11776">**widget_id:** Widget-ID att söka efter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11776">**widget_id**: Widget ID to search for</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11777">**search_level:** Definierar den rekursiva kapslingsnivån som underordnade widgetar genomsöks till.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11777">**search_level**: Defines the recursive nesting level into which child widgets are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11778">Om det här värdet är 0 genomsöks endast omedelbara underordnade till varje rotfönster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11778">If this value is 0, only immediate children of each root window are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11779">Om det här värdet GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE kapslas funktionen ned till alla underordnade som söker efter det begärda widget-ID:t.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11779">If this value is GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, the function nests down into all children searching for the requested widget ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11780">För andra värden > 0 definierar söknivån hur djupt kapslad funktionen ska söka efter det begärda widget-ID:t.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11780">For any other value > 0, the search level defines how deeply nested this function will go searching for the requested widget ID.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11781">**return_search_result:** Pekare till mål för widget hittades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11781">**return_search_result**: Pointer to destination for widget found</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11782">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11782">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11783">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Lyckad widgetsökning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11783">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful widget search</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11784">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) Widget-ID hittades inte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11784">**GX_NOT_FOUND**: (0x09) Widget ID not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11785">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11785">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11786">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11786">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11787">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11787">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11788">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11788">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Search recursively from the top level widget for the widget with
ID of MY_WIDGET_ID. */

status = gx_system_widget_find(MY_WIDGET_ID,
    GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE,
    &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS . the search was successful and
“my_widget” contains the pointer to the widget. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11813">gx_text_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11813">gx_text_button_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11814">Knappen Skapa text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11814">Create text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11815">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11815">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_create(
    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT text_button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11816">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11816">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11817">Den här tjänsten skapar en textknappswidget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11817">This service creates a text button widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11818">GX_TEXT_BUTTON härleds från GX_BUTTON och stöder alla gx_button API-tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11818">GX_TEXT_BUTTON is derived from GX_BUTTON and supports all gx_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11819">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11819">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11820">**text_button:** Pekare till textknappkontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11820">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11821">**name**: Logiskt namn på textknappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11821">**name**: Logical name of text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11822">**överordnad:** Pekare till överordnad widget för knappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11822">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11823">**text_id:** Resurs-ID för text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11823">**text_id**: Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11824">**style**: Textknappstil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11824">**style**: Text button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11825">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widgetspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11825">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11826">**text_button_id:** Programdefinierat ID för textknappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11826">**text_button_id**: Application-defined ID of the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11827">**size**: Knappens storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11827">**size**: Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11828">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11828">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11829">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Lyckades textknappen skapa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11829">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11830">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11830">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11831">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11831">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11832">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED:**(0x13) Widget har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11832">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11833">**GX_INVALID_SIZE:**(0x19) Ogiltig blockstorlek för widgetkontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11833">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11834">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Överordnad widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11834">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Parent widget not valid</span></span>


### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11835">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11835">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11836">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11836">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11837">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11837">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_BUTTON my_text_button;

GX_RECTANGLE size;

/* Define widget size. */

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Create text button “my_text_button”. */

status = gx_text_button_create(&my_text_button, "my text button",
    &my_parent_window, MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE, MY_TEXT_BUTTON_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text button “my_text_button” was
created. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11857">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11857">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_text_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11858">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11858">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11859">Den här tjänsten ritar textknappen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11859">This service draws the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11860">Den här tjänsten kallas vanligtvis internt under arbetsyteuppdatering, men kan även anropas från anpassade textknappritningsfunktioner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11860">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom text button drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11863">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11863">Return Values</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11867">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11867">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom text button draw function. */

VOID my_text_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button)
{
    /* Call default text button draw. */

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11885">gx_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11885">gx_text_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11886">Bearbeta textknappshändelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11886">Process text button event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11887">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11887">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_button_event_process(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11888">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11888">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11889">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för den angivna textknappen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11889">This service processes an event for the specified text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11890">Den här tjänsten ska anropas som standardhändelsehanterare av anpassade funktioner för textknappshändelsebearbetning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11890">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom text button event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11891">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11891">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11892">**text_button** Pekare till textknappens kontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11892">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11893">**event_ptr** Pekare till den händelse som ska bearbetas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11893">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11894">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11894">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11895">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad textknapphändelseprocess</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11895">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text button event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11896">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11896">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11897">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11897">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11898">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11898">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11899">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11899">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11900">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11900">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11901">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11901">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic text button event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_text_button_event_process(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default text button event processing */
        status = gx_text_button_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_button_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11992">gx_text_button_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11992">gx_text_button_text_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11993">Stödfunktion för att rita knapptext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11993">Support function to draw button text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11994">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11994">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_text_button_text_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11995">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11995">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11996">Den här stödfunktionen ritar textdelen av en textknapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11996">This support function draws the text portion of a text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11997">Den här funktionen anropas internt av gx_text_button_draw och tillhandahålls som ett separat API som en bekvämlighet för program som definierar en anpassad knappritningsfunktion.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11997">This function is called internally by gx_text_button_draw, and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom button drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11998">Program som vill anpassa knappbakgrundsritningen kan tillhandahålla sin anpassade ritningsfunktion och anropa gx_text_button_text_draw-tjänsten som en del av den anpassade ritningen för att rita knapptexten över bakgrunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11998">Applications that want to customize the button background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the gx_text_button_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the button text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-11999">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-11999">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12000">**text_button:** Pekare till textknappkontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12000">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12001">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12001">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12002">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12002">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12003">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12003">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12004">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12004">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12005">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12005">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */

VOID my_button_draw(GX_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Insert code here to draw button background */

    /* Call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_text_button_text_draw(button);

    /* Draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) button);
}
```

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12031">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12031">Return Values</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING string;

/* Get the string from the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_text_button_text_get_ext(&my_text_button, &string);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string pointer and length from
“my_text_button” is retrieved and stored in string. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12107">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12107">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12108">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12108">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12109">Den här tjänsten är inaktuell till förmån för gx_text_button_text_set_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12109">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_button_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12110">Den här tjänsten tilldelar den angivna strängen till textknappen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12110">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12111">Om text_button widgeten har skapats med GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY skapar widgeten en privat kopia av den tilldelade textsträngen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12111">If the text_button widget was created with style  GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12112">Om GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY inte är aktiv, gör widgeten inte en privat kopia av den inkommande strängen och därför måste strängen allokeras statiskt eller globalt, dvs. det kanske inte är en automatisk eller tillfällig variabel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12112">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12113">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12113">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12114">**text_button:** Pekare till textknappskontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12114">**text_button**: Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12115">**text**: pekare till den NULL-avslutade strängen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12115">**text**: pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12116">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12116">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12117">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Ange texten till knappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12117">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12118">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12118">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12119">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12119">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12120">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12120">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12121">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:**(0x30) Minnestilldelningen har inte definierats eller minnesallokeringen misslyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12121">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12122">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Ogiltig stränglängd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12122">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12133">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12133">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12134">Den här tjänsten tilldelar den angivna strängen till textknappen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12134">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12135">Om widgeten text_button har skapats med GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY skapar widgeten en privat kopia av den tilldelade textsträngen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12135">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12136">Om GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY inte är aktiv, gör widgeten inte en privat kopia av den inkommande strängen och därför måste strängen vara statisk eller globalt allokerad, det vill säga det kanske inte är en automatisk eller tillfällig variabel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12136">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12141">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Ange texten till knappen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12141">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12142">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12142">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12220">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12220">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12221">Tilldela återanropsfunktionen för texttypens rullningshjul (inaktuell)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12221">Assign the callback function of text type scroll wheel (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12222">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12222">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *(*callback)(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *, int));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12223">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12223">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12224">Den här tjänsten är inaktuell till förmån för gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12224">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12225">Den här tjänsten tilldelar återanropsfunktionen som ett rullningshjul av texttyp anropar för att fastställa textsträngen som ska visas på varje rad i rullningshjulet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12225">This service assigns the callback function which a text type scroll wheel will invoke to determine the text string to be displayed at each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12226">För GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL och GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL tillhandahålls standardfunktioner för återanrop och programmet behöver inte göra några ändringar för att använda dessa standardimplementeringar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12226">For GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, default callback functions are provided and the application does not need to make any changes to use these default implementations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12227">Det här API:et tillhandahålls så att programmet kan anpassa formateringen eller andra parametrar för strängen som visas på varje rad i widgeten för rullningshjul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12227">This API is provided to allow the application to customize the formatting or other parameters of the string that is displayed on each row of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12228">Återanropsfunktionen tar emot som indata en pekare till rullningshjulets kontrollblock och radnumret som visas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12228">The callback function will receive as input a pointer to the scroll wheel control block and the row number that is being displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12229">Funktionen ska returnera en pekare till en textsträng.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12229">The function should return a pointer to a text string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12230">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12230">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12231">**hjul** Blockadress för kontroll av rullningshjul för strängar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12231">**wheel** String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12232">**motringning** Pekare till återanropsfunktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12232">**callback** Pointer to callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12233">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12233">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12234">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Ange återanrop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12234">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12235">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12235">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12236">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12236">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12237">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12237">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12238">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12238">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12239">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12239">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[20];

GX_CHAR *my_wheel_callback(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, int row)
{
    /* Just for an example, return row number as string for rows
    >= 0, and return text “Invalid” otherwise */
    if (row >= 0)
    {
        gx_utility_ltoa(row, string_buffer, 20);
    }
    else
    {
        return(“Invalid”);
    }
}

gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “my wheel”, root, 10,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|ID_MY_WHEEL, &size);

status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set(&wheel,
    my_wheel_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the scroll whell callback function has
been set. */
```
