## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12256">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12256">gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12257">Tilldela återanropsfunktionen för rullningshjulet för texttyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12257">Assign the callback function of text type scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12258">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12258">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    UINT *(*callback)(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *, int, GX_STRING *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12259">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12259">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12260">Den här tjänsten tilldelar återanropsfunktionen som ett rullningshjul av texttyp anropar för att fastställa textsträngen som ska visas på varje rad i rullningshjulet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12260">This service assigns the callback function which a text type scroll wheel will invoke to determine the text string to be displayed at each row of the scroll wheel.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12261">För GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL och GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL tillhandahålls standardfunktioner för återanrop och programmet behöver inte göra några ändringar för att använda dessa standardimplementeringar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12261">For GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL, default callback functions are provided and the application does not need to make any changes to use these default implementations.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12262">Det här API:et tillhandahålls så att programmet kan anpassa formateringen eller andra parametrar för strängen som visas på varje rad i widgeten för rullningshjul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12262">This API is provided to allow the application to customize the formatting or other parameters of the string that is displayed on each row of the scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12263">Återanropsfunktionen tar emot som indata en pekare till rullningshjulets kontrollblock och radnumret som visas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12263">The callback function will receive as input a pointer to the scroll wheel control block and the row number that is being displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12264">Funktionen ska returnera en pekare till en textsträng.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12264">The function should return a pointer to a text string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12265">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12265">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12266">**hjul** Blockadress för kontroll av rullningshjul för strängar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12266">**wheel** String scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12267">**motringning** Pekare till återanropsfunktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12267">**callback** Pointer to callback function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12268">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12268">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12269">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Ange återanrop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12269">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully set callback</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12270">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12270">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12271">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12271">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12272">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12272">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12273">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12273">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12274">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12274">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL wheel;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[20];

UINT *my_wheel_callback(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, int row,
    GX_STRING *return_string)
{
    /* Just for an example, return row number as string for rows
    >= 0, and return text “Invalid” otherwise */
    if (row >= 0)
    {
        gx_utility_ltoa(row, string_buffer, 20);
        return_string->gx_string_ptr = string_buffer;
        return_string->gx_string_length = strlen(string_buffer);
    }
    else
    {
        return_string->gx_string_ptr = “Invalid”;
        return_string->gx_string_length = strlen(“Invalid”);
    }

    return GX_SUCCESS;
}

gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(&wheel, “my wheel”, root, 10,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED|GX_STYLE_TEXT_CENTER|GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT|
    GX_STYLE_WRAP|ID_MY_WHEEL, &size);

status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_callback_set_ext(&wheel,
    my_wheel_callback);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the scroll whell callback function has
been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12291">gx_text_scroll_wheel_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12291">gx_text_scroll_wheel_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12292">Skapa ett textrullningshjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12292">Create a text scroll wheel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12293">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12293">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT Id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12294">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12294">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12295">Den här tjänsten skapar ett textrullningshjul.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12295">This service creates a text scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12296">Textrullningshjulet är en baswidget för GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL och GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL typwidgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12296">The text scroll wheel is a base widget for the GX_STRING_SCROLL_WHEEL and GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL type widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12297">Den här funktionen anropas internt av gx_string_scroll_wheel_create och gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create och tillhandahålls som ett separat API som en bekvämlighet för program som definierar en anpassad rullningshjulswidget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12297">This function is called internally by gx_string_scroll_wheel_create and gx_numeric_scroll_wheel_create, and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom scroll wheel widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12298">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12298">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12299">**wheel**: Blockadress för textrullningshjulskontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12299">**wheel**: Text scroll wheel control block address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12300">**name**: Programdefinierat widgetnamn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12300">**name**: Application defined widget name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12301">**överordnad:** Överordnat eller GX_NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12301">**parent**: Wheel parent or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12302">**total_rows:** Totalt antal rader som ska visas för användaren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12302">**total_rows**: Total rows to be presented to user</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12303">**style**: Önskade formatflaggor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12303">**style**: Desired style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12304">**Id:** Programdefinierade flaggor för hjulformat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12304">**Id**: Application defined wheel style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12305">**storlek:** Ursprunglig storlek på rullningshjulet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12305">**size**: Initial scroll wheel size</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12306">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12306">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12307">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Textrullningshjulet har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12307">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully created text scroll wheel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12308">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12308">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12309">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12309">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12310">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED:**(0x13) Widget har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12310">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12311">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET:**(0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12311">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>


### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12312">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12312">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12313">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12313">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12314">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12314">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom scroll wheel widget. */
typedef MY_SCROLL_WHEEL_STRUCT
{
    GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL text_scroll_wheel;

    /* Add custom members here. */

} MY_SCROLL_WHEEL;

MY_SCROLL_WHEEL my_scroll_wheel;

UINT my_scroll_wheel_create(MY_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, GX_WIDGET *parent,
    INT total_rows, ULONG style, USHORT Id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size)
{
    /* Call base creation. */
    status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_create(
        &wheel.text_scroll_wheel,
        ”my_text_scroll_wheel”, GX_NULL, 7,
        GX_STYLE_ENABLED, ID_MY_SCROLL_WHEEL, &size);

    if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Add custom initialization here. */
        if(parent)
        {
            gx_widget_link(parent, (GX_WIDGET *)wheel);
        }
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12363">gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12363">gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12364">Processhändelse för textrullningshjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12364">Process text scroll wheel event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12365">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12365">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12366">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12366">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12367">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för det angivna textrullningshjulet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12367">This service processes an event for the specified text scroll wheel.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12368">Den här tjänsten ska anropas som standardhändelsehanterare av anpassade funktioner för bearbetning av textrullningshjulshändelse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12368">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom text scroll wheel event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12369">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12369">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12370">**hjul** Pekare till kontrollblock för textrullningshjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12370">**wheel** Pointer to text scroll wheel control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12371">**event_ptr** Pekare till den händelse som ska bearbetas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12371">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12372">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12372">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12373">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad händelseprocess för textrullningshjul</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12373">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text scroll wheel event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12374">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12374">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12375">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12375">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12376">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12376">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12377">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12377">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12378">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12378">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12379">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12379">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic text scroll wheel event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(GX_TEXT_SCROLL_WHEEL *wheel, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default text scroll wheel event processing */
        status = gx_text_scroll_wheel_event_process(wheel, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

```C
    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_TEXT,

    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_TEXT);

```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12461">gx_tree_view_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12461">gx_tree_view_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12462">Skapa en trädvy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12462">Create a tree view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12463">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12463">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_create(
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT tree_view_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12464">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12464">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12465">Den här tjänsten skapar en trädvy som angetts och associerar trädvyn med den angivna överordnade widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12465">This service creates a tree view as specified and associates the tree view with the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12466">Den accepterar alla typer av widget som underordnade menyalternativ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12466">It accepts all types of widget as child menu item.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12467">Vi rekommenderar att du använder widgeten GX_MENU som dess underordnade menyalternativ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12467">It’s recommended to use GX_MENU type widget as its child menu item.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12468">GX_TREE_VIEW härleds från GX_WINDOW och stöder alla GX_WINDOW API-tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12468">GX_TREE_VIEW is derived from GX_WINDOW and supports all gx_window API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12469">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12469">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12470">**träd:** Pekare till kontrollblock för trädvy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12470">**tree**: Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12471">**name**: Namnet på trädvyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12471">**name**: Name of the tree view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12472">**överordnad:** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12472">**parent**: Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12473">**style**: Stil på widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12473">**style**: Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12474">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widgetspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12474">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12475">**menu_id:** Programdefinierat ID för trädvyn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12475">**menu_id**: Application-defined ID of the tree view</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12476">**storlek:** Trädvyns storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12476">**size**: Size of the tree view</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12477">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12477">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12478">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Trädvyn har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12478">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful tree view creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12479">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12479">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12480">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12480">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12481">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12481">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED**: (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12482">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Ogiltig blockstorlek för widgetkontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12482">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12483">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12483">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12484">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12484">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12485">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12485">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12486">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12486">Example</span></span>

```C
status = gx_tree_view_create(&my_tree_view,
    “my_tree_view”, parent,
    GX_STYLE_ENABLED, MY_TREE_VIEW_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the tree view was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12501">gx_tree_view_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12501">gx_tree_view_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12502">Rita trädvy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12502">Draw tree view</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12503">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12503">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_tree_view_draw(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12504">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12504">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12505">Den här tjänsten ritar den angivna trädvyn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12505">This service draws the specified tree view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12506">Den här funktionen anropas vanligtvis internt av GUIX-mekanismen för arbetsyteuppdatering, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till med implementeringen av anpassade ritningsfunktioner för anpassade trädvywidgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12506">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom tree view widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12507">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12507">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12508">**träd** Pekare till trädvyns kontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12508">**tree** Pointer to tree view control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12509">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12509">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12510">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12510">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12511">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12511">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12512">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12512">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12513">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12513">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom tree view draw function. */
UINT my_tree_view_draw(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view)
{
    /* Perform default drawing */
    gx_tree_view_draw(tree_view);

    /* Add custom drawing here */
}
```

## <a name="gx_tree_view_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12528">gx_tree_view_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12528">gx_tree_view_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12529">Händelse för processträdsvy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12529">Process tree view event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12530">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12530">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_event_process(
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree, 
    GX_EVENT event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12531">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12531">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12532">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för den angivna trädvyn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12532">This service processes an event for the specified tree view.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12533">Den här tjänsten ska anropas som standardhändelsehanterare av alla anpassade funktioner för händelsebearbetning i trädvyn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12533">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom tree view event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12534">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12534">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12538">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Lyckad processträdvyhändelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12538">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful process tree view event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12539">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12539">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12540">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12540">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12541">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12541">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET**: (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12542">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12542">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12543">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12543">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12544">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12544">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic tree view event processing as part of custom event
    processing function. */

UINT custom_tree_view_event_process(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default tree view
                event processing */
            status = gx_tree_view_event_process(tree_view, event);
            break;
    }
}
return status;
```

```C
UINT gx_tree_view_root_pixelmap_set(
    GX_TREE_VIEW *tree,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID expand_map_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID collapse_map_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12740">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12740">Description</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12752">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12752">Example</span></span>

```C
FILE *fp = GX_NULL;

/* define call back function of how to write the data read from
canvas memory. */

UINT write_data_callback(GX_UBYTE *byte_data, UINT data_count)
{
    if (fp)
    {
        fwrite(byte_data, 1, data_count, fp);
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}

VOID scroll_wheel_screen_draw(GX_WINDOW *window)
{
    UINT status;

    GX_RECTANGLE size = {31,31,610,450};
    gx_window_draw(window);
    if (screenshot)
    {
        fp = fopen("../screenshot.bmp", "wb");
        /* Convert canvas memory to bitmap format.
           Status GX_SUCCESS means operation succeed. */
        status = gx_utility_canvas_to_bmp(root->gx_window_root_canvas,
            &size, write_data_callback);

        fclose(fp);
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_utility_gradient_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12804">gx_utility_gradient_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12804">gx_utility_gradient_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12805">Skapa en toningspunktskarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12805">Create a gradient pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12806">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12806">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_gradient_create(
    GX_GRADIENT *gradient,
    GX_VALUE width, 
    GX_VALUE height,
    UCHAR type, 
    GX_UBYTE start_alpha, 
    GX_UBYTE end_alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12807">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12807">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12808">Den här tjänsten skapar en tonad pixelkarta vid körning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12808">This service creates a gradient pixelmap at runtime.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12809">En toningsbild kan användas för att åstadkomma toning och andra intressanta visuella ändringar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12809">A gradient image can be used to accomplish fade effects and other interesting visual changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12810">Bredden och höjden på den begärda toningen får inte vara mindre än 2 x 2 bildpunkter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12810">The width and height of the requested gradient can be no less than 2x2 pixels.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12811">GUIX upprätthåller internt en lista över skapade toningar, och den här funktionen söker först igenom toningslistan för att hitta en matchande toningspunktskarta innan den skapar en ny pixelkarta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12811">GUIX internally maintains a list of created gradients, and this function will first search the gradient list to find a matching gradient pixelmap before creating a new pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12812">Med andra ord behövs samma toningspunktskarta flera gånger, bara en pixelkarta skapas faktiskt och varje toning som kräver den här pixelkartan delar den skapade pixelkartan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12812">In other words,  the same gradient pixelmap is needed multiple times, only one pixelmap is actually created, and each gradient that requires this pixelmap shares the created pixelmap.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12813">Detta API kräver att gx_system_memory_allocator-funktionen definieras för att tillåta minnesallokering vid körning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12813">This API requires the gx_system_memory_allocator function be defined to allow runtime memory allocation.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12814">Flaggor av toningstyp innehåller GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA och GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MIRROR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12814">The gradient type flags include GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA and GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MIRROR.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12815">Endast GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA toningar stöds för närvarande (dvs. den här typens flagga måste anges).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12815">Only  GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA type gradients are currently supported (i.e. this type flag must be set).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12816">Flaggan GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MORROR är valfri och när den har angetts instruerar logiken för toning att skapa en toning som ändras från start_alpha till end_alpha och tillbaka till start_alpha.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12816">The  GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_MORROR flag is optional, and when set  instructs the gradient creation logic to create a gradient that changes from start_alpha to end_alpha and back to start_alpha.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12817">Annars skapas en linjär toning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12817">Otherwise a linear gradient is created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12818">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12818">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12819">**gradient**: Pekare till toningskontrollens blockstruktur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12819">**gradient**: Pointer to gradient control block structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12820">**width**: Begärd pixelkarta-bredd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12820">**width**: Requested pixelmap width</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12821">**höjd:** Begärd pixelkarta-höjd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12821">**height**: Requested pixelmap height</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12822">type : Requested gradient type **(Begärd** toningstyp)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12822">**type**: Requested gradient type</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12823">**start_alpha:** Starta alfavärdet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12823">**start_alpha**: Starting alpha value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12824">**end_alpha:** Slut alfavärde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12824">**end_alpha**: End alpha value</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12825">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12825">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12826">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Toning skapades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12826">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12827">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Toning är inte minst 2 x 2 bildpunkter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12827">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Gradient is not at least 2x2 pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12828">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) Toning är inte typen GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12828">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) Gradient is not type GX_GRADIENT_TYPE_ALPHA</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12829">**GX_FAILURE:**(0x10) Minnestilldelningen har inte definierats eller så misslyckas minnesallokeringen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12829">**GX_FAILURE**: (0x10) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12830">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12830">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12831">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Toningspekaren är inte giltig<</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12831">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Gradient pointer not valid<</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12832">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Värdet för Bredd och höjd är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12832">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Width and height value not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12833">**GX_INVALID_TYPE:**(0x1B) Toningstypen är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12833">**GX_INVALID_TYPE**: (0x1B) Gradient type not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_utility_gradient_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12854">gx_utility_gradient_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12854">gx_utility_gradient_delete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12855">Ta bort en toning som skapats tidigare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12855">Delete a previously created gradient</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12856">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12856">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_gradient_delete(GX_GRADIENT *gradient);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12857">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12857">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12858">Den här tjänsten tar bort en toning som skapats tidigare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12858">This service deletes a previously created gradient.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12859">Om pixelkartan som är associerad med den här toningen inte används av andra toningar tas även pixelkartan bort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12859">If the pixelmap associated with this gradient is not in use by any other gradients, the pixelmap data will also be deleted.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12860">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12860">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12861">**gradient**: Pekare till toningskontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12861">**gradient**: Pointer to gradient control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12862">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12862">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12863">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Toning har tagits bort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12863">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Gradient was deleted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12864">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12864">**GX_CALLER_ERROR**: (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12865">**GX_PTR_ERROR:**(0x07) Toningspekaren är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12865">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Gradient pointer is not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12866">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12866">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12868">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12868">Example</span></span>

```C

/* Delete previously created gradient. */
status = gx_utility_gradient_delete(&gradient);

/* If status == GX_SUCCESS, the gradient has been deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_ltoa"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12886">gx_utility_ltoa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12886">gx_utility_ltoa</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12887">Konvertera långt heltal till ASCII</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12887">Convert long integer to ASCII</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12888">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12888">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_itoa(
    LONG value, 
    GX_CHAR *return_buffer,
    UINT seturn_buffer_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12889">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12889">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12890">Den här tjänsten konverterar ett långt heltalsvärde till en ASCII-sträng.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12890">This service converts a long integer value into an ASCII string.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12891">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12891">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12892">**value**: Långt heltalsvärde som ska konverteras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12892">**value**: Long integer value to convert</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12893">**return_buffer:** Målbuffert för ASCII-sträng</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12893">**return_buffer**: Destination buffer for ASCII string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12894">**return_buffer_size:** Storleken på målbufferten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12894">**return_buffer_size**: Size of destination buffer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12895">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12895">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12896">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Konverterat heltalsvärde till sträng</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12896">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully converted integer value to string</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12897">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare för returbuffert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12897">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid return buffer pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12898">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Ogiltig returbuffertstorlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12898">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid return buffer size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12899">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12899">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12900">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12900">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12901">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12901">Example</span></span>

```C
INT my_value = 200;

GX_CHAR string_buffer[10];

UINT status;

/* Convert “my_value” into an ASCII string. */
status = gx_utility_ltoa(my_value, string_buffer, 10);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “string_buffer” contains the ASCII
representation of “my_value”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_acos"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12917">gx_utility_math_acos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12917">gx_utility_math_acos</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12918">Compute Arc-cosinus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12918">Compute arc cosine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12919">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12919">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_math_acos(GX_FIXED_VAL x);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12920">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12920">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12921">Den här tjänsten beräknar vinkelvärdet för arc cosinus x.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12921">This service computes the angle value of the arc cosine x.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12922">Indatavärdet är en datatyp med fast punkt, anropa GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE konvertera från INT till GX_FIXED_VAL typ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12922">The input value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12923">Om du till exempel vill beräkna arc cosine för 0,5 gör du indata som GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12923">For example, if you want to calculate the arc cosine of 0.5, make the input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12924">I GUIX-versionen 5.4.0 eller mindre är indatavärdestypen för den här funktionen INT och värdet är begränsat till intervallet [-256, 256].</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12924">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value type of this function is INT, and the value is limited to the range [-256, 256].</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12925">Programmet måste skala värdet från intervallet [-1, 1] till intervallet [-256, 256] innan den här tjänsten anropas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12925">The application must scale the value from range [-1, 1] to range [-256, 256] before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12926">Om ditt projekt med GUIX-version lika med eller mindre än 5.4.0 har referens till detta API och du vill uppgradera projektet med det senaste guix-biblioteket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12926">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0 has reference to this API, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12927">Du har två alternativ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12927">You have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12928">Åtgärda indatavärdet för det här API-anropet för att GX_FIXED_VAL datatypsvärdet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12928">Fix the input value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12929">Definiera GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12929">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12930">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12930">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12931">**x**: Värde vars arc-cosinus beräknas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12931">**x**: Value whose arc cosine is computed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12932">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12932">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12933">**angle**: Vinkelvärde för arc cosinus x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12933">**angle**: Angle value of arc cosine x</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12934">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12934">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12935">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12935">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12936">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12936">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute the angle value of arc cosine of “0.5”. */

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    x = 256 / 2;
#else
    x = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

angle = gx_utility_math_acos(x);

/* “angle” contains the angle value of arc cosine “x”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_asin"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12954">gx_utility_math_asin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12954">gx_utility_math_asin</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12955">Beräknings arc sinus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12955">Compute arc sine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12956">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12956">Prototype</span></span>

```C
INT gx_utility_math_asin(GX_FIXED_VAL x);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12957">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12957">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12958">Den här tjänsten beräknar vinkelvärdet för arc sinus x.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12958">This service computes the angle value of the arc sine x.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12959">Indatavärdet är en datatyp med fast punkt, anropa GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE konvertera från INT till GX_FIXED_VAL typ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12959">The input value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL  type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12960">Om du till exempel vill beräkna arcus för 0,5 gör du indata som GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) /2.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12960">For example, if you want to calculate the arc sin of 0.5, make the input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12961">I 5.4.0 eller lägre version GUIX är den här funktionens indatavärdetyp INT och värdet är begränsat till intervallet [-256, 256].</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12961">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value type of this function is INT, and the value is limited to the range [-256, 256].</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12962">Programmet måste skala värdet från intervallet [-1, 1] till intervallet [-256, 256] innan den här tjänsten anropas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12962">The application must scale the value from range [-1, 1] to range [-256, 256] before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12963">Om ditt projekt med GUIX-version är lika med eller mindre än 5.4.0 och du vill uppgradera projektet med det senaste guix-biblioteket.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12963">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12964">Du har två alternativ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12964">You have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12965">Åtgärda indatavärdet för det här API-anropet för att GX_FIXED_VAL värdet för datatypen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12965">Fix the input value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12966">Definiera GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12966">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12967">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12967">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12968">**x**: Värde vars arc sinus beräknas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12968">**x**: Value whose arc sine is computed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12969">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12969">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12970">**angle**: Vinkelvärde för arc sinus x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12970">**angle**: Angle value of arc sine x</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12971">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12971">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12972">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12972">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12973">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12973">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute the angle value of arc sine of “x”. */

#if defined GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY
    x = 256 / 2;
#else
    X = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(1) / 2;
#endif

angle = gx_utility_math_asin(x);

/* “angle” contains the angle value of arc sine “x”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_cos"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12991">gx_utility_math_cos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12991">gx_utility_math_cos</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12992">Beräknings cosinus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12992">Compute cosine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12993">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12993">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_FIXED_VAL gx_utility_math_cos(GX_FIXED_VAL angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12994">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12994">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12995">Den här tjänsten beräknar cosinus för den angivna vinkeln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12995">This service computes the cosine of the supplied angle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12996">Indatavärdet är en datatyp med fast punkt, anropa GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE konvertera från INT till GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12996">The input value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12997">Om du till exempel vill beräkna cosinus för 90 grad gör du indata som GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12997">For example, if you want to calculate the cosine of 90 degree, make input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12998">Returvärdet är en datatyp med fast punkt, anropa GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT konvertera från GX_FIXED_VAL till INT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12998">The return value is a fixed point data type, call  GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT to convert from GX_FIXED_VAL to INT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-12999">I GUIX-versionen 5.4.0 eller mindre är indatavärdet och returvärdestypen för den här tjänsten INT, indatavärdet och returvärdet förstoras med 256.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-12999">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX version, the input value and return value type of this service is INT, the input value and return value are enlarged by 256.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13000">Programmet måste därför skala vinkelvärdet med 256 innan den här tjänsten anropas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13000">And therefore, the application must scale the angle value by 256 before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13001">Om ditt projekt med GUIX-version är lika med eller mindre än 5.4.0 och du vill uppgradera projektet med det senaste guix-biblioteket har du två alternativ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13001">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library, you have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13002">Åtgärda indatavärdet och hanteringen till returvärdet för det här API-anropet för att GX_FIXED_VAL värdet för datumtyp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13002">Fix the input value and the handling to the return value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL date type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13003">Definiera GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13003">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13004">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13004">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13005">**angle**: Vinkel för att beräkna cosinus för</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13005">**angle**: Angle to compute cosine of</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13006">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13006">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13007">**cosinus:** Cosinus för tillhandahållen vinkel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13007">**cosine**: Cosine of supplied angle</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13008">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13008">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13009">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13009">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13010">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13010">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compute cosine of 90 degree. */

INT angle = 90;

#if defined (GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    INT scaled_angle = angle << 8;
#else
    GX_FIXED_VAL scaled_angle = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(angle);
#endif

my_angle_cosine = gx_utility_math_cos(scaled_angle);

/* “my_angle_cosine” contains the cosine of “my_angle”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_math_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13028">gx_utility_math_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13028">gx_utility_math_sin</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13029">Beräknings sinus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13029">Compute sine</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13030">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13030">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_FIXED_VAL gx_utility_math_sin(GX_FIXED_VAL angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13031">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13031">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13032">Den här tjänsten beräknar sinus för den angivna vinkeln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13032">This service computes the sine of the supplied angle.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13033">Indatavärdet är en datatyp med fast punkt, anropa GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE konvertera från INT till GX_FIXED_VAL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13033">The input value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE to convert from INT to GX_FIXED_VAL.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13034">Om du till exempel vill beräkna sinus för 90 grader gör du indata som GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13034">For example, if you want to calculate the sine of 90 degree, make input as GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(90).</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13035">Returvärdet är en datatyp med fast punkt, anropa GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT konvertera från GX_FIXED_VAL till INT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13035">The return value is a fixed point data type, call GX_FIXED_VAL_TO_INT to convert from GX_FIXED_VAL to INT.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13036">I GUIX-versionen 5.4.0 eller mindre är indatavärdet och returvärdestypen INT, indatavärdet och returvärdet förstoras med 256.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13036">In 5.4.0 or lesser version GUIX, the input value and return value type is INT, the input value and return value are enlarged by 256.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13037">Programmet måste därför skala vinkelvärdet med 256 innan den här tjänsten anropas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13037">And therefore, the application must scale the angle value by 256 before invoke this service.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13038">Om ditt projekt med GUIX-versionen är lika med eller mindre än 5.4.0 och du vill uppgradera projektet med det senaste guix-biblioteket har du två alternativ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13038">If your project with GUIX version equal or lesser than 5.4.0, and you want to upgrade your project with the latest guix library, you have two options.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13039">Korrigera indatavärdet och handskriften till returvärdet för det här API-anropet för att GX_FIXED_VAL datatypsvärde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13039">Fix the input value and the handing to the return value of this API call to use GX_FIXED_VAL data type value.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13040">Definiera GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13040">Define GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13041">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13041">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13042">**angle**: Vinkel för att beräkna sinus för</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13042">**angle**: Angle to compute sine of</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13043">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13043">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13044">**sinus:** Sinus för asynlig vinkel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13044">**sine**: Sine of supplied angle</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13045">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13045">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13046">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13046">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13047">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13047">Example</span></span>

```C
INT my_angle = 80;

/* Compute sine of “my_angle”. */

#if defined(GUIX_5_4_0_COMPATIBILITY)
    INT scaled_angle = my_angle << 8;
#else
    GX_FIXED_VAL = GX_FIXED_VAL_MAKE(my_angle);
#endif

my_angle_sine = gx_utility_math_sin(scaled_angle);

/* “my_angle_sine” contains the sine of “my_angle”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13092">gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13092">gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13093">Ändra ordning på BiDi-text till dess visningsordning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13093">Reorder BiDi text into its display order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13094">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13094">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO *input_info, 
                                       GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO **resolved_info_head)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13095">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13095">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13096">Den här tjänsten ordnar om BiDi-text till visningsordningen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13096">This service reorders BiDi text into its display order.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13097">Om teckensnitt och visningsbredd för text ritas tillämpas radbrytning först, och omsorteringsprocessen tillämpas baserat på varje rad.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13097">If text draw font and display width are provided, line breaking will be applied first, reordering process will be applied based on each line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13098">Om den angivna texten innehåller fler än ett stycke delar tjänsten upp texten i stycken, radbrytningen och omsorteringsresultatet för varje stycke länkas som en lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13098">If the provided text contains more than one paragraph, the service will break the text into paragraphs, the line breaking and reordering result of each paragraph will be linked as a list.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13099">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13099">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13100">**input_info**: Pekare till information om radbrytning och omsortering av text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13100">**input_info**: Pointer to the information for line breaking and text reordering</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13101">**resolved_info_head:** Pekare till den länkade listan som innehåller radbrytning och omsortering av resultat för varje stycke i den angivna texten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13101">**resolved_info_head**: Pointer to the linked list that contains line breaking and reordering results of each paragraph of the the provided text</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13102">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13102">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13103">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Lyckad omsortering av bidi-text</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13103">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful bidi text reorder</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13104">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltiga indatapekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13104">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13105">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:**(0x30) Minnestilldelningen har inte definierats eller så misslyckas minnesallokeringen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13105">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13106">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13106">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13107">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13107">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13108">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13108">Example</span></span>
#### <a name="draw-single-line-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13109">Rita en enskild rads bidi-text till arbetsytan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13109">Draw single line bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Single Line String";
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = GX_NULL;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = -1;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_left,
                                widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_top,
                                resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text);

        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```
#### <a name="draw-multi-line-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13110">Rita flerrads-bidi-text till arbetsyta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13110">Draw multi line bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Multi Line BiDi Text Display Example";
    GX_FONT *font;
    GX_RECTANGLE client;
    GX_VALUE display_width;
    INT index;
    GX_VALUE xpos;
    GX_VALUE ypos;
    
    /* Pickup the font. */
    gx_context_font_get(font_id, &font);
    gx_widget_client_get(widget, 2, &client);
    
    display_width = (GX_VALUE)(client.gx_rectangle_right - client.gx_rectangle_left + 1);
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = font;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = display_width;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        xpos = client.gx_rectangle_left;
        ypos = client.gx_rectangle_top;
        
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        for(index = 0; index < resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_total_lines; index++)
        {
            gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(xpos, ypos, &resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text[index]);
        
            ypos += font->gx_font_line_height;
        }
        
        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

#### <a name="draw-multi-paragraph-bidi-text-to-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13111">Rita flera styckens bidi-text till arbetsytan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13111">Draw multi paragraph bidi text to canvas</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *next;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Multi Paragraph\r BiDi Text Display Example";
    GX_FONT *font;
    GX_RECTANGLE client;
    GX_VALUE display_width;
    INT index;
    GX_VALUE xpos;
    GX_VALUE ypos;
    
    /* Pickup the font. */
    gx_context_font_get(font_id, &font);
    gx_widget_client_get(widget, 2, &client);
    
    display_width = (GX_VALUE)(client.gx_rectangle_right - client.gx_rectangle_left + 1);
    
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = font;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = display_width;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        xpos = client.gx_rectangle_left;
        ypos = client.gx_rectangle_top;
        
        next = resolved_info;
        
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        while(next)
        {
            for(index = 0; index < next.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_total_lines; index++)
            {
                gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(xpos, ypos, &next.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text[index]);
            
                ypos += font->gx_font_line_height;
            }
            
            next = next->gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_next;
        }
        
        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13118">Den här tjänsten tar bort listan över lösta information som returneras av gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13118">This service deletes resolved information list that returned by gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13121">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13121">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13122">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Lyckad löst text borttagning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13122">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful resolved text delete</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13123">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltiga indatapekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13123">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13124">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:**(0x30) Minnestilldelningen har inte definierats eller så misslyckas minnesallokeringen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13124">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13126">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13126">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13127">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13127">Example</span></span>
```C
VOID custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
    GX_BIDI_TEXT_INFO input_info;
    GX_BIDI_RESOLVED_TEXT_INFO *resolved_info;
    GX_CHAR bidi_text[] = "Single Line String";
    
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_ptr = bidi_text;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_text.gx_string_length = sizeof(bidi_text) - 1;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_font = GX_NULL;
    input_info.gx_bidi_text_info_display_width = -1;
    
    /* Reordering BiDi text. */
    status = gx_utility_bidi_paragraph_reorder(&input_info, &resolved_info);
    
    if(status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        /* Draw reordered bidi text to canvas. */
        gx_canvas_text_draw_ext(widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_left,
                                widget->gx_widget_size.gx_rectangle_top,
                                resolved_info.gx_bidi_resolved_text_info_text);

        /* Delete resolved information list. */
        gx_utility_bidi_resolved_text_info_delete(&resolved_info);
    }
}
```

## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13130">gx_utility_pixelmap_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13130">gx_utility_pixelmap_resize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13131">Ändra storlek på pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13131">Resize pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13132">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13132">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_resize(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination, 
    INT width, 
    INT height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13133">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13133">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13134">Den här tjänsten ändrar storlek på en pixelkarta och returnerar en pekare till en ny pixelkarta, vilket är resultatet av storleksändringen av pixelkartan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13134">This service resizes a pixelmap and returns a pointer to a new pixelmap, which is the result of the pixelmap resize.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13135">Den här tjänsten kräver tidigare användning av gx_system_memory_allocator_set för att tillåta allokering av minne för att lagra storleksändrat pixelkarta-data.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13135">This service requires the prior use of gx_system_memory_allocator_set, to allow allocation of memory to hold the resized pixelmap data.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13136">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13136">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13137">**src:** Pekare till pixelkartan för att ändra storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13137">**src**: Pointer to the pixelmap to resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13138">**mål:** Målbufferten för den resulterande pixelkartan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13138">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13139">**width**: Bredden på den resulterande pixelkartan, i bildpunkter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13139">**width**: Width of the resulting pixelmap, in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13140">**height**(höjd): Höjden på den resulterande pixelkartan, i bildpunkter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13140">**height**: Hieght of the resulting pixelmap, in pixels</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13141">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13141">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13142">**GX_SUCCESS:**(0x00) Storleksändring av en lyckad pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13142">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap resize</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13143">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare för källa eller mål pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13143">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13144">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Värdet bredd eller höjd är inte giltigt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13144">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Width or height value not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13145">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED:**(0x28) Käll pixelkartan är komprimerat format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13145">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13146">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:**(0x30) Minnestilldelningen har inte definierats eller så misslyckas minnesallokeringen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13146">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13147">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13147">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13148">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13148">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13149">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13149">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXLEMAP *des_pixelmap;

/* Resize “src_pixelmap” with specifiy width and height. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_resize(src_pixelmap,
    &des_pixelmap, 100, 200);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of resize. */
```
