## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13166">gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13166">gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13167">Rotera pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13167">Rotate pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13168">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13168">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src, INT angle,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination,
    UINT *rot_cx, 
    UINT *rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13169">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13169">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13170">Den här tjänsten roterar en pixelkarta och returnerar en pekare till en ny pixelkarta, vilket är resultatet av rotationen av pixelkartan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13170">This service rotates a pixelmap and returns a pointer to a new pixelmap, which is the result of the pixelmap rotation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13171">Om du vill rotera en pixelkarta direkt till arbetsytan använder du gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13171">To rotate a pixelmap directly to the canvas, use gx_canvas_pixelmap_rotate().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13172">Den här tjänsten kräver tidigare användning av gx_system_memory_allocator_set för att tillåta allokering av minne för att lagra roterade pixelkarta-data.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13172">This service requires the prior use of gx_system_memory_allocator_set, to allow allocation of memory to hold the rotated pixelmap data.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13173">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13173">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13174">**src:** Pixelkartan som ska roteras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13174">**src**: The pixelmap to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13175">**angle**: Rotationsvinkel i grader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13175">**angle**: Angle of rotation in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13176">**mål:** Målbufferten för den resulterande pixelkartan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13176">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13177">**rot_cx:** Hämtade x koordinaten för rotationscentret med avseende på målpunktskartan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13177">**rot_cx**: Retrieved x coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13178">Bör initieras med x-koordinaten för rotationscentret med avseende på källans pixelkarta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13178">Should be initiated with the x coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13179">Om rot_cx är GX_NULL hämtas inte värdet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13179">If rot_cx is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13180">**rot_cy:** Hämtad y-koordinat för rotationscentret med avseende på målpunktskarta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13180">**rot_cy**: Retrieved y coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13181">Bör initieras med rotationscentrets y-koordinat med avseende på käll pixelkarta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13181">Should be initiated with the y coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13182">Om rot_cy är GX_NULL hämtas inte värdet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13182">If rot_cy is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13183">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13183">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13184">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Lyckad pixelkarta-rotation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13184">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13185">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare för källa eller mål pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13185">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13186">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Vinkelvärdet är 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13186">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Angle value is 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13187">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT:**(0x28) Käll pixelkartan är komprimerat format, vilket inte stöds</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13187">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format, which is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13188">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:**(0x30) Minnestilldelningen har inte definierats eller så misslyckas minnesallokeringen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13188">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13189">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13189">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13190">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13190">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13191">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13191">Example</span></span>

```C
rot_cx = source_rotate_center_x;
rot_cy = source_rotate_center_y;

/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 30 degree in clockwise direction. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(src_pixelmap, 30,
    &des_pixelmap, &rot_cx, &rot_cy);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of rotation. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13208">gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13208">gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13209">Rotera pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13209">Rotate pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13210">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13210">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate(
    GX_PIXELMAP *src,
    INT angle,
    GX_PIXELMAP *destination,
    UINT *rot_cx,
    UINT *rot_cy);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13211">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13211">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13212">Den här tjänsten roterar en pixelkarta med 90 grader, 180 grader eller 270 grader.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13212">This service rotates a pixelmap by 90 degree, 180 degree or 270 degree.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13213">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13213">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13214">**src:** Pixelkartan som ska roteras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13214">**src**: The pixelmap to rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13215">**vinkel:** Rotationsvinkel i grader</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13215">**angle**: Angle of rotation in degrees</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13216">**mål:** Målbufferten för den resulterande pixelkartan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13216">**destination**: Destination buffer for the resulting pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13217">**rot_cx:** Hämtade x koordinaten för rotationscentret med avseende på målpunktskartan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13217">**rot_cx**: Retrieved x coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13218">Bör initieras med x-koordinaten för rotationscentret med avseende på käll pixelkarta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13218">Should be initiated with the x coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13219">Om rot_cx är GX_NULL hämtas inte värdet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13219">If rot_cx is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13220">**rot_cy:** Hämtad y-koordinat för rotationscentret med avseende på målpunktskarta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13220">**rot_cy**: Retrieved y coordinate of rotation center with respect to destination pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13221">Bör initieras med rotationscentrets y-koordinat med avseende på käll pixelkarta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13221">Should be initiated with the y coordinate of rotation center with respect to source pixelmap.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13222">Om rot_cy är GX_NULL hämtas inte värdet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13222">If rot_cy is GX_NULL, value will not be retrieved.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13223">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13223">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13224">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Lyckad pixelkarta-rotation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13224">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successful pixelmap rotate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13225">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig pekare för källa eller mål pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13225">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid source or destination pixelmap pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13226">**GX_INVALID_VALUE:**(0x22) Vinkelvärdet är 0 eller inte en enkel vinkel som 90, 180, 270</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13226">**GX_INVALID_VALUE**: (0x22) Angle value is 0 or not a simple angle like 90, 180, 270</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13227">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT:**(0x28) Käll pixelkartan är komprimerat format, vilket inte stöds</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13227">**GX_INVALID_FORMAT**: (0x28) Source pixelmap is compressed format, which is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13228">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:**(0x30) Minnestilldelningen har inte definierats eller så misslyckas minnesallokeringen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13228">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**:  (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation is failed</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13229">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13229">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13230">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13230">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13231">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13231">Example</span></span>

```C
rot_cx = source_rotate_center_x;
rot_cy = source_rotate_center_y;

/* rotate “src_pixelmap” by 90 degree in clockwise direction. */
status = gx_utility_pixelmap_simple_rotate(src_pixelmap, 90,
    &des_pixelmap,
    &rot_cx, &rot_cy);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS. “des_pixelmap” successfully load the
resulting pixelmap of rotation. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_center"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13247">gx_utility_rectangle_center</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13247">gx_utility_rectangle_center</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13248">Center-rektangel inom en annan rektangel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13248">Center rectangle within another rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13249">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13249">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_center(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *within_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13250">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13250">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13251">Den här tjänsten centrerar rektangeln inom en annan rektangel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13251">This service centers the rectangle within another rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13252">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13252">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13253">**rektangel**: Rektangel till mitten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13253">**rectangle**: Rectangle to center</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13254">**within_rectangle:** Rektangel som ska centreras inom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13254">**within_rectangle**: Rectangle to center within</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13255">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13255">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13256">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Rektangeln har centrerats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13256">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully centered the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13257">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig rektangel för indata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13257">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13258">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Ogiltig rektangelstorlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13258">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid rectangle size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13259">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13259">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13260">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13260">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13261">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13261">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Center “my_inner_rectangle” inside of “my_outer_rectangle”.*/
status = gx_utility_rectangle_center(&my_inner_rectangle,
    &my_outer_rectangle);

/* Is status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_inner_rectangle” is centered
within “my_other_rectangle”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_center_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13277">gx_utility_rectangle_center_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13277">gx_utility_rectangle_center_find</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13278">Hitta mitten av rektangeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13278">Find center of rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13279">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13279">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_center_find(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_POINT *return_center);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13280">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13280">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13281">Den här tjänsten hittar mitten av rektangeln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13281">This service finds the center of the rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13282">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13282">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13283">**rektangel**: Rektangel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13283">**rectangle**: Rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13284">**return_center:** Pekare till mittpunkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13284">**return_center**: Pointer to center point</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13285">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13285">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13286">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Hittades i mitten av rektangeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13286">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully found the center of the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13287">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig indatapekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13287">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13288">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Ogiltig rektangelstorlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13288">**GX_INVALID_SIZE**: (0x19) Invalid rectangle size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13289">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13289">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13290">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13290">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13291">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13291">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE my_rectangle;

GX_POINT my_center_point;

gx_utility_define(&my_rectangle, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Find center of “my_rectangle””. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_center_find(&my_rectangle,
    &my_center_point);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_center_point” is the center point
of “my_rectangle” (50, 50). */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_combine"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13307">gx_utility_rectangle_combine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13307">gx_utility_rectangle_combine</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13308">Kombinera två rektanglar till den första</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13308">Combine two rectangles into first</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13309">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13309">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_combine(
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13310">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13310">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13311">Den här tjänsten kombinerar den första och andra rektangeln till den första rektangeln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13311">This service combines the first and second rectangle into the first rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13312">Den första rektangeln expanderas så att den innehåller den andra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13312">The first rectangle is expanded to include the second.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13313">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13313">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13314">**first_rectangle:** Första rektangeln och kombinerad rektangel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13314">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle and combined rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13315">**second_rectangle**: Andra rektangeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13315">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13316">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13316">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13317">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Två rektanglar har kombinerats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13317">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully combined two rectangles</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13318">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig indatapekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13318">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13319">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13319">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13320">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13320">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13321">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13321">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE rect_a;

GX_RECTANGLE rect_b;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&rect_a, 0, 0, 100, 100);
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&rect_b, 50, 50, 200, 200);

/* Combine “my_rectangle_a” to “my_rectangle_b”. */
status = gx_utility_rectangle_combine(&rect_a, &rect_b);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “rect_a” is (0, 0, 200, 200) the merger
of the original “rect_a” and “rect_b”. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_compare"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13337">gx_utility_rectangle_compare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13337">gx_utility_rectangle_compare</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13338">Jämföra två rektanglar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13338">Compare two rectangles</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13339">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13339">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_compare( 
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13340">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13340">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13341">Den här tjänsten jämför den första och andra rektangeln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13341">This service compares the first and second rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13342">Om de är lika returneras värdet GX_TRUE värde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13342">If they are equal, a value of GX_TRUE is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13343">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13343">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13344">**first_rectangle:** Första rektangeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13344">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13345">**second_rectangle**: Andra rektangeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13345">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13346">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13346">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13347">**result**: GX_TRUE rektanglar är lika, annars GX_FALSE returneras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13347">**result**: GX_TRUE if rectangles are equal, otherwise GX_FALSE is returned.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13348">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13348">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13349">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13349">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13350">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13350">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Compare “my_rectangle_a” to “my_rectangle_b”. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_compare(&my_rectangle_a,
    &my_rectangle_b);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, the two rectangles are equal. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13366">gx_utility_rectangle_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13366">gx_utility_rectangle_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13367">Definiera en rektangel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13367">Define a rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13368">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13368">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_define(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE left,
    GX_VALUE top, 
    GX_VALUE right, 
    GX_VALUE bottom);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13369">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13369">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13370">Den här tjänsten definierar en rektangel som anges.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13370">This service defines a rectangle as specified.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13371">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13371">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13372">**rektangel:** Rektangelkontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13372">**rectangle**: Rectangle control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13373">**left**: Vänster mest koordinat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13373">**left**: Left most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13374">**översta:** Översta koordinaten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13374">**top**: Top most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13375">**right**: Höger mest koordinat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13375">**right**: Right most coordinate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13376">**längst ned:** Längst ned i koordinaten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13376">**bottom**: Bottom most coordinate</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13377">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13377">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13378">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) En rektangel har definierats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13378">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully defined a rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13379">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig rektangelpekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13379">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13380">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13380">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13381">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13381">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13382">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13382">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

GX_RECTANGLE my_rect;

/* Define “my_rect”. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_define(&my_rect, 10, 5, 200, 100);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rect” is defined. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13398">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13398">gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13400">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13400">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect(
    GX_RECTANGLE *first_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *second_rectangle,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_overlap_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13401">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13401">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13402">Den här tjänsten identifierar eventuell överlappning av de angivna rektanglarna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13402">This service detects any overlap of the supplied rectangles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13403">Om överlappningen hittas returnerar tjänsten GX_TRUE och den överlappande rektangeln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13403">If overlap is found, the service returns GX_TRUE and the overlapping rectangle.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13404">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13404">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13405">**first_rectangle:** Första rektangeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13405">**first_rectangle**: First rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13406">**second_rectangle**: Andra rektangeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13406">**second_rectangle**: Second rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13407">**return_overlap_area: Överlappande** rektangelområde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13407">**return_overlap_area**: Overlapping rectangle area</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13408">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13408">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13409">**result**: GX_TRUE rektanglar överlappar, annars GX_FALSE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13409">**result**: GX_TRUE if rectangles overlap, otherwise GX_FALSE.</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13410">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13410">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13411">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13411">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13412">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13412">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Detect overlap of “my_rectangle_a” and “my_rectangle_b”. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_overlap_detect(&my_rectangle_a,
    &my_rectangle_b,
    &my_overlap_area);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, “my_overlap_area” specifies the area the
rectangles overlap. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13428">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13428">gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13429">Identifiera om punkten finns i rektangeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13429">Detect if point resides in rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13430">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13430">Prototype</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_POINT point);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13431">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13431">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13432">Den här tjänsten identifierar om den angivna punkten finns i rektangeln.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13432">This service detects if the specified point resides in the rectangle.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13433">Om punkten finns i rektangeln returnerar tjänsten GX_TRUE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13433">If the point does reside in the rectangle, the service returns  GX_TRUE.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13434">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13434">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13435">**rektangel**: Rektangel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13435">**rectangle**: Rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13436">**point**: Punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13436">**point**: Point</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13437">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13437">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13438">**result**: GX_TRUE om punkten finns i rektangeln, annars GX_FALSE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13438">**result**: GX_TRUE if point resides in rectangle, otherwise GX_FALSE</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13439">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13439">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13440">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13440">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13441">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13441">Example</span></span>

```c
GX_RECTANGLE my_rectangle;

GX_POINT my_point;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&my_rectangle, 0, 0, 100, 100);

my_point.gx_point_x = 20; my_point.gx_point_y = 20;

/* Detect if point “my_point” is within “my_rectangle””. */
result = gx_utility_rectangle_point_detect(&my_rectangle,
    &my_point);

/* If result is GX_TRUE, “my_point” resides in the rectangle. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_resize"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13457">gx_utility_rectangle_resize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13457">gx_utility_rectangle_resize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13458">Utöka rektangel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13458">Grow rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13459">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13459">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_resize(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE adjust);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13460">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13460">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13461">Den här tjänsten ökar storleken på rektangeln som anges.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13461">This service increases the size of the rectangle as specified.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13462">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13462">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13463">**rektangel**: Pekare till rektangel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13463">**rectangle**: Pointer to rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13464">**justera**: Mängd för att justera rektangeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13464">**adjust**: Amount to adjust the rectangle</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13466">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Rektangelns storlek har ändrats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13466">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully resized the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13467">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig rektangel för indata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13467">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13468">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13468">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13469">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13469">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13470">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13470">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Adjust “my_rectangle” by increasing 20 pixels on four sides */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rectangle” is 20 pixels larger. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_rectangle_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13486">gx_utility_rectangle_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13486">gx_utility_rectangle_shift</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13487">Skift-rektangel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13487">Shift rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13488">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13488">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_rectangle_shift(
    GX_RECTANGLE *rectangle,
    GX_VALUE x_shift,
    GX_VALUE y_shift);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13489">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13489">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13490">Den här tjänsten flyttar rektangeln med de angivna värdena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13490">This service shifts the rectangle by the specified values.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13491">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13491">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13492">**rektangel**: Rektangel att skifta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13492">**rectangle**: Rectangle to shift</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13493">**x_shif:** Antal bildpunkter som ska flyttas på x-axeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13493">**x_shif**: Number of pixels to shift on the x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13494">**y_shift:** Antal bildpunkter som ska flyttas på y-axeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13494">**y_shift**: Number of pixels to shift on the y-axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13495">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13495">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13496">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Rektangeln har flyttats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13496">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully shifted the rectangle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13497">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig rektangel för indata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13497">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input rectangle pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13498">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13498">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13499">Alla</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13499">All</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13500">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13500">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT status;

/* Shift “my_rectangle”. */

status = gx_utility_rectangle_shift(&my_rectangle, 10, 20);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_rectangle” has been shifted. */
```

## <a name="gx_utility_string_to_alphamap"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13516">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13516">gx_utility_string_to_alphamap</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13517">Rendera sträng till en pixelkarta med 8bpp-alfakarta (inaktuell)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13517">Render string to an 8bpp alphamap type pixelmap (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13518">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13518">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(
    const GX_CHAR *text, const
    GX_FONT *font, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13519">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13519">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13520">Den här tjänsten har gjorts inaktuell och ersatts av gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13520">This service has been deprecated in favor of gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13521">Den här tjänsten renderar en textsträng till en alfakarta, som är en särskild form av 8bpp pixelkarta som endast innehåller alfavärden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13521">This service renders a text string to an alphamap, which is a special form of 8bpp pixelmap containing only alpha values.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13522">Den här tjänsten används vanligtvis tillsammans med gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate och gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw för att rita roterad text på arbetsytan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13522">This service is typically used along with gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw to draw rotated text to the canvas.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13523">Den här tjänsten beräknar den minnesstorlek som krävs för den resulterande alfakartan och anropar funktionen gx_system_memory_allocator() som definieras av programmet för att dynamiskt allokera minne.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13523">This service calculates the memory size needed for the resulting alphamap, and invokes the gx_system_memory_allocator() function defined by the application to dynamically allocate memory.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13524">Programmet måste anropa gx_system_memory_allocator_set() någon gång, vanligtvis under programstart, innan den här tjänsten används.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13524">The application must call gx_system_memory_allocator_set() at some point, usually during program startup, prior to using this service.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13525">Om en textsträng ska roteras och dras till arbetsytan bara en gång tillhandahålls tjänsten gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() som ett alternativ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13525">If a text string is to be rotated and drawn to the canvas just once, the service gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() is provided as an alternate.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13526">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() anropar gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate() och gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() för att rendera den roterade texten i en enda åtgärd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13526">gx_canvas_rotated_text_draw() will call gx_utility_string_to_alphamap(), gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(), and gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw() to render the rotated text in one operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13527">Men om samma text ritas flera gånger roteras i olika vinklar är det mer effektivt att skapa alfakartan när du använder gx_utility_string_to_alphmap-API:et och sedan rotera den resulterande alfakartan flera gånger efter behov.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13527">However if the same text will be drawn multiple times rotated at various angles, it is more efficient to create the alphamap once using the gx_utility_string_to_alphmap API, then rotate the resulting alphamap multiple times as needed.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13528">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13528">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13529">**text:** Textsträng som ska renderas till alfakarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13529">**text**: Text string to render to alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13530">**font**: Teckensnittet som ska vara för att rendera texten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13530">**font**: The font to be to render the text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13531">**return_map:** Pekare till GX_PIXELMAP som ska returneras till anroparen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13531">**return_map**: Pointer to the GX_PIXELMAP to be returned to the caller.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13532">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13532">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13533">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) En textsträng har renderats till en alfakarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13533">**GX_SUCCESS**: (0x00) Successfully rendered a text string to an alphamap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13534">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Ogiltig indatapekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13534">**GX_PTR_ERROR**: (0x07) Invalid input pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13535">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR:**(0x30) Minnesallokering/kostnadsfri funktion har inte definierats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13535">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR**: (0x30) Memory allocation/free function is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13536">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Ogiltig stränglängd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13536">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH**: (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13537">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13537">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13538">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13538">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13539">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13539">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP alphamap;

GX_PIXELMAP rotated_text;

INT xpos;

INT ypos;

gx_widget_font_get(widget, GX_FONT_ID_SCREEN_LABEL, &font);

/* render string to alphamap once */

gx_utility_string_to_alphamap("Hello World", font, &alphamap);

/* rotate and render the alphmap at multiple angles */

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 45, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(10, 10, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 135, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(100, 100, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 300, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(200, 200, &rotated_text);
```

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13564">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13564">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_STRING string;

GX_PIXELMAP alphamap;

GX_PIXELMAP rotated_text;

INT xpos;

INT ypos;

gx_widget_font_get(widget, GX_FONT_ID_SCREEN_LABEL, &font);

string.gx_string_ptr = “Hello World”;

string.gx_string_length = strlen(string.gx_string_ptr);

/* render string to alphamap once */
gx_utility_string_to_alphamap_ext(&string, font, &alphamap);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 45, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(10, 10, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 135, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(100, 100, &rotated_text);

gx_utility_pixelmap_rotate(&alphamap, 300, &rotated_text,
    &xpos, &ypos);

gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw(200, 200, &rotated_text);
```

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_children_position"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13580">gx_vertical_list_children_position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13580">gx_vertical_list_children_position</span></span>
### <a name="position-children-for-the-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13581">Placera underordnade för den lodräta listan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13581">Position children for the vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13582">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13582">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_children_position(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13583">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13583">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13584">Den här funktionen placerar underordnade för den lodräta listan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13584">This function positions the children for the vertical list.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13604">gx_vertical_list_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13604">gx_vertical_list_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13605">Skapa lodrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13605">Create vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13606">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13606">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_create(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name, 
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    INT total_rows,
    VOID (*callback)(GX_VERTICAL_LIST *, GX_WIDGET *, INT),
    ULONG style, USHORT vertical_list_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13607">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13607">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13608">Den här tjänsten skapar en lodrät lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13608">This service creates a vertical list.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13609">GX_VERTICAL_LIST härleds från GX_WINDOW och stöder alla gx_window API-tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13609">GX_VERTICAL_LIST is derived from GX_WINDOW and supports all gx_window API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13610">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13610">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13611">**vertical_list** Kontrollblock för lodrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13611">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13612">**namn** Namn på lodrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13612">**name** Name of vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13613">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13613">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13614">**total_rows** Totalt antal rader i lodrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13614">**total_rows** Total number of rows in vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13615">**motringning** En funktion som anropas av den lodräta listan när listan rullas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13615">**callback** A function that will be called by the vertical list when the list is scrolled.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13616">Anroparen bör först skapa tillräckligt många GX_WIDGET underordnade för att fylla de synliga listraderna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13616">The caller should initially create enough GX_WIDGET based children to fill the visible list rows.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13617">När listan rullas anropas den här funktionen för att skapa de underordnade listan som motsvarar det angivna listindexet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13617">As the list is scrolled, this function is called to re-create the list children corresponding to the supplied list index</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13618">**style** Stil på rullningslistswidgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13618">**style** Style of scrollbar widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13619">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widgetspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13619">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13620">**vertical_list_id** Programdefinierat ID för lodrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13620">**vertical_list_id** Application-defined ID of vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13621">**storlek** Dimensioner för lodrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13621">**size** Dimensions of vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13622">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13622">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13623">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Den lodräta listan har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13623">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully created the vertical list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13624">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13624">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13625">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13625">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13626">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** widgeten (0x13) har redan skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13626">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13627">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Ogiltig blockstorlek för widgetkontroll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13627">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13628">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Antal rader som inte är giltiga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13628">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Number of rows not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13629">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13629">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13632">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13632">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create vertical list “my_list” with 20 rows. */
status = gx_vertical_list_create(&my_list, “my_list”, &my_parent,
                    20, callback, GX_STYLE_WRAP, MY_LIST_ID,
                    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the vertical list “my_list” has been created. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13700">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13700">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_selected_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13713">gx_vertical_list_selected_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13713">gx_vertical_list_selected_set</span></span>
### <a name="assign-the-selected-entry-in-a-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13714">Tilldela den markerade posten i en lodrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13714">Assign the selected entry in a vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13715">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13715">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_selected_set(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    INT index);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13716">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13716">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13717">Den här tjänsten tilldelar den valda posten i en lodrät lista.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13717">This service assigns the selected entry in a vertical list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13718">Om det behövs bläddrar den lodräta listan för att göra den valda posten synlig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13718">If necessary, the vertical list will scroll to make the selected entry visible.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13719">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13719">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13720">**vertical_list** Kontrollblock för lodrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13720">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13721">**index** Indexbaserad position för ny listpost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13721">**index** Index based position of new list entry</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13722">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13722">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13723">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Ange den lodräta listposten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13723">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the vertical list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13724">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Indataindex hittades inte i listan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13724">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Input index not found in list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13725">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13725">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13726">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13726">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13727">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Lodrät lista eller listinmatningswidget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13727">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Vertical list or list entry widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13728">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13728">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13729">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13729">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13730">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13730">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the list entry of “my_list” to the child in line 12. */
status = gx_vertical_list_selected_set(&my_list, 12);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the list entry of “my_list” has been successfully set to 12. */
```

## <a name="gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13739">gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13739">gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-selected-widget-from-vertical-list"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13740">Hämta vald widget från den lodräta listan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13740">Get selected widget from vertical list</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13741">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13741">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get(
    GX_VERTICAL_LIST *vertical_list,
    GX_WIDGET **return_list_entry);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13742">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13742">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13743">Den här tjänsten returnerar den valda widgeten i den lodräta listan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13743">This service returns the selected widget of the vertical list.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13744">Observera att om listan innehåller fler rader än underordnade widgetar och den valda underordnade widgeten har rullats från vyn, returnerar den här funktionen GX_NULL som GX_WIDGET-pekare, eftersom widgeten har återanvändas för att visa en ny listpost.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13744">Note that if the list contains more rows than child widgets, and the selected child widget has been scrolled from view, this function will return GX_NULL as the GX_WIDGET pointer, since the widget has been reused to display a new list entry.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13745">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13745">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13746">**vertical_list** Kontrollblock för lodrät lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13746">**vertical_list** Vertical list widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13747">**return_list_entry** Mål för widget för returlista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13747">**return_list_entry** Destination for return list entry widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13748">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13748">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13749">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Hämta den lodräta listposten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13749">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully get the vertical list entry</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13750">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Den valda widgeten har rullats från vyn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13750">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) The selected widget has been scrolled from view.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13751">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13751">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13752">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13752">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13753">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13753">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13754">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13754">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13755">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13755">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *current_selected_widget;

/* Get the list entry at the current index of vertical list “my_list”. */
status = gx_vertical_list_selected_widget_get(&my_list, &current_selected_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “current_list_entry” contains a pointer to the currently selected widget. */
```

```C
    GX_WINDOW *parent,
    GX_SCROLLBAR_APPEARANCE *appearance,
    ULONG style);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13792">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13792">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13793">Den här tjänsten skapar en lodrät rullningslist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13793">This service creates a vertical scrollbar.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13798">**utseende** Utseendet på den lodräta rullningslistswidgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13798">**appearance** Appearance of vertical scrollbar widget.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13799">**style (stil)** Rullningslistens format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13799">**style** Style of the scrollbar.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13803">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13803">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_allocate"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13816">gx_widget_allocate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13816">gx_widget_allocate</span></span>
### <a name="allocate-a-widget-control-block"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13817">Allokera ett widgetkontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13817">Allocate a widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13818">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13818">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_allocate(
    GX_WIDGET **control_block,
    ULONG memsize);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13819">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13819">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13820">Den här tjänsten allokerar dynamiskt ett widgetkontrollblock genom att anropa den programdefinierade minnesallokeringsfunktionen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13820">This service dynamically allocates a widget control block, by calling the application defined memory allocation function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13821">Den här tjänsten används främst av de funktioner som genereras av GUIX Studio för att dynamiskt allokera kontrollblock när egenskapen "Dynamisk allokering" väljs i GUIX Studio-egenskapsvyn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13821">This service is primarily used by the functions generated by GUIX Studio to dynamically allocate control block when the “Dynamic Allocation” property is selected in the GUIX Studio properties view.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13822">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13822">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13823">**control_block** Pekare till returnerad kontrollblockspekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13823">**control_block** Pointer to returned control block pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13824">**memsize** Kontrollera blockstorleken i byte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13824">**memsize** Control block size, in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13825">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13825">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13826">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Allokera en lyckad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13826">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget allocate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13827">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Minnestilldelning har inte definierats eller minnesallokeringen misslyckades</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13827">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13828">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13828">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13829">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29) Minnesstorleken är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13829">**GX_INVALID_MEMORY_SIZE** (0x29) Memory size not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13830">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13830">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13831">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13831">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C

/* Attach “my_widget” to “my_parent”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the button widget control block is allocated. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_attach"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13870">gx_widget_attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13870">gx_widget_attach</span></span>
### <a name="attach-widget-to-its-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13871">Koppla widgeten till dess överordnade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13871">Attach widget to its parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13872">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13872">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_attach(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13873">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13873">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13874">Den här tjänsten kopplar widgeten till den angivna överordnade komponenten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13874">This service attaches the widget to the specified parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13875">Om widgeten redan är kopplad till en annan överordnad, kopplas den först från.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13875">If the widget is already attached to another parent, it is first detached.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13876">Om widgeten redan är ansluten till samma överordnade funktion gör funktionen ingenting.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13876">If the widget is already attached to the same parent, the function does nothing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13877">Widgeten blir det överordnade objektet längst fram när det gäller z-ordning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13877">The widget becomes the front-most child of its parent in terms of z ordering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13878">Om widgetar på samma sätt överlappar varandra ritas den här widgeten ovanpå på samma sätt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13878">If sibling widgets overlap, this widget is drawn on top of siblings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13879">Om du vill placera den nya widgeten i z-ordningen använder du gx_widget_back_attach eller gx_widget_back_move.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13879">To put the new widget in the back of the z-order, use gx_widget_back_attach or gx_widget_back_move.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13880">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13880">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13881">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13881">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13882">**widget** Pekare till underordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13882">**widget** Pointer to child widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13883">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13883">Return Values</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13928">gx_widget_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13928">gx_widget_background_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-a-widget-background"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13929">Rita en widgetbakgrund</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13929">Draw a widget background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13930">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13930">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_background_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13931">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13931">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13932">Den här tjänsten utför en heldragen färgfyllning av en widgetbakgrund.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13932">This service performs a solid color fill of a widget background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13933">Den här tjänsten anropas automatiskt av gx_widget_draw-funktionen, men kan också anropas av programmet som en del av en anpassad widgetritning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13933">This service is automatically called by the gx_widget_draw function, but may also be invoked by the application as part of a customized widget drawing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13934">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13934">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13935">**widget** Pekare till widget som ska ritas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13935">**widget** Pointer to widget to be drawn</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13936">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13936">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13937">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13937">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13938">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13938">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13939">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13939">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13940">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13940">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
    /* Call default widget background draw. */
    gx_widget_background_draw(widget);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */

    /* Draw child widgets. */
    gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_back_attach"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13978">gx_widget_back_attach</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13978">gx_widget_back_attach</span></span>
### <a name="attach-widget-to-its-parent"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13979">Koppla widgeten till dess överordnade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13979">Attach widget to its parent</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13980">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13980">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_back_attach(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13981">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13981">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13982">Den här tjänsten kopplar widgeten till den angivna överordnade.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13982">This service attaches the widget to the specified parent.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13983">Om widgeten redan är ansluten till en annan överordnad, kopplas den först från.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13983">If the widget is already attached to another parent, it is first detached.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13984">Om widgeten redan är ansluten till samma överordnade funktion gör funktionen ingenting.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13984">If the widget is already attached to the same parent, the function does nothing.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13985">Widgeten blir det underordnade objektet till den överordnade widgeten när det gäller z-ordning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13985">The widget becomes the back-most child of its parent in terms of z ordering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13986">Om widgetar på samma sätt överlappar varandra ritas den här widgeten bakom dessa på samma sätt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13986">If sibling widgets overlap, this widget is drawn behind those siblings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13987">Om du vill placera den nya widgeten framför z-ordningen använder du gx_widget_attach eller gx_widget_front_move.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13987">To put the new widget in the front of the z-order, use gx_widget_attach or gx_widget_front_move.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13988">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13988">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13989">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13989">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13990">**widget** Pekare till underordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13990">**widget** Pointer to child widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13991">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13991">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13992">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13992">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget attach</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-13993">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-13993">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
