## <a name="gx_widget_back_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14036">gx_widget_back_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14036">gx_widget_back_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-widget-to-back"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14037">Flytta widgeten till bakåt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14037">Move widget to back</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14038">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14038">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_back_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_BOOL *return_widget_moved);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14039">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14039">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14040">Den här tjänsten flyttar widgeten till bakåt i den överordnades Z-ordning för underordnade widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14040">This service moves the widget to the back in the parent's Z-order of child widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14041">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14041">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14042">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14042">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14043">**return_widget_moved** Pekare till mål för flaggan som anger att widgeten har flyttats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14043">**return_widget_moved** Pointer to destination for flag indicating the widget was moved</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14044">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14044">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14045">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) En lyckad widget flyttas till bakåt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14045">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to the back</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14046">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14046">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14047">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14047">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14048">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) Inga ändringar tillämpas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14048">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) No changes are applied</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14049">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14049">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14050">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14050">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14051">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14051">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14052">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14052">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move “my_widget” to the back. */
status = gx_widget_back_move(&my_widget, &moved_flag);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “moved_flag” is GX_TRUE, the widget “my_widget” was moved to the back. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_block_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14089">gx_widget_block_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14089">gx_widget_block_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-a-rectangular-block-of-pixels"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14090">Flytta ett rektangulärt block med bildpunkter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14090">Move a rectangular block of pixels</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14091">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14091">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_block_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RECTANGLE *block,
    INT xshift, INT yshift);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14092">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14092">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14093">Den här tjänsten flyttar ett rektangulärt block med bildpunkter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14093">This service moves a rectangular block of pixels.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14094">Den här tjänsten används oftast för att implementera snabb bläddring.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14094">This service is most often used to implement fast scrolling.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14095">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14095">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14096">**widget** Pekare till widget som begär blockflyttning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14096">**widget** Pointer to widget requesting block move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14097">**blockera** Rektangel-begränsningsblock som ska flyttas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14097">**block** Rectangle bounding block to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14098">**xshift** X-skiftbeloppet i bildpunkter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14098">**xshift** The x shift amount in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14099">**yshift** Y-skiftbeloppet i bildpunkter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14099">**yshift** The y shift amount in pixels</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14100">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14100">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14101">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) En lyckad widget flyttas till bakåt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14101">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to the back</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_border_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14145">gx_widget_border_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14145">gx_widget_border_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget-border"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14146">Rita widget-kantlinje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14146">Draw widget border</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14147">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14147">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_border_draw(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_COLOR border_color,
    GX_COLOR upper_fill, 
    GX_COLOR lower_fill, 
    GX_BOOL fill);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14148">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14148">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14149">Den här tjänsten ritar widgetens kantlinje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14149">This service draws the widget border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14150">Den här tjänsten anropas vanligtvis som en del av en widgetritning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14150">This service is normally invoked as part of a widget drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14151">Den här tjänsten tolkar widgetens kantlinjeflaggor så att de inte ritar någon kantlinje, en tunn kantlinje, en upphöjd kantlinje, en flaggad kantlinje eller en tjock kantlinje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14151">This service interprets the widget border style flags to draw no border, a thin border, a raised border, a recessed border, or a thick border.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14152">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14152">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14153">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14153">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14154">**border_color** Färg på kantlinje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14154">**border_color** Color of border.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14155">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14155">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14156">Observera att programmet kan lägga till anpassade färger också.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14156">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14157">**upper_fill** Färg på övre fyllning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14157">**upper_fill** Color of upper fill.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14158">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14158">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14159">Observera att programmet kan lägga till anpassade färger också.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14159">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14160">**lower_fill** Färg på lägre fyllning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14160">**lower_fill** Color of lower fill.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14161">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14161">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14162">Observera att programmet kan lägga till anpassade färger också.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14162">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14163">**fill** Den här booleska flaggan anger om widgetområdet ska fyllas med angivna fyllningsfärger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14163">**fill** This boolean flag indicates whether or not the widget area should be filled with the supplied fill colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14164">Om det här värdet GX_FALSE ritas endast widgetens kantlinje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14164">If this value is GX_FALSE, only the widget border is drawn.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14165">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14165">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14166">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14166">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14167">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14167">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14168">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14168">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14169">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14169">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
      /* Call widget border draw. */
      gx_widget_border_draw(widget, GX_COLOR_BLACK,
                            GX_COLOR_GREEN, GX_COLOR_BLUE,
                            GX_TRUE);

      /* Add your own drawing here. */

      /* Draw child widgets. */
      Gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_border_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14206">gx_widget_border_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14206">gx_widget_border_style_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-border-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14207">Ange kantformat för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14207">Set widget border style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14208">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14208">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14209">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14209">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14210">Den här tjänsten anger widgetens kantlinjeformat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14210">This service sets the widget border style.</span></span>

### <a name="get-widget-border-width"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14260">Hämta bredd på widgetens kantlinje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14260">Get widget border width</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14261">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14261">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_border_width_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_VALUE *return_width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14262">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14262">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14263">Den här tjänsten hämtar widgetens kantlinjebredd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14263">This service gets the widget border width.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14264">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14264">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14265">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14265">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14266">**return_width** Pekare till mål för widgetens kantlinjebredd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14266">**return_width** Pointer to destination for widget border width</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14267">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14267">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14269">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14269">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14270">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14270">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14271">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14271">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14272">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14272">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14273">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14273">Example</span></span>

```C

/* Get border width of “my_widget”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_width” contains the border width of the widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_canvas_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14310">gx_widget_canvas_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14310">gx_widget_canvas_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-canvas"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14311">Hämta widgetarbetsyta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14311">Get widget canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14312">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14312">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_canvas_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_CANVAS **return_canvas)
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14313">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14313">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14314">Den här tjänsten returnerar en pekare till arbetsytan där widgeten återges.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14314">This service returns a pointer to the canvas onto which this widget is rendered.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14315">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14315">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14316">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14316">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14317">**return_canvas** Pekare till mål för widgetens arbetsyta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14317">**return_canvas** Pointer to destination for widget’s canvas</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14318">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14318">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14319">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad widget-arbetsyta hämta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14319">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget canvas get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14320">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Widget-arbetsytan hittades inte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14320">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) Widget canvas not found</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_child_detect"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14363">gx_widget_child_detect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14363">gx_widget_child_detect</span></span>
### <a name="detect-widget-child"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14364">Identifiera underordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14364">Detect widget child</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14365">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14365">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_child_detect(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_WIDGET *child,
    GX_BOOL *return_detect);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14366">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14366">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14367">Den här tjänsten identifierar om widgeten är underordnad den överordnade widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14367">This service detects if the widget is a child of the parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14368">Den här tjänsten kapslas för att söka efter underordnade till underordnade objekt och returnerar TRUE om den överordnade widgeten på någon nivå är en överordnad för den underordnade widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14368">This service nests to search children of children, and returns TRUE if the parent widget is at any level an ancestor of the child widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14369">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14369">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14370">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14370">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14371">**underordnad** Pekare till underordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14371">**child** Pointer to child widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14372">**return_detect** Pekare till mål för identifiering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14372">**return_detect** Pointer to destination for detection</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14373">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14373">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14374">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad underordnad widgetidentifiering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14374">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget child detection</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14375">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14375">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14376">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Överordnad eller underordnad widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14376">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Parent or child widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14377">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14377">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14378">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14378">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14379">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14379">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL detected;

/* Determine if “my_child” is a child of “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_child_detect(&my_widget, &my_child, &detected);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “detected” is GX_TRUE, “my_child” is a child of widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_children_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14416">gx_widget_children_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14416">gx_widget_children_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget-children"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14417">Underordnade rita widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14417">Draw widget children</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14418">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14418">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_children_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14419">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14419">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14420">Den här tjänsten ritar alla underordnade till den överordnade widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14420">This service draws all children of the parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14421">Den här tjänsten anropas vanligtvis av alla standardwidgetritningsfunktioner för att rita befintliga underordnade widgetar och bör anropas av alla anpassade ritningsfunktioner för att tillåta att underordnade widgetar kopplas till din anpassade överordnade widgettyp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14421">This service is normally invoked by all standard widget drawing functions to draw any existing child widgets, and should be invoked by any custom drawing functions to allow child widgets to be attached to your custom parent widget type.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14422">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14422">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14423">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14423">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14424">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14424">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14425">**Ingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14425">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14426">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14426">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14427">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14427">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14428">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14428">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET * widget)
{
        /* Call default widget background draw. */
        gx_widget_background_draw(widget);

        /* Add your own drawing here. */

        /* Draw child widgets. */
        gx_widget_children_draw(widget);
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_client_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14465">gx_widget_client_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14465">gx_widget_client_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-client-area"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14466">Hämta klientområde för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14466">Get widget client area</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14467">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14467">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_client_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_VALUE border_width,
    GX_RECTANGLE *return_client_area);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14468">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14468">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14469">Den här tjänsten beräknar klientområdet för widgeten genom att subtrahera widgetens kantlinjebredd från den övergripande widgetstorleken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14469">This service computes the client area of widget by subtracting the widget border width from the overall widget size.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14470">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14470">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14471">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14471">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14472">**border_width** Bredden på widgetens kantlinje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14472">**border_width** Width of widget border</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14473">**return_client_area** Mål för att returnera klientområde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14473">**return_client_area** Destination for returning client area</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14474">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14474">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14475">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckade widgetklientområdet get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14475">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget client area get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14476">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14476">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14477">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14477">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14478">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Widget-kantlinjen är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14478">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Widget border not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14479">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14479">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14480">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14480">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14481">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14481">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE client_area
/* Get client area of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_client_get(&my_widget, my_widget_width,
                              &client_area);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the “client_area” is the client area of “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_color_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14518">gx_widget_color_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14518">gx_widget_color_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-color"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14519">Hämta färg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14519">Get color</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14520">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14520">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_color_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_COLOR *return_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14521">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14521">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14522">Den här tjänsten hämtar färgen som är associerad med det angivna resurs-ID:t.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14522">This service gets the color associated with the supplied resource ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14523">Den här tjänsten bör endast anropas av synliga widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14523">This service should only be called by visible widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14524">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14524">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14525">**widget** Pekare till widgetkontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14525">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14526">**resource_id** Resurs-ID för färg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14526">**resource_id** Resource ID of color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14527">**Bilaga B** innehåller fördefinierade resurs-ID:er för färg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14527">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14528">Observera att programmet även kan lägga till anpassade resurs-ID:n för färg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14528">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14529">**return_color** Pekare till mål för färg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14529">**return_color** Pointer to destination for color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14530">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade färger.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14530">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined colors.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14531">Observera att programmet kan lägga till anpassade färger också.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14531">Note that the application may add custom colors as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14532">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14532">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14533">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad färg get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14533">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14534">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Ogiltigt resurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14534">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14535">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget-arbetsytan är inte giltig eller widgeten är osynlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14535">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14536">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14536">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14537">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14537">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14538">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14538">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14539">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14539">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14540">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14540">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR actual_color;

/* Get color for resource ID MY_FIRST_COLOR_ID. */
status = gx_widget_color_get(my_widget, MY_FIRST_COLOR_RESOURCE_ID,
                            &actual_color);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the actual color is contained in “actual_color”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14544">gx_widget_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14544">gx_widget_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14545">Skapa widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14545">Create widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14546">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14546">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_create(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT widget_id,
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14547">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14547">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14548">Den här tjänsten skapar en widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14548">This service creates a widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14549">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14549">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14550">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14550">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14551">**namn** Logiskt namn på widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14551">**name** Logical name of widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14552">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14552">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14553">**style (stil)** Stil.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14553">**style** Style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14554">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widgetspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14554">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14555">**widget_id** Programdefinierat ID för widgeten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14555">**widget_id** Application-defined ID of the widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14556">**storlek** Widgetens storlek</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14556">**size** Size of the widget</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14559">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14559">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14566">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14566">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET my_widget;
GX_RECTANGLE size;

gx_utility_rectangle_define(&size, 0, 0, 100, 100);

/* Get client area of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_create(&my_widget, "my widget",
                          &my_parent_window, GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED, MY_WIDGET_ID, &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the widget “my_widget” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_created_test"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14603">gx_widget_created_test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14603">gx_widget_created_test</span></span>
### <a name="test-if-widget-created"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14604">Testa om widget har skapats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14604">Test if widget created</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14605">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14605">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_created_test(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_BOOL *return_test);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14606">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14606">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14607">Den här tjänsten testar för att avgöra om widgeten har skapats tidigare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14607">This service tests to determine if the widget has previously been created.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14608">Om inga fel påträffas returnerar den här funktionen GX_SUCCESS, oavsett om widgeten har skapats än eller inte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14608">If no errors are encountered, this function return GX_SUCCESS, regardless if the widget is created yet or not.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14609">Resultatet av testet finns i return_test pekaren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14609">The result of the test is in the return_test pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14610">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14610">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14611">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14611">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14612">**return_test** Mål för testresultat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14612">**return_test** Destination for test result</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14613">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14613">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14614">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Slutfört test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14614">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful test completion</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14615">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14615">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14616">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14616">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14617">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14617">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14618">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14618">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL was_created;

/* Test to see if widget “my_widget” is created. */
status = gx_widget_created_test(&my_widget, &was_created);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, no error occurred. If “was_created” is
GX_TRUE, the widget “my_widget” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14757">gx_widget_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14757">gx_widget_draw</span></span>
### <a name="draw-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14758">Rita widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14758">Draw widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14759">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14759">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14760">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14760">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14761">Den här tjänsten ritar widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14761">This service draws the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14762">Den här funktionen anropas vanligtvis internt av GUIX-mekanismen för arbetsyteuppdatering, men exponeras för programmet för att hjälpa till med implementeringen av anpassade ritningsfunktioner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14762">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom widget draw function. */

VOID my_custom_widget_draw(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
      /* Call default widget draw. */
      gx_widget_draw(widget);

      /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_draw_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14806">gx_widget_draw_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14806">gx_widget_draw_set</span></span>
### <a name="assign-the-widget-drawing-function"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14807">Tilldela widgetens ritningsfunktion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14807">Assign the widget drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14808">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14808">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_draw_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    VOID (*drawing_function) (GX_WIDGET *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14809">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14809">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14810">Den här tjänsten åsidosätter standardritningsfunktionen för widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14810">This service overrides the default drawing function of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14811">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14811">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14812">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14812">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14813">**drawing_function** Pekare till ritningsfunktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14813">**drawing_function** Pointer to drawing function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14814">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14814">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14815">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Åsidosättning av funktion för att rita widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14815">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget drawing function override</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14816">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14816">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14817">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14817">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14818">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14818">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14819">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14819">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14820">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14820">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14821">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14821">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function. */
VOID my_drawing_function(GX_WIDGET *widget)
{
      /* Add your own drawing here. */
}

/* Set the drawing function of widget “my_widget” to “my_drawing_function”. */
status = gx_widget_draw_set(&my_widget, my_drawing_function);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has the drawning function “my_drawing_function”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_generate"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14858">gx_widget_event_generate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14858">gx_widget_event_generate</span></span>
### <a name="generate-widget-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14859">Generera widgethändelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14859">Generate widget event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14860">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14860">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_generate(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    USHORT event_type, LONG value);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14861">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14861">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14862">Den här tjänsten genererar GX_SIGNAL typ av händelse, som är en viss typ eller klass av GX_EVENT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14862">This service generates a GX_SIGNAL type of event, which is a particular type or class of GX_EVENT.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14863">gx_widget_event_generate() kodar 16-bitars widget-ID:t tillsammans med det som skickas i event_type till ett enda 32-bitars GX_EVENT.gx_event_type-värde.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14863">gx_widget_event_generate() encodes the 16 bit widget ID, along with the passed in event_type, into a single 32 bit GX_EVENT.gx_event_type value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14864">Värdeparametern kodas till den genererade gx_event.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14864">The value parameter is encoded into the generated gx_event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14865">gx_event_payload.gx_event_longdata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14865">gx_event_payload.gx_event_longdata field.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14866">Det genererade event.gx_event_target alltid läses in med den anropande widgetens överordnade, vilket innebär att den genererade händelsen alltid skickas först till den överordnade widgeten för den genererande widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14866">The generated event.gx_event_target field is always loaded with the calling widget’s parent, meaning the generated event is always sent first to the parent of the generating widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14867">Observera att gx_widget_event_generate endast ska användas för att skicka GX_SIGNAL intervallhändelsetyper.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14867">Note that gx_widget_event_generate should only be used to send GX_SIGNAL range event types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14868">För alla andra händelsetyper, inklusive användardefinierade händelsetyper, använder du API:et gx_system_event_send() som ger fullständig kontroll över alla fält i händelsen som pushas i GUIX-händelsekön.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14868">For all  other event types, including user defined event types, use the gx_system_event_send() API, which grants full control over every field of the event pushed in the GUIX event queue.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14871">**event_type** Typ av händelse.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14871">**event_type** Type of event.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14872">**Bilaga E** innehåller fördefinierade GUIX-händelser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14872">**Appendix E** contains pre-defined GUIX events.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14873">Ytterligare händelser kan läggas till av programmet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14873">Additional events may be added by the application.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14874">**värde** Ytterligare händelseinformation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14874">**value** Additional event information</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14920">gx_widget_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14920">gx_widget_event_process</span></span>
### <a name="process-widget-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14921">Händelse för processwidget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14921">Process widget event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14922">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14922">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_process(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14923">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14923">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14924">Det här är standardfunktionen för händelsebearbetning för alla widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14924">This is the default event processing function for all widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14925">När en anpassad händelsebearbetningsfunktion skrivs bör standardåtgärden för alla händelsetyper alltid vara att skicka händelsen till den widgettyp som en widget baseras på.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14925">When a custom event processing function is written, the default action for any event type should always be to pass the event to the widget type upon which a widget is based.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14926">Widgetar som baseras på de mest grundläggande GX_WIDGET typ använder gx_widget_event_process som standardfunktion för händelsebearbetning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14926">Widgets that are based on the most basic GX_WIDGET type pass use gx_widget_event_process as their default event processing function.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14927">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14927">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14928">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14928">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14929">**händelse** Pekare till händelse som ska bearbetas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14929">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14930">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14930">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14931">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad widgethändelsebearbetning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14931">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event processing</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14932">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14932">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14933">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14933">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14934">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14934">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14935">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14935">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14936">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14936">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14937">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14937">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Process event “my_event” for widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_event_process(&my_widget, &my_event);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the event “my_event” for widget “my_widget” has been processed. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_event_process_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14974">gx_widget_event_process_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14974">gx_widget_event_process_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-event-processing-function-of-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14975">Ange händelsebearbetningsfunktion för widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14975">Set event processing function of widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14976">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14976">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_process_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    UINT (*event_processing) (GX_WIDGET *, GX_EVENT *));
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14977">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14977">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14978">Den här tjänsten åsidosätter händelsebearbetningsfunktionen för widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14978">This service overrides the event processing function of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14979">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14979">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14980">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14980">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14981">**event_processing** Pekare till ny händelsebearbetningsfunktion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14981">**event_processing** Pointer to new event processing function</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14982">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14982">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14983">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Åsidosättning av lyckad widget-händelsebearbetning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14983">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget event processing override</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14984">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14984">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14985">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14985">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14986">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14986">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14987">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14987">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-14988">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-14988">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT my_event_process(GX_TREE_VIEW *tree_view,
                      GX_EVENT *event)
{
      UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

      switch(event->gx_event_type)
      {
      case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;

      default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default tree view
               event processing */
            status = gx_tree_view_event_process(tree_view, event);
            break;
      }
      return status;
}

/* Use “my_event_process” to process events for widget “my_tree_view”. */
status = gx_widget_event_process_set((GX_WIDGET *)&my_tree_view,
                    (VOID (*)(GX_WIDGET *))my_event_process);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS all event processing for widget “my_tree_view” is handled by “my_event_process”. */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15027">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15027">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_event_to_parent(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15028">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15028">Description</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15032">**händelse** Pekare till händelsen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15032">**event** Pointer to the event</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15036">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15036">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15037">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15037">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15038">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15038">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15039">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15039">Example</span></span>


```C
UINT gx_widget_fill_color_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID normal_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID selected_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID disabled_color_id);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15079">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15079">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15080">Den här tjänsten anger bakgrundsfärgerna för widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15080">This service sets the widget background colors.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15081">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15081">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15082">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15082">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15083">**normal_color_id** Resurs-ID för fyllningsfärgen i normalt tillstånd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15083">**normal_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color in normal state.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15084">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade resurs-ID:er för färg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15084">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15085">Observera att programmet kan lägga till anpassade resurs-ID:n för färg också.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15085">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15086">**selected_color_id** Resurs-ID för fyllningsfärgen när widgeten får fokus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15086">**selected_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color when the widget gain focus.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15087">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade resurs-ID:er för färg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15087">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15088">Observera att programmet kan lägga till anpassade resurs-ID:n för färg också.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15088">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15089">**disabled_color_id** Resurs-ID för fyllningsfärgen när GX_STYLE_ENABLED inte har angetts.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15089">**disabled_color_id** Resource ID of the fill color when the style GX_STYLE_ENABLED is not set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15090">**Bilaga A** innehåller fördefinierade resurs-ID:er för färg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15090">**Appendix A** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15091">Observera att programmet kan lägga till anpassade resurs-ID:n för färg också.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15091">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15094">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15094">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15095">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15095">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

```C
                    GX_COLOR_ID_NORMAL_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_SELECTED_FILL,
                    GX_COLOR_ID_DISABLED_FILL);
```

## <a name="gx_widget_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15136">gx_widget_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15136">gx_widget_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-child-widget-of-parent-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15137">Hitta underordnad widget för överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15137">Find child widget of parent widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15138">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15138">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_find(
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    USHORT widget_id,
    INT search_depth, 
    GX_WIDGET **return_widget);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15139">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15139">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15140">Den här tjänsten söker igenom underordnade objekt till den angivna överordnade och letar efter en widget med det begärda ID-värdet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15140">This service searches through the children of the specified parent looking for a widget with the  requested ID value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15141">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15141">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15142">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget som sökningen startas från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15142">**parent** Pointer to parent widget from which search is started</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15143">**widget_id** Widget-ID att söka efter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15143">**widget_id** Widget ID to search for</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15144">**search_depth** Definierar den rekursiva kapslingsnivå där funktionen söker efter underordnade widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15144">**search_depth** Defines the recursive nesting level into which the function will search child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15145">Om det här värdet <= 0 genomsöks endast omedelbara underordnade till den överordnade widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15145">If this value is <= 0, only immediate children of the parent widget are searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15146">Om det här GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE söks alla underordnade till alla underordnade widgetar igenom.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15146">If this value is GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE, all children of all child widgets are exhaustively searched.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15147">För andra värden > 0 begränsar det här värdet hur djupt kapslat funktionen söker igenom underordnade widgetar som har sökts efter det begärda widget-ID:t.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15147">For any other value > 0, this value limits how deeply nested this function will search through child widgets looked for the requested widget ID.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15148">**return_widget** Pekare till mål för hittad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15148">**return_widget** Pointer to destination for found widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15149">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15149">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15150">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Hitta en lyckad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15150">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15151">**GX_NOT_FOUND** widget (0x09) inte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15151">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Widget not fount</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15152">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15152">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15153">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15153">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15154">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15154">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15155">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15155">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15156">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15156">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET *widget_found;

/* Find widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_find(&my_widget, GX_SEARCH_DEPTH_INFINITE
                        MY_WIDGET_ID, &widget_found);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pointer “widget_found” contains the pointer to the widget found. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_first_child_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15193">gx_widget_first_child_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15193">gx_widget_first_child_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-first-child-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15194">Gå tillbaka till den första underordnade widgeten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15194">Return pointer to first child widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15195">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15195">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_first_child_get(
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15196">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15196">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15197">GUIX har en trädstrukturerad lista över överordnade och underordnade widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15197">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15198">Den här tjänsten returnerar en pekare till den första underordnade widgeten för den överordnade widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15198">This service returns a pointer to the first child widget of the parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15199">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15199">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15200">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15200">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15201">**widget_return** Pekare för att returnera widget-pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15201">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15202">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15202">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15203">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) returnerad pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15203">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15204">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Felaktig widget-pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15204">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15205">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Ogiltig widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15205">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15206">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15206">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15207">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15207">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15208">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15208">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve child widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_child_widget(GX_WIDGET *parent)
{
      GX_WIDGET *child;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_first_child_get(parent, &child);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
            return child;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15213">gx_widget_previous_sibling_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15213">gx_widget_previous_sibling_get</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_focus_next"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15215">gx_widget_focus_next</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15215">gx_widget_focus_next</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15217">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15217">Prototype</span></span>


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15218">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15218">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15219">Den här tjänsten flyttar fokus till nästa widget på samma nivå i den länkade listan över widgetar som accepterar fokus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15219">This service moves focus to the next sibling widget in the linked list of widgets that accept focus.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15220">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15220">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15221">**widget** Pekare till widgetkontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15221">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15222">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15222">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15223">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) fokus har flyttats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15223">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) focus was moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15224">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) fokus har inte flyttats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15224">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) focus was not moved</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15225">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig widget-pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15225">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15226">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15226">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15227">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Ogiltig widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15227">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15228">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15228">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15229">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15229">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15230">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15230">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Move focus to next widget in navigation order. */ status =
gx_widget_focus_next(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the focus has been moved to the next
```

## <a name="gx_widget_font_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15248">gx_widget_font_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15248">gx_widget_font_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-font-for-specified-resource-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15249">Hämta teckensnitt för angivet resurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15249">Get font for specified resource ID</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15250">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15250">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_font_get(
    GX_WIDGETG *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_FONT **return_font);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15251">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15251">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15252">Den här tjänsten hämtar teckensnittet som är associerat med det angivna resurs-ID:t från teckensnittstabellen på skärmen där widgeten visas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15252">This service retrieves the font associated with the specified resource ID from the font table of the display on which this widget is visible.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15253">Den här funktionen ska bara anropas av en synlig widget.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15253">This function should only be called by a visible widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15254">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15254">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15255">**widget** Pekare till widgetkontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15255">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15256">**resource_id** Resurs-ID för teckensnitt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15256">**resource_id** Resource ID of font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15257">**return_font** Pekare till mål för teckensnittspekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15257">**return_font** Pointer to destination for font pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15258">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15258">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15259">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Teckensnittet har hämtats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15259">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15260">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Ogiltigt resurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15260">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15261">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget-arbetsytan är inte giltig eller widgeten är osynlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15261">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15262">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig widget-pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15262">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15263">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15263">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15264">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15264">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15265">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15265">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15266">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15266">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *my_font;
/* Get font for MY_FONT_ID. */
status = gx_widget_font_get(widget, MY_FONT_RESOURCE_ID, &my_font);
/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font pointer has been retrieved in “my_font”. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15278">**return_font** Pekare till mål för teckensnittspekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15278">**return_font** Pointer to destination for font pointer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15282">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig widget-pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15282">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15283">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15283">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15284">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15284">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15285">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15285">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_WIDGET widget;
UINT status;

status = gx_widget_allocate(&widget, sizeof(GX_WIDGET))

/* Free a runtime allocated widget. */
if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
{
      status = gx_widget_free(widget);
}

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the memory that allocated to the widget has been released. */
```
