## <a name="gx_widget_front_move"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15322">gx_widget_front_move</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15322">gx_widget_front_move</span></span>
### <a name="move-widget-to-front"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15323">Flytta widget till front</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15323">Move widget to front</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15324">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15324">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_front_move(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_BOOL *return_moved);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15325">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15325">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15326">Den här tjänsten flyttar widgeten till fronten i den överordnade Z-ordningens lista över underordnade widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15326">This service moves the widget to the front in the parent Z-order list of child widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15327">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15327">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15328">**widget** Pekare till widget att flytta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15328">**widget** Pointer to widget to move</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15329">**return_moved** Pekare till mål för indikationswidgeten har flyttats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15329">**return_moved** Pointer to destination for indication widget was moved</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15330">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15330">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15331">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad widget flytta fram</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15331">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget move to front</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15332">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15332">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15333">**GX_NO_CHANGE** widget (0x08) redan framför</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15333">**GX_NO_CHANGE** (0x08) Widget already in front</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15334">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15334">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15335">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15335">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15336">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15336">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15337">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15337">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15338">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15338">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL widget_moved;

/* Move widget “my_widget” to the front. */
status = gx_widget_front_move(&my_widget, &widget_moved);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS and “widget_moved” is GX_TRUE, the
widget “my_widget” was moved to the front . */
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15377">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15377">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_height_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    UINT *return_height);
```

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15379">Den här tjänsten hämtar widgetens höjd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15379">This service gets the widget height.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_hide"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15427">gx_widget_hide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15427">gx_widget_hide</span></span>
### <a name="hide-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15428">Dölj widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15428">Hide widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15429">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15429">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_hide(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15430">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15430">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15431">Den här tjänsten döljer widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15431">This service hides the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15432">Den här widgeten är fortfarande kopplad till den överordnade, men den är inte tillåten att rita på arbetsytan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15432">This widget is still attached to it's parent, but it is not allowed to draw on the canvas.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15433">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15433">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15434">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15434">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15435">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15435">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15436">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Dölj en lyckad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15436">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget hide</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15437">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15437">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15438">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15438">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15439">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15439">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15440">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15440">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15441">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15441">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15442">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15442">Example</span></span>

```c
/* Hide widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_hide(&my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” is hidden. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_last_child_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15479">gx_widget_last_child_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15479">gx_widget_last_child_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-last-child-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15480">Återgå pekaren till den senaste underordnade widgeten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15480">Return pointer to last child widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15481">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15481">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_last_child_get(
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15482">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15482">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15483">GUIX har en trädstrukturerad lista över överordnade och underordnade widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15483">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15484">Den här tjänsten returnerar en pekare till den sista underordnade widgeten för den överordnade widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15484">This service returns a pointer to the last child widget of the parent.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15485">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15485">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15486">**överordnad** Pekare till överordnad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15486">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15487">**widget_return** Pekare för att returnera widget-pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15487">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15488">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15488">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15489">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) returnerad pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15489">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15490">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig widget-pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15490">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15491">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Ogiltig widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15491">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15492">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15492">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15493">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15493">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15494">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15494">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve child widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_last_child_widget(GX_WIDGET *parent)
{

      GX_WIDGET *child;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_last_child_get(parent, &child);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
              return child;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_next_sibling_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15501">gx_widget_next_sibling_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15501">gx_widget_next_sibling_get</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-next-sibling-of-current-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15502">Gå tillbaka till nästa nivå för den aktuella widgeten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15502">Return pointer to next sibling of current widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15503">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15503">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_next_sibling_get(
    GX_WIDGET *current,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15504">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15504">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15505">GUIX har en trädstrukturerad lista över överordnade och underordnade widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15505">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15506">Den här tjänsten returnerar en pekare till nästa nivå för den aktuella widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15506">This service returns a pointer to the next sibling of the current widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15507">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15507">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15508">**aktuell** Pekare till aktuell widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15508">**current** Pointer to current widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15509">**widget_return** Pekare för att returnera widget-pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15509">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15510">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15510">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15511">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) returnerad pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15511">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15512">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Felaktig widget-pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15512">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15513">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Ogiltig widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15513">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15514">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15514">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15515">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15515">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15516">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15516">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve next sibling widget pointer. */

GX_WIDGET *get_next(GX_WIDGET *current)
{
      GX_WIDGET *sibling;
      UINT status;

      status = gx_widget_next_sibling_get(current, &sibling);
      if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
      {
            return sibling;
      }
      return GX_NULL;
}
```

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15547">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15547">Prototype</span></span>

```C

    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID resource_id,
    GX_PIXELMAP **return_pixelmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15548">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15548">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15549">Den här tjänsten hämtar pixelkartan som är associerad med det angivna resurs-ID:t.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15549">This service gets the pixelmap associated with the supplied resource ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15550">Den här tjänsten ska bara anropas för synliga widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15550">This service should only be called for visible widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15551">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15551">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15552">**widget** Pekare till widgetkontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15552">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15553">**pixelmap_id** Resurs-ID för pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15553">**pixelmap_id** Pixelmap resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15554">**return_pixelmap** Pekare till mål pekare för pixelkarta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15554">**return_pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap destination pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15555">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15555">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15556">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad pixelkarta hämta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15556">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15557">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Ogiltigt resurs-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15557">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15558">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget-arbetsytan är inte giltig eller widgeten är osynlig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15558">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Widget canvas not valid or widget is invisible</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15559">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15559">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15560">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15560">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15561">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15561">Allowed From</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15563">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15563">Example</span></span>

```c
GX_PIXELMAP *my_pixelmap;

/* Get the pixelmap associated with MY_PIXELMAP_ID. */
status = gx_widget_pixelmap_get(widget, MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID,
                                &my_pixelmap);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, “my_pixelmap” contains the pixemap pointer. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_shift"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15642">gx_widget_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15642">gx_widget_shift</span></span>
### <a name="shift-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15643">Skift-widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15643">Shift widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15644">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15644">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_shift(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    GX_VALUE x_shift,
    GX_VALUE y_shift, 
    GX_BOOL mark_dirty);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15645">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15645">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15646">Den här tjänsten flyttar widgeten och markerar den eventuellt som felig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15646">This service shifts the widget and optionally marks it as dirty.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15647">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15647">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15648">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15648">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15649">**x_shift** Antal bildpunkter som ska flyttas på x-axeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15649">**x_shift** Number of pixels to shift on x-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15650">**y_shift** Antal bildpunkter som ska flyttas på y-axeln</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15650">**y_shift** Number of pixels to shift on y-axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15651">**mark_dirty** GX_TRUE för att indikera en grov, GX_FALSE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15651">**mark_dirty** GX_TRUE to indicate dirty, otherwise GX_FALSE</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15652">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15652">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15653">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad widgetväxling GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15653">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget shift GX_CALLER_ERROR (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15654">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15654">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15655">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15655">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15656">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15656">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15657">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15657">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15658">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15658">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Shift widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_shift(&my_widget, 10, 20, GX_FALSE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” has been shifted. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_show"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15695">gx_widget_show</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15695">gx_widget_show</span></span>
### <a name="show-widget"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15696">Visa widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15696">Show widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15697">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15697">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_show(GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15698">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15698">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15699">Den här tjänsten visar widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15699">This service shows the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15700">Widgeten blir bara synlig om den är kopplad till en överordnad och den överordnade widgeten också visas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15700">The widget will become visible only if it is attached to a parent and the parent widget is also visible.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15701">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15701">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15702">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15702">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15703">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15703">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15704">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Widgeten har lyckats</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15704">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget show</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15705">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15705">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15706">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15706">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15707">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15707">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

```C
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status)
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15798">gx_widget_status_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15798">gx_widget_status_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15799">Hämta widgetstatus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15799">Get widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15800">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15800">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    ULONG *return_status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15801">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15801">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15802">Den här tjänsten hämtar statusflaggor från widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15802">This service retrieves status flags from the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15803">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15803">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15804">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15804">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15805">**return_status** Pekar på den status som returneras</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15805">**return_status** Pointer to the status being returned</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15806">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15806">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15807">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Status för lyckad widget får</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15807">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15808">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15808">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15809">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15809">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15810">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15810">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15811">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15811">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15812">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15812">Example</span></span>

```C
ULONT get_status;

/* Retrieve status flag from widget “my_widget”. */ status =
gx_widget_status_get(&my_widget, &get_status);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the status from widget “my_widget” is
saved to “get_status”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15848">gx_widget_status_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15848">gx_widget_status_remove</span></span>
### <a name="remove-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15849">Ta bort widgetstatus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15849">Remove widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15850">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15850">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_remove(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15851">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15851">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15852">Den här tjänsten tar bort de angivna statusflaggorna från widgetens interna statusvariabel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15852">This service removes the specified status flags from the widgets internal status variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15853">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15853">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15854">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15854">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15855">**status** Status att ta bort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15855">**status** Status to remove</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15856">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15856">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15857">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad widgetstatusborttagning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15857">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status removal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15858">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15858">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15859">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15859">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15860">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15860">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15861">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15861">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15862">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15862">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove status of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_remove(&my_widget, status_to_remove);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the status flags are removed from the
widget “my_widget”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_status_test"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15899">gx_widget_status_test</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15899">gx_widget_status_test</span></span>
### <a name="test-widget-status"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15900">Status för testwidget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15900">Test widget status</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15901">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15901">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_status_test(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG status,
    GX_BOOL *return_test);
```
### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15902">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15902">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15903">Den här tjänsten testar statusflaggorna för den angivna widgeten och lagrar resultatet i minnet som "return_test".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15903">This service tests the status flags of the specified widget and stores the result in the memory pointed by “return_test”.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15904">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15904">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15905">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15905">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15906">**status** Status att testa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15906">**status** Status to test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15907">**return_status** Pekare till mål för testresultat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15907">**return_status** Pointer to destination for result of test</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15908">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15908">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15909">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Statustest för lyckad widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15909">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget status test</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15910">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15910">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15911">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15911">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15912">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15912">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15913">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15913">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15914">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15914">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BOOL test_result;

/* Test status of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_status_test(&my_widget, status_to_test,
                              &test_result);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the widget “my_widget” status was tested
and the result in “test_result”. */
```

## <a name="gx_widget_string_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15923">gx_widget_string_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15923">gx_widget_string_get</span></span>
### <a name="retrieve-string-associated-with-a-visible-widget-and-string-id-deprecated"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15924">Hämta sträng som är associerad med en synlig widget och sträng-ID (inaktuell)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15924">Retrieve string associated with a visible widget and string ID (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15925">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15925">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_string_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID string_id,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR **string);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15926">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15926">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15927">Den här tjänsten är inaktuell till förmån för gx_widget_string_get_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15927">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_widget_string_get_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15928">Den här tjänsten returnerar strängtabellposten för det angivna sträng-ID-värdet.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15928">This service returns the string table entry for the given string ID value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15929">Den här tjänsten liknar gx_display_string_get, förutom att den aktiva visningen fastställs automatiskt i stället för att skickas av anroparen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15929">This service is similar to gx_display_string_get, except the active display is determined automatically rather than being passed in by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15930">Den här tjänsten kan bara användas för widgetar som är synliga, dvs. visningen som är associerad med den här widgeten är känd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15930">This service can only be used for widgets which are visible, i.e. the display associated with this widget is known.</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_style_add"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15966">gx_widget_style_add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15966">gx_widget_style_add</span></span>
### <a name="add-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15967">Lägg till widgetformat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15967">Add widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15968">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15968">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_add(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15969">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15969">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15970">Den här tjänsten lägger till ett format i widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15970">This service adds a style to the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15971">Dessutom vidtas följande åtgärder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15971">In addition, the following actions are taken.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15972">Om det tillagda formatet GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT läggs GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT till.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15972">If the added style is GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15973">Om det tillagda formatet GX_STYLE_ENABLED läggs statusen GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE till.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15973">If the added style is GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be added.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15974">Om widgeten visas blir den automatiskt ogiltig och köas för omritning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15974">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15975">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15975">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15976">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15976">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15977">**style** Nytt format att lägga till.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15977">**style** New style to add.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15978">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widgetspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15978">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15979">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15979">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15980">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style add</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15980">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style add</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15981">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15981">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15982">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15982">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15983">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15983">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15984">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15984">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-15985">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-15985">Initialization and threads</span></span>

```C

```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16026">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16026">Description</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_style_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16075">gx_widget_style_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16075">gx_widget_style_remove</span></span>
### <a name="remove-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16076">Ta bort widgetformat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16076">Remove widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16077">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16077">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_remove(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16078">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16078">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16079">Den här tjänsten tar bort ett format från widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16079">This service removes a style from the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16080">Dessutom vidtas följande åtgärder.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16080">In addition, the following actions are taken.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16081">Om det borttagna formatet GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT tas statusen GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT bort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16081">If the removed style is GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16082">Om det borttagna formatet GX_STYLE_ENABLED tas GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE bort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16082">If the removed style is GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16083">Om widgeten visas ogiltigförklaras den automatiskt och läggs i kö för omritning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16083">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16084">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16084">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16085">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16085">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16086">**style (stil)** Format som ska tas bort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16086">**style** Style to remove.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16087">**Bilaga D** innehåller fördefinierade allmänna format för alla widgetar samt widgetspecifika format.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16087">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16088">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16088">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16089">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Bort ett lyckat widgetformat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16089">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget style remove</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16090">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16090">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16091">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16091">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16092">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16092">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16093">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16093">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16094">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16094">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16095">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16095">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Remove style from widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_style_remove(&my_widget,
                                GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the GX_STYLE_BORDER_RAISED style was removed from the widget “my_widget”.*/
```

## <a name="gx_widget_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16132">gx_widget_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16132">gx_widget_style_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-widget-style"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16133">Ange widgetformat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16133">Set widget style</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16134">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16134">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_style_set(
    GX_WIDGET *widget, 
    ULONG style)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16135">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16135">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16136">Den här tjänsten anger ett format till widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16136">This service sets a style to the widget.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16137">Om set-formatet GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT läggs statusen GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT, annars tas statusen bort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16137">If the set style includes GX_STYLE_TRANSPARENT, status GX_STATUS_TRANSPARENT will be added, otherwise the status will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16138">Om set-formatet GX_STYLE_ENABLED läggs statusen GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE, annars tas statusen bort.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16138">If the set style includes GX_STYLE_ENABLED, status GX_STATUS_SELECTABLE will be added, otherwise the status will be removed.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16139">Om widgeten visas blir den automatiskt ogiltig och köas för omritning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16139">If the widget is visible, it is automatically invalidated and queued for redrawing.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16140">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16140">Parameters</span></span>

## <a name="gx_widget_top_visible_child_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16299">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16299">gx_widget_top_visible_child_find</span></span>
### <a name="return-pointer-to-visible-child-that-is-top-of-z-order"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16300">Returnera pekaren till synlig underordnad som är överst i Z-ordningen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16300">Return pointer to visible child that is top of Z order</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16301">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16301">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_top_visible_child_find(
    GX_WIDGET *current,
    GX_WIDGET **widget_return);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16302">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16302">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16303">GUIX har en trädstrukturerad lista över överordnade och underordnade widgetar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16303">GUIX maintains a tree structured list of parent and child widgets.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16304">Den här tjänsten returnerar en pekare till den översta synliga underordnade till den aktuella widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16304">This service returns a pointer to the topmost visible child of the current widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16305">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16305">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16306">**aktuell** Pekare till aktuell widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16306">**current** Pointer to current widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16307">**widget_return** Pekare för att returnera widget-pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16307">**widget_return** Pointer to return widget pointer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16308">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16308">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16309">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) returnerad pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16309">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) pointer returned</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16310">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Felaktig widget-pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16310">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid widget pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16311">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Ogiltig widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16311">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Invalid widget</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16312">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16312">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16313">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16313">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16314">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16314">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Retrieve topmost visible widget on the display */

GX_WIDGET *get_top_window(GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root)
{
    GX_WIDGET *top_window;
    UINT status;

    status = gx_widget_top_visible_child_find(root, &top_window);
    if (status == GX_SUCCESS)
    {
        return top_window;
    }
    return GX_NULL;
}
```

## <a name="gx_widget_width_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16372">gx_widget_width_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16372">gx_widget_width_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-widget-width"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16373">Hämta widgetbredd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16373">Get widget width</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16374">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16374">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_widget_width_get(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_VALUE *return_width)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16375">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16375">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16376">Den här tjänsten hämtar widgetens bredd.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16376">This service gets the width of the widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16377">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16377">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16378">**widget** Pekare till widget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16378">**widget** Pointer to widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16379">**return_width** Pekare till mål för widgetbredd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16379">**return_width** Pointer to destination for widget width</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16380">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16380">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16381">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad widgetbredd get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16381">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful widget width get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16382">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16382">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16383">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16383">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16384">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16384">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16385">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16385">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
GX_VALUE my_widget_width;

/* Get width of widget “my_widget”. */
status = gx_widget_width_get(&my_widget, &my_widget_width);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the width of widget “my_widget” is in “my_widget_width”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_client_height_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16424">gx_window_client_height_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16424">gx_window_client_height_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-window-client-height"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16425">Hämta fönsterklientens höjd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16425">Get window client height</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16426">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16426">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_client_height_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_VALUE *return_height);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16427">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16427">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16428">Den här tjänsten hämtar klientens höjd för fönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16428">This service gets the client height of the window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16429">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16429">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16430">**fönster** Pekare till fönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16430">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16431">**return_height** Pekare till mål för klientens höjd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16431">**return_height** Pointer to destination for client height</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16432">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16432">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16433">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckade fönsterklienthöjd get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16433">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window client height get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16434">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16434">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16435">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16435">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16436">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16436">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16437">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16437">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16438">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16438">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RECTANGLE my_client_height;

/* Get client height of “my_window”. */

                                     &my_client_height);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the window “my_window” client height is contained in “my_client_height”. */
```

```C

    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_VALUE x_scroll,
    GX_VALUE y_scroll);
```

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16464">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Bläddra i fönsterklienten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16464">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window client scroll</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16465">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16465">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16468">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Rullningsvärden är inte giltiga</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16468">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Scroll value(s) not valid</span></span>

## <a name="gx_window_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16546">gx_window_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16546">gx_window_create</span></span>
### <a name="create-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16547">Fönstret Skapa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16547">Create window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16548">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16548">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_create(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    ULONG style,
    USHORT window_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16549">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16549">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16550">Den här tjänsten skapar ett fönster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16550">This service creates a window.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16551">GX_WINDOW härleds från GX_WIDGET och stöder alla gx_widget API-tjänster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16551">GX_WINDOW is derived from GX_WIDGET and supports all gx_widget API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16552">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16552">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16553">**fönster** Pekare till fönsterkontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16553">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16554">**namn** Fönstrets logiska namn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16554">**name** Logical name of window</span></span>

### <a name="draw-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16586">Fönstret Rita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16586">Draw window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16587">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16587">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_window_draw(GX_WINDOW *window);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16588">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16588">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16589">Den här tjänsten ritar ett fönster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16589">This service draws a window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16590">Den här tjänsten anropas vanligtvis internt under arbetsyteuppdateringen, men kan även anropas från anpassade fönsterritningsfunktioner.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16590">This service is normally called internally during canvas refresh, but can also be called from custom window drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="process-window-event"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16614">Processfönsterhändelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16614">Process window event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16615">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16615">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_event_process(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16616">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16616">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16617">Den här tjänsten bearbetar en händelse för det här fönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16617">This service processes an event for this window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16618">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16618">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16619">**fönster** Pekare till fönsterkontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16619">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16620">**händelse** Pekare till händelse att bearbeta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16620">**event** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16621">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16621">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16622">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad bearbetning av fönsterhändelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16622">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window event processing</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16623">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16623">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16624">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16624">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16625">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16625">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16626">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16626">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16627">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16627">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16628">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16628">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic window event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_window_event_process(GX_WINDOW *window,
                                 GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
        case xyz:
            /* Insert custom event handling here */
            break;
        default:
            /* Pass all other events to the default window
            event processing */
            status = gx_window_event_process(window, event);
            break;
        }
        return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_execute"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16644">gx_window_execute</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16644">gx_window_execute</span></span>
### <a name="modally-execute-a-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16645">Kör ett fönster modally</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16645">Modally execute a window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16646">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16646">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_execute(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    ULONG *return_ptr)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16647">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16647">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16648">Den här tjänsten kör ett fönster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16648">This service modally executes a window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16649">Alla användarindata (pennhändelser osv.) utanför fönstrets klientområde ignoreras.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16649">Any user input (pen events, etc.) outside of the window client area will be ignored.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16650">Observera att den här funktionen går in i en kontinuerlig blockerande körningsloop och inte återgår till anroparen förrän modellkörningen avslutas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16650">Note that this function enters a continuous blocking execution loop, and does not return to the caller until the model execution is terminated.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16651">Modal körning avslutas när händelsebearbetningen för en mottagen händelse returnerar ett statusvärde som inte är noll eller när gx_window_close API-funktionen anropas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16651">Modal execution terminates when the event processing for any received event returns a non-zero status value, or when the gx_window_close API function is invoked.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16652">Returkoden för händelsebearbetning som inte är noll returneras till anroparen via return_ptr skickas till det här API:et</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16652">The non-zero event processing return code is returned to the caller through the return_ptr passed into this API</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16653">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16653">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16654">**fönster** Pekare till fönsterkontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16654">**window** Pointer to window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16655">**return_ptr** Plats för att spara avslutsstatus för modal körning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16655">**return_ptr** Location to save modal execution exit status.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16656">Kan vara GX_NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16656">May be GX_NULL.</span></span>

### <a name="process-event-for-the-root-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16733">Bearbeta händelse för rotfönstret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16733">Process event for the root window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16734">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16734">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_root_create(
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root_window,
    GX_EVENT *event)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16735">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16735">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16736">Den här tjänsten bearbetar händelser för det angivna rotfönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16736">This service processes events for the specified root window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16737">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16737">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16738">**root_window** Pekare till rotfönstrets kontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16738">**root_window** Pointer to root window control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16739">**händelse** Pekare till den händelse som ska bearbetas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16739">**event** Pointer to the event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16740">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16740">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16741">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Korrekt bearbetad rotfönsterhändelse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16741">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully processed root window event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16742">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16742">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16743">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16743">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16744">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16744">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16745">Trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16745">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16746">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16746">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic root window event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_root_window_event_process(GX_ROOT_WINDOW *root,
                                      GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;
    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default root window
            event processing */
        status = gx_window_root_event_process(root, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}
```

## <a name="gx_window_root_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16762">gx_window_root_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16762">gx_window_root_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-root-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16763">Hitta rotfönstret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16763">Find root window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16764">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16764">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_root_find(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT **return_root_window);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16765">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16765">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16766">Den här tjänsten hittar rotfönstret för den angivna widgeten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16766">This service finds the root window for the specified widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16767">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16767">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16768">**widget** Pekare till widgetkontrollblock</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16768">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16769">**return_root_window** Pekare till mål för rotfönstret som hittas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16769">**return_root_window** Pointer to destination for found root window</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16770">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16770">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16771">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad rotfönsters find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16771">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful root window find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16772">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) Rotfönstret finns inte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16772">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) Root window not exist</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16773">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16773">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16774">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16774">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16775">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16775">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16776">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16776">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16777">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16777">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Find root window associated with window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_root_find(&my_window, &root_window);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “root_window” contains the root window for window “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_scroll_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16793">gx_window_scroll_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16793">gx_window_scroll_info_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-window-scroll-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16794">Hämta information om fönsterrullning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16794">Get window scroll info</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16795">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16795">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_scroll_info_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *return_scroll_info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16796">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16796">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16797">Den här tjänsten hämtar rullningsinformationen för fönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16797">This service gets the window scroll information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16798">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16798">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16799">**fönster** Pekare till fönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16799">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16800">**style (stil)** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL eller GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16800">**style** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL or GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16801">**return_scroll_info** Pekare till mål för rullningsinformation.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16801">**return_scroll_info** Pointer to destination for scroll info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16802">Det överordnade fönstret initierar den här strukturen för att informera rullningslisten för det överordnade fönstrets totala storlek, visningsbart område och inkrement och gränser för rullning.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16802">The parent window initializes this structure to inform the scrollbar of the parent window total size, viewable area, and scrolling increment and limits.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16803">Standardimplementering använder Windows-klientområdet som visningsbart område och bläddrar efter bildpunkter, men anpassad fönsterimplementering kan använda rullningsparametrarna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16803">The default implementation uses the windows client area as the viewable area and scrolls by pixels, but customized window implementation can utilize the scroll parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16804">**Bilaga I** innehåller definitionen av GX_SCROLL_INFO struktur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16804">**Appendix I** contains the definition of the GX_SCROLL_INFO structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16805">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16805">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16806">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Information om lyckad fönsterrullning hämta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16806">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window scroll info get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16807">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16807">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16808">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16808">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16809">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Ogiltig typ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16809">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid type</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16810">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16810">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16811">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16811">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16812">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16812">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLL_INFO scroll_info;

/* Get scroll information for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_scroll_info_get(&my_window,
                    GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL, &scroll_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “scroll_info” contains the scroll information for window “my_window”. */
```
