## <a name="gx_window_scrollbar_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16828">gx_window_scrollbar_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16828">gx_window_scrollbar_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-window-scrollbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16829">Hitta rullningslisten för fönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16829">Find window scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16830">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16830">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_scrollbar_find(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    USHORT type,
    GX_SCROLLBAR **return_scrollbar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16831">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16831">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16832">Den här tjänsten hittar rullningslisten för det angivna fönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16832">This service finds the scrollbar for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16833">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16833">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16834">**fönster** Pekare till fönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16834">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16835">**typ** GX_TYPE_VERTICAL_SCROLL eller GX_TYPE_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16835">**type** GX_TYPE_VERTICAL_SCROLL or GX_TYPE_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16836">**return_scrollbar** Pekare till mål för rullningslisten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16836">**return_scrollbar** Pointer to destination for scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16837">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16837">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16838">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Hitta rullningslisten i fönstret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16838">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window scrollbar find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16839">**Rullningslisten** GX_NOT_FOUND (0x09) hittades inte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16839">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Scrollbar not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16840">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16840">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16841">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16841">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16842">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Ogiltig typ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16842">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid type</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16843">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16843">Allowed From</span></span>

```C

                 GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL, &my_scrollbar);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “my_scrollbar” contains the horizontal scrollbar for window “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_wallpaper_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16861">gx_window_wallpaper_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16861">gx_window_wallpaper_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-window-wallpaper"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16862">Hämta skrivbordsunderlägg för fönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16862">Get window wallpaper</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16863">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16863">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_wallpaper_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID *return_wallpaper_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16864">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16864">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16865">Den här tjänsten hämtar skrivbordsunderlägget för det angivna fönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16865">This service gets the wallpaper for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16866">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16866">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16867">**fönster** Pekare till fönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16867">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16868">**return_wallpaper_id** Pekare till mål för resurs-ID för skrivbordsunderlägg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16868">**return_wallpaper_id** Pointer to destination for resource ID of wallpaper</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16869">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16869">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16870">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Fönsterbakgrund hämta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16870">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window wallpaper get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16871">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16871">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16872">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16872">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16873">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16873">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16874">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16874">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16875">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16875">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RESOURCE_ID my_window_wallpaper;

/* Get wallpaper for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_wallpaper_get(&my_window, &my_window_wallpaper);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “my_window_wallpaper” contains the wallpaper resource ID for window “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_wallpaper_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16891">gx_window_wallpaper_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16891">gx_window_wallpaper_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-window-wallpaper"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16892">Ange skrivbordsunderlägg för fönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16892">Set window wallpaper</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16893">Prototyp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16893">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_wallpaper_set(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID wallpaper_id,
    GX_BOOL tile);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16894">Description</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16894">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16895">Den här tjänsten anger skrivbordsunderlägget för det angivna fönstret.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16895">This service sets the wallpaper for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16896">Parametrar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16896">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16897">**fönster** Pekare till fönster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16897">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16898">**wallpaper_id** Resurs-ID för skrivbordsunderlägg som ska användas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16898">**wallpaper_id** Resource ID of wallpaper to use</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16899">**panel** Skrivbordsunderlägget är GX_TRUE, annars är skrivbordsunderlägget inte panelerat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16899">**tile** Wallpaper is tiled if GX_TRUE, otherwise wallpaper is not tiled</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16900">Returvärden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16900">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16901">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Lyckad fönsterbakgrundsuppsättning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16901">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window wallpaper set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16902">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Ogiltig anropare för den här funktionen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16902">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16903">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Ogiltig pekare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16903">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16904">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget är inte giltig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16904">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16905">Tillåts från</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16905">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16906">Initiering och trådar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16906">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="01e9c-16907">Exempel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="01e9c-16907">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set wallpaper for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_wallpaper_set(&my_window,
                                 MY_WALLPAPER_RESOURCE_ID,
                                 GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the wallpaper for window “my_window” is set. */
```
